[\[1a\]]
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]{D3855}#]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_ma d+h+yA [#]ma ka hr-i [#]da ya kA ri kA[#]/_bod skad du/_dbu ma'i snying po'i tshig le'ur byas pa/[ #]'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang gis
[\[1b.2\]]de nyid rab brtag min/_/rnam shes bya min gzhi ma yin/_/mtshon min brtag min rig bya min/_/skye 'jig med cing bde ba dang /_/rnam brtag ma yin snang ba med[#]/_/mtshan ma med cing gsal
[\[1b.3\]]byed med/_/gnyis min gnyis med ma yin dang /_/zhi dang blo 'jug spangs pa dang /_/yi ge med pa yi ge yis/_/thugs rje nyid kyis bstan mdzad pa/_/ston pa ma nor nyid gsung ba/_/de
[\[1b.4\]]la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/gzhan don bsgrub phyir brtul zhugs kyis/_/byang chub chen por blos byas rnams/_/de nyid bdud rtsir gzung [#]ba'i phyir/_/nus pas cung zhig brjod par bya/_/byang
[\[1b.5\]]chub sems ni mi gtong dang /_/thub pa'i brtul zhugs yang dag brtan[#]/_/de nyid shes pa tshol [#]ba ni/_/don kun sgrub [#]pa'i spyod pa yin/_/byams pa dang ni snying rje dang /_/shes pa chen pos
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]brgyan pa yi/_/sangs rgyas sa bon byang chub sems/_/de phyir mkhas pas de mi gtang [#]/_/blo ldan snying stobs che ba dang /_/gzhan gyi sdug bsngal mi bzod cing /_/yang dag
[\[2a.2\]]brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang /_/mthu dang ldan zhing mkhas pas ni/_/shes rab snang ba med pa yi/_/'jig rten kun la blta byas nas/_/'khor ba mi gtsang sa 'og nas/_/bdag nyid brgal bas
[\[2a.3\]]bsgral bar rigs/_/gang zhig shes rab mtshon rnon gyis/_/'ching ba kun bcad grol gyur pa/_/snying rje'i bdag nyid ldan pa yis/_/gang phyir mgon med sdug bsngal ba/_/'khor ba'i btson ra mi
[\[2a.4\]]bzad par/_/'dod chags la sogs sgrog gis bcings/_/bag med pa yi chang 'thungs [#]nas/_/gti mug gnyid kyis log pa dang /_/rnam par rtog pa'i chom rkun gyis/_/dge tshogs ma lus brkus
[\[2a.5\]]pa dag_/gal te grol bar mi byed na/_/mthu ldan mthu ni ci la phan/_/gang zhig lag pa'i mthus bsgrubs pa/_/'dod pas bskyed pa'i bde chung yang /_/gcig pu gdu bas za byed pa/_/de yang mkhas pas
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]smad 'gyur [#]na/_/'khor los sgyur dang dbang po dang /_/tshangs pa la yang rab bkod [#]pa/_/sred pa rnam par gcod pa dang /_/thabs kyi sgo nas thun mong ba/_/len dang zad dang mthar thug dang /_/sdug la sogs pas mi 'gyur zhing /_/sdug bsngal ma lus zhi byed pa'i/_/
[\[2b.2\]]de nyid don rtogs [#]bdud rtsi ci/_/gzhan yang sngon chad nyon mongs pa'i/_/gdon gyis brlams pa bdag [#]gis ni/_/rma la 'gyur byed 'debs pa bzhin/_/sdug bsngal nad pa gang sdug byas/_/skye ba gzhan du gang dag gis/_/byams dang bsnyen bkur phan pa byas/_/de
[\[2b.3\]]la lan du phan gdags pa/_/mya ngan bzla las gzhan ci yod/_/gzhan don byed las byung ba yi/_/dga' bas sems dga' mkhas pa dag_/ral gri rab tu 'bar 'dra ba'i/_/srid pa dag gis gnod [#]mi 'gyur/_/tshul khrims 'chal pa mi byed pas/_/ngan 'gro'i
[\[2b.4\]]sgo kun bcad pa'i phyir/_/stong nyid lta ba goms byas pas/_/nyon mongs 'jug pa bcom phyir ro/_/mkhas pa bsod nams byas pa yis/_/'gro drug bskyed [#]tshal dus ston ltar/_/mthong ba srid pa'i btson ra yis/_/skrag par 'gyur ba yod ma yin/_/skyon mthong phyir ni
[\[2b.5\]]srid par min/_/brtse phyir mya ngan 'das mi gnas/_/gzhan don bsgrub phyir brtul zhugs can/_/srid pa na yang gnas par byed/_/'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das/_/gnyis dang gnyis min mi dmigs pa'i/_/mkhas pa gar yang mi gnas shing /_/srid pa na yang
[\[2b.6\]]gnas par byed/_/byang lag rin chen bdun phyug cing /_/yon tan dpag med 'byung ba'i gnas/_/lha dang lha min phyag byas pa/_/dam chos 'khor lo bskor brnyes shing /_/mu tig 'pho 'dra'i grags pa dang /_/ston zla nya ba'i dri med pa'i/_/'od zer lta bu'i gsung dag
[\[2b.7\]]gis/_/phyogs bcu dag ni rgyas mdzad la/_/dkon mchog gsum gdung gnas bya'i phyir/_/yon tan 'byung gnas dam pa'i sras/_/lha klu la sogs spyi gtsug gis/_/bstan pa [#]mchod pa bzhag [#]mdzad de/_/rang dang gzhan don mdzad pa'i phyir/_/de dag mya ngan 'das legs
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]'das/_/de las gzhan gang lus bcud chad/_/de yang mya ngan 'das pa yin/_/wa ni glang chen dregs pa yi/_/glad [#]pa 'gems shing dbye mi sems/_/gdol pa rgya mtsho'i mthas klas pa'i/_/sa yi dkyil 'khor bskyang mi sems/_/de bzhin sems can
[\[3a.2\]]dman pa yang /_/zab cing bla med rgya che ba/_/yon tan bgrang [#]'das 'byung ba'i gnas/_/sangs rgyas nyid la re ba'ang med/_/gzhal yas rmad byung bsam mi khyab/_/snang ba thams cad zil gnon pa/_/rdzogs sangs yon tan rin chen la/_/su zhig yid kyis sems mi
[\[3a.3\]]bskyed/_/gzhan don byed pa dpa' ba dang /_/skyes bu chen po'i tshul ldan pa/_/su zhig 'khor mtha' med par yang /_/nyin gcig lta bur gnas mi byed/_/mkhas pa gang zhig 'das gyur kyang /_/gang gis gtam gzhi 'phel 'gyur ba/_/'phags pa gzhan don mdzad
[\[3a.4\]]rnams kyi/_/lam gyi rjes su 'jug mi byed/_/su zhig chu shing dbu ba ltar/_/snying po med pa'i lus 'di dag_/gzhan phan rkyen du sgrub byed pas/_/lhun po snying por sgrub mi byed/_/ya rabs [#]snying rje ldan pas ni/_/skad cig re re [#]rga shi dang /_/nad kyi gzhir gyur lus dag ni/_/
[\[3a.5\]]gzhan la bde skyid [#]gzhir byed do/_/dam chos sgron ma [#]dang bcas [#]la/_/mi khom brgyad spangs khom pa 'di/_/skyes bu chen po'i spyod pa yis/_/'bras bu yod par bya ba'i rigs/_/dbu ma'i snying po las byang chub kyi [#]sems mi gtong [#]ba'i le'u ste dang po'o//_//de ltar
[\[3a.6\]]'gro la phan pa'i phyir/_/byang chub chen por brtan blangs pa/_/tshul dang mthun pa'i lam nyid du/_/rab tu zhugs pa rnam par mdzes/_/de ni byams pa gnod med dang /_/snying rje phan pa bsgrub pa yis/_/dam chos rtogs pa [#]ngoms med dang /_/chos sbyin pa la ser sna med/_/
[\[3a.7\]]drang dang nga rgyal bcom pa dang /_/yid kyis de nyid blta ba dang /_/gzhan skyon rtog [#]la long ba dang /_/rang skyon 'byung bas 'jigs pa yin/_/rtsod dang 'jig rten 'du 'dzi dang /_/'jig rten rgyang pan rgyab kyis phyogs/_/yon tan med la'ang yon tan gyi/_/rgyun [#]rnams skye
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]bar rtag tu gus/_/snying rjes bskyed pa'i sbyin pa dag_/skye bo'i tshogs rnams thams cad kyi/_/sdug bsngal chu bo kun zhi'i phyir/_/thams cad mkhyen nyid 'dod pa skyed[#]/_/tshul khrims dri med chus [#]khrus dang /_/bzod pa'i se ral phreng dkar dang /_/brtson 'grus ral pa'i
[\[3b.2\]]khur bcings dang /_/bsam gtan shes pa lhur len te/_/blo mig legs par bye ba dang /_/bstan bcos 'jig rten shes la mkhas/_/ngo tsha khrel yod gos dang ni/_/des pa'i ska rags 'ching ba yin/_/snying rje'i pags pa gnag 'chang zhing /_/dad pa dri med ril ba
[\[3b.3\]]dang /_/dran pas dbang po'i sgo bsrungs shing /_/brtan pa'i sba stegs stan la 'dug_/theg pa chen po dga' chen gyi/_/dka' thub nags tshal yang dag bsten/_/bsam gtan dga' ba'i 'bras bu za/_/dran pa nyer gzhag spyod yul can/_/zab cing rgya che mdo sde'i mtha'/_/
[\[3b.4\]]'don cing sdig pa bcom pa dang /_/bden pa gnyis la brten pa yi/_/rten cing 'brel 'byung nyi bshad zlos/_/sgrub pa'i me tog bsngags ldan pa/_/phyogs rnams kun du dris khyab pas/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma la/_/nyin gcig bzhin du bsnyen bkur byed/_/so sor rtog pa'i
[\[3b.5\]]me thab tu/_/mi dge'i kun du rtog pa sreg[#]/bla med go 'phang thob bya'i phyir/_/de ltar thub pa'i brtul zhugs spyod/_/dbu ma'i snying po las thub pa'i brtul zhugs la yang dag par bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//_//gang la shes pa'i mig yod pa/_/de la mig yod gzhan ma yin/_/
[\[3b.6\]]des na gang phyir blo ldan dag_/de nyid shes pa tshol [#]ba brtson/_/blo ldan 'jig rten gsum po dag_/thogs [#]med mthong ba long bas kyang /_/blta 'dod thag ring cha phra [#]dang /_/bsgribs pa'i don yang mthong bar 'gyur/_/mig stong pa yang blo med na/_/mig dang ldan pa ma yin te/_/mtho ris
[\[3b.7\]]dang ni byang grol gyi/_/lam dang lam min mi mthong phyir/_/shes rab mig bye mthong ba dang /_/ma mthong khyad par 'dod pa yi/_/'bras bu re ba dug tsher gyi/_/sbyin pa sogs la 'jug mi byed/_/snying rjes thams cad mkhyen pa'i phyir/_/'khor gsum yongs su dag pa yi/_/sbyin
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]la sogs la brtson [#]byed cing /_/de la 'ang yid ni gnas mi byed/_/shes rab bdud rtsi ngoms byed dang /_/sgron ma snang ba thogs [#]med dang /_/thar pa'i khang bzangs them [#]skas dang /_/nyon mongs bud shing sreg [#]pa'i me/_/blo gros de yang bden gnyis la/_/ltos [#]
[\[4a.2\]]nas rnam pa gnyis su 'dod/_/yang dag don rtogs rjes mthun phyir/_/yang dag kun rdzob shes pa yin/_/sbyin dang bsod nams ye shes kyi/_/tshogs rnams yongs su rdzogs byed dang /_/rgyu de dag gi 'bras bu dang /_/'brel dang mtshan nyid la sogs shes/_/byams dang snying rje
[\[4a.3\]]bsgom [#]pa dang /_/sems can sdud dang smin byed dang /_/skye mched bcu gnyis brten pa yi/_/shes rab brdar btags shes par bya/_/rtog pa'i dra ba ma lus pa/_/dgag pa sgrub par byed pa dang /_/zhi dang so so rang rig dang /_/rnam rtog med cing yi ge med/_/gcig nyid tha dad
[\[4a.4\]]nyid bral dang /_/mkha' ltar dri med de nyid la/_/'jug pa med pas 'jug pa yi/_/shes rab don dam shes pa yin/_/yang dag kun rdzob rnams kyi skas/_/med par yang dag khang pa yi/_/steng du 'gro bar bya ba ni/_/mkhas la rung ba ma yin no/_/de nyid khang bzangs [#]thog 'dzeg
[\[4a.5\]]pa/_/yang dag kun rdzob them pa'i skas/_/med par rung ba ma yin pa/_/gang gi phyir ba [#]de phyir ro/_/mkhas pas sems ni mnyam gzhag phyir/_/mngon par brtson pa nyid du bya/_/de bzhin thos byung shes pa la/_/de las gzhan shes rgyu [#]phyir ro/_/ji ltar chu rnyog g.yo ba la/_/bzhin ni
[\[4a.6\]]mthong bar mi 'gyur ba/_/de ltar sems mnyam ma bzhag dang /_/sgrib pas bsgribs la de nyid do/_/yid kyi glang po log 'gro ba/_/dmigs pa'i ka ba brtan po la/_/dran pa'i thag pas nges bcings nas/_/shes rab lcags kyus rim dbang bya/_/rgod pa mi rtag la sogs pa/_/yid la byed pas
[\[4a.7\]]zhi bar bya/_/zhum pa dmigs pa rgya chen dag_/bsgom pas spang ba [#]nyid du bya/_/g.yengs pas g.yeng ba'i mtshan ma la/_/nyes dmigs blta bas bsdu bar bya/_/zhum pa yang ni brtson 'grus kyi/_/phan yon mthong bas gzengs bstod bya/_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gi_/rdzab dris sbags
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]shing ma bsdams pa/_/mi sdug byams pa rten 'byung ba'i/_/chu dag gis ni bkru bar bya/_/dben zhing mi g.yo zhi ba dang /_/dmigs pa dag la gzhol ba dang /_/las su rung zhing mnyen shes nas/_/de la legs par btang snyoms bya/_/blo gros mnyam gzhag 'og tu ni/_/tha snyad sgo nas
[\[4b.2\]]gzung [#]bya yi/_/chos rnams dngos po 'di dag la/_/shes rab kyis ni 'di ltar brtag_/blo yis rnam par dpyad pa na/_/'di dag don dam yod dam ci/_/gal te yin na 'di de nyid/_/gal te gzhan na de btsal bya/_/phyogs su lhung bas sems gdungs pas/_/zhi ba nam yang
[\[4b.3\]]rtogs [#]mi 'gyur/_/'dus byas 'dus ma byas chos ni/_/phung po skye mched khams rnams so[#]/_/nyon mongs sgrib pa spang ba'i phyir/_/nyan thos rnams la rab tu bshad/_/nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib dri ma/_/spang phyir snying rje ldan rnams la/_/rag [#]phyir dang po kho nar ni/_/gzugs kyi phung
[\[4b.4\]]po brtag par bya/_/de la'ang dang por 'byung ba rnams/_/ji skad bstan pa'i gtan tshigs kyis/_/'dir ni sa la sogs pa dag_/don dam par na 'byung ba yi/_/ngo bo nyid min byas phyir dang /_/rgyu ldan sogs phyir shes pa bzhin/_/sa ni sra ba'i ngo bo min[#]/_/'byung ba nyid phyir rlung bzhin
[\[4b.5\]]no/_/sa yis [#]las ni 'dzin ma yin/_/byas pa nyid phyir chu bzhin no/_/med kyang gal te de nyid du/_/sa yi dngos nyid sra snyam na/_/rnal 'byor pa dag de la ni/_/'byung dang 'bying ba mi rigs so/_/bsam gtan pa yi bsam gtan mthus/_/sa ni gsher ba nyid mi rigs/_/ngo
[\[4b.6\]]bo nyid la 'gyur med phyir/_/yang na de sra nyid ma yin/_/de bzhin chu dang me rlung dag_/gsher la sogs pa'i dngos nyid min/_/de dag las kyang sdud pa dang /_/smin dang g.yo bar byed mi rigs/_/rlung la sogs pa kun rdzob tu/_/yon tan mnyam par mi 'dod min/_/lus
[\[4b.7\]]kyi dbang pos dmigs phyir dang /_/'byung ba yin phyir sa bzhin no/_/sa la sogs pa rdzas yod min/_/tshogs pa'i yan lag min med phyir/_/gang dag ji skad bstan pa de/_/rdzas yod ma mthong nags tshal bzhin/_/sa la sogs pa yul gyi blo/_/_
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]de yang rdzas yod ma yin 'dod/_/rgyu dang bcas phyir 'jig pa'i phyir/_/nags tshal la sogs blo bzhin no/_/sa la sogs pa ston pa'i sgra/_/brjod pa rdzas su mi 'dod de/_/mnyam [#]pa yin phyir dmag la sogs/_/ston pa'i sgra dag mi 'dod bzhin/_/pal
[\[5a.2\]]sha pan d+ha la sogs pa/_/nags tshal rtsom pa yin [#]mi 'dod/_/rgyu ldan la sogs gtan tshigs kyis/_/dper na rtsa ba la sogs bzhin/_/yan lag can gyi nags tshal ni/_/pa la sha la sogs brtsams min/_/de dag re rer ma rdzogs phyir/_/yal ga la sogs gang
[\[5a.3\]]yin bzhin/_/nags tshal sgra ni ma nges pa/_/du ma'i rdzas grangs 'jug ma yin/_/khyad par can gyi blos brtag phyir/_/bum bzangs [#]la sogs sgra bzhin no/_/gang phyir gzugs ni don dam du/_/mig gi dbang po'i gzung ba min/_/bsags phyir dper na sgra bzhin dang /_/
[\[5a.4\]]'byung las gyur phyir de nyid bzhin/_/gzugs ni mig gis bzung [#]min te/_/'byung las gyur phyir rang gzugs bzhin/_/bde la sogs 'byung rgyu phyir dang /_/brjod bya yin phyir ro sogs bzhin/_/de bzhin gzugs ni 'byung 'gyur min/_/'byung phyir me la sogs pa bzhin/_/rgyu ldan
[\[5a.5\]]la sogs gtan tshigs kyi[#]/_/yang na sems bzhin shes par bya/_/des ni kha dog dbyibs dang ni/_/bsags dang phra [#]dang rags sogs kyi/_/dbye bas gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dag_/ji snyed rnam par brtags pa rnams/_/ji ltar rigs [#]pa'i sbyor ba yin[#]/_/bkag par khong du chud par
[\[5a.6\]]bya/_/sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg_/dgag pa'i tshul yang de bzhin no/_/mig gi dbang po don dam du/_/gzugs la lta ba [#]ma yin te/_/sems dang sems byung las gzhan phyir/_/dper na ri bo'i [#]dbang po bzhin/_/yang na mig ni [#]don dam du/_/gzugs la lta ba ma yin te/_/rnam
[\[5a.7\]]shes dngos med mi skye'i phyir/_/pags pa dag la sogs pa bzhin/_/mig ni gzugs kyi yul can min/_/rang gi gzugs la mi 'dzin phyir/_/nyan la sogs pa'i dbang po dang /_/gzugs can yin phyir ro sogs bzhin/_/de bzhin lta po mig med pa/_/dpe yang med pas
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]mthong ma yin/_/blta ba'i ngo bo nyid yin [#]pas/_/ji ltar gzugs la blta bar rigs/_/blta ba'i ngo bo nyid min pas/_/ji ltar gzugs la blta bar rigs/_/[#]gal te lta po nyan po na/_/ci phyir de ni nyan por 'gyur/_/de shes nyid dang rtag mi 'dod/_/bsgyur rung khyad par yin
[\[5b.2\]]pa'i phyir/_/gcig nyid ma yin tshul gnyis phyir/_/lus gzhan dag gi gzugs bzhin no/_/de bzhin mig gi dbang po ni/_/gzugs la dmigs pa'i byed mi 'dod/_/yid bral nyid na lta po las/_/gzhan phyir nyan la sogs pa bzhin/_/de ni lta po nyid mi
[\[5b.3\]]rigs/_/mig la sogs la ltos pa'i phyir/_/yid bzhin yongs su 'gyur phyir dang /_/de bzhin gzugs brnyan 'char [#]phyir ro/_/lta po ji ltar yid dang 'dra/_/dbang po gzhan gyis [#]mi mthong phyir/_/yid ni yang dag nyid du na/_/lta bar mi 'dod
[\[5b.4\]]bdag bzhin no/_/de ni lta min tshogs pa dag_/rdzas su med phyir de nyid bzhin/_/byed po nyid rung chos gzhan dag_/mngon par 'grub phyir dril bu bzhin/_/mig ni 'od zer ldan mi rigs/_/dbang po yin phyir dbang gzhan bzhin/_/mtshan mo rgyu ba'i mig 'bras
[\[5b.5\]]snang /_/dbang po snang ba ma yin no/_/mig ni bde sogs bdag nyid min/_/dngos po yin phyir skyes bu bzhin/_/mig ni kun tu song min te/_/g.yo phyir de 'bras la sogs bzhin/_/yang na mig ni kun 'gro min/_/gzhan don nyid phyir bum pa bzhin/_/
[\[5b.6\]]gzugs dmigs 'gyur ba'i rgyu yin phyir/_/dper na gzugs bzhin de bzhin no/_/mig ni me dang ldan ma yin/_/dbang po yin phyir lpags sogs bzhin/_/'byung chen dang sogs bdag nyid ni[#]/_/me shas che ba ma yin no/_/mig ni yul dang phrad ma yin/_/
[\[5b.7\]]dbang po yin phyir yid bzhin dang /_/rgyu phyir rgyu dang ldan pa'i phyir/_/yang na gzugs la sogs pa bzhin/_/sna sogs [#]yul phrad 'dzin mi 'dod/_/phyi don mngon sum 'dzin phyir dang /_/'das dang ma 'ongs mi 'dzin phyir/_/dper na mig gi dbang po bzhin/_/sgrub dang 'dra bar
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]bkag pa'i phyir/_/lus la sogs pa ma nges min/_/mig rna [#]yid kyi mtshan nyid gsum/_/yul dang ma phrad 'dzin ma yin/_/lta ba ji ltar rgyas bshad pas/_/nyan dang snom dang myang ba dang /_/lus kyi dbang po gsal ba dag_/
[\[6a.2\]]nges par khong du chud par bya/_/sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg_/dgag pa'i tshul yang de yin te/_/mkhas pas gzu bo'i blo dag gis/_/ci rigs par ni shes par bya/_/tshor ba don dam nyid du na/_/myang [#]ba'i bdag nyid yin mi rigs/_/rnam shes mtshungs par
[\[6a.3\]]ldan pa'i phyir/_/de las gzhan pa'i sems byung bzhin/_/bde ba phan 'dogs mi 'dod de/_/reg las byung phyir de gzhan bzhin/_/sdug bsngal gnod pa'i bdag nyid min/_/gtan tshigs bstan pas shes par bya/_/sdug min bde min mi 'dod de/_/'bras bu sred phyir
[\[6a.4\]]gzhan bzhin no/_/rnam shes ngo bo nyid kyang ni/_/dgag pa smra bar 'dod phyir ro/_/'du shes 'du byed rnam gnyis dag_/des ni rnam par bshad gyur te/_/mkhas pas gzu bo'i blo dag gis/_/ci rigs par ni shes par bya/_/rnam shes don dam nyid du na/_/dngos po rnam rig dngos
[\[6a.5\]]nyid min/_/dmigs dang bcas phyir 'du shes bzhin/_/yang na 'jig phyir mar me bzhin/_/phung po lnga po rnam dpyad pa'i/_/sgrub pa ji skad bstan pa des/_/phung po rnams kyi khams shes bya/_/skye mched rnams kyang shes par bya/_/skye sogs 'dus byas nyid kyis ni/_/
[\[6a.6\]]mtshan nyid mtshan gzhi [#]nyid mi rigs/_/'dus byas yin phyir rtogs bya'i phyir/_/de las gzhan pa nyid bzhin no/_/dngos rnams mtshan nyid yod pa'i phyir/_/ngo bo nyid yod nyid mi 'dod/_/de phyir gtan tshigs don ma grub/_/don 'gal nyid du'ang gyur pa yin/_/sa yi[#]
[\[6a.7\]]mtshan nyid sa nyid kyis/_/sra ba nyid du mtshon mi rigs/_/lus kyi rnam shes rgyu yin phyir/_/me nyid kyis ni mi rigs bzhin/_/glang gi mtshan nyid glang nyid kyis/_/nog dang lkog shal sogs mi 'dod/_/khyad par can gyi blos brtag phyir/_/dper na bong bu'i mtshan nyid
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]bzhin/_/gcig na ji ltar mtshan nyid yin/_/des ni de nyid mi mtshon phyir/_/gzhan na ji ltar mtshan nyid yin/_/gzhan gyis gzhan nyid mi mtshon phyir/_/ma song ba la don dam du/_/'gro ba yod par mi 'dod de/_/lam yin phyir dang 'gro med phyir/_/dper na ma 'ongs
[\[6b.2\]]lam bzhin no/_/'gom [#]la don dam nyid du na/_/'gro ba yod pa ma yin te/_/song dang ma song ma gtogs par/_/'gom [#]pa rtag tu med phyir ro/_/'gom [#]pa song dang ma song bar/_/brjod pa min la'ang 'gro med de/_/lam yin phyir na 'das pa bzhin/_/yang na
[\[6b.3\]]ma 'ongs lam bzhin no/_/'gro ma [#]grub phyir 'gro po med/_/de phyir de ni 'gro mi 'dod/_/'gro po min par 'gro mi rigs/_/'gro dang bral phyir sngon bzhin no/_/rang las gzhan pa'i don 'brel la/_/'gro po snyam pa'i blo 'di 'dod/_/blo dang sgra rjes 'jug pa'i phyir/_/dbyug
[\[6b.4\]]can bzhin min rjes 'gro med/_/rgyun chags yul gzhan 'byung ba yi[#]/_/'du byed rgyun la brten nas ni/_/me la sogs bzhin 'khrul pa'i 'gro/_/de yang kun rdzob de nyid min/_/ser skya pa yis rnam brtags pa'i/_/'gro po don dam nyid mi rigs/_/tshogs pa rdzas su med
[\[6b.5\]]phyir dang /_/yang na g.yo ba med phyir ro/_/gal te tshogs pa rdzas yod de/_/tshogs byed ma bzung [#]gzung med phyir/_/de yi bdag bzhin de mi rigs/_/de dag rdzas su med phyir ro/_/bya ba lhag ma dgag pa yang /_/phyogs des rab tu bstan pa yin/_/gal te dngos nyid yod 'dod
[\[6b.6\]]de/_/'khor dang thar pa yod phyir na/_/gang tshe ji ltar rnam brtags pa[#]/_/de dag rang bzhin rnam dpyad na/_/nges gzung [#]med pa de yi tshe/_/ji ltar bcings shing gang nas thar/_/ngo bo nyid yod ma yin pa/_/sgyu ma rmi lam lta bu dang /_/rang gi rgyu dang rkyen dbang las/_/bdag
[\[6b.7\]]nyid khyad par 'thob la 'thad/_/ming dang gzugs ni don dam du/_/'khor bar rigs pa ma yin te/_/'dus byas yin phyir phyi rol gyi/_/sa la sogs pa mi 'dod bzhin/_/ming gzugs don dam nyid du na/_/ji ltar yang ni thar mi 'gyur/_/skye dang ldan phyir 'jig pa'i
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]phyir/_/phyi rol chu la sogs pa bzhin/_/gang zag yang dag nyid du ni/_/'khor dang thar par mi 'gyur te/_/gdags bya yin phyir khang pa bzhin/_/brjod bya yin phyir ri dang 'dra/_/yang na gang zag gang zag min/_/rgyu dang ldan phyir bum pa bzhin/_/
[\[7a.2\]]skye dang ldan phyir 'jig pa'i phyir/_/shes bya yin phyir 'ong ba bzhin/_/gang zag brjod du med phyir bas/_/rdzas su yod par mi 'gyur [#]ste/_/dri dang dkar sngor brjod med pa'i/_/mo gsham bus ni ma nges 'gyur/_/de ltar phung po bdag med cing /_/srog med sems can yod min pa/_/
[\[7a.3\]]mkhas pas gzu bo'i blo dag gis/_/ci rigs par ni shes par bya/_/lus dang dbang po'i tshogs rnams la/_/de nyid du na bdag med 'dod/_/rgyu dang ldan phyir ka ba bzhin/_/yang na bsags phyir grog mkhar bzhin/_/dran pa dang ni ngo shes dang /_/shes skye la [#]sogs gtan
[\[7a.4\]]tshigs kyi/_/bdag yod nyid du dam 'cha' ba/_/gtan tshigs rnams ni ma grub nyid/_/gal te dbang bcas lus la ni/_/bdag yod nyid du sgrub byed na/_/gtan tshigs thun mong [#]nyid mi 'gyur/_/rjes su 'gro ba med phyir ro/_/gal te bdag sgra don bzhin te/_/'ga' la nye bar
[\[7a.5\]]gdags pa'i phyir/_/seng ge'i sgra dang 'dra zhe na/_/bdag ni grub pa nyid mi 'gyur/_/ci ste rnam shes yul la ni/_/don bzhin gzhan la sgrub byed na/_/rtag dang kun 'gro sogs bral phyir/_/'gal ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin/_/de phyir gang la'ang don dam du/_/bcings dang thar
[\[7a.6\]]pa yod mi 'dod/_/song dang ma song 'gom [#]pa yis/_/de bzhin sems la lhag ma bshad/_/gang tshe sems ni 'gag pa la/_/mngon du phyogs shing skyes pa'i tshe/_/gang la gang gis chags par 'dod/_/chags pa 'gags la'ang mi 'dod do/_/gal te skye bzhin chags zhe na/_/
[\[7a.7\]]de ci gal te skye mngon phyogs/_/ma skyes pa la de mi 'dod/_/gzhi [#]med bya ba mi ldan phyir/_/skye bzhin skyes dang ma skyes par/_/brjod pa mig [#]la'ang chags pa med/_/brjod med sems kyang chags min te/_/brjod du med phyir 'dod chags bzhin/_/gal te sems ni chags pa yi[#]/_/
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]rnam par shes [#]pa chags 'dod de/_/shel [#]la tshon chags blo bzhin na/_/de'i blo ji ltar chags nyid yin/_/de ltar chags pa med pa'i phyir/_/'dod chags rtog [#]pa kun rdzob yin/_/'dod chags bzhin du chos rnams kun/_/ci rigs par ni shes par bya/_/dngos po rdzas la rten [#]
[\[7b.2\]]rigs na/_/de yang de las dbyer yod min/_/de phyir 'dod chags ji bzhin du/_/sems la'ang chags pa 'thad mi 'gyur/_/'dod chags chags las gzhan mi rigs/_/chags pa ma bzung gzung med phyir/_/chags pa nyid bzhin tha dad na 'ang /_/des ni [#]mi chags gzhan bzhin no/_/
[\[7b.3\]]dngos po rnam par rig pa'i sems/_/'dod chags las gzhan yod min te/_/dmigs pa la sogs mtshungs phyir dang /_/tha dad rgyu gzhan med phyir ro/_/de phyir 'dus pa gcig rang nyid/_/skyes la ltos nas 'dus pa can/_/tha dad bstan pa nyid 'dod de/_/me tog
[\[7b.4\]]rgyas pas shing bzhin no/_/de spangs phyir ni mya ngan 'das/_/mi rigs de nyid mi 'thad phyir/_/mya ngan 'das pa don dam du/_/dngos dang dngos med mtshan nyid min/_/gal te mya ngan 'das dngos na/_/dngos po yin phyir de 'dus byas/_/gnyen po ma yin 'dus byas phyir/_/dper na
[\[7b.5\]]'dus [#]byas 'gags pa bzhin/_/[#]gal te dngos med gzhan brten [#]'gyur/_/dngos po med phyir zhig pa bzhin/_/de ni gnyen por mi 'dod de/_/gzhan la brten [#]phyir zhig bzhin no/_/de ni 'dus ma byas mi rigs/_/dgag [#]pa gong du bstan pa'i phyir/_/grangs can dag gis rab brtags
[\[7b.6\]]pa'i_/grol ba'i sems las khyad ci yod/_/nyon mongs rnam rtog gtsub shing las/_/byung ba rang gi ngang zad pa/_/de la bsags pa yod min pas/_/gang zag khyod thar [#]mi zad 'gyur/_/skye ba med la rtog pa yang /_/de bzhin med phyir tshul nyid mtshungs/_/zad pa can nam zad med
[\[7b.7\]]na/_/gang gi zad pas thar pa smros/_/rang bzhin stong nyid rtogs [#]pa'i phyir/_/de yi blo yang zlog gyur pas/_/zad med mi zad chos nyid 'thob/_/thob pa med pa'i tshul gyis so/_/yang dag ji bzhin yongs rtog [#]pa/_/bdag la phan pa 'dod pa dag_/lta ngan nad dri ngan bsgos pa'i/_/
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]sgregs pa'i tshig la rten [#]mi byed/_/phyin ci log dag yod pa'i phyir/_/'dod chags yod par mi rigs te/_/'dod chags bzhin du brtags pa'i phyir/_/rtog pa de yang kun rdzob pa[#]/_/sems dang sems las byung ba yi/_/ngo bo nyid phyir sngar bkag phyir/_/
[\[8a.2\]]gang gi de ni chags 'gyur ba'i/_/'dod chags chags pa'i dngos nyid med/_/des ni sdang dang rmongs la sogs/_/so sor bshad pa byas par 'gyur/_/de ltar bcings thar ma grub phyir/_/ngo bo nyid med g.yo ba med/_/sa ni don dam nyid du na/_/sa las gzhan min
[\[8a.3\]]nyid mi 'dod/_/rgyu dang ldan phyir rlung bzhin dang /_/dngos po yin phyir shes pa bzhin/_/sa las don dam nyid du na/_/chu ni gzhan par mi bzung [#]ste/_/skye dang ldan phyir rdzas las ni/_/sa gzhan min pa ji bzhin no/_/sa la sogs pa sgra blo dang /_/las dang mtshan nyid tha dad
[\[8a.4\]]pas/_/de dag gzhan nyid mi 'dod de/_/bsgrub bya'i chos dang mi ldan phyir/_/gzugs kyi bdag nyid mi gzhan yang /_/tha snyad yod phyir ma nges 'gyur/_/yongs su brtags [#]pa ma grub phyir/_/de don ma grub nyid du 'gyur/_/sgra sogs bye brag tha dad kyang /_/de phyir de dag 'khrul
[\[8a.5\]]par 'gyur/_/khyad par brjod par gyur kyang ni/_/'gal bas [#]nges par zlog par 'gyur/_/gnyi ga nyid kyang mi rung ste/_/'gal phyir me la grang dro bzhin/_/gzhan dang gzhan min phyogs dgag pa/_/bstan phyir de yang bzang po min/_/gnyi ga'i bdag nyid nyid yin yang /_/kun la
[\[8a.6\]]grags pa'i cha dper bstan/_/des na gzhan la dpe med pa/_/rab tu skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de ni ltos nas 'grub pa ste/_/gnyis las gang yang rung ba zhig_/sngar ma grub na mi 'grub phyir/_/yid kyis [#]rnam par brtags par zad/_/gnyi gar smra ba thams cad la/_/dgag pa'i
[\[8a.7\]]tshul yang de nyid do/_/de ltar 'di skad bsgrub bstan pas/_/ngo bo nyid yod nyid ma grub/_/de ltar 'dus byas chos de dag_/bsdu bas rnam par brtags pa yin/_/'dus ma byas ni 'gog gnyis dang /_/nam mkha' dang ni de bzhin nyid/_/so sor brtags te 'gog pa ni/_/
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]don dam du na dngos po min/_/rtag dang rang bzhin mi 'gyur phyir/_/mo gsham bu yi gzugs bzhin no/_/ma skyes phyir dang rgyu med phyir/_/de bzhin las kyang med phyir dang /_/'dus byas ma bsdus phyir dang ni/_/'gag pa med pa'i phyir yang ngo /_/gang gi 'bras bur [#]
[\[8b.2\]]gang 'dod pa/_/de ni de'i rgyu ma yin te/_/ma skyes la sogs gtan tshigs kyis/_/glang chen glad kyi rwa bzhin no/_/ma skyes rgyu dang ldan pa yi/_/'bras bur mi 'dod shes par bya/_/'bras bu yin phyir sbrang rtsi ni/_/mkha' min sogs rgyu ldan min bzhin/_/des ni nam mkha'
[\[8b.3\]]de bzhin nyid/_/phyogs dang dus dang bdag la sogs/_/'dus ma byas pa ji snyed pa/_/bkag par mkhas pas shes par bya/_/rdzas dang gtso bo srog la sogs/_/mu stegs brtags pa'i shes bya dag_/rigs [#]dang lung la mkhas rnams kyis/_/ci rigs [#]par ni dgag
[\[8b.4\]]par bya/_/rang dang gzhan gyis [#]grub pa'i phyir/_/dngos po rnams la bdag btags pa/_/mkhas pas bdag med rtogs bya zhing /_/de nyid shes pa'i bdud rtsi btung /_/yang na rnam rtog dra ba yi/_/rgyun 'brel de dag la sogs pa/_/dngos po [#]skye bar 'dzin brten pas/_/
[\[8b.5\]]nan gyis byis pa 'khrug par byed/_/gang tshe mkhas pa rig sgron gyis/_/yang dag ji bzhin yongs rtogs pa/_/de tshe skye bkag de zhi bas/_/spros pa nye bar zhi bar 'gyur/_/de la re zhig bdag skye ba/_/kun rdzob tu yang mi rigs te/_/bdag nyid yod phyir dper bya na/_/
[\[8b.6\]]zho ni bdag las mi skye bzhin/_/dngos rnams bdag las ma skyes te/_/dngos po yin phyir skyes bu bzhin/_/ma skyes pa la bdag med de/_/ma skyes phyir na mkha' min bzhin/_/nam mkha'i me tog med pa'i don/_/mkha' la sogs par [#]khyod 'dod pa/_/de dag nam mkha'i me
[\[8b.7\]]tog min/_/de phyir kho bo'i phyogs med min/_/gal te rgyu la 'bras bdag yod/_/de las de ni skye snyam zhing /_/dngos rnams de las skye ba ni/_/bdag las skye ba nyid 'dod na/_/de la [#]gzhan min bdag bzhin na/_/rgyu ni rgyu min nyid du 'gyur/_/ma skyes phyir ni rgyu min pa/_/ci zhig
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]yin zhing gang gi rgyu/_/'bras bu bdag nyid nyid yin [#]na/_/rgyur brtags [#]pa ni don med 'gyur/_/de nyid las ni de skye na/_/bskyed dang bskyed bya gcig tu 'gyur/_/gal te 'o ma zho nyid du/_/gnas pas gnod pa med snyam na/_/pha ni bu nyid mi 'gyur
[\[9a.2\]]bas/_/gnod pa med pa ma yin no/_/mi mthun phyogs ni med pa'i phyir/_/gtan tshigs 'gal ba nyid mi 'dod/_/de ltar re zhig dngos po rnams/_/bdag las skye bar mi rigs so/_/ngo bo nyid ni med pa'i phyir/_/gang zhig gang las gzhan du 'dod/_/glang ru dang ni ri rtse las/_/
[\[9a.3\]]rta ru gzhan du mi 'dod bzhin/_/mig la sogs pa rkyen gzhan rnams/_/don dam du na [#]mig sogs kyi/_/rnam shes skyed [#]par byed ma yin/_/gzhan phyir rtsi skyang [#]la sogs bzhin/_/gzugs kyi blo la sogs pa dag_/brjod 'dod mi [#]sogs rgyu can min/_/gzhan phyir snga na
[\[9a.4\]]med pa'i phyir/_/dper na bum snam la sogs bzhin/_/ma skyes pa yi gzhan nyid ni/_/kun rdzob yin pas don dam min/_/gzhan las skye ba nyid kyang ni/_/rigs pa ma yin gzung bar bya/_/skyes pa brjod du med pa la/_/skye ba don med nyid du 'gyur/_/ma skyes pa la skye med
[\[9a.5\]]de/_/ma skyes phyir ni mkha' min bzhin/_/skye bzhin skye bar 'dod pa la/_/brgal zhing brtag pa mtshungs par 'gyur/_/brjod du med la 'ang de med de/_/brjod du med phyir gzhan bzhin no/_/yang na mig la sogs pa dag_/brtags pa'i bdag nyid nyid kyis stong /_/byas pa'i phyir
[\[9a.6\]]dang 'jig pa'i phyir/_/dper na sgyu ma'i 'o ma bzhin/_/bsgrub dang mtshungs par bkag pa'i phyir/_/cig shos kyi ni the tshom med/_/sgyu ma'i bdag nyid ma brtags pa'ang /_/yang dag tu na log par 'dod/_/la la'i 'dod chags rgyu yin phyir/_/dper na brtags pa
[\[9a.7\]]de nyid bzhin/_/grags pa'i chas ni de grub phyir/_/kho bo'i dpe ni med ma yin/_/yang na mig la sogs pa ni/_/yang dag tu na dngos nyid stong /_/byas pa nyid phyir 'jig nyid phyir/_/bdud kyis [#]sprul pa'i sangs rgyas bzhin/_/dngos po rnams kyi dngos nyid gang /_/yang
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]dag tu na dngos de med/_/byas phyir dper na chu yi ni/_/tsha ba nyid dang brtan nyid bzhin/_/dngos rnams rang gi bdag nyid du/_/skye bar 'thad pa ma yin pas/_/gzhan gyi dngos por mi skye ste/_/ba lang bong bur ma mthong bzhin/_/rgyu la sogs pa'i rkyen gzhan las/_/skye ba
[\[9b.2\]]kun rdzob tha snyad yin/_/de phyir khas blangs gnod pa med/_/de dag yang dag nyid ma yin/_/yod la rkyen rnams mi rigs te/_/med la'ang mi rigs yod med phyir/_/de las gzhan bzhin rkyen ma skyes/_/rkyen rnams su ni ji ltar 'gyur/_/rgyu ni 'bras bu bskyed
[\[9b.3\]]ma yin/_/de yis [#]stong phyir de gzhan bzhin/_/skye bar 'dod pa'ang des bskyed [#]min/_/snga na med phyir de gzhan bzhin/_/des ni skyes dang ma skyes dang /_/skyes bzhin skyed [#]pa mi byed de/_/nyes pa bstan phyir ma skyes pa'i/_/rgyu ni yang dag nyid ma yin/_/skyes pa dmigs
[\[9b.4\]]dang mi phrad [#]de/_/skyes la'ang skye ba don med phyir/_/ma skyes pa yang ma skyes phyir/_/dper na mi skye chos bzhin no/_/skye bzhin phrad par 'gyur snyam na/_/de yang dmigs pa med par med/_/yan lag ma tshang ba la ni/_/skye ba'i bya ba 'jug mi 'dod/_/yang na sems dang
[\[9b.5\]]sems byung rnams/_/yang dag dmigs pa yod mi 'dod/_/skye bzhin phyir dang gzung [#]ba'i phyir/_/dper na gzugs la sogs pa bzhin/_/yang na de dag dmigs bcas pa/_/dus gcig phyir na de mi rung /_/de ltar dmigs pa yod min pas/_/gang zhig gang gis dmigs
[\[9b.6\]]par 'gyur/_/ma skyes pa la 'gag med de/_/ma skyes nyid phyir mkha' min bzhin/_/'gags pa la yang 'gag med de/_/'gags [#]phyir dper na shi ba bzhin/_/ma 'gags [#]pa la'ang ma 'gags phyir/_/da ltar 'jug pa'i mar me bzhin/_/'gag bzhin pa la mi
[\[9b.7\]]'dod de/_/dgag pa gong du bstan phyir ro/_/de yang dus mnyam nyid cig gam/_/yang na dus gzhan 'gyur grang na/_/mi rigs 'gag bzhin yin pa'i phyir/_/dgra bcom sems kyi tha ma bzhin/_/dngos po yod pa don dam du/_/mi rigs skye ba med pa'i phyir/_/mo
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]gsham bu yi yod pa bzhin/_/de phyir bdag po med par 'dod/_/'bras bus stong ngam mi stong pa'i[#]/_/rkyen zhig bdag por 'gyur grang na/_/stong pa ma yin des stong phyir/_/dper na mig ni sgra blo bzhin/_/sbyang la sogs na gnas pa yi/_/rgyu tsam yod
[\[10a.2\]]pa nyi tshe la/_/'bras bu 'bras bur mi 'gyur zhing /_/med pa khyod la 'bras bur 'gyur/_/gal te 'bras bu'i nus 'bras na/_/de las gzhan pa'i rgyu ci yod/_/de las gzhan pa ma yin la/_/gzhi [#]dang bzhag pa'i dngos mi 'dod/_/'bras bu'i ming tsam nyid la ni/_/
[\[10a.3\]]dper na mkha' la mkha' gnas bzhin/_/gal te de nyid rgyu yin na/_/gang gis mi gtong de cir yod/_/yod la skye ba med pa'i phyir/_/gang zhig gang gis bdag por 'dod/_/med las rkyen yang med pa'i phyir/_/gang zhig gang gis bdag por 'dod/_/gal te bum sogs
[\[10a.4\]]skyes mthong bas/_/mthong la gtan tshigs [#]don med de/_/mngon sum dang ni grags pa yi/_/gnod pas gnod par 'gyur zhe na/_/bum pa la sogs skye ba dag_/byis pa'i blo dang mthun mthong ba/_/gang phyir de ni mi 'gog pas/_/de phyir ji skad smras skyon med/_/gzugs
[\[10a.5\]]la dmigs pa'i blo la ni/_/yang dag tu na rang rig med/_/de ma skyes phyir kho bo la/_/de yi gnod pa med phyir ro/_/mngon sum blo ni don dam du/_/don bzhin nyid du mi rigs te/_/byis pa'i blo dang khyad med phyir/_/mgal me'i 'khor lo'i blo bzhin no/_/de yi spyod yul dngos
[\[10a.6\]]min te/_/'dus byas yin phyir bdag blo bzhin/_/gzugs la sogs pa rdzas min phyir/_/nged la mngon sum gnod pa med/_/mkhas pa'i tshul la spyod pa la/_/grags pa'i gnod pa yod ma yin/_/de nyid la ni ma rig pa'i/_/ling tog ldongs pa'i tshig skabs min/_/yod
[\[10a.7\]]la'ang skye bar [#]mi 'dod de/_/yod pa ci phyir skye bar gyur[#]/_/yod pa rags par mi byed de/_/snga na med dang phyis 'byung phyir/_/mig [#]rags pa nyid gang yin pa[#]/_/de ni rkyen gyis ma byas te/_/snga na med phyir rdza mkhan [#]bzhin/_/shes bya min [#]phyir za po bzhin/_/za po la sogs kun
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]rdzob tu/_/thun mong yin par 'dod pa'i phyir/_/de phyir nged la gang du yang /_/dpe yi skyon du 'gyur ba med/_/gal te gsal ba skyon med na/_/gang gis [#]ci gsal ji lta bu/_/gal te de [#]dag 'di skad ces/_/dper na mar mes bum pa bzhin/_/yod la mngon [#]gsal byed phyir ro/_/
[\[10b.2\]]kun rdzob tu yang mar mes ni/_/bum pa snang dang bcas pa dang /_/de yi blo'am gnyen po dag_/skye bar byed pa nyid yin no/_/mngon par mi gsal gsal mi byed/_/mi gsal phyir na mkha' min bzhin/_/rang tshul gyis kyang dper bya na/_/gtso bo za po bzhin du bstan/_/gal
[\[10b.3\]]te de yang mngon gsal na/_/za po kun 'gro ma yin zhing /_/rgyu med ma yin shes yod min/_/mi gsal ba yang nyams par 'gyur/_/gal te gtso bo mngon gsal na/_/khyod kyi gtso bo bya ba dang /_/dpag yod gsal bar thal 'gyur te/_/de ni de dag min par grags/_/
[\[10b.4\]]gang gis gsal byed gang dag 'dod/_/de dag de gsal byed mi 'dod/_/rgyu nyid la sogs gtan tshigs kyis/_/rgyu spun la sogs zho min bzhin/_/gal te rgyu spun la sogs la 'ang /_/de nus yod phyir dper med na/_/de min rgyu spun la sogs dngos/_/de dag de
[\[10b.5\]]gsal byed min phyir/_/bdag dang gzhan las skye ba dang /_/bdag nyid yod dang med mi 'dod/_/gnyi gar smra ba yod min te/_/rigs pas gong du brtags phyir ro/_/kun rdzob tu yang 'bras bu ni/_/rkyen rnams kyis ni gsal mi 'dod/_/de zhig bar du rjes sgrub phyir/_/
[\[10b.6\]]sa la sogs pas bum pa bzhin/_/mig ni kun rdzob nyid du yang /_/glo bur skye bar mi 'dod de/_/spyi dang khyad par ldan pa'i phyir/_/de ni dper na bum pa bzhin/_/'bras bu yin phyir rim skye'i phyir/_/'jig pa'i phyir dang yongs 'gyur phyir/_/rgyu rkyen nges pa'i phyir dang ni/_/skye ba'i
[\[10b.7\]]phyir yang shes par bya/_/gal te 'jim gong tshe gzhan la/_/'gags pa mi skye zhig pa'i phyir/_/'bras bu yin phyir dper na ni/_/bum pa bzhin du 'dod ce na/_/ji ltar bum pa bum pa yi[#]/_/ngo bo nyid 'gags mi skye ba/_/de ltar 'jim gong 'dod na ni/_/'dod pa nyid ni sgrub pa
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]yin/_/'on te 'gags pa rgyun min na/_/des na gtan tshigs [#]'gal ba nyid/_/gal te rgyun nyid ma nyams na/_/des na 'khrul pa nyid du 'gyur/_/mngal nas sngon rol blo la ni/_/mdun rol kho nar [#]'gags blo yod/_/shes bya gzhan gyis de
[\[11a.2\]]gzhan phyir/_/yang na blo phyir de 'og bzhin/_/tse'i [#]tra la ni sgra blo dang /_/gzugs blo skye ba gang yin pa/_/de gnyis mi gcig yul gzhan phyir/_/dper na rgyud gzhan dag gi bzhin/_/de phyir pha rol phyir yang ni/_/dpe med par ni mi 'gyur te/_/blo phyir de yang gcig nyid min/_/
[\[11a.3\]]gzhan blos 'khrul par 'gyur phyir ro/_/gal te med smra [#]byis pa yis/_/'chi 'pho'i sems la mtshams sbyor med/_/'chi 'pho'i sems phyir dgra bcom gyi/_/tha ma'i sems bzhin sgrub byed na/_/gtan tshigs ma nges nyid 'gyur te/_/'das pa'i 'chi 'pho'i sems
[\[11a.4\]]kyis so/_/tshe rabs dran la sogs yod dang /_/tshul smras phyir na de yang yod/_/'phags pa min pa'i 'chi 'pho'i sems/_/sems gzhan bskyed pa nyid yin te/_/ma rig pa dang bcas pa'i phyir/_/sems de skyed par [#]byed pa bzhin/_/gal te lus dang dbang blo
[\[11a.5\]]dag_/rang gi las kyis [#]skyed mi 'dod/_/zhig phyir dper na bum pa bzhin/_/de phyir 'jig rten pha rol med/_/de nyid kyis [#]ni de ma byas/_/de gzhan gyis kyang ma byas phyir/_/'jig rten rang gi [#]las bskyed min/_/gzhan 'di nged [#]la ci zhig gnod/_/las kyis skyed nyid
[\[11a.6\]]ma yin la/_/dpe ni yod pa ma yin no/_/shing la sogs pa dus skye ba/_/sems can las kyi dbang gis te/_/sems dmyal gnas dang mtho ris na/_/mtshon dang dpag bsam shing skye bzhin/_/'byung ba rnams la blo gros ni/_/mtshan nyid mi mthun ji ltar 'byung /_/'byung
[\[11a.7\]]ba sems med rnams las ni/_/shes pa yod pa nyid skye ste/_/skye can yin phyir myos mthu dang /_/me shel las [#]ni me bzhin no/_/myos mthu shes yod ma yin pas/_/khyod kyi dpe ni med pa nyid/_/rgyu rnams rigs mthun yin pa'i phyir/_/gtan tshigs kyang ni 'gal ba nyid/_/nang
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]gi 'byung ba rnams kyang ni/_/shes pa yod pa ma yin te/_/sa la sogs pa'i dngos phyir dang /_/'byung ba yin phyir de gzhan bzhin/_/de phyir mngal nas sngon rol sems/_/sems gzhan sngon du song yin par/_/mkhas pa rnams kyis [#]shes bya ste/_/'dzin pa yin phyir
[\[11b.2\]]de 'og bzhin/_/be'u yang sngon chad goms byas pas/_/byung ma thag tu zas tshol [#]byed/_/zas kyi don du skyod [#]pa'i phyir/_/dper na dbang po smin pa bzhin/_/khab long gis ni rdo bskyod pas/_/gtan tshigs ma nges nyid ma yin/_/de ni zas za mthong ba'i phyir/_/ma
[\[11b.3\]]grub nyid kyang ma yin no/_/dbang phyug 'jig rten byed po min/_/la la'i dga' ba'i rgyu yin phyir/_/dper na dbang phyug dga' byed pa'i/_/byed po dbang phyug ma yin bzhin/_/dbang phyug kun gyi rgyur mi 'dod/_/ma skyes phyir dang rgyu med phyir/_/dper na nam mkha'i
[\[11b.4\]]me tog ni/_/kun gyi rgyur ni mi 'dod bzhin/_/'gro ba ma lus 'di dag gi_/rgyu ni dbang phyug rab tu min/_/sems dang ldan phyir dper na ni/_/glang rdzi 'gro rgyu rab min bzhin/_/dbang phyug gcig pu 'ga' yang med/_/dngos rnams tshogs las 'grub pa'i phyir/_/byed po gcig
[\[11b.5\]]pu 'ga' yang med/_/de phyir ma nges nyid ma yin/_/gal te mig sogs dbang phyug bcas/_/mang phyir bran bzhin [#]'dod ce na/_/ma skyes dbang phyug gcig mi 'grub/_/dbang phyug de las zlog par 'gyur/_/ci ste byed por bcas 'dod de/_/bkod phyir bum sogs bzhin
[\[11b.6\]]zhe na/_/gal te khyad par ma bstan pa'i/_/byed po yin na grub pa sgrub/_/ci ste rtag cig [#]phra sogs kyi/_/khyad par gyis ni [#]khyod dpe med/_/khyod kyi de ni mi rtag dang /_/gzugs can skyes nyid skyon du 'gyur/_/gal te sems can snod bgrang ba'i/_/'jig rten sna tshogs rgyu yi las/_/
[\[11b.7\]]dbang phyug yin na kun rdzob tu'ang /_/grub pa nyid la rab tu sgrub/_/des ni dus dang skyes bu dang /_/gtso bo rdul phran khyab 'jug dag_/'gro ba 'di yi rgyu min par/_/dgag pa khong du chud par bya/_/gal te lta ba'i mun sel ba/_/gang phyir sangs rgyas 'byung de'i phyir/_/de bzhin skye
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]mched skye 'dod na/_/lan du rung ba ma yin no/_/dus med skye ba yod min na/_/gang la lta ba gang zhig 'dod/_/de yod ma yin rtogs [#]bya'i phyir/_/sangs rgyas 'byung ba byed po nyid/_/gal te lha dang lha min gcig_/des na ji ltar rtag mi 'gyur/_/
[\[12a.2\]]gal te lha dang lha min gzhan/_/ji ltar chad par mi rigs 'gyur/_/brjod min bum pa bzhin na yang /_/chad pa ji ltar spong bar 'gyur/_/yin dang ma yin nyid yin yang /_/mya ngan 'das tshe gcig 'da' [#]med/_/gal te 'gags pa skye gyur na/_/des na ji ltar rtag ma yin/_/
[\[12a.3\]]'gags pa skye ba med gyur na/_/ji ltar chad smra nyid ma yin/_/rgyun ni rdzas [#]su med pa'i phyir/_/rtag chad de dag ga la yod/_/de med phyir na ma skyes la/_/rtag med chad med rigs pa yin/_/gal te sdug bsngal mi bskyed phyir/_/sangs rgyas rnams ni chos ston pa/_/de
[\[12a.4\]]phyir de yi 'bras yod phyir/_/skye ba yod par 'dod ce na/_/gal te de ni skye 'dod na/_/de ni sngar bzhin skye med phyir/_/skye ba med pa de 'bras min/_/de yongs shes pa de'i 'bras yin/_/de ni bdag gis byas mi rigs/_/de nyid kyis de ma byas phyir/_/gzhan gyis
[\[12a.5\]]byas par mi 'dod de/_/gzhan gyis gzhan byed 'gal ba'i phyir/_/sdug bsngal rang rgyud skye mi 'dod/_/sems can la sogs med phyir dang /_/rdzas med phyir dang dbyer med phyir/_/sdug bsngal de la rgyud kyang med/_/gal te mig sogs 'du byed rnams/_/de nyid
[\[12a.6\]]du na skye can te/_/sems can ming du brjod pa'i phyir/_/sangs rgyas nyid du sgrub byed na/_/nged la sangs rgyas skye chos min/_/de phyir de yod ma yin la/_/de bzhin de skye yod min te/_/bdag bzhin sgyu ma bzhin 'byung yod/_/gzugs ni yang dag nyid du na/_/sangs rgyas
[\[12a.7\]]ma yin rtogs [#]bya'i phyir/_/'khor los sgyur [#]bzhin rnam shes min/_/rang gzhan snang phyir mig 'phrul bzhin/_/phung po gzugs can sangs rgyas min/_/phung po bsdus pa yin 'dod phyir/_/skye 'jig chos can yin phyir dang /_/shes bya yin phyir gzugs bzhin no/_/sku
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]ni sangs rgyas yin mi rigs/_/de zhig 'jig pa'i skyon phyir dang /_/gzhan gyi mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir/_/bdag bzhin de ni ga la yod/_/brjod min rdzas med min 'dod de/_/snga ma bzhin du gsal ba'i phyir/_/bum pa bzhin du brjod min na/_/de ni ji ltar sangs
[\[12b.2\]]rgyas 'dod/_/rten cing 'brel par 'byung mthong bas/_/chos dang sangs rgyas mthong ba'i phyir/_/skye mched [#]skye yod mi 'dod de/_/snga ma bzhin du bsal [#]phyir ro/_/bdag dang gzhan gnyis rgyu med min/_/yod med rtag dang mi rtag min/_/gzhan dang gzhan min skye med
[\[12b.3\]]pas/_/rtag dang chad pa rnam par spangs/_/skye ba yod min med ma [#]yin/_/yod med ma yin de gang na/_/de mthong ston pa mthong 'gyur bas/_/ji lta bur ni shes par bya/_/de phyir ngo bo nyid smra'i tshig_/'dod pa rnam par nyams pa yin/_/gang la skye ba sgyu ma yi[#]/_/skye
[\[12b.4\]]ba yod pa [#]de la rung /_/smras pa'i nyes pa'i dri bsal bas[#]/_/dam chos sgron ma rab bstan phyir/_/mdzad pas phan thogs tshul gyis ni/_/kun rdzob tu ni sangs rgyas mthong /_/de ni de nyid mthong min te/_/sgyu 'dra yang dag ma yin phyir/_/rab tu brtag min rnam shes
[\[12b.5\]]min/_/brtag bya ma yin dpe med pa/_/mtshan ma med cing snang ba med/_/rnam rtog med cing yi ge med/_/lta ba'i blo yis rtogs bya ba/_/mthong ba med pas de mthong yin/_/de ni don dam nyid du na/_/bdag las ma yin gzhan las min/_/gnyis las ma yin rgyu med
[\[12b.6\]]min/_/yod med ma yin gzhan ma yin/_/sred med dbang phyug skyes bu dang /_/gtso bo rdul phran la sogs pa'i/_/rgyu las skyes dang gsal bya yi/_/dngos po 'ga' yang yod ma yin/_/de la ngo bo nyid dang las/_/mtshan gzhi mtshan nyid brten pa dang /_/gcig
[\[12b.7\]]nyid gzhan nyid kun nyon mongs/_/rnam par byung [#]bar bya brten pa/_/dper na mkha' la lcag [#]'debs dang /_/tshon gyi ri mo'i las dang ni/_/sa bon dag ni skye med ltar/_/rtog pa thams cad skye ba med/_/rab rib bral bar gyur pa'i mig_/rnam dag dri ma med pa la/_/skra dang
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]sbrang bu zla gnyis dang /_/rma bya'i mdongs dag mi snang ltar/_/mkhas pa nyon mongs shes bya yi/_/sgrib mun rab rib bral gyur cing /_/yang dag mkhyen spyan [#]dri med la'ang /_/de bzhin ci yang snang ba med/_/dper na gnyid log gnyid dbang gis/_/
[\[13a.2\]]bu dang bud med gzhal med khang /_/gnas la sogs pa mthong gyur pa/_/sad na de la mi mthong ltar/_/de bzhin kun rdzob shes pa dag_/blo gros mig ni bye gyur cing /_/mi shes gnyid dang bral gyur nas/_/sad pa'i tshe na mi mthong ngo /_/dper na mtshan mo mun khrod na/_/
[\[13a.3\]]'byung po yang dag mi [#]mthong ba/_/nyi ma shar cing mig bye'i tshe/_/snang bar gyur pa ma yin ltar/_/de bzhin mkhas pa yang dag gi_/shes pa'i nyi mas mi shes pa'i/_/bag chags ma lus bcom pa'i tshe/_/sems dang sems byung yul mi mthong /_/dngos rnams ngo bo nyid yod
[\[13a.4\]]par/_/mi mthong dngos nyid ma grub phyir/_/yang na dngos nyid skye med phyir/_/sgyu ma'i glang chen ji bzhin no/_/dngos rnams ngo bo nyid yod par/_/mi mthong kun rdzob skye yod phyir/_/yang na rgyu dang ldan pa'i phyir/_/sgyu ma'i glang chen ji bzhin no/_/dngos rnams med ces bya
[\[13a.5\]]ba'i blo/_/don bzhin yin par mi 'dod de/_/rtog pa'i sgo nas grub pa'i phyir/_/mtho [#]yor la ni mi blo bzhin/_/yang na yang dag ma yin blos/_/dmigs [#]bya'i dngos bdag log par 'dod/_/rtog pa'i shes pa'i yul yin phyir/_/smig [#]rgyu la ni chu blo bzhin/_/yod
[\[13a.6\]]med blos ni rtogs [#]bya ba/_/bkag phyir de bzhin mkhas rnams kyis[#]/_/rnam par mi rtog blo gros ni/_/skye ba med pa'i tshul gyis [#]skye/_/chos rnams thams cad stong pa'i phyir/_/de ni gtong ba'i sgo nas kyang /_/mi rtog blo gros mi 'dod min/_/de ni sngar bzhin bgag [#]phyir
[\[13a.7\]]ro/_/gang phyir stong nyid stong sogs kyi/_/ngo bo nyid kyis [#]stong de'i phyir/_/mkhas pa stong pa nyid la yang /_/stong pa nyid du lta mi 'gyur/_/dngos po'i bdag nyid snang med pa/_/mi rtog blo yi spyod yul yang [#]/_/don bzhin ma yin dmigs bya'i phyir/_/chu zla la ni zla blo [#]bzhin/_/
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]rnam par mi rtog don yul gyi/_/blo rnams rtog pa med pa'ang brdzun[#]/_/bdag med la sogs ngo bo'i phyir/_/dper na rnam rtog bcas blo bzhin/_/shes bya rnam [#]kun ma grub phyir/_/gang la rnam par mi rtog pa'i/_/blo yang skye bar mi 'gyur ba/_/de nyid mnyam med de mkhyen
[\[13b.2\]]gsung /_/de rtogs phyir na gang zhig la/_/blo skye med pas sangs rgyas dngos/_/rnam rtog gnyid ni sangs phyir dang /_/rtog pa med pas rgyas phyir ro/_/yongs shes byas sogs mthar thug dang /_/mnyam nyid rtogs [#]par gyur pa dang /_/sprul pa dag gis skal ldan gyi/_/
[\[13b.3\]]blo yi pad ma kha 'byed phyir/_/chos rnams mtshan nyid tha dad pa/_/skyed dang dgag [#]pa ma mdzad par/_/mnyam pa nyid kyi mnyam nyid dang /_/bdag gzhan bdag nyid mnyam pa nyid/_/dmigs med nyid du rdzogs rgyas shing /_/rdzogs sangs rgyas med sangs rgyas pas/_/
[\[13b.4\]]lha mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten na/_/de ni rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes brjod/_/chos rnams gsal dang gzhag med phyir/_/chos nyid ji lta ba [#]bzhin du/_/gang phyir de ni gshegs gyur pa/_/de phyir de ni de bzhin gshegs/_/rtogs bya gtan dang ma lus dang /_/mthar
[\[13b.5\]]lhung rnam par spangs pa dag_/rtogs med tshul gyis rtogs pa yis[#]/_/bder gshegs phyir na bde bar gshegs/_/gzhal med gzhal yas rtogs [#]pa'i phyir/_/grangs med gzung du med pa'i phyir/_/bsam yas sems yul ma yin phyir/_/bstan min bstan du med pa'i
[\[13b.6\]]phyir/_/brtag med de ni 'di'o zhes/_/rnam kun brtag [#]tu med pa'i phyir/_/gsal min gsal byed med pa'i phyir/_/zhi ba gnod pa med pa'i phyir/_/brtag par brjod de snang med pa'i/_/bdag nyid nyid kyis rnam kun tu/_/rnam rtog med pas rtag phyir dang /_/rtag tu don ni
[\[13b.7\]]rab bsgrub [#]phyir/_/zhi ba ngo bo nyid stong phyir/_/mtshan ma med pa dngos med phyir/_/mtshan ma nyid du mi 'gro dang /_/mtshan ma med phyir de yang yin/_/mtshan ma med phyir snang ba med/_/snang med phyir yang mtshan ma med/_/mtshan ma med cing snang med pa/_/lta 'dod bdag
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]nyid grol bas mthong /_/mi gnas mtshan ma med pa'i phyir/_/rnam par mi rtog mi gnas phyir/_/spros med rnam par mi rtog phyir/_/dmigs med der 'dzin med pa'i phyir/_/skye ba med pa rnam pa med/_/'gyur ba med pa 'od gsal ba/_/mnyam
[\[14a.2\]]pa mi mnyam mu med pa/_/rnam par mi rtog mtshan nyid med/_/mkha' bzhin de la lta med par/_/bdag nyid chen po de dag lta/_/gang dag rnam par mi rtog pa'i/_/gnas pas lhun grub dri med mig_/'dud par [#]byed dang yid byed dang /_/brjod la sogs pa gsal ba dag_/
[\[14a.3\]]mgon po la ni phyag 'tshal ba/_/de dag la ni gus phyag 'tshal/_/sangs rgyas la sogs sgro btags pas/_/sgrub dang rjes su mthun par bstan/_/de nyid du na [#]rnam kun du/_/rnam brtag [#]min phyir brjod mi 'dod/_/'di la tshig [#]dang ldog 'gyur zhing /_/'di ni sems
[\[14a.4\]]kyi spyod yul min/_/'di la kun rtog ldog 'gyur zhing /_/shes pa 'jug par mi 'gyur ro/_/grangs med bsod nams tshogs ldan zhing /_/shes bya mtha' yas mkhyen gyur pa'i/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos sku 'di/_/spros pa [#]nyer zhi zhi ba yin/_/sha yi mig
[\[14a.5\]]gis de lta min/_/lha yi mig gis blta ma yin/_/rtog bcas rnam rtog med pa yi/_/shes pas kyang ni mthong bar dka'/_/mtho ris sdig can yul min dang /_/nyon mongs med pa de bcas min/_/nyi ma dmus long yul min ltar/_/de yang rtog ge'i spyod yul min/_/
[\[14a.6\]]yod min med min yod med min/_/de las gzhan min gzhan ma yin/_/phra ba ma yin chen po min/_/gcig min ring min nye ba'ang min/_/de las cung zad ji ltar yang /_/skye ba med cing gsal ba med/_/'di la 'ga' yang gnas pa med/_/'ga' yang bag la zhar mi 'gyur/_/
[\[14a.7\]]tshangs la sogs pas gang mi rtogs/_/de ni tshangs pa dam pa yin/_/de ni bden pa dam pa zhes/_/thub pa bden pa gsung bas gsungs/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang dang /_/'phags pa byams pa la sogs pa/_/mkhas pa thub pa mang po dag_/bsnyen med tshul
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]gyis [#]de bsnyen byed/_/de las dngos nyid mi gzhan dang /_/des ni thugs su chud pa'i phyir/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur 'dod de/_/gzhan gyis ma yin de ma rtogs/_/de nyid bsgoms [#]pa goms byed pa/_/dmigs med gnas pa de la yang /_/gang la yid ni chags
[\[14b.2\]]'gyur zhing /_/sdang 'gyur rmongs 'gyur ga la yod/_/sdug bral mi sdug phrad pa las/_/byung ba'i sdug bsngal ga las 'byung /_/'jig rten chos kyis mi gos te/_/pad+ma la ni chus bzhin no/_/'khor ba las ni byung [#]ma yin/_/'khor ba las gnod bral ba yin/_/mya ngan
[\[14b.3\]]'das pa thob ma yin/_/mya ngan 'das la gnas dang 'dra/_/nyon mongs me yis [#]gdung ba med/_/nyon mongs ldan yang nam mkha' bzhin/_/sems med sems med ma yin te/_/snyoms par 'jug [#]la gnas phyir ro/_/de ni shes rab lhun po'i rtser/_/'dzegs shing mya ngan
[\[14b.4\]]med gyur kyang /_/snying rje'i dbang gis 'jig rten pa/_/mya ngan gdungs dang sdug bsngal blta/_/de ni de tshe snying rje yis/_/brlan pa'i mig gis 'jig rten pa/_/rnam rtog bzo las byung ba yi[#]/_/rtog pa'i dra bas dkris pa dang /_/skye rga na 'chi'i zug rngu yis/_/rma btod [#]
[\[14b.5\]]na bar gyur pa dang /_/zhan [#]dang bkren dang mtha' ngan dang /_/mgon med dpung gnyen med pa dang /_/sdug bsngal nye bar zhi 'dod pas/_/sdug bsngal chu bo cher lhung dang /_/sdug bsngal rgyu dag spel ba'i phyir/_/rmongs pa'i yid kyis zhugs pa dang /_/de nyid bdud
[\[14b.6\]]rtsi zhi ba dang /_/spros pa nyer zhi ston ka yi/_/dri med mkha' la blos dpyod [#]pa'i/_/snang med mig med kun bltas nas/_/snying rjes shin tu yid gdungs pa/_/de la phan phyir brtul zhugs can/_/rdo rje rin chen sra ba'i sems/_/sems can gtso bo legs bslabs pa/_/
[\[14b.7\]]sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod pa dang /_/brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes rab brtson/_/dus gzhan [#]dang ni mthu bzhin du/_/shes rab dran pa sngon 'gro bas/_/sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/_/sbyin la sogs pa'i ri bo las/_/byung ba'i chu klung bsod nams dang /_/dri
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]med dge ba'i chu ldan 'bebs/_/slong ba kun la dus kun du/_/phyi nang dngos po thams cad kyis/_/dbul dang slong ba'i sdug bsngal kun/_/rnam pa kun du sel bar byed/_/slong ba rnams kyi bsam pa dag_/skad cig skad cig dgas [#]
[\[15a.2\]]rdzogs shing /_/dus kun mi zad [#]'bras bu yis[#]/_/'byor cing dpag bsam shing ltar byed/_/de ni gzhan phan bde skyid pa'i/_/bde 'gro kho nar skye bar 'gyur/_/yang na 'dod pas gzhan dag tu/_/gzhan phan bde ba skyed par skye/_/'gro ba de dang de dag tu/_/'khor
[\[15a.3\]]bcugs rtag bzod mtha' yas dang /_/rgya mtsho bzhin du sgo kun nas/_/bsod nams chu bos yongs rgyas 'gyur/_/sems gnyen rnam par mi g.yeng dang /_/shes bya rtogs dang mkhas pa'i blo/_/lhan cig skyes dang ldan gyur cing /_/ji srid 'dod pa'i skal bar
[\[15a.4\]]gnas/_/grangs med dpag tu med pa yi/_/ting 'dzin nges rtog blo dang ldan/_/'jig rten khams ni mtha' yas dag_/rgyan rnams kyis ni brgyan par byed/_/bzo dang las sngon 'du byed dang /_/las kyi rnam smin rab tu ston/_/'gro la phan pa bsgrub 'dod pas/_/
[\[15a.5\]]ji ltar 'dod pa rab tu skye/_/sangs rgyas skus ni gang ba yi/_/'jig rten khams rnams ston par byed/_/ji ltar 'dod pa'i dus dang ni/_/zhing du rdzogs par byang chub ston/_/ye shes mig gis shes bya ba'i/_/de nyid thams cad ston par byed/_/chos
[\[15a.6\]]rnams bzhag pa nyid rtogs shing /_/ming la sogs pa thob pa nyid/_/rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa yis/_/mtha' yas zhing dag g.yo bar byed/_/dus gcig gam ni rim yang rung /_/lus las [#]'bar dang 'bebs par byed/_/phyogs ni mtha' yas kun tu
[\[15a.7\]]yang /_/rang gi 'od kyis spro bar byed/_/tshad med rmad byung bsam mi khyab/_/yon tan rin chen 'od 'bar ba/_/'jig rten rtsa lag sangs rgyas rnams/_/'khor dang bcas pa'ang ston par byed/_/gser dang nor bu bai DUr+ya/_/mu tig rdo rje mthon ka cher/_/ri bo'i dbang
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]po che rnams dang /_/me nyid grang bar bzhed par [#]byed/_/chen por gyur pa'i lus kyis su/_/rdo rje sogs la mi chags par/_/ngo mtshar byed cing skad cig gis/_/phyogs kun du ni 'gro zhing 'ong /_/rang gi lus sam rdul phran la/_/dpag tu med pa'i 'jig rten khams/_/
[\[15b.2\]]yang dag 'dzud kyang sems can la/_/gnod pa med pa'ang ston par byed/_/'jig rten khams rnams phra rab tu/_/phra rab de yi tshad nyid du/_/bsdus pa'am ni rgyas par yang /_/bzhed pa tsam byed 'og stengs [#]kyang /_/de'i tshad 'od dang kha dog dang /_/dbyangs dang
[\[15b.3\]]spyod lam phun tshogs kyis/_/gdul bya 'dul bar 'dod pa'i phyir/_/tshangs pa la sogs 'khor du 'gro/_/snang bar 'gyur zhing mi snang 'gyur/_/de dag 'gas [#]kyang mi shes dang /_/gzhan gyis zil gyis gnon par yang /_/byed de snying rjes bskul ba'i phyir/_/'gro
[\[15b.4\]]ba'i gnas ni brjod rnams su/_/'gro ba dbang byas dgod [#]'dod pas/_/spobs sogs kyis ni dman pa la/_/spobs pa'i bde ba rab tu ster/_/dmyal sogs sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa[#]/_/'od zer btang ba la sogs kyis/_/zhi bar byed cing lha dbang sogs/_/
[\[15b.5\]]skal ba mnyam par 'gro bar byed/_/gdul bya ji bzhin sprul pa yi/_/sprul pa yis [#]ni phyogs bkang nas/_/bstan pa rin chen char phab pas/_/'jig rten 'das pa'i bde ba bskyed/_/dus gsum tshad med lus nyid dang /_/sangs rgyas zhing ni phun sum tshogs/_/'jig
[\[15b.6\]]rten khams ni dpag med rnams/_/'jig pa dang ni chags pa yang /_/rang lus bde bar gshegs zhing du/_/de yang rang lus bdag nyid du/_/rang gi zhing ni bde gshegs skur/_/bzhed pa tsam gyis byin gyis rlob[#]/_/ba spu'i khung dang 'od zer las/_/nam mkha'
[\[15b.7\]]la ni rol mo'i sgra/_/sprul pa yis ni rab bton nas/_/thos na dga' bar 'gyur bas ni/_/mthar thug par ni gsal bar 'gengs/_/ka la ping+ka'i sgra dbyangs ni/_/zab cing rgya chen [#]sgrogs pa yis/_/'jig rten rnams ni gsung gis 'gengs/_/mos pa'i dbang dang dbang
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]po bzhin/_/zhi bar ro gcig zhi ba dang /_/gdul bya rnams ni 'dul ba'i phyir/_/chos 'di rnams ni gsung bar mdzad/_/dman dang bag la nyal bcas dag_/bde dang sdug bsngal sogs dang bcas/_/dman dang 'bring dang mchog rnams
[\[16a.2\]]dang /_/yang dag gyi nom sogs de rnams/_/gang la ji ltar ji srid du/_/lus can rnams kyi sems 'byung ba/_/de rnams de la de bzhin dang /_/de snyed [#]mang rnams rig par byed/_/lha dang sprul pa phra mo dang /_/de las bzlog par gyur pa dag_/kun tu gzugs ni
[\[16a.3\]]thams cad kyang /_/lha yi mig gis de dag mthong /_/lha dang 'phags pa bkod dang sprul/_/gsal po'i sgra dang mir bcas [#]dang /_/ring na gnas dang bzlog pa dag_/lha yi rna ba 'di yis thos/_/sngon gyi gnas rnams thams cad de/_/sems can rnams dang bdag nyid kyi/_/
[\[16a.4\]]ming dang rigs kyi bye brag rnams/_/dran zhing gzhan dag gi yang dran/_/tha dad 'gro ba'i 'dod pa dang /_/mi 'dod las 'bras sna tshogs gnas/_/'chi dang 'pho dang skye ba rnams/_/lus can kun gyi rig par gyur/_/'jig rten khams ni dpag med du/_/'di yis gdul bya 'dul ba'i
[\[16a.5\]]phyir/_/dga' ldan gnas 'phos 'jug pa dang /_/yang dag byang chub mngon par ston/_/rang gi 'dod pas dpag med pa'i/_/'jig rten khams kyi rdul mnyam pa/_/sangs rgyas zhing yang de snyed du/_/sems can rnams kyang de snyed [#]kyi/_/gdul bya thabs kyis sprul
[\[16a.6\]]pa ni/_/rang gi zhing nas ma g.yos par/_/rang gi 'dod pas lus sprul pa/_/re re las kyang de snyed lag_/de snyed pa yi mgo las lce/_/so so kun nas de snyed spro/_/lag pa de dag gis bzung ba'i/_/me tog dris bkang sna tshogs pa/_/gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed/_/lhun
[\[16a.7\]]po'i tshad tsam dri spro zhing /_/rgyas pa mchog bzang dri dag dang /_/rdzogs sangs rnam par sangs rgyas dag_/'gro la phan pa [#]byed pa'i mchog_/shin tu gus pas mchod par byed/_/lan cig min par bstod pas bstod/_/rin chen gdugs dang bla re sogs/_/mu tig dra bas
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]yongs brgyan pa/_/tshad med rin chen myu gu las/_/mche ba lta bu'i 'od zer 'phro/_/steng g.yogs ka ba 'bar bas dga'/_/mu tig phreng ba 'phyang ba dang /_/rin chen sna tshogs du ma las/_/sna tshogs las kyis bzo [#]sbyar ba/_/rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang /_/
[\[16b.2\]]'od zer sgron ma brgya snyed 'bar/_/shin tu mtho ba mkha' mnyam pa/_/rin chen 'od kyis phyogs khyab byed/_/de yis [#]rnam grangs du ma yis[#]/_/bstan pa rtag tu mkhas pa des/_/thos nas gus pa gzhan dag la/_/lhag chad med pa'i yi ges ston/_/mkhas pa legs
[\[16b.3\]]par bslabs [#]pa des/_/bskal pa grangs med dpag med par/_/bsod nams ye shes stobs kyis 'phags/_/pha rol phyin rnams pha rol phyin/_/'di ni 'di ltar skyes bu mchog_/rdzogs sangs nyi mar gyur nas ni/_/gdul bya'i sems can pad+ma'i mtsho/_/
[\[16b.4\]]bstan pa'i 'od kyis rgyas par byed/_/dri ma med pas dri ma sbyong /_/gangs phreng bsil ba'i 'od zer dang /_/tsan+dan pas lhag bsung gi chus/_/lus can yid kyi nyon mongs mes/_/rab tu gdungs pa zhi bar byed/_/skye ba'i 'khor ba dba' klong can/_/'chi ba'i chu srin bcas
[\[16b.5\]]mtsho las/_/theg pa gsum gyi gru chen gyis/_/'di yis skye bo myur du sgrol/_/bdag gis legs bshad chu rgyun gyis/_/thog ma med dus 'gro ba rnams/_/shin tu skom pa sel bar byed/_/yon tan gyis phongs kyang sel byed/_/srid pa'i dgon par lam stor bas/_/
[\[16b.6\]]ma rig pas bsgribs lam ston byed/_/'gro rnams shes rab mig phye [#]nas/_/mya ngan 'das par phyin par byed/_/nyon mongs sbrul gdug mche bas btab/_/rang la phan pa'i thabs la brgyal/_/ye shes sman ni yang dag pa/_/rig pa bstan pas 'gro rnams gso/_/srid
[\[16b.7\]]par mgon med srog chags rnams/_/yun rings [#]gnyid kyis log pa la/_/bstan pa rnga yi sgra dag gis/_/snying rje yid ni sad par byed/_/yun ring 'khor ba'i btson ra na/_/srid pa'i lcags sgrog gis bsdams pa/_/bdud bzhi las ni rgyal byas nas/_/bcings pa las ni
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]grol bar byed/_/byin za ngoms pa med pa bzhin/_/lha dang mi yi yul dag gis/_/shes rab bdud rtsi'i ro bzang pos/_/lus can rnams ni tshim par byed/_/'khor du stong nyid seng ge yi/_/sgra chen sgra ni bsgrags [#]pa yis/_/gdul dka'
[\[17a.2\]]mu stegs myos pa ni/_/shes pas myos pa'i nga rgyal sel/_/dbang po chen po'i gzhu 'dra ba/_/'dom gang 'od kyis kun tu bskor/_/gzugs nas 'bar ba yongs rdzogs pa'i/_/mtshan dang dpe byad rnams kyi dpal/_/dpal nyid rgyan du gyur pa yi/_/yid dang
[\[17a.3\]]mig ni 'phrog byed pa'i/_/gzugs ni mnyam pa'i gzugs med pa/_/mdzes pa thams cad zil gyis gnon/_/de yis [#]rnam pa drug cu dang /_/ldan pa'i gsung gi [#]cho 'phrul dang /_/bcas pas lha dang lha min mi/_/la sogs yid ni dga' bar byed/_/de yi [#]gsung dang
[\[17a.4\]]sku rnams kyis/_/yid bzhin nor bu dpag bsam ltar/_/gdul ba'i dbang gis phyogs kun tu/_/sna tshogs bdag po'i gzugs su bsgyur/_/de dag de ltar sogs [#]grangs med/_/dpag med rmad du byung ba'i gnas/_/che ba'i bdag nyid mkhas pas lam/_/'di
[\[17a.5\]]la brten nas thob par 'gyur/_/dbu ma'i [#]snying po las de kho na nyid kyi shes pa tshol [#]ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//_//rtogs [#]par dka' ba'i lugs 'di la/_/rtogs pa'i nus pa chung gyur pa/_/gnas min skrag pa'i dman mos dag_/yang dang yang du rtsod par
[\[17a.6\]]rtsom[#]/_/ston pa'i rnam par mi rtog blo/_/sku la brten [#]pa ma yin te/_/lus can yin phyir ba rdzi yi/_/lus la ji lta ba bzhin zer/_/yang dag lta sogs lam gyis ni/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub cher/_/'dren byed yang dag rab rtogs [#]byed/_/byang chub yin
[\[17a.7\]]phyir slob ma'i bzhin/_/ston pa'i dbang po khyad 'phags pas/_/kun mkhyen ye shes srid pa yin/_/lam gcig na yang 'dod pa bzhin/_/'ga' yi so so yang dag rig_/shes bya'i sgrib pa zad byed pa/_/de yang lam de nyid kyis yin/_/sems las byung ba'i sgrib yin
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]phyir/_/nyon mongs sgrib pa ji bzhin 'dod/_/theg chen du yang lam 'di yis/_/kun rig thub pa 'thob byed de/_/theg pa gzhan nyid yin pa'i phyir/_/rang rgyal theg pa bzhin du 'dod/_/mdo sde sogs su ma bsdus dang /_/lam gzhan nye bar ston phyir yang [#]/_/theg
[\[17b.2\]]chen sangs rgyas gsung ma [#]yin/_/rig byed mtha' pa'i lta ba bzhin/_/chad par lta ba ji bzhin du/_/rgyu dang 'bras bur skur 'debs pas/_/sde pa bco brgyad khongs su yang /_/gtogs pa med pas ma yin nges/_/gzugs la sogs la dmigs pa'i blo/_/rang rig
[\[17b.3\]]nyid du yod pas kyang /_/mngon sum gnod pa gang yin des/_/skye med smra ba de la gnod/_/srid pa rnams ni de nyid du/_/skye med ces bya'i khyad par gyis/_/mngon sum dang ni grags pa dag_/gnod pa 'di la med ce na/_/bgrod min la yang yang dag tu/_/bgrod par bya ste
[\[17b.4\]]bud med phyir/_/bud med gzhan bzhin zer ba yi/_/skyon bcas tshig kyang skyon med 'gyur/_/bden pa mthong ba de nyid min/_/de nyid med par thal bar 'gyur/_/nam mkha'i lha yis bstan pa ltar/_/de nyid yin par mi 'dod do/_/phyi rol skye mched yod pa las/_/
[\[17b.5\]]der snang ba yi blo 'byung bas/_/yod par rigs te sems nyid ni/_/yod la dga' ba ji bzhin gyis/_/gal te sems yod mi 'dod na/_/khyod kyi 'gro ba sems tsam min/_/'gro ba phyogs su bya ba dang /_/gtan tshigs bsgrub pa khyod la med/_/de la sngar smras rigs
[\[17b.6\]]pa ni/_/rang gi phyogs nyams dogs pas gzhan/_/mi 'dod gyur pa gang smra ba/_/de ni rigs pa ma yin no/_/ston pa'i rnam par mi rtog blo/_/bdag med pa la dmigs par 'dod/_/yul can gyi ni blo yin phyir/_/gang zag bdag med pa bzhin no/_/sbyor
[\[17b.7\]]las byung sogs blo dag ni/_/'byung ba gal te 'gog byed na/_/shes bya kun du ma grub pas/_/blo gang gang gi rjes 'byung ba/_/de ni rtog med sngon byang chub/_/shes bya de nyid ma log phyir/_/de yi ngo bo rnam rtog sogs/_/bral ba'i blor ni mngon 'dod pas/_/
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]de yi rten ni 'gog byed na/_/grub pa nyid ni rab sgrub byed/_/de ni [#]zhi nyid sogs bstan pa/_/rtog pa rnams kyis sgro btags pa'o/_/mthong ba med pa rtog med pa/_/brjod pa med pa byed med pa/_/'tsho ba med pa rtsom med pa/_/de bzhin [#]dga' med
[\[18a.2\]]gnas med pa/_/de tshe lam ni de nyid kyis/_/sangs rgyas byang chub 'dod phyir bdag_/grub pa sgrub pa'i skyon yang yin/_/bsgom nyid la yang btag [#]par bya/_/ji ltar lung dang mi 'gal bar/_/rjes su dpag pa'i rjes 'brangs pa/_/'di ltar de nyid bsgom pa ste/_/
[\[18a.3\]]de ni de bzhin mkhas pas 'dod/_/gang gis de rtogs te [#]sangs rgyas/_/gzhan ni mi yi [#]la du mtshungs/_/theg chen sangs rgyas gsung min zhes/_/zer ba 'di yang gtan la dbab/_/sngar bstan pa yi lam 'di yis/_/sangs rgyas byang chub thob mi nus/_/sdug bsngal
[\[18a.4\]]rnam par rtogs byed phyir/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bzhin/_/rjes su dpag pas gnod pa yang [#]/_/gzhan gyi phyogs la 'byung bar 'gyur/_/dpe ni ma grub pa nyid kyang /_/de la zhugs pa bzlog par dka'/_/mi skye zad par shes pa ni/_/ji bzhin don gyi don dam min/_/
[\[18a.5\]]'khrul bzhin rnam rtog bcas pa'i phyir/_/de rtogs ji ltar de nyid yin/_/theg pa gzhan nyid rgyu yin zhes/_/zer ba de yi lan yang btab/_/ji ltar sgrib pa yod bzhin du/_/dgra bcom mya ngan 'da' bar rigs[#]/_/ma rig nyon mongs can spangs pas/_/de ni grol gyur
[\[18a.6\]]sangs rgyas bzhin/_/de ni mi bden med pa'i phyir/_/dngos dang sprul pa'i sangs rgyas la/_/yang dag tu na theg chen gyi[#]/_/lam gyi sangs rgyas byang chub dag_/sgrub min rtog bcas mtshan bcas phyir/_/'jig rten pa yi lam bzhin no/_/ji srid 'ga' zhig skrag
[\[18a.7\]]pa yis/_/thag pa la ni sbrul zhes 'khrul/_/'khri shing bsdogs par shes pa ni/_/gnyen po'i phyogs kyis [#]shes par 'byung /_/des na gtan tshigs ma nges bcas/_/rgol ba'i smra ba spangs pa yin/_/kun nas nyon mongs gnyen po'i phyir/_/'dis ni lan yang btab pa
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]byas/_/theg chen sangs rgyas gsung [#]yin te/_/bdag med la sogs ston pa dang /_/dkon mchog gsum gyi bdag nyid che/_/ston phyir slob ma'i theg pa bzhin/_/phyir rgol tshad mas gnod pa'i phyir/_/de yi gtan tshigs ma grub nyid/_/bla ma kun dga' pa ta [#]li/_/
[\[18b.2\]]sdug bsngal phung po sa pa dang [#]/_/'char byed stong pa 'char ba dang /_/gang po spangs pa ram pa dang /_/mya ngan 'das dang yul 'khor skyong /_/zhes bya gzhan yang 'gro ba'i mdo/_/rtsa ba'i sdud par ma tshang bas/_/rgyas pa min par rtogs [#]par bya/_/[#]yang dag lta ba sngon 'gro ba/_/
[\[18b.3\]]gang phyir theg chen las gsungs pa/_/de phyir gtan tshigs ma grub nyid/_/sdug bsngal skye ba bkag bstan pas/_/ma skye [#]sdug bsngal yin mi 'dod/_/skyes pa sdug bsngal ngo bo na/_/de stong ci'i phyir khas mi len/_/'dus byas yin phyir sgyu ma'am/_/zag med phung po ji
[\[18b.4\]]bzhin no/_/khyod ci sdug bsngal bden 'dod pa/_/yang dag lta ba'i blos 'dod pa/_/tshor ba sdug bsngal sdug bsngal yin/_/skye sogs sdug bsngal nyid ji ltar/_/mi rtag phyir na sdug bsngal na/_/rgyu dang lam yang sdug bsngal nyid/_/sdug bsngal rgyu yin phyir zhe na/_/kun
[\[18b.5\]]'byung sdug bsngal nyid du 'gyur/_/sdug bsngal nyid ni tshig tsam phyir/_/de shes ji ltar sdug bsngal shes/_/sdug bsngal yul can shes pa de[#]/_/de nyid du na bden pa min/_/sdug bsngal nyid du de shes phyir/_/phung sogs sdug bsngal blo bzhin no/_/rgyu ni sdug
[\[18b.6\]]bsngal rgyu nyid du/_/mi rigs kun 'byung bdag nyid phyir/_/ral gris gshags sogs bzhin du'am/_/sems byung yin phyir lam bzhin no/_/sdug bsngal rgyu yi yul can gyi/_/blo de brdzun pa nyid du 'dod/_/rgyu sogs rnam par rtog pa'i phyir/_/sdug bsngal rgyu yi
[\[18b.7\]]blo can bzhin/_/skye med 'gag pa yod min te/_/sngar smras pa yi dgag pa nyid/_/skyes pa 'gag na ma skyes la/_/nam mkha'i me tog bzhin mi rigs/_/gang tshe skyes pas de ma skyes/_/'gog pa nyid kyis 'gog yin par/_/mi 'dod de tshe mkhas pa khyod/_/
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]ci zhig bden pa yod par smros/_/ma skyes pa yi 'gog pa yang /_/yang dag tu na 'gog pa min/_/ma skyes pa yi [#]'gog yin phyir/_/so sor brtags min 'gog pa bzhin/_/'gog pa'i ngo bo nyid med na/_/khyod kyi lam gyis [#]ci zhig
[\[19a.2\]]len/_/ma skyes lam yang ji ltar yin/_/gang gis ci zhig thob par byed/_/lam gyis [#]ngan grol thob min te/_/'dus byas yin phyir gzhan bzhin nam/_/'gog pa la ni dmigs pa'i phyir/_/de las gzhan pa'i 'gog pa bzhin/_/spyi la dmigs pa yin phyir
[\[19a.3\]]ram/_/'dus byas yin phyir de bzhin du/_/sdug bsngal la sogs mthong ba brdzun/_/brdzun pa'i shes pa bzhin du 'dod/_/'dis ni yang dag rtog pa dang /_/rtsol ba sogs kyang brdzun nyid phyir/_/lam gyi bden pa don dam du/_/mi bden par ni grub pa yin/_/des
[\[19a.4\]]na bsgom de mi rigs la/_/sdug bsngal la sogs ma mthong rigs/_/mthong ba rnams kyis [#]ma mthong gzugs/_/thams cad du yang de bzhin gnas/_/gal te blo ngan 'ba' [#]zhig ni/_/bden pa mthong ba mi 'dod phyir/_/khyod ni thar par rigs [#]min te/_/byis pa'i
[\[19a.5\]]skye bo bzhin zhe na/_/sdug bsngal des sdug ma skyes phyir/_/su zhig thar pa gang la 'dod/_/grol ba'ang sgyu ma byas pa bzhin/_/'khrul pa'i dbang gis bstan pa yin/_/sdug bsngal la sogs gang dag rnams/_/gtan du ma mthong grol bar 'dod/_/de
[\[19a.6\]]phyir dpe yang yod min la/_/de bzhin gtan tshigs [#]ma grub nyid/_/yang dag lta ba sngon 'gro ba'i/_/ji ltar 'byung ba'i lam 'di nyid/_/theg chen du yang nyer bstan pas/_/de phyir gtan tshigs ma grub nyid/_/bden pa gnyis la nyer brten nas/_/sangs rgyas
[\[19a.7\]]rnams kyis chos bsten [#]te/_/'jig rten kun rdzob bden pa dang /_/don dam nyid kyi bden pa'o/_/rig byed mtha' [#]yang legs bstan gang /_/de kun sangs rgyas gsungs pa yin/_/de phyir dpe ni ma grub ste/_/the tshom za na brtag par gyis/_/yod dang med pa'i rtog
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]bral zhing /_/shes rab spyod pas gnas pa la/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu skur 'debs pa'i/_/lta ba gang yod 'dod pa gang /_/rgyu dang 'bras bu 'brel pa dag_/'jig rten grags pa ji lta bar/_/de bzhin de ni 'gog pa min/_/de phyir gtan tshigs ma grub nyid/_/dngos po
[\[19b.2\]]mngon sum spyod yul gyi/_/kun rdzob byis pas gzung [#]ba 'di/_/'dir ni lan yang snga ma bzhin/_/de yi [#]gnod pas mi gnod do/_/mkhas pa'i lugs kyis [#]brtags pa la/_/grags pas gnod pa ma yin te/_/ji ltar chos bdag med pa dang /_/skad cig ma zhes brjod pa
[\[19b.3\]]bzhin/_/gzugs kyi de nyid byis rnams kyi[#]/_/yul nyid 'gyur ba ma yin te/_/nang la rig pa ma sbyangs phyir/_/bdag sogs stong pa ji bzhin no/_/byis rnams blo la yang dag tu/_/gzugs kyi de nyid ldan pa min/_/ma rig rab rib kyis bsgribs phyir/_/mya ngan
[\[19b.4\]]'das pa'i spyod yul bzhin/_/srid pa rnams ni yang dag tu/_/skye med ces bya'i khyad par gyis/_/mngon sum dang ni grags pa dag_/gnod pa bstan pas gnod pa med/_/yang dag par na chos rnams ni/_/zhi zhing mkha' [#]dang mnyam pa la/_/bud med nyid kyang ma grub
[\[19b.5\]]na/_/dpe yi gnod par ji ltar 'dod/_/bgrod bya bgrod pa bgrod po dang /_/gsum po ji ltar yod bzhin du/_/bgrod min bgrod par sgrub byed pa/_/de bzhin skyon zhig 'dogs par 'dod/_/grags pas gnod pa nyid ni bden/_/khyad par can la ma grub phyir/_/des na [#]
[\[19b.6\]]mi mthun phyogs 'di la/_/bdag gi phyogs gnod nus pa med/_/spros pa med cing rang rig la/_/rnam rtog dri ma dang bral ba/_/du ma nyid dang gcig nyid bral/_/zhi ba de nyid mkhas rig [#]pa/_/nam mkha'i lha yis bstan pa nyid/_/de nyid yin par mi rigs kyang /_/tshangs
[\[19b.7\]]pa dang po'i lha las byung /_/lha de la gus de skad smra/_/gzugs sogs skye mched snang ba nyid/_/blo yi yul du 'dod pa yin/_/de yi yod pa thun mong nyid/_/bsgrub bya zhe na nga yang 'dod/_/'byung las gyur sogs ngo bo yi/_/gzugs sogs skye mched yod nyid ni/_/bsgrub bya'o
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]zhe na dpe yang med/_/phyir rgol rtog ges gnod pa'ang yod/_/gzugs sogs skye mched 'byung ba dang /_/'byung ba las gyur mtshan nyid min/_/rang bdag rnam par snang ba'i blo/_/skyed [#]pa'i rgyu phyir yid bzhin no/_/sems dang sems byung ngo
[\[20a.2\]]bo nyid/_/sems dang sems byung rab tu grags/_/gtan tshigs dang ni dpe yang med/_/phyogs kyang rnal 'byor pa la med/_/rnam shes tsam zhes bya ba 'dir/_/phyi rol don ni bzlog pa'i phyir/_/tshig don 'di ni de spong zer/_/bdag gi phyogs nyams ji ltar 'dod/_/
[\[20a.3\]]'ga' yi tshig gis smrar med par/_/bya bar mi nus zhi ba'i blo/_/snying po yod dam snying po med/_/mkhas pas de la dpyad par gyis/_/dbu ma'i snying po las nyan thos kyi de kho na nyid la 'jug pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//_//rang gi lugs kyi nga rgyal gyis[#]/_/mkhas
[\[20a.4\]]par rlom gzhan 'di skad smra/_/de nyid bdud rtsir 'jug pa dang [#]/_/rnal 'byor spyod pas legs bstan zer/_/dngos po gnyis po med pa'i phyir/_/gnyis dngos med pa'i yod pa ni/_/yod la sogs pa'i blo yi yul/_/dam pa'i don du 'dod do lo/_/med pa'i dngos po
[\[20a.5\]]bdag med pa/_/de bzhin nyid dang chos gnas dang /_/rnam par mi rtog blo'i gzung ste/_/de shes par ni bya ba yang /_/dmigs pa la ni brten byas nas/_/mi dmigs pa ni rab tu skye/_/mi dmigs pa la brten byas nas/_/mi dmigs pa ni rab tu skye/_/brtags
[\[20a.6\]]pa nye bar mi dmigs shing /_/gzhan gyi dbang yang gzung med pas/_/de nyid mthong ba yongs grub pa'i/_/ngo bo nyid la blta ba yin/_/brtags pa rgyu mtshan bcas phyir dang /_/gzhan du gnyis po med phyir dang /_/kun nas nyon mongs dmigs pa'i phyir/_/gzhan dbang yod
[\[20a.7\]]pa nyid du 'dod/_shes rab pha rol phyin tshul 'di/_/thams cad mkhyen nyid thob pa yin/_/skye dang 'gag la sogs pa dag_/dgag pa lhur len ma yin no/_/'dir bshad de bzhin gshegs bka' kun/_/kho bo cag gi tshad ma yin/_/tshad ma yid ches lung yin
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]phyir/_/bzang po dag ni sgrub par byed/_/lung gzhan dag gis the tshom dang /_/log pa'i blo can gzhan mi byed/_/de phyir de dag sgrub gzhug phyir/_/rigs [#]pa ldan pa'i tshul btsal bya/_/gnyis med pa yi dngos po ni/_/rigs [#]pa ma yin 'gal ba'i phyir/_/nam
[\[20b.2\]]mkha'i me tog med dngos sam/_/de dngos yin par brtag mi bya/_/gal te yang dag brtags med phyir/_/de la dbye ba med snyam na/_/mtshan gzhi mtshan nyid rnam bzhag [#]la/_/de ni mtshungs phyir lan ma yin/_/gal te de dngos ma btang gang /_/de ni de dngos yin
[\[20b.3\]]'dod na/_/de ltar dngos nyid mi gtong ba/_/de phyir de ni dngos ma yin/_/des na de nyid gzigs rnams kyi/_/mkhyen pa dngos med dmigs par 'gyur/_/de yang chos bdag med yin te/_/med pa'i blo yi [#]rgyu phyir ro/_/gal te dngos med dmigs pa'i blo/_/
[\[20b.4\]]rnam par mi rtog yin 'dod na/_/des na gzugs blo mi rtog pa'ang /_/dam pa yin pa nyid du gyur[#]/_/gal te gzung bar snang 'dod pas/_/gzugs blo yang dag ma yin na/_/des na gtan tshigs 'khrul 'gyur zhing /_/dam bcas pa yang nyams par 'gyur/_/ngo bo
[\[20b.5\]]nyid la dmigs yin na/_/ston pa'i byang chub rtog can dang /_/dmigs pa can du 'gyur ba dang /_/rnam par mi rtog blor mi 'gyur/_/sems tsam du ni dmigs pa dang /_/gzugs la sogs pa mi 'dzin na/_/khas blangs pa dang grags pa yis[#]/_/dam bcas pa la gnod
[\[20b.6\]]par 'gyur/_/de ltar snang ba skye ba'i phyir/_/rmi lam gzugs sogs blo bzhin du/_/gzugs la sogs pa don med par/_/rnam par shes zhes byar mi rung /_/gang phyir rmi lam la sogs pa'i/_/rnam shes chos la dmigs pa'i phyir/_/de phyir dpe yang med pa
[\[20b.7\]]dang /_/yul la skur pa 'debs par 'gyur/_/gal te yul du snang ba nyid/_/sems kyi dmigs pa yin 'dod na/_/yul du snang ba ma gtogs par/_/sems kyi bdag nyid gzhan ci yod/_/gzhan ltar skyes phyir de gnyis snang /_/shel dang 'dra bar mi 'dod de/_/
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]nye bar bzhag [#]las der skye bas/_/shel gyi skad cig min phyir ro/_/de 'gags [#]gzhan ni skyes pa la/_/de yi blo ni 'khrul par 'dod/_/gnyis su snang med nus pa ni/_/tha dad min phyir yul snang bzhin/_/sems ni rang dang gzhan snang ba/_/
[\[21a.2\]]lhan cig 'dra bar 'byung ba'i phyir/_/gzugs brnyan bzhin du mi 'dod de/_/de phyir gnyis su snang ma yin/_/gal te tshad ma 'bras yod phyir/_/gnyis su snang bar 'dod ce na/_/gzhan du'ang de dag 'grub pa'i phyir/_/rtog [#]pa de yang mi 'dod do/_/yul du snang ba 'dzin
[\[21a.3\]]pa yi[#]/_/rnam par shes pa skye bzhin pas/_/gzhal bya gang yin 'jal byed pa/_/des na de ni tshad mar 'dod/_/bstan du med pa'i ngo bo nyid/_/de bzhin rtogs [#]pa gang thob pa/_/gal te smra 'dod bsgrub bya ba/_/phyi don sems kyi dngos nyid de/_/rnam par shes pa'i
[\[21a.4\]]yul yin phyir/_/dper na de ma thag bzhin na/_/des na sems byung so so yis[#]/_/gtan tshigs [#]'khrul pa nyid du 'gyur/_/mdo las sems tsam gsungs pa ni/_/byed po za po dgag phyir ro/_/gal te rnam brtags don mthong bas/_/rnam par shes pa
[\[21a.5\]]sgrub byed na/_/brtags pa ma yin don yod phyir/_/yul med par ni mi 'gyur ro/_/rmi lam la yang brtags min pa'i/_/ngo bo nyid blos ma nges 'gyur/_/dmigs pa med par mi 'dod de[#]/_/dpe ni rab tu ma grub phyir/_/ci ste blo yul rnam gnyis te/_/gcig dang
[\[21a.6\]]'dus pa yin snyam na/_/rigs [#]pas yongs su brtags pa na/_/de ni gnyi gar mi rigs so/_/de la gzugs rdul gcig pu ni/_/gzugs blo'i spyod yul ma yin te/_/de snang nyid du mi 'gyur phyir/_/dbang gzugs spyod yul ma yin bzhin/_/phra rab gzugs ni du
[\[21a.7\]]ma de/_/sems kyi spyod yul yin mi 'dod/_/rdzas su yod pa ma yin phyir/_/dper na zla ba gnyis bzhin no/_/de la gal te pha rol po/_/bsags pa min pa'i gzugs sems kyis/_/spyod yul min par sgrub byed na/_/der ni [#]grub pa nyid sgrub 'gyur/_/ci ste
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]bsags pa'i gzugs la ni/_/gtan tshigs ma grub nyid 'gyur te/_/gzugs gzhan dag gis [#]bsags pa ni/_/der snang blo ni skye phyir ro/_/de ni dmigs nyid yin [#]'dod de/_/der snang blo yi rgyur 'gyur phyir/_/'dod chags bzhin te de yi phyir/_/khyod dam bcas
[\[21b.2\]]la rjes dpag gnod/_/gal te rang blo dmigs med de/_/rang gi sa bon las skye'i phyir/_/yid blo bzhin 'dod brtags min phyir/_/khyod kyi dmigs bcas nyid du 'gyur/_/dmigs pa med pa rjes dpog [#]pas/_/de ni blo nyid ma yin 'gyur/_/'dus pa dam ni
[\[21b.3\]]ma bcas pas/_/de 'gog pa ni gnod pa med/_/mi rtog blo ni spang min te/_/'phags phyir rnam par mi rtog phyir/_/de skye thar pa ga la yod/_/de yi sa bon ma bcom phyir/_/gnyis kyi 'du shes 'jug pa na/_/sna tshogs snang ba rab tu skye/_/de yi sna tshogs
[\[21b.4\]]snang gang dang /_/de rang sa bon las skye'i phyir/_/zha [#]ba de la nus phul dang /_/rang bdag nyid dang gzhan las so/_/rnam par shes pa'i ming gis ni/_/de la bdag tu btags par 'gyur/_/gnyis yod sgyu ma lta bu dang /_/zad can ma zhi bdag med dang /_/gnyis
[\[21b.5\]]med mi zad yang dag dang /_/'chi med go 'phang mchog rtogs nas/_/de la 'dra ba med pa'i phyir/_/rnam par rtog pa rnam ldog pas/_/mi rtog blos ni dmigs byas pa'i/_/grol ba khyad par med par 'gyur/_/yang na sems tsam bsgrub pa'i phyir/_/sems las byung
[\[21b.6\]]rnams sems las ni/_/tha dad med par khas blang bya/_/yang na rnam rig tsam mi 'grub/_/yang na tshor sogs 'dus pa la/_/sems su gdags par 'dod par gyis/_/des na gzhan gyi rjes smra dang /_/rang gi gzhung yang btang bar 'gyur/_/kun nas nyon mongs rnam [#]byang
[\[21b.7\]]las/_/gal te sems ni rdzas 'dod na/_/tshor sogs de bzhin skye ba'i phyir/_/de grub pas na gnod pa med/_/ut+pal rtsa ba nus mang las/_/lo ma la sogs rgyun 'byung ltar/_/de bzhin sems rdzas med pa las/_/rgyun rnams sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur/_/gnyen pos
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]skye bar mi 'gyur zhing /_/byed rgyu yod na skye bar 'gyur/_/'di las sna tshogs skyes la sogs/_/brtags pa mi 'dod rdzas med phyir/_/de la dmigs pas mi 'grol te/_/blo 'gag med pa'ang ma yin pas/_/de phyir kun rdzob don dam du'ang /_/
[\[22a.2\]]bdag tu smra dang 'dra mi 'gyur/_/gzugs la sogs pa stong pa ste/_/ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes phyir/_/rdzas su med phyir 'jig pa'i phyir/_/sgyu ma bzhin goms chags med 'gyur/_/gzugs la sogs pa yod kyang ni/_/yang dag ji bzhin rtogs gyur pa/_/de yod
[\[22a.3\]]ma yin de yi tshe/_/log 'dzin ci phyir mi ldog 'gyur/_/gnyis su rnam par rtog pa dag_/sems dang sems byung spyod yul na/_/gzugs la sogs pa dgag byas kyang /_/'jug par mi 'gyur mi rigs so/_/gal te de ni dgag pa'i phyir/_/sgrub gzhan yongs su
[\[22a.4\]]'dzin 'dod na/_/'dam rdzab 'khru bar byed pa bas/_/ma reg par ni bsrings na bzang /_/kun brtags [#]yod pa ma yin te/_/btags phyir sbrul dang 'drar mi 'dod/_/thag pa'i dngos por ma nges phyir/_/yang na grags pas gnod par 'gyur/_/de ni 'khrul min
[\[22a.5\]]gang gi phyir/_/du ma'i cha de mthong phyir ro/_/khyod ni [#]dngos la skur 'debs 'gyur/_/rnam pa kun tu yul 'gog phyir/_/de med par yang kun nyon mongs/_/ming las don 'jug las 'byung min/_/smra mi shes pa'i dud 'gro yang /_/nyon mongs skye ba mthong
[\[22a.6\]]phyir ro/_/gzugs ni gzugs kyi [#]ngo bos stong /_/gzugs zhes brjod la ltos bcas [#]par/_/gzugs blo skye bar 'gyur phyir zhes/_/brtag pa bzod par mi 'gyur ro/_/gzugs ni stong nyid mi rigs te/_/gzugs min bdag nyid rnam bcas pa'i/_/dngos
[\[22a.7\]]por snang blo spyod yul gyi[#]/_/gzugs kyi bdag nyid de yod phyir/_/mngon par brjod bya spyi yin na/_/spyi ni ci yang yod min pas/_/des [#]na mngon brjod bdag nyid kyis/_/stong pa 'thad par mi 'gyur ro/_/brjod bya spyi ldan dngos po de/_/der snang blo yi rgyu yin phyir/_/de ni de
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]bdag nyid yod pas/_/brjod med nyid du mi rigs so/_/rigs mi mthun pas stong nyid de/_/blo mthun 'jug pa'i rgyu yin phyir/_/rigs mthun pa la mthun pas na/_/spyi zhes bya bar nges pa yin/_/gzhi ma bzung na gzung [#]med de/_/de bzung gzung [#]du yod pa'i phyir/_/grangs
[\[22b.2\]]bzhin des na dngos de ni/_/brtag bya brjod par 'dod gzhan min/_/dbyer med phyir na gcig pa dang /_/rdzas med phyir na du mar 'jug_/de nyams na yang mi nyams phyir/_/gzhan la'ang de 'dod ma yin min/_/sngon min ut+pal ma yin pa/_/med pa'i dngos pos ma bsal
[\[22b.3\]]bas/_/gzhi mthun ldan pa nyid yin te/_/gnyi ga don gcig 'jug phyir ro/_/gzhan sel gzhan gyi spyi ma yin/_/chos gzhan yin phyir khyad par bzhin/_/lkog shal la sogs blo dbye med/_/med la khyad par med phyir ro/_/dngos ma bzung bar de 'dzin phyir/_/brtag bya brjod
[\[22b.4\]]min yin mi 'dod/_/de yi sgo nas gzhan brjod na/_/de ni brjod bya'i nyid sogs nyams/_/de ni gzhan gyi ngo bo na/_/des na brjod med nyid mi rigs/_/de phyir rnal 'byor spyod pa yi/_/tshul gyis smra ba mi rigs so/_/dngos rnams ngo bo nyid med de/_/mngon brjod bdag nyid stong phyir
[\[22b.5\]]ro/_/de nyid kyis de skye med phyir/_/ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags nyid/_/gang phyir mngon brjod ldan dngos ni/_/ji ltar brjod pa de ltar med/_/de phyir chos rnams dngos med nyid/_/ces bya la sogs gang smras [#]dang /_/gzhan dbang yod pa nyid smras pa/_/kun rdzob tu ni grub
[\[22b.6\]]pa sgrub/_/gal te don dam dpe med cing /_/gtan tshigs 'gal ba nyid du 'gyur/_/gal te gzhan dbang ngo bo nyid/_/skye ba ngo bo nyid med de/_/yod par gyur las ma skyes na/_/skye 'gag la sogs 'gal sgrub yin/_/rkyen rnams las ni gang skyes pa/_/de skye med par
[\[22b.7\]]thub pas gsungs/_/don dam du na dngos nyid las/_/de yi skye ba dgag phyir ro/_/chos rnams yang dag nyid min phyir/_/de dag [#]kun rdzob blo dang sgra/_/sna tshogs rang spyi'i spyod yul du/_/'gyur ba la ni 'gal ba med/_/ming ni gang dang gang dag gis/_/chos rnams
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]gang dang gang brjod pa/_/de la de ni yod min pa/_/de ni chos rnams chos nyid do/_/ci ste rkyen 'byung ngo bo yis/_/gzhan gyi dbang las skye 'dod na/_/rgyu bzhin yang dag nyid min pas/_/'dod pa sgrub par byed pa yin/_/gzhan gyi dbang
