[\[23a.2\]]yang gzung med pa/_/ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes 'dod/_/don dam du ni skyes pa la/_/log par snang ba mi rigs phyir/_/gal te ji ltar snang ba ltar/_/der snang bdag nyid yod gyur na/_/ji ltar snang ba der yod phyir/_/chos rnams ji ltar sgyu ma bzhin/_/ma skyes pa dang ma
[\[23a.3\]]'gags dang /_/dngos med ngo bo nyid med pa'ang /_/yod pa nyid las ma skyes dang /_/rdzas su yod pa ma yin phyir/_/gdags pa [#]skyon chags nyid med de/_/rnam rig tsam du mtshungs phyir ro/_/spang dang spong byed yod pa'i phyir/_/yongs shes sogs yod gang gir 'dod/_/
[\[23a.4\]]de ni gang phyir [#]rdzas med kyang /_/rnam rtog bral bas thar par 'gyur/_/rdzas yod nyid na'ang skye med phyir/_/'di las bzhin [#]du brtag mi 'dod/_/dngos rnams ngo bo nyid med na/_/gdags pa'ang yod par mi 'gyur bas/_/de ni med par lta ba dag_/mi gleng bstan par bya
[\[23a.5\]]min dang /_/rang yang ngan song gzhol ba dang /_/gzhan yang phung [#]bar byed pa yin/_/zhe sdang sha rul sgregs pa 'di/_/nga rgyal ma zhu ston pa yin/_/chos rnams sgyu ma bzhin 'dod de/_/ngo bo nyid ni med phyir dang /_/byis pa rmongs pa'i rgyu phyir dang /_/ma byung ba las
[\[23a.6\]]'byung phyir ro/_/rnam par mi rtog dngos po ni/_/mkha' dang mtshungs pa nyid mi rigs/_/rnam rtog 'du shes sna tshogs kyi/_/go skabs rab tu 'byed phyir ro/_/skyes pa brjod med nyid mi rigs/_/dgag pa gong du bstan phyir ro/_/brjod du med nyid yin gyur na'ang /_/
[\[23a.7\]]kun rdzob la ni de nyid nor/_/de la de nyid gzhan med phyir/_/gal te de nyid mthong 'dod na/_/bum la'ang bum pa gzhan med pas/_/ci phyir de nyid mthong mi 'dod/_/khyod kyi tshul skyon sba phyir gyi/_/de ni [#]nyon mongs byang [#]mi 'gyur/_/gser la sogs pa rkyen rnams kyi/_/
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]rjes su 'gyur ba yin phyir ro/_/nam mkha' rtag tu rnam dag ste/_/mig ni dag dang ma dag pas/_/dri bcas dri med mkha' 'dod dang /_/chos rnams chos nyid de bzhin no/_/ma dag la sogs blo 'khrul te/_/byed pa'i chos yin las kyi min/_/de la dmigs pa dag [#]
[\[23b.2\]]ma yin/_/de nyid dmigs byar mi 'dod do/_/de nyid rdzas su yod yin na/_/skyon ni snga ma bzhin du 'gyur/_/'jig rten 'das pa rnam mi rtog_/de blor mi 'dod 'jig phyir ro/_/de srid shes pa dmigs yod pa/_/de srid shes bya'i rjes 'jug nyid/_/thams cad mkhyen
[\[23b.3\]]nyid cig car min/_/shes pa rang la 'jug pa ni/_/med phyir ral gri'i so bzhin dang /_/rang rig 'gog par byed phyir ro/_/rnam par mi rtog 'phags blo'i gzung /_/rnam pa kun tu brjod med nyid/_/sngar bzhin skye ba bkag pa'i phyir/_/skye med rdzas su yod min phyir/_/
[\[23b.4\]]yod dang med pa'i dngos nyid kyi/_/ngo bo don dam nyid yin na/_/sgro 'dogs pa dang skur mtha' las/_/grol ba khyod la ji ltar yod/_/yod min de nyid skye med phyir/_/med min de yod ma yin phyir/_/yod dang med pa gnyis spangs pas/_/de 'dod de phyir gnyis su
[\[23b.5\]]med/_/ston pa dmigs med mi 'gyur te/_/de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa'i phyir/_/byang chub mnyam nyid mi 'gyur te/_/de nyid rang snang tha dad phyir/_/de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa'i blo/_/nus pa ma bzhag ga las 'byung /_/nam mkha'i me tog snang ba'i blo/_/nus pa ma
[\[23b.6\]]bzhag mi rigs [#]bzhin/_/rang tshul sbed pas khyod kyis ni/_/de nyid gcig nyid gzhan mi 'grol/_/rdzas med dmigs su med pa'i phyir/_/nged la ji skad smras de [#]rigs/_/nam mkha' 'dra ba'ang skye med pas/_/khyad par med phyir ma gos phyir/_/shin tu brjod du med nyid
[\[23b.7\]]kyang /_/blos ni rnam kun gzung med phyir/_/skye ba rab rib bral ba'i blo/_/'jig rten 'das pa yin par 'dod/_/'jig rten las sgrol don phyir dang /_/'jig rten shin tu 'da' phyir ro/_/de ni mi rtogs dmigs med dang /_/mtshan ma med cing de yis ni/_/rang gzhan chos nyid
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]cig char du/_/rtogs med tshul gyis mnyam nyid rtogs/_/chos rnams skye ba med pa ni/_/chos bdag med pa nyid ces bya/_/de la rtog dri'i mtshan ma dag_/'byung ba med pa snga ma bzhin/_/gal te de nyid rtog ge yi/_/spyod yul min phyir rjes dpag
[\[24a.2\]]pas/_/de mi rtogs pa de yi phyir/_/chos rnams chos nyid brtag [#]min na/_/'di la rjes dpag skyon med pa/_/lung gis [#]rjes su sgrub byed pas/_/brtags [#]pa'i rnam rtog chu bo dag_/sna tshogs ma lus bsal mdzad nas/_/sangs rgyas rnam rtog mi mnga' ba/_/dgongs pa
[\[24a.3\]]mkha' mnyam ye shes kyi/_/shes bya mtha' dag ji bzhin du/_/chos rnams bzhag pa nyid rtogs shing /_/ming la sogs pa thob pa nyid/_/des na rjes su dpag pa'i yul/_/de nyid yin par sgrub mi nus/_/de nyid shes pa'i mi mthun phyogs/_/gang yin de ni des zlog byed/_/
[\[24a.4\]]lung gi [#]khyad par tha dad pas/_/tha dad gyur pa'i blo la ci/_/lung gi dbye ba med pa la/_/rtogs [#]par gyur pa gzhan ci yod/_/mi mthun phyogs ni spang bya na[#]/_/dam bcas tsam gyis ji ltar 'dod/_/rnam par rtog pa ma spangs par/_/rnam par mi rtog blo ji ltar/_/thub pa bden pa
[\[24a.5\]]gzigs pa yi/_/'di ltar bden pa gnyis su gsungs/_/tha snyad la ni brten [#]nas su/_/de nyid don ni rtogs 'gyur phyir/_/de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa'i blo/_/dmigs dang bcas phyir brdzun yin te/_/rmi lam sogs yin de shes bya/_/des na de nyid yin mi rigs/_/gzung du med
[\[24a.6\]]pa brjod med pa/_/shes pa'i spyod pa rnam [#]spangs pa/_/thub pa'i dbang pos gsungs pa'i chos/_/de yis 'di ltar 'di la gnod/_/de ltar lung rigs ldan pa yi/_/de nyid gang zhig sngar bstan pa/_/rigs pas yongs su brtags na yang /_/de la nyams pa med par gnas/_/kha
[\[24a.7\]]cig phung po'i ljon shing chags/_/kha cig rnam shes [#]rgyal thogs/_/yang dag mtha' yi g.yang sar yang /_/ma lhung [#]rgyal ba'i thugs [#]sras rol/_/shes bya rnam kun ma grub phyir/_/gang la rnam par mi rtog pa'i/_/blo yang skye bar mi 'gyur ba/_/de nyid mnyam med de mkhyen gsung /_/
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]dbu ma'i snying po las rnal 'byor spyod pa pa'i de kho na nyid gtan la dbab pa la 'jug pa ste le'u lnga pa'o//_//rang bzhin gang zhig rtogs pa med[#]/_/yon tan gsum dang skyed bdag nyid/_/de las bzlog pas skyes bu nyid/_/'di dag rtag tu goms par bya/_/rtsa ba'i
[\[24b.2\]]rang bzhin mi 'gyur ba/_/chen po la sogs rnam pa bdun/_/rang bzhin 'gyur ba bdun nyid do/_/'gyur ba rnam pa bcu drug kyang /_/rang bzhin 'gyur ba min skyes bu/_/yid las [#]snying stobs skyes pa can/_/skyes bu'i gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'am/_/de bzhin yongs su gyur
[\[24b.3\]]nas ni/_/blo 'jug pa yi rjes su byed/_/bdag kyang gzhan la rang bzhin gzhan/_/'di ltar de nyid mthong ba yi/_/byed dang bya ba ldog pa yi/_/skyes bu grol ba yin zhes brjod/_/bdag dang bdag med rtogs pa'am/_/don byas pa na rjes gzung [#]ba/_/rang bzhin gyis ni grol yin
[\[24b.4\]]phyir/_/de nyid yin par grangs can smra/_/de la gtso bo skyes bu ni/_/ji ltar mi rigs las sngar bstan/_/de yang yang 'dir brtag bya ste/_/bdag ni rtogs [#]pa ma yin no/_/shes bya rtogs pas rtogs yin na/_/shes bya med pas de yang med/_/rtogs pa can nam rtogs [#]med pa/_/
[\[24b.5\]]'dir ni bdag tu gang zhig 'gyur/_/ma bsregs sreg [#]par mi rigs te/_/bsregs pa med phyir de sngon bzhin/_/des na sreg byed dpe yis ni/_/rtogs pa'i bdag nyid grub ma yin/_/shes bya'i rnam pa 'dzin byed pas/_/shes la rtogs pa zhes 'dod de/_/dngos po byed pa
[\[24b.6\]]la brten phyir/_/de yang skyes bu 'di la brten/_/brtags pa byas pa yin na ni/_/skyes bu 'gyur med rang gi yul/_/de dang 'di ni lugs 'dis 'gal/_/shes las rtogs pa gzhan min pas/_/ci zhig gzhan du brtag par bya/_/rtogs pa blo gros ma yin te/_/rgyu dang ldan phyir
[\[24b.7\]]bum pa bzhin/_/des na rtogs pa shes pa min/_/gal te blo la de snyam na/_/rtogs las shes pa gzhan yin par/_/sgrub byed ce na dpe yang med/_/shes pa'ang de dngos med ce na/_/khas blangs pa yis gnod pa yin/_/ma skyes pa ni rtogs min te/_/ma skyes phyir na rigs
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]ldan min/_/blo yi 'jug pa'i khyad par ni/_/gang phyir shes la [#]'jug 'dod na'ang /_/tha dad khyad can nyid 'gyur gyi/_/de med pas na de yang med/_/gal te bdag gi blo gang yang /_/la lar ji bzhin don du 'dod/_/la lar de las bzlog
[\[25a.2\]]nyid de/_/mtho la mtho yi blo bzhin no/_/la lar ji ltar ji bzhin don/_/zhe na kun rdzob grub pa sgrub/_/ji bzhin don gyi sems kyi yul/_/bdag ces bya bar bdag cag 'dod/_/ci ste kun la khyab sogs kyi/_/mtshan nyid can blo don bzhin na/_/de nyid du 'am kun rdzob tu'ang /_/dpe
[\[25a.3\]]ni yod pa ma yin no/_/rtogs pa med pas rtogs pa ni/_/rang bzhin rtogs pa med pa'am/_/gang gi de nyid shes skye bas/_/gang zhig grol bar 'gyur ba yin/_/rtogs pas 'dzin par byed pa na/_/bdag ni 'di ltar zhes sogs des/_/rtogs [#]pa med phyir gzhan mi rigs/_/de med
[\[25a.4\]]gyur na yang ci zhig_/'di yi ldog pa'ang rigs min te/_/mang po dag dang thun mong phyir/_/ji ltar rje gcig shi gyur kyang /_/tshogs pa dag gi [#]bran bzhin 'dod/_/tha dad yul la ma bsgribs [#]phyir/_/ji ltar bdag gi dbye ba las/_/skyes bu'i yid la snying stobs dag_/lhag pas de nyid
[\[25a.5\]]mthong bar 'dod/_/sgra la sogs pa rtogs pa dang /_/de bzhin chos dang chos min dag_/skyon ni rjes su mtshungs pa'i phyir/_/ma mthong nges pa med pa'ang yin/_/gal te skyes bu 'gyur zhe na/_/skyes bu rtogs pa med pa dang /_/rgyu med khyab pa ma yin te/_/skyes bu 'gyur phyir 'o ma bzhin/_/
[\[25a.6\]]sems ni 'gyur ba med na yang /_/gzugs brnyan gyi ni rgyu yin phyir/_/ji skad smras pa'i skyon ldan par/_/'gyur te [#]gdong gi gzugs brnyan bzhin/_/skyes bu rtog pa med pa'i phyir/_/bdag dang gzhan zhes mi rigs so/_/brtags nas skyon med ce na yang /_/grol ba brtags pa nyid du
[\[25a.7\]]'gyur/_/gtso bo yod de sna tshogs kyi/_/rjes su 'gro phyir yongs gyur [#]phyir/_/bya dang byed pa'i ngo bo'i phyir/_/nus phyir sna tshogs ngo bo'i phyir/_/ji skad smras pa [#]de bzhin te/_/snod chag pa yi dum sogs ltar/_/de bzhin dbye ba de dang ldan/_/des na dbye ba rgyu dang bcas/_/dbye rnams rgyu dang
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]bcas nyid du/_/sgrub byed ce na grub pa sgrub/_/kun la khyab par ma grub ste/_/'di yi gtan tshigs ma grub phyir/_/spyi ni sngon du song 'dod de/_/spyi dang ldan pa'i phyir zhe na/_/spyi nyid dam ni khyad par la/_/snga ma bzhin du dpe yang med/_/bde la sogs pa'i ngo bo'i phyir/_/tshor ba'i phung po
[\[25b.2\]]bzhin mi 'dod/_/phung po yin phyir bde sdug sogs/_/so sor ma nges pa nyid yin/_/ma nges pa yis spangs pas [#]na/_/de ltar don byed bdag nyid yin/_/rgyu dang ldan pa yin pa'i phyir/_/[#]rjes 'gro sogs kyi [#]rjes dpag gi_/dam bcas skyon gyis gnod pa yin/_/skye med mtha' med nyid
[\[25b.3\]]sogs kyi/_/de yis [#]khyad par spangs pas na/_/gtso bo'i yon tan 'dod pa yi/_/gtan tshigs ma nges pa nyid yin/_/de bzhin tha dad rgyu las kyang /_/'byung bar 'dod pa'i dpe yod min/_/tsan+dan dum bur gyur pa na/_/nyams pa min par rtogs bya ste/_/stobs dang gzugs dang tshad
[\[25b.4\]]la sogs/_/nye bar gnas te bdag nyid bzhin/_/nus pa'i bdag nyid nyid du ste/_/yod na sngar bzhin dpe mi 'grub/_/gsal [#]ba'i ngo bor de yod na'ang /_/grub pa'i mtha' ni spang bar [#]'gyur/_/bya dang byed pa gcig nyid du/_/sgrub na'ang smras pa'i tshul nyid yin/_/rigs mthun
[\[25b.5\]]nyid la gcig nyid du/_/sgrub [#]na'ang grub pa sgrub [#]pa yin/_/de las don gzhan tog [#]na yang /_/snga ma bzhin du skyon kun 'byung /_/bde dang sdug bsngal sogs kun du/_/gtan tshigs ma nges pa nyid yin/_/dus dbyer med pas gzhan min na'ang /_/grags dang lung dang 'gal ba
[\[25b.6\]]nyid/_/tsan+dan ngo bo mi mngon pas/_/med par grub pa ma yin te/_/dus dang drug pas bstan pa'i phyir/_/de [#]ltar skad cig bzhin zhe na/_/de lta na yang spro gyur nas/_/rang gi lugs kyi skyon sbed kyang /_/smras pa'i skyon rnams med min te/_/gyen du skra 'greng bum 'dra bzhin/_/de
[\[25b.7\]]gzugs she na gtan tshigs don/_/rnam par rtog pa ma nges nyid/_/dbyer med ngo bo yin na yang /_/gtan tshigs ma nges pa nyid yin/_/rna sogs spyad bya ba yin te/_/rtogs [#]pa med phyir gal te 'dod/_/khyad par dag ni ma bstan par/_/spyad bya'o zhe na grub pa sgrub/_/ci ste g.yo ba med
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]sogs kyi/_/khyad par can na rjes 'gro gang /_/rtogs par bden yang rtsol med phyir/_/spyod pa por ni mi 'dod do/_/dngos rnams bya ba med nyid du/_/rab tu rtogs te gzhal bya'i phyir/_/smras pa ci [#]ltar de de ltar/_/rtogs te bde dang gti mug bzhin/_/bya
[\[26a.2\]]ba med par sdug bsngal yang /_/shes par bya ste rgyud ldan phyir/_/rtogs pa med phyir brjod bya'i phyir/_/gzhal bya yin phyir gti mug bzhin/_/rjes 'gro la sogs gtan tshigs rnams/_/tha dad nyid du 'dod pas na/_/gtso bo'i yon tan la de rnams/_/ma nges ma yin pa de
[\[26a.3\]]bden/_/bya dang byed pa sgrub bcas phyir/_/rgyu dang ldan par rjes dpag nyid/_/gtan tshigs rnams kyang khyad bcas pas/_/de ltar 'gal ba nyid du 'gyur/_/de ma bzung bar mi 'dzin pas/_/gzugs sogs gzhan min de dngos [#]bzhin/_/tha dad dngos phyir gzhan min
[\[26a.4\]]min/_/gang de rtogs bya rtogs byed phyir/_/des na mi mngon ma yin la/_/bya bar yod pa'ang mi 'dod do/_/da ltar gyi na skad cig kyang /_/rjes [#]su yod par ma grags nyid/_/spyod dang [#]bcas pa'i spyad bya 'di/_/spyad bya yin phyir mal sogs bzhin/_/rtogs pa po ni spyod
[\[26a.5\]]pa nyid/_/de yi sgrub par byed pa min/_/rtogs pa nges par rtogs yin na/_/de ni gang gi yin pa smros/_/dngos po byed po la brten te/_/gos sogs tshon du btsos pa bzhin/_/sgra sogs shes par mi 'gyur ba/_/yin na'ang shes pa ji ltar yin/_/sgra sogs shes par 'gyur ba nyid/_/
[\[26a.6\]]yin na'ang shes pa ji ltar yin/_/byed pa med pa ma skyes phyir/_/byed po nyid du ji ltar 'dod/_/ma skyes pa la bdogs [#]na yang /_/skyes bu btags pa pa ru 'gyur/_/byed po'i sgra yis [#]brjod bya'i phyir/_/me bzhin khyod kyi [#]skyes bu yang /_/rgyu bcas bya bcas spyad bya dang /_/bya ba rab tu bskyed
[\[26a.7\]]pa'ang yin/_/kun khyab ma yin rang bzhin las/_/gzhan pa ma yin skyes bu min/_/de yi [#]rang dngos khyad par ni/_/de yis 'di ltar spong bar 'gyur/_/des na khas blangs pa de la/_/gnod phyir dam bcas skyon med min/_/ji ltar dbang phyug rgyur smra [#]bzhin/_/rtogs [#]pa la sogs
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]spangs pa yin/_/bdag dang bdag gi min rtogs pa/_/blo yi [#]rjes su rtogs pa yi/_/lta ba log pas grol bar ni/_/khyod kyi skyes bu 'gyur mi rigs/_/skyes bu tha dad mthong ba yis[#]/_/thar pa 'thob [#]pa ma yin te/_/blo gzhan yin phyir spyad bya dang /_/skyes bu gzhan nyid mthong ba
[\[26b.2\]]bzhin/_/ji ltar rnam rtog bcas pa'i phyir/_/mi ni tha dad mthong ba ltar/_/skyes bu tha dad mthong ba yis/_/de bzhin grol ba mi 'dod do/_/de ltar grangs can de nyid ni/_/sngon dang phyi mar 'gal ba dang /_/rigs pa dang ni mi ldan la/_/mkhas pa rnams kyi blo mi 'jug_/n+ya gro d+ha yi [#]
[\[26b.3\]]sa bon gyi/_/nang na yod pa'i n+ya gro dang /_/bud med skyes pa 'grogs la bu/_/rnga yi nang na sgra gnas dang /_/zas kyi nang na phyi sa sogs/_/shing la 'bar yod mi mthong zhes/_/gang zhig mngon sum spong byed pa/_/de ni bden smra ji ltar yin/_/de ni yod kyang mi gsal bas/_/
[\[26b.4\]]des na bya ba mngon [#]ma mthong /_/zhe na mi gsal med min pas/_/e ma'o bstan bcos shin tu legs/_/dbu ma'i snying po las grangs can gyi de kho na nyid la 'jug pa ste le'u drug pa'o//_//blo sogs bdag gi yon tan bcad/_/drungs nas phyung ba'i rnal 'byor pa/_/
[\[26b.5\]]yid la bdag ces gnas pa ni/_/bye brag pa yis [#]thar par shes/_/rgyas par sngar bstan rim pa yis/_/mi bden skye ba bkag pa'am/_/dngos po yongs su bkag pas na/_/'dod dang sdang sogs yon tan med/_/ma skyes byed por mi rung ste/_/bya ba nges par bya ba la/_/byed
[\[26b.6\]]po yin phyir sbrang rtsi'i rgyu/_/nam mkha'i me tog min pa bzhin/_/ma skyes skyes pa ma yin te/_/nam mkha'i me tog ma skyes bzhin/_/'byung ba'i ngo bo la sogs kyi/_/don dam par na yod min te/_/rtag pa'i bdag la shes mi brten/_/rgyu dang ldan phyir bum pa bzhin/_/blo ni bdag gi yon
[\[26b.7\]]tan du/_/mi rigs skye dang ldan pa'i phyir/_/ji ltar de yi yon tan du/_/gzugs la sogs pa mi 'dod bzhin/_/'du ba yin phyir bdag med pas/_/rigs te mi rtag pa yi phyir/_/de ltar bde dang sdug bsngal sogs/_/dgag pa mthar thug [#]shes par bya/_/yid ni rtag pa [#]min par
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]'dod/_/brjod bya yin phyir bum pa bzhin/_/'di ni bdag gi byed pa min/_/dngos po yin phyir bde ba bzhin/_/bdag yod pa ni bkag zin kyang /_/'dir yang brtag par bya ba ste/_/brten nas byung ba ma yin phyir/_/bdag med nam mkha'i me tog bzhin/_/
[\[27a.2\]]de yi spyi ni yod par yang /_/khas len pa yang brtag par bya/_/'di ni khyab min rtag pa min/_/rtogs bya yin phyir bum pa bzhin/_/blo skye 'gyur dang bcas she na/_/khyod kyi bdag nyid nyams par 'gyur/_/'on te 'gyur med shes pa min/_/shes dang shes min ji ltar rung /_/'du ba
[\[27a.3\]]dgag pa byas pas na/_/de dang 'brel pa'ang rigs pa min/_/bde dang sdug bsngal 'bad dang 'dod/_/sdang la sogs kyang tshul 'di yin/_/brtag [#]pa'i bdag la bde mi rten[#]/_/rgyu dang ldan phyir bum pa bzhin/_/yang na bdag gi yon tan ni/_/bde ba yin par ma rtogs [#]te/_/skye
[\[27a.4\]]dang ldan phyir gzugs la sogs/_/de yi yon tan mi 'dod bzhin/_/yang na 'di dag 'du ba ni/_/bdag la yod par ma rtogs [#]nyid/_/lhan cig yod chen dang 'brel bar/_/yod dang [#]med pa mi rigs so/_/yod na'ang de [#]sbyor don med la/_/med na de yang med par 'gyur/_/gsal
[\[27a.5\]]bar byed pa chos gzhan phyir/_/de ni gsal byed ji ltar yin/_/grangs la sogs dang 'brel ba yang /_/'di nyid kyis ni lan btab po/_/gal te spyi sogs dang 'brel bas/_/skyes bu spyi dang gcig rtogs [#]par/_/de sogs rkyen dang phrad tsam gyis/_/skyes bu 'byung bar 'dod
[\[27a.6\]]na ni/_/yod min med min du ma min/_/gcig min phra min chen po min/_/'di ni rtag min mi rtag min/_/gzhan min gzhan min min de nyid/_/ji ltar bdag bzhin tshig gi don/_/gzhan yang 'di ltar stong pa de/_/'bad nas gsangs [#]su zin kyang ni/_/gzegs zan pa yis gsal
[\[27a.7\]]bar byas/_/'di dag mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i phyir/_/de nyid mthong bar mi rigs so/_/mtshan ma mi bden par skyes pa'i/_/ngo bo rtag par mi bden 'dod/_/bdag las tha dad gyur pa'i don/_/de dang 'brel par mi 'dod de/_/yod pa'i blo phyir blo spyi la/_/spyi zhes bya bar 'dod
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]pa bzhin/_/de bzhin grangs sogs 'brel pa yang /_/bdag gam gzhan pa la la la/_/mkhas pas ji ltar rigs pa bzhin/_/blo de min par rtogs [#]par bya/_/bdag ni blo dang sdug bsngal dang /_/bde sogs yon tan dang mi [#]'bral/_/yon tan yin phyir grangs bzhin no/_/
[\[27b.2\]]de phyir yon tan med bdag min/_/yul dang ngo bor dbyer med kyang /_/gang zhig rang gi bdag nyid 'gyur/_/bdag dang sbyor bar 'dod pa las/_/dran nas shes pa kun tu 'byung /_/ma mthong nges pa'ang sngar bzhin du/_/thal 'gyur lan yang 'di la yin/_/med pa'i skye ba bkag
[\[27b.3\]]pas na/_/de yi sbyor ba'ang mi 'dod do/_/yid dang bdag gi med pa la/_/rten dang brten par mi 'dod do/_/bdag dang yid ni yod na yang /_/rten dang brten par mi 'dod do/_/rnam rtog rgyu mtshan bcas pa'i phyir/_/rdzas sogs mthong bas grol bar ni/_/ji ltar 'ug pa mi 'dod
[\[27b.4\]]pa/_/de bzhin 'ug pa pa mi 'dod/_/sa sogs de nyid 'byung ba'i blo/_/thar pa min par gzegs zan 'dod/_/khyad par dag ni mi 'dzin phyir/_/'tsho ba'i de nyid blo bzhin no/_/bye brag pa yi de nyid la'ang /_/lta ngan rab rib skyes pas na/_/des na rigs [#]pa dang bral
[\[27b.5\]]phyir/_/blo ni dga' bar mi bya'o/_/dbu ma'i snying po las bye brag pa'i de kho na nyid la 'jug pa ste le'u bdun pa'o//_//rig byed mthar smras smras pa ni/_/'dus byas stong par smra ba yi/_/phyi rol pa la bdag rig dkon/_/bdag sdang [#]thar pa ga la yod/_/mun pa
[\[27b.6\]]las gzhan skyes bu ni/_/chen por gyur pa nyi ma'i 'od/_/dbang phyug chen po bdag de nyid/_/mkhas pas shes na 'chi med 'gyur/_/byed po dbang phyug gser mdog tu/_/gang gis mthong zhing blta ba de/_/sdig dang bsod nams las 'das nas/_/mchog tu zhi ba thob
[\[27b.7\]]par 'gyur/_/byung gyur byung dang 'byung ba dag_/thams cad skyes bu yin 'dod de/_/de ni phyi nang ring ba dang /_/de ni nye [#]dang de las byed/_/srid pa sna tshogs de las skyes/_/dar gyi srin bu'i skud pa bzhin/_/mkhas pa de yi char thim pa/_/yang srid len par mi 'gyur ro/_/'chi
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]bcas rnams la bdud rtsi med/_/me la grang ba ji bzhin no/_/des na bdud rtsi skyes bu nyid/_/ma rtogs bdud rtsi yod mi rigs/_/gang las mchog gyur gzhan med phyir/_/gang las dam pa gzhan med la[#]/_/'di las phra gyur gzhan med pas/_/sna tshogs 'di
[\[28a.2\]]dag rgyu gcig nyid/_/de ni phra dang rags dang ldan/_/yang ldan gtso bo dbang bsgyur [#]ba/_/rab phye 'dod pa'i mthar thug gang /_/rnal 'byor ji ltar 'dod par 'gro/_/der ni 'byung ba thams cad kyang /_/bdag nyid du ni 'dus par mthong /_/byis dang mkhas dang gdol pa dang /_/
[\[28a.3\]]bram ze sogs rnams mnyam pa nyid/_/bum pa 'byung zhing 'jig pa ltar/_/nam mkha' de yi bdag nyid min/_/lus can 'byung zhing 'jig pa ltar/_/de bdag yin pas bdag mi 'dod/_/bum pa'i nam mkha' bzhin du gcig_/du ma'o zhe na bum pa dag_/chag na
[\[28a.4\]]dbyer [#]med gcig nyid du/_/thams cad mnyam [#]par 'gyur bar 'dod/_/ji ltar bum sogs tha dad kyang /_/sa la tha dad 'ga' yang med/_/de bzhin lus ni tha dad kyang /_/bdag la tha dad 'ga' yang med/_/ji ltar bum pa'i nam mkha' gcig_/rdul dang du bas
[\[28a.5\]]bsgribs pa na/_/thams cad de bzhin ma yin ltar/_/bde sogs de bzhin bdag la min/_/bdag ma shes shing ma rtogs pas/_/rmi lam longs spyod nga rgyal bzhin/_/las rnams sogs shing dge ba dang /_/mi dge'i 'bras bu spyod pa yin/_/lus la gnas kyang
[\[28a.6\]]ma chags dang /_/spyod par byed kyang mi gos te/_/'dod bzhin spyod kyang rgyal po bzhin/_/sdig pas gnod par mi 'gyur ro/_/gcig po [#]kun khyab rtag pa ste/_/tshangs mchog 'chi ba med pa'i gnas/_/rnal 'byor pa yis goms byas na/_/de ni yang srid len mi
[\[28a.7\]]'gyur/_/de ni rtag par rtog med pa/_/gang [#]gi spyod yul gang ma gyur/_/blo ni dbye bas phrogs rnams kyis/_/de la tshig tu sbyor bar byed/_/phyogs su lhung ba ma yin pas/_/'dir ni 'di yang 'di ltar dpyad/_/phyogs la chags pas bsgribs pa'i blos/_/ji ltar
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]bden pa'ang rtogs mi 'gyur/_/bdag yod pas ni bkag pa na/_/'gro ba'i rgyu yang de bzhin te/_/des na de mthong grol ba ni/_/mi bden par ni rab brtags nyid/_/byol song rnams la 'jig [#]tshogs lta/_/lhan cig skyes yod zhi ma gyur/_/kun nyon mongs kun rtsa ba'i
[\[28b.2\]]phyir/_/de nyid khyod kyis [#]shin tu spel/_/'jig tshogs lta la zhen pa yi/_/bdag 'dzin bdag gir [#]'dzin pa dag_/gang las 'khor bar 'byung 'gyur ba/_/de nyid grol ba yin par smra/_/myos par gyur la myos 'gyur bzhin/_/de lta ba yis [#]zhi gyur na/_/shin tu ma
[\[28b.3\]]zhu'i nad ldan la/_/kha zas zos pas phan par 'gyur/_/rig byed smra bas bdag de ni/_/rnam pa gnyis su 'dod byed de/_/lus zhes bya ba bcings bdag dang /_/mchog na gnas pa grol ba'i bdag_/mchog tu 'dzin pa bdag gi yul/_/bdag blo ji bzhin don ma
[\[28b.4\]]yin/_/bdag ni 'di zhes mchog 'dzin phyir/_/lus la bdag gi blo bzhin no/_/yongs su btags pa yod na yang /_/khyod kyi bdag gis [#]ci zhig byed/_/gzugs dang sgra sogs yul rnams la/_/blo'o zhe na de mi rigs/_/gzugs sogs yul la blo dag
[\[28b.5\]]ni/_/byed po bdag ni med kyang skye[#]/_/rkyen la ltos pa'i skye yin phyir/_/me shel gyi ni me bzhin no/_/gang yang yi ge'i bdag nyid sgra/_/de yi byed po bdag min [#]'dod/_/mnyan bya'i phyir dang sgra yin phyir/_/dper na brag ca ji bzhin no/_/'dis ni lus kyi bya ba gzhan/_/'ong
[\[28b.6\]]ba dang ni 'gro ba dang /_/lag pa rkang pa g.yo ba ni/_/mtshan nyid lhag ma rnams kyang bkag_/rnam par bcad nas kun shes las/_/kun shes dran pa nyid las dran/_/so sor rnam par rab shes las/_/shes rab nyams su myong las tshor/_/shes sogs byed par smra zhe
[\[28b.7\]]na/_/byed pa nyid du sgrub pa'am/_/de las gzhan pa'i byed po nyid/_/gcod byed bzhin du rigs ldan min/_/byed pa po la rkyen ldan zhing /_/gang phyir byed pa la min pas/_/des na gtan tshigs ma grub pa'am/_/ma nges pa nyid yin par 'gyur/_/shes la sogs pa byed
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]po nyid/_/byed po'i sgra yis [#]brjod pa'i phyir/_/lhas sbyin gyis ni gcod do zhes/_/ji ltar byed por mthong ba bzhin/_/'dus byas phung po byed [#]bral nyid/_/'di la byed por brjod bya ste/_/byed pa yin phyir mar me yis[#]/_/gsal bar byed pa yin pa
[\[29a.2\]]bzhin/_/yang dag gtso gcig byed po min/_/gang phyir gcig gis bum mi byed/_/des na mar me sogs byed po/_/gdags pa par ni mi 'dod do/_/'dod chags sogs kyi dbang phyug sems/_/gzugs sogs yul la mngon zhen pa'i/_/thar pa mi mthun phyogs kyis
[\[29a.3\]]phrogs/_/'khor ba'i btson rar bcings pa yin/_/lag pa la sogs tshogs pa ni/_/sems bcas sems can zhes bya ste/_/gtong ba la sogs sems 'byung ba/_/yod pa gtong po [#]la sogs brjod/_/rig pa skyes pas ma rig [#]sogs/_/kun sbyor ldog par gyur
[\[29a.4\]]pa'i phyir/_/chags sogs 'ching ba las grol ba/_/grol ba zhes ni brjod pa yin/_/nam mkha' 'dra ba'i bdag la ni/_/'di dag thams cad brjod par dka'/_/gal te bdag la lhag chags na/_/nam mkha'i me tog bdag 'dod kyis/_/gang phyir bdag ni rang bzhin
[\[29a.5\]]gyis[#]/_/shes pa'i ngo bor 'dod na ni/_/byed pa la sogs ltos pa'i phyir/_/de ni gcig tu mi rigs so/_/bdag sogs shes bya yod pas na/_/shes pa ldog par mi 'gyur te/_/don byas zin pa'i mar me yang /_/rang gi rgyu las skye bar mthong /_/ci srid yid la shes
[\[29a.6\]]'byung ba/_/de srid sa bon sogs 'gyur te/_/ji [#]srid sgra ni yod gyur pa/_/de srid sgra brnyan 'byung ba bzhin/_/byed pa med par shes pa ni/_/'khor ba ji ltar shes pa yin/_/kun tu khyab med yin pa'i phyir/_/gang las ji ltar bcings dang grol/_/sdug bsngal
[\[29a.7\]]las kyang thar min te/_/thar dang gcig tu smra ba'i phyir/_/bdag las de ni gzhan min phyir/_/ji ltar me dang tsha ba bzhin/_/nyams dang ma skyes pa yi blo/_/byed pa med par ji ltar yin[#]/_/gang pos gcod par byed pa yang /_/sta re med par [#]ji ltar rigs/_/me yis bsreg [#]ces
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]smras pa na/_/me yis bsregs kyi byed pas min/_/de bzhin blo yis rig smras pas/_/shes pas rig gi skyes bus min/_/rdza mkhan bzhin du de mi 'grub/_/de yi ngo bor [#]med pa'i phyir/_/sred [#]byed bzhin du'ang 'grub mi 'dod/_/bsreg bya med pas me med phyir/_/gal te mi shes
[\[29b.2\]]byed po dang /_/za po khyod kyis shes ci [#]ltar/_/mkha' 'dra rtog pa med pa yang /_/lung 'ba' zhig gis brtags ci bya/_/mi shes pa'am shes dngos min/_/'di ni dngos po med par 'gyur/_/dngos med bdag tu mi 'gyur te/_/'di ni mo gsham bu bzhin no/_/gang la gnod dang
[\[29b.3\]]phan pa las/_/gang la gnod dang bde mi 'byung /_/de de'i [#]bdag tu mi rigs te/_/nam mkha' de ba shar ma'i bzhin/_/nyi tshe'i bdag dang grol bar ni/_/bsam gtan shes sogs kyis 'dod na/_/bdag med don la 'bad pa yis[#]/_/shi ba mi 'chir ji ltar 'gyur/_/nyi tshe'i
[\[29b.4\]]bdag ni bdag las gzhan/_/zhe na thams cad skyes bu yin/_/de ni nyi tshe gnyis dag dang /_/phyi zhes dam bcas nyams pa yin/_/bdag las nyi tshe'i bdag de ni/_/gzhan min zhe na'ang dam bcas nyams/_/gang yang bdag gi bde sdug sogs/_/'gro bas mi shes
[\[29b.5\]]gtso bo min/_/gal te phra yin 'di che min/_/chen po yin na phra ba min/_/gcig kyang ma yin gzugs kyi chos/_/ji ltar gzugs med bdag gi yin/_/gcig nyid du ma'i ngo bo ru/_/glang po'i dpe 'di mi rigs te/_/sna ni glang du mi 'dod phyir/_/sna tshogs rnams
[\[29b.6\]]kyang gcig nyid min/_/gang yang bdag ni nyi sogs mdog_/yin na mdog bral ji ltar yin/_/bdag de du ma'i ngo bo yi/_/dper ni pa la sha mi 'dod/_/gcig pu pa la sha med de[#]/_/kun tu 'gyur ba'i bdag nyid dang /_/ji ltar rtsa ba sogs du mar/_/rkyen la sogs pas
[\[29b.7\]]'byed pa'i phyir/_/gtso bo nyid dang dam pa nyid/_/de las gzhan la ltos nas 'dod/_/gcig nyid yin na tshul 'di nyid/_/yod par ji ltar 'dod par bya/_/gal te bdag de rdzas yin na/_/rdzas yin phyir na kun khyab min/_/bum pa bzhin du rtag mi 'gyur/_/des na 'gro
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]ba rgyas ji ltar/_/rdzas ni rten du rigs 'gyur [#]na/_/bdag ni rdzas su mi rigs te/_/nam mkha'i me tog ji lta bar/_/de bzhin ma skyes phyir rdzas med/_/thams cad byung gyur byung ba dang /_/'byung 'gyur bdag med ji ltar mthong /_/bdag med
[\[30a.2\]]bdag tu mi rigs te/_/ji ltar dngos med ngo bo bzhin/_/byis sogs khyad par med ma yin/_/brten med pa dang dpe med phyir/_/bdag gcig yin na du ma yi/_/skyon rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ma yin/_/tse tra'i bdag de me tra'i byed/_/me tra'i bdag gi'ang de
[\[30a.3\]]bzhin te/_/tse tra tha dad min dngos phyir/_/yang na yul la dbyer [#]med phyir/_/bde dang sdug bsngal spyod pa dang /_/de grol bas kyang grol ba dang /_/de bcings pas kyang bcings pa dang /_/de sdug pas kyang sdug nyid 'gyur/_/bum pa'i nam mkha' dper bstan pa/_/
[\[30a.4\]]kun la de ni 'byung ma yin/_/gang phyir nam mkha' gcig nyid du/_/khyod kyi de ni ma grub ste/_/rdzas kyi ngo bos gang stong pa/_/de ni kun rdzob nam mkha' yin/_/de la 'gro ldan 'gro ba dang /_/de ni skabs 'dod skabs can no/_/des na nam mkha'i sgrib med min/_/skabs sbyin
[\[30a.5\]]pa yang ma yin te/_/de yod gtan tshigs smras pa yis/_/gtan tshigs 'di yang ma grub nyid/_/rgyu las [#]nye bar ma byung ba/_/nam mkha' dngos por mi 'dod do/_/de ni gcig kyang ma yin te/_/mo gsham gyi ni bu bzhin no/_/bum sogs gzugs kyi sa rnams ni/_/
[\[30a.6\]]sa yi rigs su gcig na yang /_/rdza sogs gzhan dang gzhan yin ltar/_/des na bdag [#]ni gcig ma yin/_/bdag ma shes shing ma rtags [#]pas/_/rmi lam longs spyod nga rgyal bzhin/_/shes nyid phyin ci ma log [#]pas/_/shes 'di nga rgyal mi rigs so/_/mi shes nyid na'ang
[\[30a.7\]]log med pas/_/mi shes nga rgyal mi 'dod do/_/nam mkha' bzhin du 'gyur med phyir/_/de bzhin chags pa med pa'i phyir/_/bdag ni byed por mi rigs la/_/za ba por yang mi rigs so/_/byed po bdag yin mi gos pa/_/byed po'i 'bras bu 'dod ci ltar/_/mi dbang
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]sdig dang bcas pa'i phyir/_/rgyal po'i dpe ni mi rigs so/_/phyi rol la ni ma ltos par/_/gcig nyid ngo bo nyid mi rigs/_/gcig nyid dang ldan pas she na/_/de ni de dang ldan ma yin/_/du ma nyid du brtags pa dag_/gsal ba gcig nyid yin zhe na/_/ji ltar brtags
[\[30b.2\]]pa kun rdzob phyir/_/des na gcig ste [#]don dam min/_/rtag dang gcig sogs ngo bo yis/_/don dam de yod yin zhe na/_/gcig sogs sgra dang blo 'jug pa/_/don yod na ni skyon med 'gyur/_/gcig la sogs par rnam rtog pa/_/'di ni ci [#]ltar mi rtag nyid/_/rnam par rtog [#]pa'i
[\[30b.3\]]yul don la/_/tshig 'jug par ni ma bkag go/_/'di ltar blo yi yul min dang /_/ngag gi spyod yul min ci ltar/_/brjod med rtog pa med pa yang /_/sngar bstan rigs [#]pas brdzun pa nyid/_/shes bya ye nas ma grub pas/_/blo yi yul du mi rigs so/_/blo yi yul las
[\[30b.4\]]log pas na/_/ngag gi yul las log pa'ang yin/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi brdzun pa'i/_/lugs 'di dge bar shes nas ni/_/de phyir mu stegs 'dod skyes te/_/de la bdag gir byas pa yin/_/sngon dang phyi mar 'gal ba yi[#]/_/de yi lugs la su zhig dad/_/
[\[30b.5\]]shin tu rigs mi gcig pa'i phyir/_/lcags las nor bu rin chen bzhin/_/'di ltar 'di ni lugs 'di la/_/kha cig dag ni drang phyir dang /_/lhag ma 'dzin las bzlog pa'i phyir/_/sna tshogs dag tu bstan pa yin/_/dngos po rnams ni ma skyes nyid/_/rang bzhin bcos
[\[30b.6\]]ma med pa'i phyir/_/'di la nyams pa med pas na/_/bdag ces kyang ni brjod pa yin/_/tha dad dngos kyang dbyer [#]med phyir/_/ngo bo gcig phyir gcig nyid yin/_/kun khyab chos rnams thams cad phyir/_/rtag pa'ang de yin mi nyams phyir/_/ma skyes phyir na skye med nyid/_/
[\[30b.7\]]de nyid phyir na rga shi med/_/'pho ba med phyir 'di 'pho med/_/rab mthar thug [#]phyir mchog yin nyid/_/gzugs dang sgra dang dri sogs min/_/sa dang me dang chu rlung min/_/nam mkha' zla ba nyi ma min/_/yid dang shes pa'i mtshan nyid min/_/thams cad 'di yin rang bzhin
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]phyir/_/nyams pa med phyir thams cad min/_/de la nyon mongs skye med phyir/_/dag pa 'di yin zhi nyid 'di/_/de ni brtags pas sgro btags nas[#]/_/brjod bya yang dag brjod bya min/_/ye nas brjod bya ma yin phyir/_/'di ni dri ma med ces
[\[31a.2\]]bstan/_/gang zhig 'di ltar mngon 'dod pa/_/khyod kyis bdag kyang yin na ni/_/ming sogs chos mang 'dra ba la/_/skyon med rigs [#]pa dang bcas yin/_/bdag med nyid kyis 'jigs pa rnams/_/'jigs kyang de nyid la gnas te/_/nam mkha' 'jigs par
[\[31a.3\]]gyur pa dag_/gzhan pa'i gnas 'ga' 'ang [#]med pa bzhin/_/sangs rgyas 'jig rten gnyen rnams kyi/_/de nyid bdud rtsi mchog 'di la/_/'di ni 'ga' yang bkag med pas/_/legs par 'ongs so ngoms par gyis/_/yang dag lta la sgrib med pa'i/_/bdag
[\[31a.4\]]ni byed po za po sogs/_/rten med brdzun pa'i 'dzin pa ni/_/des na spang ba kho nar gyis/_/dngos rnams rang bzhin skye med phyir/_/de nyid du na skye med 'dod/_/ngo bo nyid kyis skye med nyid/_/'di yi ngo bo nyid du bstan/_/dngos med nyid ni [#]bdag med pa/_/de ni bdag
[\[31a.5\]]min 'gal ba nyid/_/bdag med bdag tu 'gyur zhe na/_/ba lang min pa 'ang ba lang 'gyur/_/dngos po'i ngo bo med 'di ni/_/'di ltar byed po za por rigs/_/gang phyir mo gsham dag gi bu/_/byed po za por ma yin bzhin/_/de ltar gyur la skye ji ltar/_/
[\[31a.6\]]de las nyams par 'gyur ji ltar/_/mkha' la me tog med pa la/_/ji ltar skye 'jig btags pa bzhin/_/dngos po med pa'i yul dag la/_/ji srid blo ni 'jug gyur pa/_/blo yis btags pas sgro btags phyir/_/de srid gcig la sogs par 'dod/_/
[\[31a.7\]]rtog bcas rtog pa med pa las[#]/_/gang tshe blo ni log gyur pa/_/de tshe blo la yul med phyir/_/spros pa nyer zhi zhi ba nyid/_/dbu ma'i snying po las rig byed kyi mtha' rgyur smra ba'i de kho na nyid la 'jug pa ste le'u brgyad pa'o//_//ngo tsha med pa kha cig ni/_/
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]byang grol legs lam bsam gtan dang /_/shes la skur 'debs bya ba tsam/_/bdag [#]gis de ni 'thob par sems/_/chags sogs skyon gyis nyams pa'i phyir/_/skyes bu'i tshig ni brdzun [#]nyid yin/_/rig byed skyes bus ma byas phyir/_/des na tshad mar gzung bar
[\[31b.2\]]bya/_/byed po mi dran par 'dod phyir/_/rig byed skyes bus ma byas la[#]/_/brgyud nas 'ongs pa ma chad phyir/_/des na lung yin de med na/_/sgra rtag dbyangs kyis [#]gsal bar byed/_/don dang 'brel pa rtag pa nyid/_/don la rtogs [#]pa dang ldan la/_/rtogs pa rab tu skye bar
[\[31b.3\]]'gyur/_/lan cig 'jug phyir goms pa'i phyir/_/phyis kyang shes phyir de bzhin du/_/mnyan bya yin phyir sgra nyid bzhin/_/sgra ni rtag par shes par bya/_/mngon sum rjes su dpag pa dang /_/sgra las [#]byung dang nyer 'jal bcas/_/don gyis [#]go dang dngos med
[\[31b.4\]]pa'i/_/gtan tshigs bsgrub [#]bya sgrub par byed/_/'di ni rjes dpag las tha dad/_/tshad ma yin phyir gzhan de bzhin/_/yang na gcig dang du ma'i yul/_/rtogs [#]par gyur pa ji bzhin no/_/rtags [#]dang 'brel pa ma mthong ba'i/_/dngos don blo yi rgyu phyir ram/_/
[\[31b.5\]]yang na tha dad blo skye ba'i/_/rgyur gyur pa nyid yin phyir ro/_/sngon med pa yang bya bas gsal/_/thar pa'ang bya bas sgrub par byed/_/mkhas gang zla ba'i btung sogs kyis/_/mthar byed pa las nges par rgyal/_/drang srong lhas bsten [#]dam pas 'dod/_/lam
[\[31b.6\]]rnying bzang po rig don 'di/_/phyi rol dmangs rigs bud med gzugs/_/'dzin pas rigs ldan gsum 'di spangs/_/'di la gang yod gzhan la yod/_/'di la gang med 'ga' la'ang min/_/chos la sogs pa bzhi po yang /_/de nyid gzhan na'ang mthong ba
[\[31b.7\]]min/_/gtan tshigs smra bas gtan tshigs kyis/_/lam gsum po ni sun 'byin te/_/rjes su dpag pa gtsor gyur phyir/_/rang gi lugs ni gsal byed gang /_/long ba rkang [#]pa'i tshod dpags kyis/_/nyam nga'i lam du rgyug pa ltar/_/rjes su dpag
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]pa gtsor 'dzin rnams/_/ltung bar dka' ba ma yin no/_/'di na [#]'ga' yang kun mkhyen med/_/gang phyir 'di ni ma mthong phyir/_/thams cad mkhyen par sangs rgyas la/_/brtags pa 'jig rten gus bya'i phyir/_/sangs rgyas gsung
[\[32a.2\]]yang tshad ma min/_/byas pa'i phyir na gzhan bzhin no/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun mkhyen min/_/skyes bu yin phyir gzhan bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas gsung ni tshad ma yin[#]/_/lta ba gsum po sun 'byin phyir/_/ji ltar gang smra de de ltar/_/gcer bur rgyu ba'i
[\[32a.3\]]lta ba bzhin/_/sgra don rigs [#]pa shes pa yis/_/phyogs su lta ba'i dug spangs nas/_/yang dag ji bzhin tshol [#]byed na/_/'di la 'di ltar dpyad par bya/_/brgyud nas 'ongs pas ma chad pa/_/lung nyid yin pas lung zhe na/_/kun gyi lung yang 'grub 'gyur bas/_/
[\[32a.4\]]nges par gang gi de nyid bzung /_/gal te rigs pas brtag [#]bzod pa'i/_/tshig gang yin pa de lung yin/_/re zhig de nyid dpyad par bya/_/phyi nas de yis [#]gang bstan pa'o/_/de la de yi gnyen po'i phyir/_/ye shes grol ba zhes 'dod de/_/nad kyi gnyen po
[\[32a.5\]]yin pa'i phyir/_/sman gyis [#]nad las grol ba nyid/_/bya bas grol ba 'thob pa min/_/bya ba yin phyir zhing las bzhin/_/blo ma yin phyir brjod bya'i phyir/_/cung zad dus can yin phyir yang /_/skyes bu'i tshig ni skyon bcas phyir/_/tshad ma min par 'dod ce na/_/
[\[32a.6\]]gser tog [#]shes sogs tshig [#]rnams kyis/_/gtan tshigs nyid ni ma nges 'gyur/_/'on te byas pa min pa'i phyir/_/rig byed tshad mar sgrub [#]ce na/_/gtan tshigs thun mong min nyid dang /_/ma grub pa yi don yang yin/_/rjes su bstan min [#]skyon med do/_/zhe na sangs
[\[32a.7\]]rgyas kyi'ang ma byas/_/sngon gyi sangs rgyas rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/ji ltar rtogs de gsal byas yin/_/byas pa nyid du rjes dpag pas/_/phyogs la rjes su dpag pas gnod/_/byed pa mi dran ma grub pas/_/gtan tshigs 'di ni ma grub nyid/_/gal te sngags
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]kyi byed po sngon/_/sngags dang bcas par byung [#]gyur pas/_/byed pos byas kyang ma byas par/_/khyod kyi bstan bcos mngon 'dod pa/_/de dang lhan cig byung bcas phyir/_/skye ba dran pas smras pa bzhin/_/bstan bcos byed po dang bcas na/_/'di ltar
[\[32b.2\]]ci phyir smra mi byed/_/rtogs dang rjes su mthun phyir ram/_/de bzhin yi ge'i lugs ldan phyir/_/rig byed tshig rnams gzung bya ba'i/_/byed po skyes ba min nam ci/_/'dis kyang rig byed tshig rnams ni/_/skyes bus byas pa yin par 'dod/_/brjod 'dod don gyi blo skye
[\[32b.3\]]ba'i/_/rgyu phyir 'dod pa spyod pa bzhin/_/skyes [#]bu mi bzang bas byas par/_/rig byed 'di ni gzhal bya ste/_/'byung po 'tshe [#]dang chang 'thung brdzun[#]/_/smra phyir ma ga'i bstan bcos bzhin/_/gal te gnod sems mi 'dod pa'i/_/'bras bu mi sbyin 'dod pa'i
[\[32b.4\]]'byin/_/sngags kyis [#]gzung phyir dug spyod bzhin/_/bstan bcos 'byung phyir sbyin pa bzhin/_/sngags sogs phye mas bkug pa yi/_/bgrod min la yang bgrod bya gang /_/sngar bstan chang btung phyi ma yang /_/des na ma nges pa nyid yin/_/blo sngon ma song bya ba yis/_/
[\[32b.5\]]dug zos na yang 'chi byed la/_/las ni blo sngon ma song la/_/'bras bu 'byin par ma bstan to/_/de nyid phyir na dug gi dpe/_/mthun pa min pas rigs ldan min/_/des na sngags kyis phyugs [#]gsod pa/_/rigs [#]pa min par rtogs [#]par bya/_/tshe yi bar du gcod byed
[\[32b.6\]]phyir/_/sngags kyis [#]gzung ba 'dod pa yi/_/'bras bu 'byin par mi 'dod de/_/dug mtshon bstan bcos sbyor ba bzhin/_/rang gi lugs las bstan ce na/_/'khor ba sgrol byed pa'i yang 'grub/_/thun mong gtan tshigs smra zhe na/_/gzhan la ma grub pa nyid
[\[32b.7\]]yin/_/gang yang sngags kyis ma bzung [#]ba'i/_/bsod nams cung zhig ci byas pa/_/de kun 'bras bu med 'gyur ba/_/mi 'dod pa yi 'bras she na/_/sngags kyis gzhan ni gsod pa gang /_/de yang skyon med thal bar 'gyur/_/dbang du byed pa'i sngags gang gis/_/
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]gzhan gyi bud med bsten pa dang /_/sngags kyi stobs kyis 'tshe 'gyur gang /_/gal te gsod par mi 'dod na/_/gzhan gyi nor ni rku byed pa/_/de yang skyon bcas ma yin 'gyur/_/gal te sngags sngon song [#]ba'i las/_/der ni dger 'dod gzhan ma
[\[33a.2\]]yin/_/zhe na lung 'di 'dra ba la/_/gtan tshigs khyad par smra dgos so/_/gal te srog chags sngags [#]btab pas/_/gang yang bcing ba ma byas la/_/g.yo ba med par bya zhe na/_/de lta na yang khyad par med/_/gang phyir sgo kun bsubs nas ni/_/bzung nas nus med
[\[33a.3\]]byol song dag_/mtshon cha rnon pos gsod pa la/_/de la sngags kyis ci zhig bya/_/rang nyid rang byung gyur pa yis/_/mchod sbyin don du byol song bskyed/_/des na de la dgos pa'i phyir/_/mchod sbyin chos yin 'di ltar dper[#]/_/bram ze'i don du 'tshe byed pa/_/'di ltar chos
[\[33a.4\]]min min pa bzhin/_/mchod sbyin byol song rnams [#]gtses kyang /_/'bras bu mi 'dod min de yi/_/don [#]phyir zhe na bram ze'i phyir/_/ci ltar 'dod par [#]'tshe byed bzhin/_/byol song spyad pa'i phyir bskyed de/_/spyad bya yin phyir bud med bzhin/_/de phyir mchod sbyin phyir ma
[\[33a.5\]]grub/_/byol song gtan tshigs ma grub phyir/_/dbus [#]kyi mchog sbyin gnas bsad na'ang /_/ma 'khrul bsams bzhin bsad pa'i phyir/_/phyi mar byed po mi 'dod pa'i/_/'bras bur gyur [#]te gzhan bzhin no/_/mchod sbyin la ni bsad [#]pa yang /_/mi 'dod pa yi 'bras
[\[33a.6\]]bu 'byung /_/bsams bzhin du ni srog 'chad pa'i/_/sdug bsngal bskyed phyir gzhan bzhin no/_/bya ba ji ltar byas pa las/_/de 'dra'i 'bras bu lus la mthong /_/byed po de 'dra'i ma mthong yang /_/bsad pa yin phyir gzhan bzhin no/_/myos 'gyur btung sogs kyang
[\[33a.7\]]bshad pas/_/ci ltar bstan bzhin spang bya ste/_/des na myos 'gyur bsten [#]mi bya/_/myos par 'gyur phyir myos sogs bzhin/_/mchod sbyin sngags kyis yongs bzung ba'i/_/myos 'gyur skyon med ma yin te/_/myos phyir dper na gzhan bzhin te/_/sngags kyis
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]btab pa mthong ba bzhin/_/rtags ni mthong ba med ces te/_/gal te mtho ris sogs mi [#]nges/_/she na rtags las rjes dpag des/_/nges pas nges pa min [#]nam ci/_/lan cig 'jug phyir zhes bya 'dir/_/mar me'ang lan cig nyid 'jug pas/_/gtan
[\[33b.2\]]tshigs ma nges nyid yin [#]phyir/_/sgra yi rtag pa nyid kyang brdzun/_/yod phyir sgra ni mi rtag ste/_/ci phyir bya ba bzhin mi bzung /_/yang na lus kyi g.yo ba bzhin/_/blo yi rgyu phyir nyams par 'gyur/_/goms phyir phyis shes phyir zhes pa'ang /_/gtan tshigs rjes 'gro med
[\[33b.3\]]pa nyid/_/goms dang phyis kyang shes pa ni/_/rtag min nam yang ma mthong phyir/_/sgra nyid rtag pa nyid ma grub/_/sgra nyid dpe yang ma yin la/_/mngon par gsal byed pa yang bkag_/'di ni ngag gi gsal byed min/_/gal te sgra de mnyan bya [#]na/_/ngag gis gsal bar ji ltar
[\[33b.4\]]'dod/_/rtogs pa zhes bya'ang brda [#]nyid pas/_/'di nyid sgra ru thal bar 'gyur/_/dang po brda ni med pa na/_/rtogs pa yod [#]par mi rigs so/_/'khor ba thog ma med pa ltar/_/brda yang rjes su 'jug pa nyid/_/rjes su dpag pa'i tshad ma nyid/_/de bdag nyid
[\[33b.5\]]las tha dad min/_/des na tshad ma yin phyir zhes/_/bya ba'i gtan tshigs 'di ma nges/_/tha dad spyod yul can gyi blo'i/_/rgyu nyid du ni khyod kyi de/_/ma grub tha dad yul yin [#]phyir/_/gtan tshigs ma grub nyid du 'gyur/_/du ma'i don dngos tha dad phyir/_/don gcig
[\[33b.6\]]min pa rtogs pa'i rgyu/_/rjes su dpag par yang 'dod pas/_/de phyir sgra byung las gzhan min/_/rtags [#]dang 'brel ba [#]ma mthong bas/_/mthong ba'i don las rjes dpag nyid/_/gang phyir rtog bya rtogs par byed/_/de phyir de ma thag tu min/_/rjes dpag sgra byung tha dad
[\[33b.7\]]min/_/lkog gyur shes pa'i rgyu nyid yin/_/'brel pa dran la ltos bcas [#]phyir/_/ji ltar rjes dpog rang nyid bzhin/_/sngon med bya bas gsal mi byed/_/sgra yis [#]gsal byed bkag pa bzhin/_/gsal bar [#]byas pa'i bum pa ltar/_/sngon med pa yang mi rtag 'dod/_/
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]zla ba'i btung sogs bya ba'i 'bras/_/rtag pa min pa nyid du 'dod/_/bya ba'i 'bras bu yin phyir dper/_/'dod pa'i rgyus byung 'bras bu bzhin/_/zla ba'i btung sogs bya ba yis[#]/_/thar pa 'thob [#]par mi rigs te/_/bya ba yin phyir 'dod pa yi[#]/_/
[\[34a.2\]]rgyu mtshan bya ba mi 'dod ltar/_/de'i phyir lam 'di la brten nas/_/mthar byed las rgyal 'gyur ma yin/_/blo yis dpyod pa'i nus med pas/_/gzhan rjes 'brang bas 'di la brten/_/'chi med nyid ni yod pa'i phyir/_/nyer zhi rig byed yod ce na/_/med de 'di ni
[\[34a.3\]]phyin ci log_/mi rtag pa la rtag par btags/_/rig las 'byung [#]ba'i don gsum mo/_/shis brjod bstod dang cho ga dag_/gang phyir don 'di gsum po 'dis/_/thar pa nam yang 'thob ma yin/_/gal te snying po [#]nyid yin pas/_/rig byed tshad mar 'dod ce na/_/mi
[\[34a.4\]]shes phyin ci log lta sogs/_/ci yi phyir na tshad ma min/_/lan [#]gsum po ni ston byed pa/_/tshangs pa khyab 'jug bde byed rnams/_/nyon mongs bdag nyid spyod mthong bas/_/gang phyir gsum 'di spang ba'i rigs/_/'dod pa med na ji ltar 'di/_/'dod dga' ma
[\[34a.5\]]la spyod par byed/_/de bzhin 'dod bral lha mo la/_/'gro gtso stobs kyis [#]ci phyir brjod/_/'di ni skye dgu'i bdag las skyes/_/de ni rang byung bu yin na/_/rang byung tsha mo 'dod ldan la/_/spyad par gyur pa min nam ci/_/rig las drang srong skye bstan pa/_/'di ltar
[\[34a.6\]]byung 'di brtag [#]mi bya/_/gnyis skyes rnams kyi gsang ba gang /_/kun la brjod par bya ba min/_/rang byung gi ni spyod pa 'di/_/'khrul par gyur pa 'di la ltos/_/tsha mo mthong dang reg pa las/_/byol song bzhin du gang chags nas/_/lus ni 'byung bar gyur pa las/_/
[\[34a.7\]]mi gtsang shong [#]bar gyur pa 'di/_/mi ni sems dang ldan pa 'ga'/_/mi skye yin na 'di byed dam/_/khyi dang bong bu dag gi ni/_/spyod pa 'phags pas dmad pa la/_/rang byung spyod pas des na des[#]/_/de dag dang ni khyad ci yod/_/shes ldan shes pas sdig pa dag_/
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]sreg ste me yis shing bzhin no/_/des na mthu yi khyad par gyis[#]/_/ngan 'gror de mi 'gro zhe na/_/gang gis nyon mongs sreg nus pa'i/_/mkhas pa shes des shes ldan la/_/de ni sdig pa byed mi 'gyur/_/de rgyu shes ldan la med phyir/_/ltung bar byed pa'i las rnams
[\[34b.2\]]kyis/_/rnal 'byor grub la mi gos zhes/_/smra zhing yang dag lam nyams la/_/gzhan dag gi yang nyams par byed/_/tshangs la sogs pas de nyid don/_/blo yis [#]mthong bar mi 'dod de/_/tshangs pa dang ni rtse gsum can/_/thig le mchog mar kun chags phyir/_/
[\[34b.3\]]dang por [#]khro mes ma bsregs na/_/grong khyer sum rtseg [#]ji ltar bsregs/_/nyi rgyal so phyung [#]ci lta bu/_/nyi skal mig phyung ci lta bu/_/tshangs bsad chang 'thungs 'dod pa can/_/dbang phyug de nyid mthong zhe na/_/de yi lam gyi rjes 'brang ba/_/ji ltar de nyid mi mthong 'gyur/_/
[\[34b.4\]]khyab 'jug yin na sgra gcan dang /_/tsa tu ra dang dmyal la sogs/_/snying rje med par gyur pa yi/_/nor srog phral ba ji lta [#]bu/_/gzhan nor chung ma ma byin len/_/chang sred srog ni gcod pa dang /_/de nyid mthong bas 'ongs [#]gyur na/_/ri brags rkun mo shin tu'ang yin/_/skye
[\[34b.5\]]dgu bskyang la gsal ba'i phyir/_/lha min lha yi tsher ma dag_/bsad kyang skyon ni yod min te/_/de ni chos bsrung phyir zhe na/_/gal te de ni chos bsrung bar/_/'dod pa yin na ci yi phyir/_/gzhan nor bud med rku [#]ba dang /_/g.yo sgyu [#]la 'jug spong mi byed/_/'gro ba'i de nyid de rang
[\[34b.6\]]bzhin/_/rang bzhin yin phyir dong tshe bzhin/_/'gro ba mi rtag par mthong na/_/de ni ji ltar rtag par 'dod/_/gal te 'gro las de gzhan [#]te/_/sa dang rdza mkhan bzhin zhe na/_/rdza mkhan dang ni sa bzhin du/_/mi rtag par ni mtshon par bya/_/chos min 'dod pa ma yin
[\[34b.7\]]na/_/de byed par ni ji ltar 'gyur/_/yang na lkog tu gyur pa'i don/_/mi shes phyir na byas pa yin/_/sred pas 'jig rten skyong [#]zhe na/_/sred pa'i bran du ji ltar 'os/_/snying rje zhe na 'jig rten rnams/_/sgyu mas rmongs par ci phyir byed/_/skye dang 'chi sogs sdug
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]bsngal can/_/lha ma yin la 'ang cis mi brtse/_/thams cad mnyam par mthong ba'i phyir/_/dgra yi 'du shes mi rigs so/_/rang nyid 'gro ba'i byed po yin/_/skye 'jig dag gi gtso bo ni/_/phan par byed la brtse ba [#]ltar/_/phan byed la brtse
[\[35a.2\]]de ci ltar/_/gal te 'gro gtso 'di yin pas/_/'di las lhag pa'i mchog med na/_/ci phyir mdangs ldan ma bcas pas/_/thub pa gos ngan khur bar byed/_/yang na de yi spyod mthong nas/_/skye dgu byed po zhes bya'i blo/_/rang gis [#]byas sam slob yin na'ang /_/khur
[\[35a.3\]]bar byed pa'i blo ci yin/_/mchod 'os dka' thub lhag ce na/_/dka' thub gtso yin de ma yin/_/dmod pas 'jigs pa yin zhe na/_/byed po yin pa'i yon tan ci/_/'dod chags zhe sdang sogs 'dres pa'i/_/'phrog byed spyod pa 'di ci yin/_/'phags min spyod pa
[\[35a.4\]]'di ldan pa/_/de ni ji ltar skyes mchog yin/_/'gro ba mnyam med 'phrog byed pa/_/gal te de la stobs yod na/_/ci phyir shugs can nag po yis/_/'jigs nas phug tu zhugs zhes drag_/shugs can nag pos 'jigs skrag [#]nas/_/rgyal po'i drang srong mu tsu
[\[35a.5\]]ku'i/_/khri yi 'og tu zhugs gyur par/_/nag por gyur pa min nam ci/_/grong khyer mang por gnas pa na/_/khung nas rkun mo bzhin 'bros pa/_/gal te srid gsum des bskyed na/_/lha ma yin la ci phyir 'jigs/_/gang tshe rgas byed mdas phog nas/_/'di ni 'chi bar
[\[35a.6\]]'gyur ba'i tshe/_/de nyid mthong ba'i shes pa dang /_/de yi [#]stobs kyang gang du song /_/sgyu dang g.yo yis rmongs byas te/_/ngan pa'i las la sbyar byas nas/_/bla ma gnyen bsad 'jigs pa yis/_/srid sgrub tu gyur ji lta bu/_/dgra tshogs zad par byas pa la[#]/_/nges par
[\[35a.7\]]rang la nus med pas/_/gang phyir snying rje med pas gzhan/_/bskul ba'i don du song bar gyur/_/gang yang cung zhig dbang phyug ldan/_/gal te de la gnas yin na/_/de ni kun la khyab nyid min/_/des na gzhung 'di dor bar gyis/_/'og tu zhugs nas sa bteg pa/_/
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]khyab pa yin na ji ltar rung /_/'on te 'di der ma gnas na'ang /_/khyab par smra ba mi mdzes so/_/'og tu zhugs nas sa 'dzin par/_/nus na drang srong dmod pa yis/_/rang rigs sa 'og 'gro gyur pa/_/'dzin par mi byed ji lta bu/_/de la gus pa mi nyams zhes/_/
[\[35b.2\]]gang la de lta'i blo yod na/_/de la gus pa'i bud med dag_/co bzung dgras khyer ji lta bu/_/de 'ba' zhig kyang ma yin gyi/_/bshes dang gnyen dang bu rnams dang /_/de la gus par mthong ba gzhan/_/kun kyang nyams par gyur pa nyid/_/'phrog byed 'di yi dngos
[\[35b.3\]]gzhan zhig_/zhi bar gal te rtog byed la/_/gang mthong dul gang yang srid du/_/'byung bar mi 'gyur gang yin pa/_/'di yi yod min med ma yin/_/yod min med pa min pa'ang min/_/des na med phyir yod pa'i phyir/_/yod med min phyir de ni mchog_/nya sogs
[\[35b.4\]]ngo bo yod pa'i phyir/_/gzhan yin na yang 'chi med min/_/gzhan min nyid na'ang gzhan min phyir/_/de ni zhi min gzhan bzhin no/_/gal te gcig ni zhi bdag nyid/_/yin na'ang gcig ni ma zhi na/_/bud med 'phyon ma'ang bsngags par 'os/_/lus kyi phyed ni 'dod pa'i
[\[35b.5\]]phyir/_/yod sogs sgra yis brjod min phyir/_/mchog ces bya ba'ang rigs pa min/_/yod na mchog tu rigs 'gyur la/_/rgyu nyid du yang rigs pa yin/_/rgyu nyid yin pa spangs pa yin/_/gzhan nyid yin pa 'ang snga ma bzhin/_/rgyu yang ma yin gzhan yang min/_/
[\[35b.6\]]'chi med ma yin skye ba'ang min/_/gal te 'chi med dngos yin na/_/'di ni nyams 'gyur ro sogs bzhin/_/gal te 'chi med dngos min na/_/de med nam mkha'i me tog bzhin/_/yod min med min mi rigs te/_/me la grang dang dro bzhin no/_/de bzhin 'chi ba med
[\[35b.7\]]pa de[#]/_/brjod med yin par ji ltar rigs/_/brjod du med nyid bdag dang ni/_/'dra na med yin bkag pa nyid/_/'chi med phyir 'chi med ce na/_/'chi med med phyir 'chi med min/_/skyon rnams sba phyir btags pa yi/_/de yi dngos po gzhan zhig ste/_/de la dmigs
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]na ji lta bu/_/grol 'dod grol bar 'gyur ba yin/_/tshangs pa dang ni nor lha yis/_/glur blangs gsang ba oM zhes bya/_/tshangs pa'i yi ge de nyid ni/_/yod de kun la khyab pa yin/_/de ni tshad gsum gsal ba yin/_/de bzhin shin tu phra bar bstan/_/dang po'i
[\[36a.2\]]rgyu ni i ge aH[#]/_/ngag dang snying stobs [#]sa me bsdus[#]/_/las dang nam mkha' nyid dag kyang /_/yid rtul [#]snying stobs u dang ldan/_/byed po'i yi ge ma'i ming can/_/srog dang mun pa gsum pa yin/_/'gro ba thams cad sdud par byed/_/gnyid chen shin tu log pa'i rgyu'o/_/
[\[36a.3\]]'pho dang bsam gtan rlung 'byung 'jug_/gzung bar bya dang brtag pa dang /_/ting 'dzin zhes bya rnal 'byor gyi/_/yan lag drug tu brjod pa [#]yin/_/dbang po kun gyi shes pa ni/_/yul la g.yo bar byed pa rnams/_/yang dag bsdus la srog ldan ni[#]/_/yid la bsam gtan bya ba
[\[36a.4\]]ste/_/gnas dag tu ni spo zhi bya/_/dbang po dag dang dbang don dag_/rus sbal yan lag bzhin bsdus la/_/dran pas yi ge oM brjod na/_/de gus skyes bu grol bar 'gyur/_/'phrog byed gus pas grol bar [#]ni/_/'phrog byed mthong bas mi rigs nyid/_/rnam rtog mtshan
[\[36a.5\]]ma dang bcas phyir/_/dper na 'phrog byed mthong ba bzhin/_/grol phyir rnal 'byor ldan pa yi/_/mi rtog [#]blo yang mi 'dod de/_/mtshan mar 'dzin phyir brdzun yin na/_/yongs su brtags pa smos ci dgos/_/chags sogs kun tu spyod pa'i phyir/_/tshangs sogs rnams ni phyugs rdzi bzhin/_/
[\[36a.6\]]de nyid rig pa spangs pa'i phyir/_/rgyu la mkhas pa ma yin no/_/bden pa'i chos ni bstan pa'am/_/rang nyid sgrub par byed pa yis/_/chos ni bsrungs par 'gyur yin na[#]/_/de la 'di ni gnyi ga med/_/kun kyang bskyed pa'i rgyu nyid du/_/smra la rang bdag tha dad pa[#]/_/gang gi tshig la bden
[\[36a.7\]]pa'am/_/mi bden par ni brtag par bya/_/de gcig phyir [#]skyon med ce na/_/tshangs pas tshangs bsad ji lta bu/_/gcig nyid rab tu bkag pa'i phyir/_/gcig nyid yin par mi rigs so/_/bdag las dbye ba mi rigs [#]pas/_/gsum nyid du yang ji ltar 'gyur/_/sdug bsngal rgyu la
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]rmongs rnams la/_/de zhi'i gtam [#]yang ga la yod/_/rig las rnal 'byor bstan pa ni/_/de bstan pa las nyams pa'i phyir/_/chos bsrung bar ni nus pa yi/_/re zhig chos bden smra mi nus/_/sgrub pa las ni nyams pa'i phyir/_/gzhan dag zhi bar khrid [#]mi nus/_/ji ltar g.yang sar
[\[36b.2\]]rang lhung ba/_/gzhan dag 'dren par mi nus so/_/rtog pa'i dra bas btags pa yi/_/log pa'i gtan tshigs gsum po la/_/rigs sam mi rigs dpyad nas ni/_/gsum po 'di ni gtang ba'i rigs/_/sna tshogs byed pa byed [#]byed sogs/_/rigs [#]pa min [#]pas sngar smras so/_/byed
[\[36b.3\]]po yin par bden nyid na/_/'di dag gis ni ci zhig byas/_/re zhig bdag ni ma skyes phyir/_/de yis byas par mi 'dod do/_/chos dang chos min des ma bskyed/_/de'i yon tan phyir da lta bzhin/_/gal te 'di dag byed pos [#]yin/_/las kyis [#]bya ba'i ma yin na/_/las dang bya ba de
[\[36b.4\]]dag gis/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu ji ltar 'gyur/_/bde dang sdug bsngal nyer dmigs pa'i/_/lus kyang de dag la 'jug pas/_/des na lus can rnams kyi lus/_/dbang phyug sogs kyis [#]byas mi rigs/_/bskal pa dang po'i lus can lus/_/sngon [#]byas ma mthong rgyu can te/_/
[\[36b.5\]]bde sogs 'byung ba'i rgyu yin phyir/_/dper na da ltar lus bzhin no/_/gal te dbang phyug gi [#]dbang phyug_/de yang bsod nams byas she na/_/de yang bsod nams gzhan dbang phyir/_/dbang phyug dbang phyug min par 'gyur/_/gal te dbang phyug gi dbang phyug_/glo bur gyur par
[\[36b.6\]]'dod na ni/_/des na gzhan dang mtshungs pa'i phyir/_/dbang phyug dbang phyug min par 'gyur/_/dbang phyug shes dngos yin zhe na/_/des na des byas 'gro ba rnams/_/rgyu yi rjes su byed pa'i phyir/_/kun kyang sems dang ldan par 'gyur/_/gal te dbang phyug rgyu yin na/_/'gro ba phra sogs
[\[36b.7\]]ldan par 'gyur/_/las byed dbang phyug yin zhe na/_/de yang dmyal ba dag tu 'tshed/_/de min gzhan dag 'tshed na ni/_/byas nyams ma byas 'phrad par 'gyur/_/thar pa med pa yang yin te/_/rtag tu sdug bsngal rgyu ldan phyir/_/de yi sdug bsngal ga la zhi/_/me ni 'bar bar gyur pa yi/_/
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]tsha ba ma zhi mthong ba bzhin/_/gcig pu sna tshogs min zhe na/_/'bras bu sna tshogs ji lta bu/_/'dod pas sna tshogs yin zhe na 'ang /_/gcig pu sna tshogs mi rigs so/_/rtag pa cha med phra ba dang /_/'gro ba'i byed po gcig pu nyid/_/kun la khyab pa yin no lo/_/'di las mtshar
[\[37a.2\]]ba gzhan ci yod/_/phan tshun za bas 'jigs pa yi/_/bde ba rnyed dka'i dud 'gro dang /_/zhib tu 'thag [#]cing gcod 'bigs pa'i/_/sdug bsngal gyis gzir dmyal ba dang /_/mi rnams skye rga nad dag dang /_/sdug bsngal zug rngu'i rma btod nas/_/dga' 'gyur gang yin drag po zhes/_/ming don
[\[37a.3\]]ldan pa de phyag 'tshal/_/'dzin pa can gang nor ldan dang /_/gzhan gyi mtsho [#]bcas dge ba can/_/chos min can 'ga' mtho gnas [#]ldan/_/dbang phyug spyod par gsal ba yin/_/yon tan nor ldan tshe thung dang /_/ngan par spyod rnams tshe ring dang /_/gtong ldan dbul po mthong bas na/_/dbang
[\[37a.4\]]phyug gis byas gsal ba yin/_/kha cig sangs rgyas pa yang bde/_/de la gus pa kha cig sdug_/dbang phyug bkas ni bsod nams can/_/dag kyang ci phyir sdig mi [#]byed/_/sna tshogs las la mi shes pas/_/de rgyu nyid du smra ba yin/_/sna tshogs byed por tshangs pa ni/_/mi rigs [#]
[\[37a.5\]]sngon du bstan pa bzhin/_/tshangs pa byed por bden na yang /_/de yis [#]ci zhig byas par 'gyur/_/dang por sems ni mnyam bzhag [#]pas/_/blo yi sgo rnams legs bsdams la/_/yid la shi ba gzhag [#]par bya/_/'di ltar yi ge oM bsgoms te/_/snying la gzungs kyis bzung byas pa/_/
[\[37a.6\]]sa sogs gzugs la goms par bya/_/bde byed mnyes na sdug bsngal las/_/grol 'gyur zer ba 'di mi bden/_/ci srid yid kyi shes 'byung bas/_/de srid grol bar mi rigs te/_/yid shes 'byung phyir ji ltar sngar/_/grol bar ma gyur pa bzhin no/_/dbang phyug la gus grol 'gyur bar/_/
[\[37a.7\]]mi rigs bde byed mthong ba yang /_/dmigs la gnas pa yin pa'i phyir/_/dper na mtho yor mthong ba bzhin/_/sdug bsngal rgyu ni dbang phyug na/_/de ni rtag phyir bcos su med/_/des na sdug bsngal mthar [#]'gro bar/_/dbang phyug nam yang 'gyur ma yin/_/'dis ni lhag ma'ang dgag
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]byas phyir/_/tshangs pa khyab 'jug bdag smra la/_/mi rigs phyir na dbang phyug sogs/_/btags la blo ni dga' mi byed/_/dus chen shin tu mang po 'das/_/bud med sems ni shin tu g.yo/_/de phyir bram ze zhes bya'i [#]rigs/_/'ga' yang gang la'ang yod ma yin/_/rtsal dang rtsal gyi sde
[\[37b.2\]]dag dang /_/de bzhin thos pa'i rtsa can dag_/drang srong chen po gau ta ma/_/bran song nyal ba'i mngal nas skyes/_/gzhung ni rtsom par byed pa yi/_/kun 'da'[#] bram ze'i drang srong yang /_/thub pa chen po [#]tun 'da' yis[#]/_/gdol pa mo dang nyal las skyes/_/nya pa yi ni bu mo la/_/pha ni mchog
[\[37b.3\]]'gro zhes bya bas/_/nyal las drang srong gling lam skyes/_/de yang bram ze zhes brjod do/_/bram ze'i drang srong 'jig rten grags/_/thos mang rig [#]byed 'don byed pa/_/drang srong rwa zhes bya ba'i ma/_/dud 'gror skyes pa'i ri dgas yin/_/sbom dang de bzhin ras [#]bal can/_/dmangs rigs
[\[37b.4\]]bu yin bram zer grags/_/zla ba'i btung ba yang 'thungs nas/_/'jig rten drang srong chen por grags/_/'jig rten du ni grags gyur pa/_/bram ze lung phu [#]zhes bya ba/_/thos mang de yang gdol pa'i rigs/_/lung ma [#]zhes bya ba las skyes/_/bur shing bu mo las skyes pa'i/_/drang srong drang
[\[37b.5\]]srong ka na ya[#]/_/ka n+wa ya yi rigs bcas pa/_/skyes pa yin zhes rjod par byed/_/drang srong ka pi [#]dza la yang /_/drang srong dbang byed chen po yis[#]/_/gdol pa phreng ba mo la ni/_/nyal las skyes pa yin zhes thos/_/a gasta [#]dang dbang byed ni/_/bum pa'i nang nas skyes zhes thos/_/
[\[37b.6\]]bum pa'ang bum pa'i nang nas skyes/_/de bzhin gtsang skyes chu las [#]skyes/_/pad+ma'i 'dab las shes rab myur/_/ka bad t+ya ni thal ba las/_/mgo la thod pa can nyid ni/_/thod pa las ni skyes zhes zer/_/chu yis [#]sdig pa dag pa 'khrul/_/dge sogs nyo tshong byed pa dag_/nyes bstan
[\[37b.7\]]gsum la mthong bas na/_/gang phyir gsum 'di gtong [#]ba'i rigs/_/'dis ni sdig pa dag mi 'gyur/_/ma reg phyir dang ma mthong phyir/_/ma bsgoms phyir dang bag chags phyir/_/dran pa'i shes dang dge ba bzhin/_/pad snying rkang phyung [#]klung sogs kyi/_/chus ni sdig pa 'dag
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]mi 'gyur/_/reg bya'i phyir ram bsgo bya'i phyir/_/khyim gyi ngan skyugs chu bzhin no/_/rang bzhin bsod nams ma yin las/_/chur zhugs sogs kyis zad [#]'gyur na/_/'bab [#]stegs sogs su khrus byas rnams/_/sdug bsngal mi 'gyur rgyu med phyir/_/las rnams zad
[\[38a.2\]]pa'ang [#]ma yin pas/_/sdig pa zad pa 'ga' yang med/_/nang [#]gi bdag nyid mi 'dag ces/_/bstan pa yod pas de yang brdzun/_/rgyud gzhan las ni rgyud gzhan du/_/sdig pa 'pho [#]ba min par bzung /_/lus can min phyir 'dod chags dang /_/zhe sdang gti mug mi 'pho bzhin/_/de
[\[38a.3\]]tshe bsod nams blangs par ni/_/mi rigs zhes ni nges par bya/_/sems dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir/_/dper na bde dang sdug bsngal bzhin/_/'bar sogs nang du mchongs [#]pa nyid/_/tshangs pa'i 'jig rten sogs 'gro bar/_/bstan pa'i lugs ngan gsum las mthong /_/
[\[38a.4\]]de phyir spang bar rigs [#]pa yin/_/mer mchong [#]la sogs tshangs pa yi/_/'jig rten sogs 'thob rgyu ma yin/_/srog la gnod par byed pa'i phyir/_/phye ma leb sogs mthong ba bzhin/_/bza' dang btung ba spangs pa yis/_/mtho ris thob [#]par mi 'dod de/_/bkres dang skom pa'i rgyu
[\[38a.5\]]yin phyir/_/zas ma zos pas gdungs pa bzhin/_/zas ma zos sogs bsod nams 'gyur/_/spangs phyir sdig spangs bzhin zhe na/_/bden sogs spangs pas gtan tshigs 'di/_/ma nges pa nyid yin par 'gyur/_/zas spangs bsod nams mi 'gyur te/_/bya ba de la sdig
[\[38a.6\]]med phyir/_/dge ba yid la byed pa yi/_/yid la byed pa spangs pa bzhin/_/mtha' gsum dag pa'i sha gang dag_/zos kyang sdig tu mi 'gyur te/_/dngas ma sogs su 'gyur ba'i phyir/_/slong mo'i zas la sdig med bzhin/_/gang yang sha ni zos pa yis/_/sdig pa'i rgyur ni mi 'gyur
[\[38a.7\]]te/_/bkres pa zlog [#]pa'i rgyu yin phyir/_/ma blangs byin pa'i zas skom bzhin/_/sha ni mi bza' [#]ba yin phyir/_/mi za zhe na lus la rtogs/_/sa bon dang ni brtan [#]byed pa/_/mi gtsang [#]mi gtsang srin [#]bu bzhin/_/khu [#]ba sogs las byung ba'i phyir/_/nya sha sogs ni smad [#]ce na/_/mar
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]dang 'o sogs rgyu yin pas/_/'di ni ma nges pa nyid yin/_/sha za srog [#]gcod nyid yin te/_/de yi rgyu mtshan phyir zhe na/_/lpags sogs thogs pas gtan tshigs ni/_/ma nges pa nyid yin par 'gyur/_/'jal dang srang la g.yo byed dang /_/nye bar 'dod pa mi dge mnyam/_/'tsho byed
[\[38b.2\]]nor ni rnyed pa de'i/_/gang yang sdig pa dag las ni/_/skyon ni gnyis kyis [#]lhag pa ru/_/nyo ba po la 'byung bar 'dod/_/de bzhin bud med bdag po gzhan/_/'dod pa'i kha zas sbyin byed dang /_/skal bar ldan pa'i bud med dang /_/gang dag chos de ston pa dang /_/tshul khrims med
[\[38b.3\]]la smod [#]pa dang /_/skyon tshogs 'joms phyir ti ti ri/_/dgra gsos las kyang nges par ni/_/chos ma yin pa thob par 'gyur/_/kun dga' ra ba khron pa rdzing /_/der ni lus can shi gyur na/_/byed pa'i skye mched yin pa'i phyir/_/de la skyon 'di yod par 'gyur/_/gsad bya yod pas
[\[38b.4\]]gsod yod kyis/_/gang phyir med na ma yin no/_/des na gsad bya gsod pa gnyis/_/sdig pa mnyam par thob par 'gyur/_/mthong dang thos dang bsnams pa dang /_/reg dang dran pa nyid dang ni/_/sha las byas na'ang chos min 'brel/_/'di lta bur ni 'gyur ba yin/_/
[\[38b.5\]]gsal bar byed pa'i nyi ma dang /_/skye ba'i rgyu yi pha dag dang /_/skyong [#]bar byed pa'i mi bdag rnams/_/de rnams sdig pa'i byed po nyid/_/gos byed pa yi ltar byas na/_/zas kyi bya ba'ang mi rigs te/_/gang phyir skyon ni gnyis 'byung ba/_/ma zos pa la ma yin te/_/zos
[\[38b.6\]]las srog chags skye 'gyur zhing /_/de dag thur du 'byung bar 'gyur/_/skyes pa nyams gyur ma zos na/_/ma skyes skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gal te gzhan gyi rgyu mtshan gyi/_/skyon de khyod ni mi 'dod na/_/gzhan gyis bsad par gyur pa yi/_/sdig de spyod la ga la 'ong /_/gang
[\[38b.7\]]phyir mi sdig gnas [#]mi sbyin/_/des na sdig de yod ma yin/_/de phyir sha sogs rjes gnang ba/_/skyon med par ni gzung bar bya/_/sha za ba ni skyon bcas min/_/de tshe srog chags gnod min phyir/_/mu tig rma bya'i sgro sogs dang /_/'bras dang chu yi dgos pa bzhin/_/'dod
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]chags kun rtog las byung phyir/_/sha zos de yi rgyu ma yin/_/de ma zos la'ang de 'byung ste/_/rtswa zan ba lang la sogs bzhin/_/sems med pa yi brtan pa la'ang /_/sems ni yod par rtogs byed pa'i/_/nyes bstan gsum la mthong bas na/_/
[\[39a.2\]]gsum po 'di ni spang ba'i rigs/_/ljon shing sems dang bcas pa min/_/skye gnas bzhir ni ma bsdus phyir/_/dkyil du bcad kyang bzod pa'i phyir/_/phag dum bzhin du bems po yin/_/gal te srog chags rkang brgya ltar/_/reg na 'khums [#]par 'gyur bas
[\[39a.3\]]na/_/sa ma ga dang thal sbyar ni/_/sems dang bcas par 'dod ce na/_/me yis reg pa'i skra sogs dang /_/skra la 'tshal [#]phyes blugs pa yi/_/khyad par de dag nyid kyis kyang /_/'di ni ma nges pa nyid yin/_/gso ba yod pas shing rnams ni/_/sems dang bcas par mi 'grub ste/_/
[\[39a.4\]]chang la sogs pa nyams pa [#]dag_/ldog pa yod par the tshom 'gyur/_/mthun [#]pa las skyes 'phel 'gyur dang /_/sdang sems dus ldan skye ba'i phyir/_/de bzhin gnyid log smyo ba'i phyir/_/sems yod rta sogs bzhin du 'dod/_/lhog pa byu ru bai DUr+ya/_/rin chen gser gyi
[\[39a.5\]]myug sogs kyis/_/shing rnams sems dang bcas par ni/_/'di ltar ma nges pa nyid yin/_/'di dag la ni sems med phyir/_/sdang sems zhes bya 'ang ma grub nyid/_/gtan tshigs don yang mi 'grub ste/_/lhog [#]pa sogs kyis [#]ma nges nyid/_/sems can rnams kyi
[\[39a.6\]]las dbang gis/_/rtsa bas 'byung ba dus su skye/_/dmyal ba dang ni mtho ris kyi/_/mtshon dang dpag bsam shing bzhin no/_/lam gsum ji bzhin don [#]ldan yin/_/tshangs pas bstan phyir sman dpyad bzhin/_/'das dang ma 'ongs mkhyen pa po/_/des bstan bsgrub bya yin zhe
[\[39a.7\]]na/_/tshangs smras zhes bya'i gtan tshigs dag_/skyed byed sogs kyis smras pa ni/_/nyes par brtags par bsgrubs [#]pa'i phyir/_/des na khyod kyi [#]'di ma nges/_/'ga' zhig don bzhin mthong ba [#]yis/_/kun tu don bzhin ma yin te/_/gnag rdzi smyon pa'i tshig rnams ni/_/
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]kun tu ji bzhin don min bzhin/_/'das dang ma 'ongs shes pa nyid/_/yi dgas la sogs la yang yod/_/de yis smras pa'i thams cad min/_/de phyir gtan tshigs dpyad bya yin/_/chos sogs 'di la gang yod pa/_/de nyid gzhan la'ang yod ces pa/_/res 'ga'
[\[39b.2\]]srin bu'i yi ge'i tshul/_/legs bshad 'ga' zhig mthong ba yin/_/ji ltar mi gtsang phung po'i nang /_/rin chen 'ga' zhig mthong gyur pa/_/rab tu skye dang de yi mthu/_/shes dang ldan pas de shes 'gyur/_/legs bshad 'ga' zhig gsum pa la/_/rab tu mthong
[\[39b.3\]]ba'ang de dang 'dra/_/khyim srang mi gtsang phung po las/_/rin chen 'byung ba ma yin no/_/skyon med rjes su dpag pa yis/_/rigs sam mi rigs ma dpyad par/_/blo ni gzhan gyis bskyed pa'i phyir/_/lung gzhan dag la the tshom za/_/ji ltar klung chen rgal [#]'dod pa/_/
[\[39b.4\]]gzings dag yongs su 'dzin pa ltar/_/de bzhin gtang [#]bya yin na yang /_/rjes su dpag pa gzung bar rigs/_/sgra tsam rjes su 'brang byed cing /_/song ba'i rjes su 'gro byed pa'i/_/dmus long bzhin du dkyil 'khor 'dir/_/byis pa 'khor bar 'khor ba yin/_/rten
[\[39b.5\]]pa med pa'i dmus long dag_/nyam nga'i lam du 'gro byed ltar/_/sgra tsam gtso bor byed pa rnams/_/ltung bar dka' ba ma yin no/_/kun mkhyen zhes bya'i sgra 'di yang /_/yul 'ga' zhig la ji bzhin yin/_/seng ge'i sgra yang la la bden/_/kha cig nye bar btags pa
[\[39b.6\]]nyid/_/chos dang sprul pa'i sku dag ni/_/nga la mi nyid du ma grub/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'ang ma grub ste/_/des na ma nges pa nyid yin/_/gal te ji ltar khyod bcom ldan/_/thams cad mkhyen pa min par 'dod/_/bde byed khyab 'jug sogs dag gis/_/shes pa de ltar
[\[39b.7\]]min zhe na/_/ji ltar de dag gis shes ltar/_/thams cad mkhyen pa de bden na/_/rab rib can gyis mthong ba ltar/_/dri med mig gis mi mthong bzhin/_/yang na 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen/_/chog shes nyid du 'dod na ni/_/gang phyir mdze [#]ni mi sogs kyis/_/gtan tshigs
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]'di ni ma nges nyid/_/cung zhig shes kyi kun mi shes/_/she na thub pas gang ma mkhyen/_/mtho ris byang grol lam zhe na/_/bstan pa 'di las bstan pa nyid/_/bstan du zin kyang mi rigs zhes/_/gal te khyod [#]kyi blo 'byung na/_/mi shes pa nyid yin
[\[40a.2\]]pas na/_/de yi lan yang smras zin to/_/bstan bcos blo sgra'i phyogs byas kyang /_/gtan la dbab par 'dra ba yin/_/dpyad [#]pa can sogs ma nges nyid/_/byas pa'i phyir na skyon dang ldan/_/gsum po sun 'byin par 'dra bas/_/gcer bur rgyu ltar bdag 'dod
[\[40a.3\]]pas/_/bsgrub bya'i rjes su 'gro med phyir/_/dpe ni med pa nyid yin no/_/dbu ma'i snying po las dpyod pa'i de kho na nyid gtan la dbab pa la 'jug pa ste le'u dgu pa'o//_//gcer bur rgyu bas thub pa la/_/kun ma bstan pas kun mkhyen min/_/zhes smras khyu
[\[40a.4\]]mchog sogs ma nges/_/brjod du med par brjod pa'i phyir/_/'khor ba'i thog ma ma [#]rig cing /_/rgyu yang rab tu ma shes la/_/de phyir ma rig rig med phyir/_/de bzhin nam mkha'i ro bzhin no/_/gal te thub pa'i mthus nus na/_/sems can thams cad mya ngan 'da'/_/
[\[40a.5\]]mu stegs rnams kyis [#]zhag bdun na/_/nor dang phrag dog dag gi phyir/_/mdzes ma bdag gis bsad do zhes/_/rang nyid kyis ni bstan pa yin/_/ji ltar thag pa chad gyur nas/_/shing gshong sa la lhung ba ni/_/rgyal bcas skye bo'i 'khor mthong nas/_de dag ngo mtshar
[\[40a.6\]]che bar gyur/_/mngon du bstan par bya ba'i phyir/_/skyob pas gzhan du de ma bsgyur/_/sA [#]la can grong zhugs pa ni/_/sems can don gyi bya ba mdzad/_/gang phyir bdud las rgyal zin pas/_/bdud kyi las ni de na med/_/nyan thos tshogs bcas dpa' bo ni/_/der
[\[40a.7\]]ni bsod snyoms chad gyur pas/_/sems ni zhum par ma mthong tshe/_/mang po byang chub tu nges [#]'gyur/_/glang chen dul bar bya phyir dang /_/'gro ba rnams ni gdul [#]ba'i phyir/_/bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa yin/_/thub pa bcom ldan mi mkhyen min/_/lha sbyin gyis
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]ni sgyogs 'phangs pa/_/de yang 'gro la phan phyir te/_/gzhan gyi gnod las grol ba yi/_/che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa yin/_/skyes bu lngas [#]brgyab brten pa'i rdo/_/chen po 'phangs par gyur pa ni/_/gnod sbyin kim pas de mthong nas/_/rang gi lus la bzed pa yin/_/
[\[40b.2\]]lha dang lha min rnams dang ni/_/stong phrag dag ni brgya snyed kyis/_/dad pa'i dbang po sogs thob nas/_/srid pa las ni grol bar gyur/_/lhas sbyin khyim na gnas na ni/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i stobs ldan zhing /_/'khor dang stobs ni thob gyur nas/_/bstan pa 'di ni nyams par
[\[40b.3\]]byed/_/blo ngan 'di ni rab byung na/_/nga la ci yang byed mi nus/_/de ltar ston pas gzigs nas ni/_/rab tu byung ba [#]ma bzlog go/_/cho 'phrul dag ni mthong 'gyur zhing /_/chos ni thos par gyur nas 'di/_/bsod nams sog [#]par gzigs gyur nas/_/rgyu skar bzang
[\[40b.4\]]po [#]bzhag pa yin/_/[#]dbu ma'i snying po las thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du grub par bstan pa ste le'u bcu pa'o//_//tha snyad la yang rmongs gyur pa/_/lta ba'i phreng 'khrugs 'gro rnams las/_/gnyis med de nyid nam mkha' 'dra/_/skal ldan sems can bkri
[\[40b.5\]]phyir dang /_/'jig rten gnyis la phan gdags phyir/_/gang gis [#]'jig rten kun rdzob ni/_/'jig rten 'das kyang ston mdzad pa/_/'jig rten rig pa de la 'dud/_/de ltar 'di ni dbu ma yi/_/snying po mdor bsdus byas pa yin/_/blo ldan mdo sde du ma yi/_/
[\[40b.6\]]gzugs brnyan blta ba'i me long yin/_/dbu ma'i snying po las bstod pa dang mtshan bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o/_/[#]dbu ma'i snying po tshig le'ur byas pa slob dpon chen po b+ha byas mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//ra sa 'phrul snang gi gtsug lag khang gi gzhir/_
[\[40b.7\]]rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na'i zhal snga nas dang [#]/_lo ts+tsha ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//[ {D3856}#]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_mad d+h+yA ma kA [#]hr-i da ya br-it+ti ta ra [#]kA dz+wA la/_bod skad du/_dbu ma'i
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]snying po'i 'grel pa rtog ge 'bar ba/_bam po dang po/_thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di na rang gi lha yid du 'ong ba la dang por phyag 'tshal ba nye bar bstan pa'i bstan bcos dag ni skyes bu dpa' bo'i rkyen dang /_bar chad med pa dang /_
[\[41a.2\]]'bras bu dang ldan par 'gyur bas/_de'i phyir bstan bcos byed pas bstan bcos kyi dang por/_gang gis de nyid rab brtag min/_/rnam shes bya min gzhi ma yin/_/mtshon min brtag min rig bya min/_/skye 'jig med cing bde ba dang /_/rnam brtag ma yin snang ba med/_/
[\[41a.3\]]mtshan ma med cing gsal byed med/_/gnyis min gnyis med ma yin dang /_/zhi dang blo 'jug rnam spangs pa/_/yi ge med pa yi ge yis/_/thugs rje nyid kyis bstan mdzad pa/_/ston pa ma nor nyid gsung ba/_/de la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/zhes ston pa la/_de nyid khyad
[\[41a.4\]]par thun mong ma yin pa dag [#]gis khyad par can ston par mdzad pa nyid kyis mngon par bstod do/_/de la gang gis zhes bya ba'i sgra ni spyi yin yang /_de nyid phyin ci ma log par ston par mdzad pa nyid kyis na 'dis ni bcom ldan 'das kho na dang sbyar bar bya'o/_/de nyid ces bya ba ni khyad par dag
[\[41a.5\]]bstan du zin kyang /_khyad par gyi gzhi'i ming ma bstan na de mi rtogs pas de'i phyir/_de nyid ces smos te/_'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos po de dag gi de nyid de/_de bzhin nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_stong pa nyid ces bya ba dag gi rnam grangs so/_/
[\[41a.6\]]rab brtag min zhes bya ba ni spyi dang ldan pa lkog tu gyur pa'i don snang ba la rjes su dpog pa'i shes pas rab tu brtag par bya ba ma yin pa'am/_rtog pa dang dpyod pa rtsing ba dang /_zhib pa'i rnam pas rjes su 'jug pa yang rung lhan cig 'byung ba [#]yang rung ba'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir
[\[41a.7\]]ro/_/rnam shes bya min zhes bya ba ni shes bya rnam pa lnga la 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa lngas rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ram/_byis pa dang /_mu stegs byed dang /_slob pa dang /_mi slob pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rtogs par mi nus pa'i phyir ro/_/
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]gzhi ma yin zhes bya ba ni ji ltar kun gzhi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa'i sa bon thams cad kyi gzhi yod pa dang /_skyes bu la bdag grol ba rnams kyi gzhi yod pa ltar/_'di la gang [#]gzhi dang kun tu sbyar ba yang yod pa ma yin pa'am/_sa yul gang na yang 'di'i gzhi dang kun tu sbyar
[\[41b.2\]]ba 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin pa'o/_/mtshon min zhes bya ba 'di rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid kyis [#]mtshon par bya ba ma yin pa'am/_'dis dngos po gang yang mtshon par byed pa ma yin pa'o/_/brtag min zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad rang gi ngo bor yongs su ma grub pa'i phyir 'di dang de'o
[\[41b.3\]]zhes brtag par mi nus pa'i phyir ro/_/rig bya min zhes bya ba ni rang byung gi ye shes skad cig gcig gis chos thams cad phyin ci ma log par rnam pa thams cad mngon par rtogs [#]pas rig pa med pa'i tshul gyis rig par bya ba'o/_/skye 'jig med cing zhes bya ba ni skye ba ni 'byung ba yin
[\[41b.4\]]la/_'jig pa ni rgyun chad pa'am zhig pa ste/_'di la de gnyis yod pa ma yin pa'o/_/bde ba zhes bya ba ni skye ba la sogs pa'i gnod pa ma lus pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro/_/rnam brtag ma yin zhes bya ba ni gzung ba dang /_'dzin pa dang /_bdag gi dngos po dang /_gzhan gyi dngos po
[\[41b.5\]]dang /[ #]dngos po med par rnam pa brtag pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/snang ba med ces bya ba ni rang dang gzhan du [#]snang ba med pa'i phyir ro/_/mtshan ma med cing zhes bya ba ni gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i mtshan ma dang bral ba'i phyir ro/_/gsal byed med ces bya ba ni skye ba dang /_
[\[41b.6\]]gnas pa dang /_'jig pa dang /_gzhan du 'gyur ba nyid ces bya ba'i gsal byed dag dang bral ba'i phyir ro/_/gnyis min gnyis med ma yin zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa gnyis dang /_dmigs su med pa gnyis dang /_dmigs pa dang dmigs pa med pa mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/
[\[41b.7\]]zhi zhes bya ba ni ye shes zhi bas rtogs par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ram/_rab tu zhi ba bla na med pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro/_/blo 'jug rnam spangs pa zhes bya ba ni don dam pa rtogs pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i shes rab 'jug pa med pa'i tshul du 'jug pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir/_mtshan ma dang bcas
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]pa dang dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i blo'i 'jug pa rnam par spangs pa'o/_/yi ge med pa zhes bya ba ni blo'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir/_tshig gi yul yang ma yin pas de'i phyir yi ge med pa ni brjod du med pa'o/_/yi ge yis zhes bya ba ni yi ge dag gis sgro
[\[42a.2\]]btags te'o[#]/_/thugs rje nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni brtsad [#]pa'i phyir ma yin par ro/_/bstan mdzad pa zhes bya ba ni rab tu bstan par gyur pa'o/_ston pa zhes bya ba ni lha dang mi rnams la phyin ci ma log par ston pa'o/_/ma nor nyid gsung ba zhes bya ba ni don yang dag pa ji lta ba nyid gsung
[\[42a.3\]]ba'o/_/de la zhes bya ba ni ston pa la'o/_/gus par zhes bya ba ni bsam pa thag pa nas so/_/phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ni phyag 'tshal bar gyur cig ces bya'o[#]/_/de ltar na des ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rang dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa bstan te/_rang gis [#]de nyid thugs
[\[42a.4\]]su chud nas gzhan dag la ston par mdzad pa'i phyir ro/_/'o na gang gi phyir dang 'brel pa gang gis bstan bcos 'di rtsom par byed ce na/_de'i phyir/_gzhan don bsgrub phyir brtul zhugs kyis/_/byang chub chen por blos byas rnams/_/de nyid bdud rtsir gzung [#]ba'i phyir/_/nus pas [#]
[\[42a.5\]]cung zhig brjod par bya/_/zhes smras te/_gzhan don bsgrub phyir zhes bya ba ni/_gzhan dag gi don bya ba'i phyir ro/_/brtul zhugs kyis zhes bya ba ni gang dag gis [#]brtul zhugs drag po blangs pas so/_/byang chub chen po zhes bya ba ni de byang chub kyang yin la/_chen po yang yin pas
[\[42a.6\]]byang chub chen po ste/_theg pa thams cad theg pa gcig gi rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir dang rtogs par bya ba mtha' yas pa'i phyir ro/_/der blos [#]byas rnams zhes bya ba ni mi phyed pa'i bsam pa yang dag par bskyed pa rnams so/_/de rnams de nyid bdud rtsi la gzud pa'i phyir bstan bcos 'di rtsom
[\[42a.7\]]par byed de/_de ltar na de ni dgos pa yin no/_/nus pas [#]cung zhig brjod par bya/_/zhes bya ba ni 'brel pa yin te/_ji ltar zhe na/_gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis [#]theg pa chen po'i phyir/_de nyid bdud rtsi'i yi ge dpag tu med pa dang /_don shin tu rgya chen po bka' stsal pa de'i rjes su
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]slob dpon gyis kyang de dbu ma'i bstan bcos su [#]rgya cher bstan gyi/_bdag gis ni blo zhan [#]pa rnams drang ba'i phyir ci nus pas cung zad tsam zhig brjod pa'i phyir ro/_/bstan bcos mtha' dag gi don gyi sgo nas yongs su rdzogs pa dang 'dra bar blos yang dag mthong ba na/_spyi sdom byed pa ni/_
[\[42b.2\]]byang chub sems ni mi gtong dang /_/thub pa'i brtul zhugs yang dag brten/_/de nyid shes pa tshol [#]ba ni/_/don kun sgrub pa'i spyod pa yin/_/zhes bya ba ste/_byang chub chen por smon lam btab pa rnams kyis dang por byang chub yid la byed pa dang mi 'bral bar bya'o/_/de nas phyi rol pa'i
[\[42b.3\]]thub pa'i chos dang mthun par theg pa chen po las gsungs pa'i thub pa'i brtul zhugs la yang dag par brten par bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu phyogs su lhung ba'i blo med pas gzhung lugs thams cad rnam par brtags nas rigs pa dang lung dang mi 'gal ba'i de nyid shes par bya ba'i phyir 'bad
[\[42b.4\]]par bya ste/_de ltar spyod pa gsum po de dag ni rang dang gzhan gyi don thams cad sgrub [#]pa'i spyod pa yin te/_bstan bcos 'di la mdor bstan pa ni de yin no/_/de la re zhig byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba ji brjod par bya ste/_byang chub kyi sems zhes bya ba de ji lta bu zhe na/_/byams
[\[42b.5\]]pa dang ni snying rje dang /_/shes pa chen pos brgyan pa yi/_/sangs rgyas sa bon byang chub sems/_/de phyir mkhas pas [#]de mi btang /_/zhes bya ba ste/_byams pa chen po zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang /_sgrol ba dang /_mngon par byang chub par bya ba dang /_yongs
[\[42b.6\]]su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i sems bskyed pa bzhi dang ldan pa'o/_/snying rje chen po zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad kyi don bya ba dang /_ngan 'gro las yongs su bskyab pa dang /_theg pa dman pa las bslang ba dang /_yang dag pa'i lam du dgod pa'i sems bskyed pa bzhi dang ldan
[\[42b.7\]]pa'o/_/shes pa chen po zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gnyis te/_thabs kyi shes pa dang /_shes rab kyi shes pa'o/_/de la thabs kyi shes pa ni 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad skyed [#]cing /_sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /_bla na med
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba dang /_sdig pa 'chags pa dang /_bsod nams kyi rjes su yi rang ba la sogs pa dang /_tshogs gsum yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/_/shes rab kyi shes pa ni chos thams cad dmigs su med
[\[43a.2\]]pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang /_skye ba med pa dang /_dngos po med pa dang /_yongs su ma grub pas so sor rtog [#]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi shes pa skad cig gcig dang ldan pa bskyed pa'o/_/de dag gis brgyan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa bon ni byang chub kyi
[\[43a.3\]]sems yin te/_byang chub ni chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du yongs su mkhyen pa'o/_/byang chub kyi sems ni byang chub kyi phyir sems pa'o[#]/_/gang gi phyir de sangs rgyas kyi sa bon yin pa de'i phyir mkhas pa sems can la blta bas bsam pa dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa dang mos
[\[43a.4\]]pa dang mos pa rgya chen po de mi gtang [#]bar bya ba'i rigs so/_/byang chub tu sems bskyed pas ci zhig bya bar rigs she na/_de'i phyir/_blo ldan snying stobs che ba dang /_/gzhan gyi sdug bsngal mi bzod cing /_/yang dag brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang /_/mthu dang ldan zhing mkhas pas ni/_/
[\[43a.5\]]shes rab snang ba med pa yi[#]/_/'jig rten kun la blta byas nas/_/'khor ba mi gtsang sa 'og nas/_/bdag nyid rgal bas bsgral bar rigs/_/zhes bya ba smras te/_blo dang ldan pa chos thams cad rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi shes rab dri ma med pa dang ldan pa dang /_snying
[\[43a.6\]]stobs che ba bdud dang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis [#]mi phyed cing brtan pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_gzhan gyi sdug bsngal mi bzod pa sems can thams cad bdag nyid dang 'dra bar khas blangs nas de dag sdug bsngal bas bdag nyid sdug bsngal ba dang /_yang dag par brtson 'grus
[\[43a.7\]]brtsams pa dge ba'i chos kyi spyod pa dag la brtson 'grus brtan pa brtsams pa dang /_mthu dang ldan pa bdag dang gzhan gyi don byed par nus pa dang /_mkhas pa shes nyen [#]can gyi ni shes rab kyi snang ba med pa blo'i gsal ba dang bral ba'i 'jig rten ma lus pa kun la blta ba yang dang
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]yang du brtag pa byas nas 'khor ba mi gtsang ba'i sa 'og nas/_bdag nyid rgal [#]bas 'jig rten yang bsgral bar rigs so zhes bya bar sbyar ro/_/byams pa chen po'i bshad pa sems can thams cad bsgral ba'i sems bskyed pa zhes bya ba dang po bshad zin to/_/sems can thams
[\[43b.2\]]cad [#]dgrol ba'i sems bskyed pa zhes bya ba gnyis pa'i dbang du byas nas/_/gang zhig shes rab mtshon rnon gyis/_/'ching ba kun bcad grol gyur pa/_/snying rje'i bdag nyid ldan pa yis/_/gang phyir mgon med sdug bsngal ba/_/'khor ba'i btson ra mi bzad par/_/'dod chags
[\[43b.3\]]la sogs sgrog gis bcings/_/bag med pa yi chang 'thungs nas/_/gti mug gnyid kyis log pa dang /_/rnam par rtog pa'i chom rkun gyis/_/dge tshogs ma lus rkus pa dag_/gal te grol bar mi byed na/_/mthu ldan mthu ni ci la phan/_/zhes bya ba smras te/_gang zhig shes
