[\[163a.1\]]sku nyid du/_/gyur na 'di bzod mya ngan 'das/_/sangs rgyas chos kyi sku 'di ni/_/mya ngan 'das yin de nyid ni/_/sangs rgyas kho nas [#]mngon par mkhyen/_/de phyir byin gyis brlabs nas zhugs[#]/_/zhes bstan pa lta bu'o/_/de la nyon mongs pa can gyi mi shes pa
[\[163a.2\]]ni 'phags pa nyan thos rnams kyis [#]lhag ma ma lus par rab tu spangs te/_gang zag la bdag med pa rtogs pa'i phyir ro/_/nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa ni grol ba la sgrib par byed pa ma yin par [#]yod bzhin du yang 'dir zad pa dang /_mi skye ba shes pa thob par 'gyur zhes bya'o/_/
[\[163a.3\]]ma rig nyon mongs can spangs pa[#]/_/de ni grol 'gyur sangs rgyas bzhin/_/de ni mi bden med pa'i phyir/_/dngos dang sprul pa'i sangs rgyas la/_/byang chub sems dpar gyur pa nyid nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das des sgra'i rjes su 'jug pa'i lugs su 'byung ba skye ba med
[\[163a.4\]]pa'i chos la bzod pa rtogs pas nyon mongs pa can gyi mi shes pa spangs par gyur pa yin gyi/_gtso bo chos kyi sku dang /_sprul pa'i sku dag gis ni yang nyon mongs pa can gyi mi shes pa spong bar mi srid pas sangs rgyas kyi dang /_de'i thar pa ni 'dra bar rigs pa ma yin no/_/gzhan
[\[163a.5\]]yang theg pa chen po'i lugs 'di la ni kun rdzob tu bcom ldan 'das kyis lam bsgom pa dang /_mngon par rtogs pa bstan pa yin gyi don dam par ni ma yin no zhes bstan par/_yang dag tu na theg chen gyi/_/lam gyis sangs rgyas byang chub dag_/sgrub min rtog bcas
[\[163a.6\]]mtshan bcas min/_/'jig rten pa yi lam bzhin no/_/'jig rten 'di dang 'jig rten pha rol ni yod do zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang /_mtshan ma dang ldan pa'i phyir lam ni byang chub kyi rgyu ma [#]yin te/_lha dang mi'i 'gro bar 'jug par byed pa'i dge ba'i las byed
[\[163a.7\]]pa'i lam bzhin no/_/gal te yang lam goms par byed pa ni nyon mongs pa zad par bya ba'i don du yin na gang gi tshe de nyid mi bden par gyur nas gang gis nyon mongs pa zad par byed/_sdong dum la mi yin par nyams su myong bar gyur pas the tshom med par byed pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]ni gzhan gyi [#]bsam pa smras pa yin no/_/de ltar na ji lta ba bzhin ma yin pa'i lam gyis nyon mongs pa zad par byed pa yang med de[#]/_yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phyir sdong dum la mir shes pas [#]de dang mi 'bral bas rang gi bsam pa smras pa/_ji srid 'ga' zhig skrag pa yis/_/
[\[163b.2\]]thag pa la ni sbrul zhes 'khrul/_/'khri shing bsdogs par shes pa ni/_/gnyen po'i phyogs kyi shes par 'byung /_/'khrul par gyur pas dang por ni thag pa la [#]sbrul yin gyi/_thag pa yin par mi [#]shes par 'gyur la/_yang de nyid la 'di'i [#]'khri shing bsgril ba yin gyi/_thag pa
[\[163b.3\]]yang ma yin pa la yang ma yin no zhes yang dag pa ma yin pa'i 'khri shing bsdogs par shes pas kyang sbrul du 'khrul pa'i gnyen por gyur pa de bzhin du gzugs la sogs pa la dang po ni 'khrul pas lta ba ngan pa rtogs [#]pa ngan pas zhen pa 'byung la/_yang [#]de dag la 'khrul pa nyid
[\[163b.4\]]shes pas yang dag pa'i lta ba la sogs pa'i gnyen po'i lta ba skyes pa na de dag gnyi ga yang dngos por 'dzin pas yang dag pa ma yin par shes kyis[#]/_mthong ba med pa ni yang dag pa nyid yin te/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid las gzhan med pa'i phyir ro/_/de yang ji skad
[\[163b.5\]]du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod [#]kyi mdo las/_'od srungs 'di lta ste/_skyes bu 'ga' zhig mi [#]bden pa'i the tshom gyi dug gis gdungs par gyur cing bdag gis dug zos so bdag gis dug zos so zhes zer zhing ngu bar byed brang rdung bar byed pa de la sman pa thabs la mkhas
[\[163b.6\]]pas yang dag pa ma yin pa'i dug 'byin pa ltar byas pas des de'i the tshom gyi dug gi [#]'du shes de ldog par 'gyur te/_des de yongs su gdung ba las grol bar 'gyur ro/_/'od srungs de ji snyam du sems/_de la sman pa gang gis yang dag pa ma yin pa'i dug gzhan 'byin pa
[\[163b.7\]]ltar ma byas na skyes bu de 'tsho bar 'gyur ram gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/ji ltar yang dag pa ma lags pa'i dug gi [#]som nyis gdungs par gyur pa la de bzhin du yang dag pa ma lags pa'i dug gzhan bsal [#]bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_'od srungs de bzhin du byis pa so so'i [#]skye bo rnams nyon mongs pas nyon mongs par gyur pa rnams la yang dag pa ma yin pa'i tshul gyis chos ston par mdzad do/_/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ni bden pa gsung ba [#]ma lags
[\[164a.2\]]sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar na bden pa ma lags pa gsung ba mdzad/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'od srungs de ji snyam du sems/_khyod bden pas rnam par grol lam/_bden pa ma yin pas yin/_gsol pa bdag ni bden pa ma lags
[\[164a.3\]]pas grol gyi/_bden pas ni ma lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das mi bden pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dag go/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te 'dod chags bden pa zhig tu 'gyur na ni mi sdug pas kyang
[\[164a.4\]]'dod chags dang 'bral [#]bar mi 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te zhe sdang yang dag pa zhig tu gyur na ni byams pas kyang zhe sdang dang 'bral [#]bar mi 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te gti mug yang dag pa zhig tu gyur na ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung bas kyang
[\[164a.5\]]gti mug dang 'bral [#]bar mi 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug yang dag pa ma lags pa de'i slad du mi sdug pa dang /_byams pa dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bsgoms pas 'bral bar 'gyur
[\[164a.6\]]ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang yang dag pa ma lags pas na yang dag pa ma lags pa'i yongs su shes pas yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de la nyon mongs pa [#]gang gis yang dag par spong bar 'gyur ba de
[\[164a.7\]]gnyi ga yang yang dag pa ma lags pa bden pa ma lags pa'i slad du yang dag pa ma lags pa'i nyon mongs pa yang dag pa ma lags pa'i yongs su shes pas 'bral bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no/_/des na gtan tshigs [#]ma nges bcas/_/
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]rgol ba'i smra ba spangs pa yin/_/gang dag yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phyir sdong dum la mir shes pa bzhin no zhes zer ba'i yang dag pa ma yin pas yang dag pa ma yin pa'i 'khrul pa spong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la/_yang dag pa ma yin pa nyid kyis ci thag pa la 'khri
[\[164b.2\]]shing bsdogs par shes pa sbrul du 'khrul pa spong bar 'gyur ba nyid yin nam/_'on te yang dag pa ma yin pa nyid kyis sdong dum la mir 'khrul pa bral bar mi 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs ma nges pa yin no[#]/_/gang yang gzhan gyis [#]khas blangs pa'i yang dag pa'i lam gyis yang dag pa'i
[\[164b.3\]]nyon mongs pa bsags pa zad par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba de yang dpe 'dis yang dag pa ma yin pa'i 'di gnyis bral bar [#]byed pas nyan thos kyi theg par smra ba [#]de spong ba yin no/_/gzhan yang /_kun nas nyon mongs gnyen po'i phyir/_/'dis ni lan yang btab pa [#]byas/_/
[\[164b.4\]]yang gal te gzhan dag na re lam ni yang dag pa yin te/_kun nas nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir mun pa'i gnyen po'i snang ba bzhin no zer na/_de [#]yang yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa yang dag pa ma yin pa'i gnyen pos [#]spong bar byed do
[\[164b.5\]]zhes bya ba thag pa dang sbrul dang 'khri shing bsdogs pa'i dpe 'di dag nyid kyis lan btab pa yin par rig [#]par bya'o/_/gtan tshigs ma [#]nges pa nyid du rgol ba yang spangs pa yin no/_/'dir theg pa chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi [#]gsung ma yin no zhes sngar bdag cag
[\[164b.6\]]gis bsgrubs [#]zin pas de'i phyir na lung med pa'i theg pa chen por bstan pa ni rigs pa ma yin te/_tshad ma'i rtog ge skom [#]po yin pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ba'i lan gdab par bya ba'i phyir phyogs snga ma dang gnyen po'i phyogs kyi dbye ba brjod pa/_theg chen sangs rgyas
[\[164b.7\]]gsung yin te/_/bdag med la sogs ston pa dang /_/dkon mchog gsum gyi bdag nyid che/_/ston phyir slob ma'i theg pa bzhin/_/'bras bu dang bcas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug ces bya ba'i lam dang /_de ston par byed pa'i gtsug lag kyang theg
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]pa chen po zhes bya ste/_'di ni chos can no/_/de sangs rgyas kyis [#]gsungs pa'i gsung yin pas sangs rgyas kyi zhes bya ba ni chos yin par bsgrub par bya'o/_/chos can dang chos bsdoms pa ni phyogs so/_/mu stegs byed gzhan dag gis bdag
[\[165a.2\]]la sogs par btags pa dag las 'das pas bdag med pa ste/_bdag med pa'i ngo bo ni bdag med pa nyid do/_/gang dag la bdag med pa la sogs pa ste/_stong pa dang mi rtag pa la sogs pa yod pa de ni bdag med pa la sogs so/_/de rnams ston par
[\[165a.3\]]byed pa ni bdag med pa la sogs pa ston pa'o/_/rnyed par dka' ba'i don dang dga' bar byed pa'i don gyis na dkon mchog ste/_sangs rgyas dang [#]/_chos dang /_dge 'dun no/_/dkon mchog rnams ni gsum yin pas dkon mchog gsum mo/_/de che ba'i bdag nyid kyi [#]ngo bo
[\[165a.4\]]nyid ni che ba'i bdag nyid de dkon mchog gsum gyi bdag nyid che'o/_/de ston par byed pa ni dkon mchog gsum gyi che ba'i bdag nyid sgrogs pa'o/_/gang dang gang bdag med pa la sogs pa rnams ston pa dang /_dkon mchog gsum gyi che ba'i bdag nyid
[\[165a.5\]]sgrogs pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi gsung yin te/_dper na slob ma'i theg pa bzhin no/_/slob ma'i theg pa dang 'dra bas slob ma'i theg pa bzhin te/_des na theg pa chen po ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa yin no/_/ma yin te/_sde snod gsum po nyid theg pa gsum [#]thob
[\[165a.6\]]pa'i rgyu yin gyi theg pa chen po yang bdag cag la ma grags la/_de sangs rgyas kyi gsung yin par yang ma grub pas phyogs gnyis ka la ma grub pa'i skyon yod pa'i phyir ro zhe na/_nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i mi shes pa rang byung phyin ci ma log par skad cig
[\[165a.7\]]ma gcig gis chos thams cad mngon par rtogs pa'i ye shes kyis rab tu spangs shing mi dmigs pa la goms par byas [#]pas shin tu bral bar gyur pa ni theg pa gzhan nyid du 'di sangs rgyas kyis [#]gsungs pa yin pas gnyi ga la ma grub [#]pa yin no/_/phyir rgol tshad mas
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]#]gnod pa'i phyir/_/de yi gtan tshigs ma grub nyid/_/gang dag gis [#]phyogs snga mar/_theg chen sangs rgyas gsung [#]ma yin/_/mdo sde sogs su ma bsdus phyir/_/rig [#]byed mtha' pa'i lta ba bzhin/_/zhes gang smras pa'i tshad ma de la yang lan btab pa'i phyir gang gis 'di la
[\[165b.2\]]gnod par 'gyur bsgrub [#]cing brjod par bya'o/_/gang gis mdo sde la sogs par ma bsdus pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs de ni ma grub pa nyid de/_ji lta [#]zhe na/_theg pa chen por bstan pa'i bden pa la sogs pa ni 'du [#]ba la sogs pa'i nang du bsdus pa'i phyir te/_gang 'di ltar
[\[165b.3\]]sdug bsngal dang /_kun 'byung [#]dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam gyi bden pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
[\[165b.4\]]la sogs pa theg pa chen por bstan pa de dag nyid 'dul ba dang /_mdo sde dang /_chos mngon pa rnams su yi ge de dang /_tshig de dag dang gsal byed de dag nyid kyis bstan te/_de rnams bsgoms [#]pas nyon mongs pa spong bar kun kyang mtshungs so/_/khyad par ni theg pa
[\[165b.5\]]chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes bya'i sgrib pa spangs pa ni bcom ldan 'das 'ba' zhig yin no/_/'dis ni 'dul ba la sogs par bstan pa'i bden pa la sogs par ni theg pa chen po thams cad du bstan pa yin pas mdo sde la sogs pa dang theg pa chen po phan tshun
[\[165b.6\]]bsdus pa yin te/_don gyis na mdo sde la sogs pa'i nang du theg pa chen po bsdus pa yin pas gzhan gyi [#]gtan tshigs ma grub par ston to/_/yang 'dir 'phags pa'i bden pa la sogs pa kha cig dang theg pa chen po ldan du zin kyang sde pa tha dad kyi gtsug lag mang
[\[165b.7\]]pos phyogs snga mar bdag cag gis [#]bkod pa gang yin pa de dag dang 'gal lo zhe na/_brjod par bya ste/_phyin ci log la mngon par zhen pa'i bag chags kyi blo bsgos [#]pa khyod kyis theg pa chen po'i gtsug lag gi don nges par ma bzung bar smra bar byed pa de la bdag gis
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]brjod par bya'o/_/theg pa chen po ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa [#]nyid yin te/_chos kyi phyag rgya dang mi 'gal ba'i phyir dang /_gang 'phags pa'i bden pa'i mdo sde la yang 'jug_/nyon mongs pa 'dul ba la yang yang dag par mthong /_rten
[\[166a.2\]]cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos nyid dang yang mi 'gal ba nyid ni sangs rgyas kyi gsung yin no zhes bya ba de thams cad theg pa chen po la grub [#]pa'i phyir ro/_/yang na sde pa bco brgyad po rnams kun gyi yang rang rang gi mdo sde la sogs pa la 'jug pa yin gyi/_phan tshun ni
[\[166a.3\]]'gal ba cher yod pa yin no/_/theg pa chen po yang gzhan la phan pa'i dbang du byas pa'i zab pa dang rgya che ba'i tshul gyis nyan thos kyi mdo sde la sogs pa'i sde snod la 'ga' zhig mi 'jug tu zin kyang /_theg pa chen po'i mdo sde la yang 'jug_/byang chub sems dpa'i bslab
[\[166a.4\]]pa'i gnas bdun brgya la yang snang /_stong pa nyid du bstan pa'i chos nyid dang yang mi 'gal ba'i phyir ro/_/de ltar na chos kyi phyag rgya dang 'gal ba med do/_/'di'i phyir yang theg pa chen po sangs rgyas kyis [#]gsungs pa yin te/_rtsa ba'i sdud par byed pa po kun du bzang po
[\[166a.5\]]dang /_'jam dpal dang /_gsang ba'i bdag po dang /_byams pa la sogs pa rnams kyis bsdus pa'i phyir ro/_/bdag cag gi rtsa ba'i sdud [#]par byed pa nyan thos ni ma yin te/_theg pa chen po'i gsung rab ni de dag gi yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/ji skad du/_shing sha pa'i
[\[166a.6\]]tshal gyi mdo las/_kun dga' bo shing sha pa'i tshal 'di la 'dab ma ji snyed pa [#]yod pa bas lhag par mang ba'i chos ngas rtogs par [#]gyur na yang khyed la ni ngas ma bstan te/_de snyed nyid kyis don bya ba byas pa'i phyir de dag nyid kyis ni khyed skyo bar yang mi 'gyur/_'dod
[\[166a.7\]]chags dang bral bar yang mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin du/_bla ma kun dga' pa ta li/_/sdug bsngal phung po sa pa [#]dang /_/'char byed stong pa 'char ba dang /_/gang po spangs pa ram pa dang /_/mya ngan 'das dang yul 'khor skyong /_/zhes bya gzhan yang 'gro ba'i
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]mdo/_/rtsa ba'i sdud par ma tshang bas[#]/_/rgyas pa min par rtogs par bya/_/'di ltar bla ma'i mdo sder lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis smras pa/_btsun pa bla ma bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos ji snyed cig 'dzam bu'i gling na rab tu gnas pa thams cad kyi sems la bltas na
[\[166b.2\]]chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin par byed pa ni btsun pa bla ma khyod ma gtogs pa dge slong gcig kyang med kyi[#]/_btsun pa bla ma khyod [#]kyi rnam grangs 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs yin gyi[#]/_khyod kyis zung shig [#]ces bya ba ste/_'di'i rjes su dpag [#]
[\[166b.3\]]nas gzhan dag kyang de'i dus na med par shes par bya'o/_/gang yang bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das nas ring po ma lon pa dang /_'phags pa kun dga' bo yang yod bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab rab tu shes pa dang shes par gyur pa med na da ltar lta ga la yod/_gzhan
[\[166b.4\]]yang [#]kun dga' bo'i mdo las/_bcom ldan 'das bgres [#]par gyur pa'i gnas skabs na/_'phags pa kun dga' bo la bsnyen bkur bar bka' stsal te/_ngas bstan pa'i chos rnams kyang 'dzin par nus so zhes bya ba nas des gsol pa/_bdag lo nyi shu lhag
[\[166b.5\]]tsam zhig bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du gnas par bgyi lags so zhes bya ba dang /_de nyid las chos kyi phung po stong phrag brgyad cu zhig_/bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas bdag gis bzung bas so[#]/_/gnyis ni dge slong dag las so zhes bya ba ste/_'dis ni 'di ltar
[\[166b.6\]]rtogs par bya ste/_gang bcom ldan 'das kyis sngar bstan pa de dag des ma bzung [#]ba nyid yin la/_de nyid de la yang bstan to zhes bya ba yang mi rigs te[#]/_gang dge slong dag la bzung [#]bas so/_/lo bzhi bcu'i bar gyi dus de srid cig chos nyung zad cig bstan par yang
[\[166b.7\]]mi rigs so/_/gal te 'phags pa kun dga' bos thams cad rtogs par 'gyur ro zhe na/_de lta na ni bla ma'i mdo las/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin par byed pa'i dge slong ni gcig kyang med do zhes smra bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de lta bas na
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]kun dga' bos thams cad bzung [#]ba ma yin no/_/de'i phyir des bstan cing yang dag par bsdus pas yang dag par bsdus [#]pa der ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' rgyas par mthong ba ma yin no/_/pa ta [#]li'i mdo las/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[167a.2\]]pa ta [#]li gang gi [#]tshe 'khor nyung zad dang lhags par gyur pa de'i tshe/_gang nas dge slong gi dge 'dun la rta cang shes bzang po'i rte'u zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bstan te zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ste/_mdo de yang ma [#]mthong ngo /_/gzhan yang sdug bsngal gyi phung po [#]
[\[167a.3\]]las/_bcom ldan 'das kyis shAkya ming chen las brtsams nas/_nga dus gcig gi tshe na rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa las/_ri'i lam nas nga ri ngos bzangs [#]la gshegs pa na/_der ngas gcer bu pa mgo thur [#]du bstan pa ngas mthong ste/_de la ngas 'di skad ces smras
[\[167a.4\]]so zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgyas par 'byung ba'i mdo sde de lta bu yang ma mthong ngo /_/sa pa'i mdo las/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dus gcig na nga rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs pa'i tshe ri la 'gro ba'i lam du gzhan mu stegs byed kun du rgyu mang po zhig nga'i thad du lhags
[\[167a.5\]]so/_/lhags nas nga la don 'di dag 'dri bar sems so zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgyas par 'byung ba'i mdo sde de yang ma mthong ngo /_/yang 'char byed kyi mdo las/_rnam grangs kyang yod de[#]/_gang ngas tshor ba bzhi bstan pa'o zhes bya ba'i mdo de yang ma mthong ngo /_/stong pa nyid
[\[167a.6\]]kyi mdo las kyang /_'phags pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya rnams kyi tshong dus [#]na bzhugs so/_/der bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don kun shes te zhes bya ba nas/_kun dga' bo nga ni stong pa nyid la mang du gnas so zhes bya
[\[167a.7\]]ba la sogs pa 'byung ste/_mdo de yang ma mthong ngo /_/'char ba'i mdo las/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po/_ngas dran te dus gcig tu thams cad shes pa dang thams cad mthong ba'i dge sbyong ngam bram ze 'ga' yang ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]de ltar mi 'byung ste/_de ni gnas ma yin no zhes bya ba ste/_mdo de yang ma mthong ngo /_/gang po'i mdo las/_gnas brtan kun dga' bos smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa gang po zhes bya ba dge slong gnas brtan byams ma zhes bya ba'i bu sngon gsar bur gyur pa na 'di lta bur zab pa zab pa'i
[\[167b.2\]]ngo bo'i chos kyi gtam brjod pa dang ldan pa na [#]zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba'i mdo sde de yang ma mthong ngo /_/sbas pa'i mdo [#]las/_lo byed kyis [#]smras pa/_dge sbyong gau ta ma ni ta ka na bzhugs pa'i dus gcig na gu 'dzi ka'i bsti gnas su zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba na der ji skad du/_bcom ldan
[\[167b.3\]]'das gau ta mas thams cad la bsam gtan bsngags par mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i mdo de yang ma mthong ngo /_/ram pa ka'i mdo las der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong lnga sde las brtsams te bka' stsal pa/_nga sngon rab tu ma byung zhing khyim par gyur pa na 'di ltar
[\[167b.4\]]bsams shing bslabs te/_khyim na gnas pa ni gnod pa dang bcas par gyur pa'o zhes rgyas par 'byung ba'i mdo de yang ma mthong ngo /_/yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo las/_gnas brtan kun dga' bos tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa la smras pa/_ngas bcom
[\[167b.5\]]ldan 'das kyi thad nas mngon sum du thos shing mngon sum du bzung [#]ba yin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par zhugs shing g.yo ba med pa'i zhi ba rtogs nas mig dang ldan pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o zhes 'byung ba'i [#]mdo de yang ma
[\[167b.6\]]mthong ngo /_/'phags pa yul 'khor skyong gis smras pa/_rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag par mkhyen cing gzigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis skyo bar 'gyur ba'i lam bzhi po 'di gsungs te/_
[\[167b.7\]]ji srid dma' [#]bar gyur pa ste/_rgyal po chen po 'jig rten 'di ni ngoms pa med pa sred pa'i khol po'o zhes bya ba'i bar du ste mdo de yang ma mthong ngo /_/'gro ba'i mdo las kyang /_mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa/_bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas mngon sum du thos
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]shing mngon sum du bzung ste/_kun dga' ra ba byas nas sngo bar byed pa'i sems can yang yod de[#]/_lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba nas [#]phan yon ston cing sbyin rabs brjod pa'i
[\[168a.2\]]rgyus skye ba yang yod do zhes bya ba'i bar du 'byung ba'i mdo de yang ma mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du mdo gzhan dag kyang shes par bya ste/_mi smra ba'i dngos po'i mdo las/_maud gal gyi bu la sangs rgyas kyi gsung gis sngar bka' stsal ba bzhin du maud gal gyi bu khyod kyis 'phags pa'i mi smra ba sgoms
[\[168a.3\]]shig_/bag med par ma byed cig ces bya ba dang /_gnas par bya ba'i mdo las/_'phags pa'i gnas pa 'di la bag med par ma byed cig_/ces bya ba 'byung ba'i mdo de dag kyang ma mthong ngo /_/yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po la sogs pa'i mdo da ltar yod pa'i mdo mang po
[\[168a.4\]]rnams kyang mdo tha dad kyi nang nas tshig so sor 'byung ngo /_/de lta bas na de dag dang gzhan yang mdo mang po dag nyan thos kyi theg pa la da ltar sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa rgyas par mi snang ba yin pas shes par byed pas [#]shes par bya'o/_/gang yang rtsa ba'i sdud par byed pa po 'od
[\[168a.5\]]srungs chen po la sogs pa dgra bcom pas byas pa de ni 'di [#]ltar nyams te/_sde pa tha dad kyi lung las tshig gi mdo rnams rnam par gzhag [#]pa tha dad pa'i phyir ro/_/lung gi tshig de dag gi khyad par bsdus pa'i mdo de dag gi tshig gi don bsdus pa rnams kyang /_yang tha dad du 'don
[\[168a.6\]]pa'i phyir dang /_mdo gzhan yang ma gtogs shing mi 'gal ba mngal du 'jug pa dang /_dga' ba can dang /_tshe'i mthar thug pa zhes bya ba'i ming can rnams nye bar mthong ste/_de ltar na sdud par byed pa yang 'chol bar gyur pas de lta bu dag la sangs rgyas kyi bka' rgyas par bzhugs
[\[168a.7\]]par ji ltar yid ches par nus/_gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa las thos pa gcig las 'phros pa yang brgya'i bar du yang yod do zhes thos so/_/gzhan yang theg pa chen po la yang /_gsung rab gzhan nyid yin na tha dad kyi sdud par byed pas ga la sdud par 'gyur te/_phan tshun
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]'gal bas [#]na sdud par byed pa tha dad pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/gang gi phyir 'di ltar don dam par stong pa nyid la sogs pa bdag med pa dang ldan pa'i mdo ni 'phags pa mang pos bkur ba rnams khas mi len te/_bar ma do'i srid pa srid pa bdun pa dang ldan pa la sogs pa ni sa ston
[\[168b.2\]]sde pa la sogs pa khas mi len to/_/de bzhin du 'dul ba las kyang /_gnas ma bu [#]rnams kyi las ni dus ma yin par bu ram bza' ba la sogs pa bkag go/_/thams cad yod par smra ba rnams kyi las ni bza' shing [#]longs spyod par snang ngo /_/de dag gi mdo las ni bdag
[\[168b.3\]]yod pa nyid du rjes su bsngags so/_/thams cad yod par smra ba rnams kyis ni spong ngo /_/de bzhin du kha cig ni bdag med par smra ba'o/_/kha cig ni gang zag tu smra ba'o/_/kha cig ni 'dus byas thams cad skad cig mar 'dod do/_/la la ni skad cig ma gnyis su
[\[168b.4\]]'dod do/_/la la ni sa 'di bskal pa'i mthar gnas par 'dod do/_/la la ni mya ngan las 'das pa rdzas su yod par 'dod do/_/kha cig ni ming tsam du'o/_/kha cig ni srid pa bar ma 'dod do/_/gzhan dag ni mi 'dod do/_/kha cig ni bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon par rtogs pa
[\[168b.5\]]skad cig ma gcig tu 'dod do/_/gzhan dag ni skad cig ma bcu drug nyid du 'dod de/_de ltar na snga ma bzhin du 'gal bar gyur pas sde pa tha dad kyi gsung rab rnams sna tshogs su gyur pas na gtsug lag nyid kyang re zhig bsgrub par dka' bas sdud par byed pa tha dad kyis [#]
[\[168b.6\]]bsdus pas theg pa chen po sangs rgyas kyi bka' [#]yin no/_/gzhan yang gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa ni mngon par rtogs pa ji lta ba bzhin yin gyi de las gzhan du ma yin pas mngon par rtogs pa rtag pa yin pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa zhes bstan gyi mi 'gyur
[\[168b.7\]]ba ni ma yin no/_/khyad par du shes par 'dod na lang kar gshegs pa'i mdo las blta bar bya'o/_/rgyun gyi rjes su 'jug pa skad cig gis 'jig pa'i ngo bo la yang rtag pa zhes bya ba'i sgra yod de/_ji ltar chu klung ni rtag tu 'bab po/_/me ni rtag tu 'bar ro zhes bya ba ste/_de ltar
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]na 'dus byas thams cad mi rtag go zhes bya ba dang mi 'gal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni khyab pa'o zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi shes bya ma lus pa la khyab pas yin gyi/_khyab 'jug dang 'dra bar thams cad du gnas pa nyid ni ma yin no/_/de bzhin
[\[169a.2\]]gshegs pa'i snying po can zhes bya ba yang stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa la sogs pa rnams sems can thams cad kyi rgyud la yod pa'i phyir yin gyi/_nang gi byed pa'i skyes bu rtag pa thams cad du khyab pa lta bu ni ma yin te/_ji skad du/_chos thams
[\[169a.3\]]cad ni stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i ngo bo/_gang stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [#]dang /_smon pa med pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung bas so/_/len pa'i rnam par shes pa yang 'khor bar 'jug pa dang ldog pa'i rgyur gyur
[\[169a.4\]]pa/_chu bo chen po'i rgyun bzhin du 'bab pas 'jug tu zin kyang /_skad cig ma nyid kyi rgyun gyis [#]'jug pa yin gyi/_bdag dang 'dra bar ni ma yin pa'i phyir bdag med pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya dang mi 'gal lo/_/sangs rgyas mya ngan yongs mi 'da'/_/zhes bya ba dang /_nyon
[\[169a.5\]]mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /_shes bya'i sgrib pa spangs su zin kyang gdul ba'i skye bo la ltos nas chos nyid kyis thob pa'i skye bas [#]kha cig tu ni 'bar ba mdzad pa/[#]yang gang dag tu gdul ba'i skye bo'i zhing med par gyur pa de dag tu ni mya ngan las 'das par yang ston te/_'gro
[\[169a.6\]]ba gzhan dag tu shing med pa'i me bzhin no/_/yang gzhan dag tu ji ltar bzhed pas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa yang ston pa yin gyi/_gtan du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ni ma yin te/_sems can gyi khams ma lus pa mthar thug par
[\[169a.7\]]bsgrub par bya'o zhes smon lam btab pa yod pa'i phyir ro/_/mya ngan las 'das pa yang mya ngan las 'da' ba bstan pas 'dul ba rnams skyo ba skyed [#]pa'i phyir ro/_/rnam grangs kyi mya ngan las 'das pa yang yod pa'i phyir ram/_'khor ba dang zhi ba la mi gnas pa'i mya
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]ngan las 'das pa yang yod pa'i phyir te/_dngos pos mya ngan nga mi 'da'/_/mdzad pa nyid dang mtshan gyis min/_/shes [#]dang shes bya'i rnam rtog las/_/'das pas nga ni mya ngan 'da'/_/zhes bya bas rnam par rtog pa spangs pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa khas blangs pa'i phyir mya ngan las
[\[169b.2\]]'das pa zhi ba dang 'gal ba yang ma yin no/_/nyan thos chen po rnams lung bstan pa yang sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma yin pa ma yin te/_nyan thos gang dag gi rigs [#]la dgongs nas lung bstan pa yin te/_sems can gyi rigs gang dbang po rno ba gang yin pa de lta bus gzhan gyi [#]don rab tu
[\[169b.3\]]sgrub pa'i thabs la mkhas pa bla na med pa'i 'bras bu khyad par can thob par 'dod pas 'bras bu'i mchog 'dod pa nyid kyis mchog nyid du gyur pa yang yod de/_byang chub sems dpa' bzhin no/_/sems can gyi rigs gang dbang po rtul [#]ba bdag gi don sgrub par [#]byed pas gang zag
[\[169b.4\]]la bdag med pa tsam goms par byas pas 'bras bu dman pa nyid kyis dman pa'i khyad par nyid thob par gyur pa yang yod de/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas bzhin no/_/sems can gyi rigs gang dag khyad par can la 'dod pa bskyed pa na yang 'bras bu dman pa thob pa yang yod
[\[169b.5\]]de/_ji ltar rang sangs rgyas bse ru ltar spyod pa dag gis byang chub kyi tshogs bskal pa brgya'i bar du bsags nas rkyen 'ga' zhig gis byang chub chen po las phyir log par 'gyur ba lta bu'o/_/sems can gyi rigs gang dag dbang po rnon po dang ldan du zin na yang dman pa'i khyad
[\[169b.6\]]par 'dod cing thabs la mi mkhas par gyur pas dang por nyon mongs pa spong bar byed pa la gang gi [#]tshe byang chub chen po'i bskal pa yod par mthong ba na de bzhin gshegs pas lung nod par mdzad de[#]/_de de'i rjes la las dang nyon mongs pa spangs na [#]yang chos nyid kyis thob pa'i skye
[\[169b.7\]]ba [#]byang chub chen po'i tshogs khyad par can nyid bsags nas khyad par can gyi rtogs pa thob par 'gyur te/_nyan thos chen po shA ri'i bu la sogs pa bzhin te/_de dag ni chos bcu pa'i mdo las bstan to/_/yang na sngar nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa spang bar byas nas phyis shes bya'i
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]sgrib pa spong bas yongs su sbyang ba byas nas/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/gang yang sa bon mes tshig pa la myu gu 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba bzhin no zhes zer ba yang mi rigs te/_bdag cag kyang yang de nyon mongs pa'i skye ba'i myu gus yang
[\[170a.2\]]'byung bar mi 'dod do/_/de lta [#]na yang nyon mongs pa med pa'i shes bya'i sgrib pa spang ba'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bskul ba na rab tu sbyor bar byed de/_des dang por ni lhag pa'i bsam pa dag pa'i sa nas nye bar bzung nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa nyon mongs pa
[\[170a.3\]]can ltar spyod na yang kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yin par blta bar bya'o/_/gang 'di skad du sa bdun pa ni nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa yang ma yin/_nyon mongs pa med pa yang ma yin zhes zer ba ni nyon mongs pa'i kun du rgyu ba med pas nyon
[\[170a.4\]]mongs pa dang bcas pa yang ma yin la/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'dod pa'i bsam pa rdzogs par ma gyur pas nyon mongs pa med pa yang ma yin zhes brjod par bya'o/_/bskal pa grangs med pa gnyis pas yongs su rdzogs pa'i sa brgyad pa la ni sbyor ba las byung
[\[170a.5\]]ba'i spyod pa thams cad nas thams cad du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs ma thag nyid du byang chub sems dpa' des byang chub sems dpa'i gnas pa zab mo dben pa la gnas pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/de ni 'gog
[\[170a.6\]]pa la snyoms par zhugs pa'i dgra bcom pa bzhin du gang gi tshe skye ba med pa'i chos la bzod pa la gnas pa de'i tshe de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis [#]bslang bar ma mdzad na de nyid du mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni mdo'i tshig yin no/_/skye ba med pa'i
[\[170a.7\]]chos la bzod pa de'i nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa spangs pa ni dgra bcom pa dang 'dra bas bsil bar gyur cing /_'khor bar 'jug pa dang bral ba [#]tshe la dbang ba [#]sogs pa dbang bcu rab tu thob pa de la dbang bar gyur cing /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi shin tu goms pas bdud bzhi las
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]rnam par rgyal zhing sems can gyi don la ro gcig par gyur pa [#]sgrib pa med pa'i byams pa la gnas pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang /_sman gyi sdong bu dang /_dpag bsam gyi shing [#]ljon pa dang 'dra ba'i lus kyis gang dang gang sems can la mngon par bsgrub pa de dang de sems can gyi rgyud [#]la
[\[170b.2\]]bsams pa bzhin du 'bras bu rtsol [#]bar 'gyur te mig dug can bzhin no/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las kyang /_don 'di nyid bstan te/_lha'i bu gzhan [#]dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa/_dbang po rnon po la sogs pa de dag ni bla na med
[\[170b.3\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o/_/gang dag yang dag pa'i skyon med pa la zhugs par gyur pa de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i nus pa yod pa ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_des 'khor bar 'jug
[\[170b.4\]]pa'i mtshams bcad pa'i phyir ro/_/gang yang bse ru dang dman pa'i rigs kyi 'bras bu can dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par byed na/_de dag la yang rjes su yi rang ngo /_/gang yang khyad par can gyi rigs dag thabs la mi mkhas
[\[170b.5\]]pa nyid kyis nyon mongs pa spangs par gyur na yang dman pa las khyad par can gyis rtogs par 'gyur te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nyan thos la sogs pa'i chos las khyad par du 'phags shing 'jig rten las shin tu 'das shing khyad par du [#]'phags pa'i mchog_/rnam pa thams
[\[170b.6\]]cad mkhyen pa'i chos la dmigs par byed pas so/_/de ltar na nyan thos la sogs pa lung bstan pa mi rigs pa ma yin no/_/yang na/_gzugs ni gang dang gang rnams kyis/_/lus can rnams ni 'dul gyur pa/_/snying rje'i dbang gis de dang der/_/de bzhin gshegs
[\[170b.7\]]pa ston par mdzad/_/gang gi phyir sa brgyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' kho na nyon mongs pa dang bral ba dgra bcom pa dang 'dra na yang thabs kyis 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga mngon par sprul nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang gros su mdzad de/_rgya che zhing rnam pa [#]mang ba'i nyon mongs pa
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]can lta bu'i spyod pa yang ston par mdzad de/_sems can rnams skyo ba skyed [#]pa'i phyir gling bzhi pa dag kyang yongs su [#]gtong ste/_ji [#]skad du 'bar ra ru tses sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa las/_bdag nyid gcig las mang po nyid/_/mchog tu legs par mdzad pas
[\[171a.2\]]sprul/_/tha dad ma gyur bden dngos las/_/bdag dang lhan cig dga'o [#]zhes/_/myos pa rnams dang lhan cig de/_/rgyags shing myos pas myos ma dang /_/'dod pa'i rgyags pa las rgal [#]kyang /_/'dod pas myos ma rnams dang rtse[#]/_/rnal 'byor ye shes me yis ni/_/'dod pa'i
[\[171a.3\]]'dod chags bsregs gyur kyang /_/de yis [#]sems la 'dod pa ni/_/'byung ba lta bu nyid du ston/_/de ltar de ni spyod pa dang bcas rmi lam sgyu ma ltar/_/myos pa'i dbang gyur de dag 'dun phyir rtse [#]ba nyid du byed/_/mi g.yo brtan pa'i sems can sems can kun gyi sems can gcig_/
[\[171a.4\]]legs par spyad pas gnyid spangs gnyid ces bya ba'i gnyid kyis log_/ces 'byung bas/_de lta bas na 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur na yang snying rje'i dbang gis nyon mongs pa'i spyod pa sprul pa'i gar stabs ston par mdzad do/_/gang dag byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa la gnas pa ni
[\[171a.5\]]'dod pa la dga' ba bstan par gyur nas [#]sras kyang bltams [#]par gyur to zhes zer ba de dag gi [#]ltar na ni sangs rgyas nyid kyang med de/_tshul khrims 'chal bar gyur pas so/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med par gyur na ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pas pha
[\[171a.6\]]rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyang med de/_gang gi phyir tshul khrims 'chal pa la [#]ni sbyin pa med do/_/bzod pa yang med do/_/brtson 'grus kyang med do/_/bsam gtan yang med do/_/shes rab kyang med do zhes gsungs pa ste/_de ltar na pha rol tu phyin pa med pas sangs
[\[171a.7\]]rgyas kyang med par thal bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang mi rigs pa mang du yod de/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar gyur cing mthu phun sum tshogs par gyur pa gang gis yum gyi lhums su 'jug cing 'byung ba de dag gi tshe 'jig rten thams cad du snang ba rgya chen pos gsal
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]bar gyur na yang thos pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa la dbang thob pa ma yin zhing nyon mongs pa'i kun du rgyu thams cad ma spangs pa yang mi rigs so/_/de ltar gyur na yang nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis 'dod pa'i khams su skye ba bzhes shing lhums su 'jug pa
[\[171b.2\]]dang /_de na [#]gnas pa yang rigs pa ma yin no/_/bltams nas ring po ma lon pa na byang chub sems dpa' sus kyang ma brten par gom [#]pa bdun du gshegs pa dang /_phyogs bzhir gzigs nas bdag gi skye ba tha ma 'di yin no zhes gsungs pa yang brjod par mdzad [#]
[\[171b.3\]]de phyis sku rgyas par gyur cing dbang po yang yongs su smin pa na 'dod pa'i dga' ba la longs spyod cing bag med par gyur to zhes bya ba yang mi rigs so/_/rang bzhin gyis skye ba du ma rjes su dran pas/_bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs las tshangs par spyod pa [#]spyad par byos [#]shing /_byang chub
[\[171b.4\]]kyi lam goms par byas nas dga' ldan du lha'i rigs drug la bos nas 'dir byon pa dang /_bdag dang /_gzhan gyi dga' [#]ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba'i chos kyi de nyid mi mkhyen pa dang /_mu stegs byed gzhan las byang chub kyi lam btsal ba byas pa dang /_bdag nyid
[\[171b.5\]]gdung ba la rjes su sbyor bas gnas pa la lam gyi 'du shes byas nas dka' thub kyi sdug bsngal gyis gdung bar byed pa yang mi rigs so//_//dbu ma'i snying po'i 'grel pa rtog ge 'bar ba/_bam po bco lnga pa/_yang skye ba dran pa yang ma yin te/_bskal pa mi
[\[171b.6\]]nyung bar bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pa dang ldan zhing /_dran pa dang blo dang stobs chen po yang thob nas/_lhums su zhugs pa dran pa bsnyel zhing 'khrungs pa tsam gyis de lta bu'i gsung brjod pa yang mi rigs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa ni bsam gtan
[\[171b.7\]]dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bskyed nas nyams par gyur pa'o zhes bya ba yang mi rigs pa'am nyams par ma gyur na yang dka' thub spyad pas dag par 'gyur bar 'dod cing /_'dod pa na spyod cing tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa'i lta ba mchog tu
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]'dzin pa yang mi rigs so/_/gal te yang byang chub sems dpa' ni blo sngon du btang nas sems can gdul ba'i thabs kyi bye brag bzung ba'i don gyis ji skad smras pa de dag thams cad bstan pa yin no zhe na/_de lta bu thams cad ni sprul pa nyid kyis kyang mdzad par
[\[172a.2\]]skyod [#]do/_/de lta bas na glo bur du skye ba yongs su 'dzin pa [#]yang mi rigs la 'dod pa'i bsod nams kyi mtha' la sbyor ba dang /_bdag nyid dub pa'i mtha' la sbyor ba yang mi rigs pas brjod par mi bya'o/_/gal te 'di dag thams cad sprul pa yin na dka' ba'i spyad [#]pa spyod pa'i dus
[\[172a.3\]]na las kyi 'bras bu yin te/_nga sngon bram ze bla ma zhes bya bar gyur pa'i dus su yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs la dge sbyong mgo reg la byang chub ga [#]la yod/_byang chub ni shin tu dka' bas bsgrub [#]par bya ba yin no zhes ngag tu brjod pa'i las de'i rnam par smin
[\[172a.4\]]pas ngas lo drug tu dka' ba spyad pa yin no zhes ci'i phyir gsungs par [#]gyur ce na/_da ni de ltar shin tu mun par gyur pa'i rigs dag bsal bar bya'o/_/ji ltar na de lta bu'i dgongs pa can dag la drang thad du dad par gyur nas spro bar byed/_gang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis
[\[172a.5\]]sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgra snga na ma thos pa thos pa na ba spu thams cad langs par gyur cing mchog tu dga' ba dang bde ba skyes te/_shin tu mthong bar 'dod par gyur to zhes bya ba dang /_yang bram ze bla mas [#]sangs rgyas la skur pa btab pa yang gzhan du ma yin la skye ba gsum pa la sangs
[\[172a.6\]]rgyas su gyur to zhes bya ba dang /_mya ngan las 'da' ba'i sgra yang kun du sgrogs shing bdud kyi dgra'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pas dril chen gyi sgras bdud bzhi las rgyal bar gyur cing /_'chi bdag kyang shin tu pham par byas na/_ci zhig byed na mthar byed pa'i dgra bo'i gnod pa dang 'brel
[\[172a.7\]]par gyur/_yang bcom ldan 'das de sku tshe thung ngun du 'jug pa'i phrin las ci zhig mdzad nas mi rnams kyi tshe tshad tsam du yang 'di ma gyur cing 'chi bdag gi dbang du gyur pa dang /_so so'i [#]skye bo bzhin du gsung bar yang [#]mdzad de/_kun dga' bo 'dzam bu'i gling 'di ni dga' bar bya ba'o/_/
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]ri'i lam gyi ri 'di ni dga' bar bya ba'o/_/'dod pa thams cad dang /_yid du 'ong ba dang /_mdzes pa dang /_yid dang 'thad pa'i dngos po sna tshogs kyang byung bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang tha dad du gyur pa'o [#]zhes gsung bsgrags pa dang /_dge slong dag nga'i mdun du ma 'dug cig
[\[172b.2\]]ces snyung ba na tshor bas nyen pa'i thugs skyo ba'i tshig gsung ba dang /_kun dga' bo la chu blangs pa [#]na ring du 'gor ro zhes ma dgyes par gyur pas [#]gsung ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dag gis nyams par gyur cing non nas/_kha rlangs kyi du bas mun par gyur cing /_/gdong
[\[172b.3\]]g.yogs par gyur pa'i dgra bcom pa stong snyed kyi bu dag smre sngags sna tshogs 'don cing ngu ba dang /_so so skye bo'i dge slong gi tshogs brgya stong snyed du ngu ba dang bcas pa dang /_kun nas mtha' yas pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun las lus [#]'bor ba dang /_dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma'i tshogs
[\[172b.4\]]stong phrag snyed kyis [#]stod g.yogs dang rgyan rnams 'bor bar byed cing /_mgo dang lus rdul gyis g.yogs [#]par gyur cing mchi mas gdong gi pad+ma bangs par gyur pa dang /_skra 'bal ba dang spyi gtsug tu rde[#]bas shing snying rje rje ltar ngu bar byed cing bzhin mi sdug pas smre ba dang /_
[\[172b.5\]]lha'i bu brgya stong rgyan dang /_phreng ba dang /_lus kyi rgyan dang /_cod pan dang /_gdub 'khor dang /_gos dang /_mgo rgyan dag sgyur [#]bar byed cing /_lag pa dbyug pa ltar sgreng [#]ba kun du g.yob par byed pas/_bdag nyid la mgon skyabs med par sems shing mya ngan byed pa
[\[172b.6\]]dang /_shin tu g.yo ba'i mar me'i rtse mo la rlung gi shugs kyis brgyab [#]pa ltar mi rtag pa'i rlung gi shugs kyis brgyab [#]pa'i tshe'i mtha' mi rtag pa nyid kyi chu srin gyi ltor zhugs pa ni gang 'di skad bstan pa dang 'gal ba yin te/_skyes bu gang zag 'ga' zhig srog gcod pa rab tu spangs
[\[172b.7\]]nas/_gang gi tshe sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa de'i tshe phun sum tshogs pa gnyis 'dzin pa yin te/_longs spyod chen po phun sum tshogs pa sgrub [#]pa dang /_tshe ring ba phun sum tshogs pa sgrub [#]pa'o/_/'dir bcom ldan 'das ni thams cad du srog gcod pa las shin tu log cing spangs
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]par gyur pas dag par byas nas phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid kyi dngos po grangs med pa yongs su btang bas mchod sbyin chen po rtsom pa mdzad pa'i sku tshe ring po'i las bsags pa'i rnam par smin pa [#]cung zhig kyang mthong bar ma gyur pa de gang du zad par gyur/_grangs med
[\[173a.2\]]pa gsum du bsags pa las lo bzhi bcu rtsa lngas 'bras bu 'byung [#]bar ma gyur pa yang mi rigs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi [#]phrin las kyi dbang gis yin no zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das ni 'jigs [#]pa thams cad las grol bar gyur pa yin na phrin [#]las kyi dbang gis 'jigs pa mnga'
[\[173a.3\]]ba'o zhes bya ba 'di mi rigs so/_/rgyun mi 'chad par yangs shing rgya che ba tshad med pa'i sku tshe ring bar 'jug pa'i las rnams mi dge ba'i las 'ga' zhig gis zil gyis mnan nas sku tshe thung ba'i las kyi rjes su rnam par smin par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni gzhan dag zil gyis mnan nas de
[\[173a.4\]]dag [#]gcig pu smin par 'gyur zhes bya ba 'di lta bu ni shin tu rmongs par gyur pa rnams kyis gzung bar bya ba yin no/_/rdo rje ltar mi phyed par gyur pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyi sku/_mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs par gyur pa la snyun mnga' bar gyur nas maud gal [#]gyi bu 'tsho byed
[\[173a.5\]]la rmed du btang ba na/_des gnas brtan zhun mar ro zhes bya ba'i bar gyis thams cad mkhyen pas 'tsho byed la rmed par byed pa yang rigs pa ma yin no/_/'di ltar yang grags te/_gnas brtan ba [#]ku las tshangs pa mtshungs par [#]spyod pa rnams la smras pa/_tshe dang
[\[173a.6\]]ldan pa dag bdag gis bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgyad cu lhag cig lon na mgo na ba tsam yang nam yang byung bar ma dran te zhes smras pa dang /_de ni sman a ru ra gcig nad pa la sbyin pa byas pas rnam pa de lta bur gyur to zhes seng ge'i sgra bsgrags par gyur to/_/nad pa la
[\[173a.7\]]a ru ra gcig tsam byin pa'i rnam par smin pa yang de dang 'dra na/_bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa [#]lta smos kyang ci dgos te 'gal lo/_/de lta bas na 'di dag thams cad ni sems can gyi don gyi ched du bcom ldan 'das kyi sprul pa yin
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]te/_de ltar na bdag nyid nyan thos su sprul pa lung bstan pa yin pa'am/_nyan thos kyi cha byad 'dzin pa shA ri'i bu la sogs pa'i ming gis brjod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams lung bstan pa yin te/_ji skad du/_gcig ni nges par bzhugs pa dang /_/gzhan dag nges par
[\[173b.2\]]gzung ba'i phyir/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni/_/ma nges rnams la theg gcig bstan/_/zhes 'byung ba bzhin no/_/yang gzhan dag ni bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba dang bcas par spangs pas grol ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa gcig pu yin gyi/_nyan thos
[\[173b.3\]]dang rang sangs rgyas rnams ni ma yin te/_de dag la nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i mi shes pa yod pa'i phyir ro/_/de la nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang shes bya'i sgrib pa spangs pas bag chags dang bral bar gyur nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi rtog pa'i ye
[\[173b.4\]]shes thob par 'gyur te/_de dag gi [#]ye shes rnam par mi rtog pa des 'bad pa med na yang sngon mngon par bsgrubs pa'i smon lam gyi [#]mthus 'khor ba'i mtha'i bar du sems can la phan pa bsgrub cing gnas so zhes zer ro[#]/_/rtag pa nyid dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po can
[\[173b.5\]]yin pa [#]nyid dang /_yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'i phyir nyan thos la sogs pa lung bstan pa nyid ni yang 'tsham zhing rigs pa yin no zhes rjod par byed do/_/theg pa ni [#]gcig ste gnyis dang gsum du med do zhes bya ba la sogs pa ma lus pa'i lung du dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i
[\[173b.6\]]mdo ston par byed do/_/'di lta ste/_yi ge zhes bya ba ni gang ji ltar theg pa rnam par gzhag [#]pa ston par byed pa yin no/_/don zhes bya ba ni gang chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi tshul gcig pu'o zhes blo gros mi zad [#]pas bstan pa'i mdo las byung [#]ngo /_/de
[\[173b.7\]]bzhin du theg pa thams cad theg pa gcig tu 'du bar 'gyur ro zhes blo gros rgya mtsho'i mdo la sogs pa rnams las kyang 'don par byed do/_/yang theg pa chen po 'ga' las kyang dgra bcom pa rnams la dmod pa'i byed pa ni med de/_gang yang bu mo blo gros bzang mo'i mdo las
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]]yungs kar dang /_ri rab dang /_me khyer dang /_nyi ma dang /_wa dang /_seng ge dang /_e raN+Da [#]dang /_tsan+dan bzhin du nyan thos dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i khyad par bstan pa de yang rang gi ngo bo ji lta ba bzhin du gnas pa tsam smras pa byas pa yin gyi/_
[\[174a.2\]]gang la yang smad pa'am [#]bstod par byas pa med de/_gang yang nor bu mching bu'i 'od pas ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che 'od shin tu chen por 'byung ba yin no zhes zer na/_ci des nor bu mching bu la smad [#]pa'am/_yid bzhin gyi nor bu la bstod pa yin nam/_yang rmongs
[\[174a.3\]]pa gang dag rgya mtsho chen po dang ba lang gi rmig rjes kyi chu snyoms par byed cing /_ba lang gi rmig rjes kyi chu la 'di ni rgya mtsho chen po yin no zhes smra bar byed na ci de bzhad gad du bya ba ma yin nam/_de la nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa dag ni don nyung ba dang /_bya ba nyung
[\[174a.4\]]ba dang /_gzhan la phan pa la rgyab kyis phyogs pa bdag nyid dul ba dang /_zhi ba la mngon par sbyor ba dang thar pa'i sa bon cung zhig la brten nas yungs kar gyi nang srin bus zos pa'i nam mkha'i tshad tsam gyi [#]zag pa med pa'i ye shes thob pa de rnams su zhig gis smad [#]pa yin/_byang chub
[\[174a.5\]]sems dpa' rnams ni bskal pa bye ba brgya stong dpag tu med pa rnams su dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar bsags pa/_gzhan sdug bsngal bas sdug bsngal bar gyur pa sems can ma lus pa grol bar bya ba'i phyir dad pa dang ldan pa'i blo can nam mkha'i khams ma lus pa dang mnyam pa'i
[\[174a.6\]]zag pa med pa'i ye shes kun nas sgrub pa'i phyir brtson pa dang ldan pa rnams ni bdag nyid mthu chen po mtha' med pa dang ldan par gyur pa de rnams ni su zhig gis bstod pa yin te/_ji skad du/_kun kyang sa bon chung ngu las/_/'bras bu shin tu yangs pa 'byung /_/sangs rgyas rgyu ni
[\[174a.7\]]dpag med las/_/'bras bu dpag med bsam ci dgos/_/zhes kyang 'byung ngo /_/khyim pa la phyag byed pa 'byung bas theg pa chen po ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin no [#]zhes bya ba yang 'jig rten dbang phyug la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni khyim pa ma yin te/_
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]chags pa thams cad yongs su spangs pa dang /_so sor [#]thar pa'i sdom pa yang dag par blangs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pas byang chub kyi snying po la gnas kyi bar du bsdams pa'i phyir ro/_/gang yang de dag khyim pa la sogs pa'i gzugs su gnas pa ni sprul pa ston
[\[174b.2\]]pa yin te/_de dag ni [#]sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir yin pas de dag ni khyim pa yang ma yin la phyag mi bya bar gyur pa yang ma yin te/_ji ltar rgyal po ka pi na gdul bar bya ba'i phyir thub pas 'khor los sgyur bar sprul na yang khyim pa yang ma yin zhing phyag mi bya ba
[\[174b.3\]]yang ma yin par yang 'dod pa bzhin te/_gang gi phyir der 'khor los sgyur ba'i gzugs su bcom ldan 'das rgyan rnams kyang bzung zhing /_de na re khyod kyis [#]mda' 'phongs dang zhes zer ba na mda' dang bcas pa'i gzhu blangs nas bkang ba dang /_'khor de'i [#]nyan thos chen po thams
[\[174b.4\]]cad kyang blon po'i gzugs 'dzin par gyur cing rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu byung ba la ma gnang ba thogs par gyur pa nyid dang /_mnyan yod de nyid du bram ze rgyu can zhes bya ba 'dul ba'i dus su bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i gzugs zhal bzhi pa ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba zhig tu gyur te
[\[174b.5\]]zhes kyang 'byung ba dang /_'ba' [#]shi ta'i rigs kyi bram ze mo gdul ba'i phyir mnyan yod de nyid du bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze'i gzugs su mdzad nas bud med shi ba'i ro gcig bzung ste/_'di ni bdag gi chung ma'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_ko sa lar gar mkhan gdul ba'i don du bcom
[\[174b.6\]]ldan 'das gar mkhan gyi gzugs su mdzad nas rdza rnga brdungs so zhes 'byung ba dang /_rtse lnga'i dri za gdul ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis dri za'i gzugs tha mal pa bzung nas pi wang blangs shing brdung ba [#]dang /_de bzhin du rab tu byung ba dang 'gal ba 'dul ba las bkag pa/_gzhan dang
[\[174b.7\]]gzhan rdza mkhan gyi gzugs dang /_lcags mgar gyi gzugs dang /_stobs 'gyed pa'i gzugs dang /_rngon pa gzugs mi sdug pa la sogs pa khyim pa tha mal pa'i gzugs dang /_spyod pa dang /_smra ba ltar mdzad na yang bcom ldan 'das dang nyan thos de dag ni phyag mi bya bar 'os
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]pa ma yin te/_ji skad du/_rgyan gyis brgyan par gyur kyang chos spyod de/_/zhi dang dul dang yang dag sdom tshangs spyod/_/sems can kun la chad pa spangs pa ni/_/de de bram ze dge sbyong de dge slong /_/zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/gal te khyim pa'i gzugs la ni khyim pa
[\[175a.2\]]kho nas phyag bya ba yin gyi[#]/_rab tu byung ba ni ma yin no zhe na/_yon tan gtso bor gyur pa'i phyir phyag bya bar 'os pa yin pas rab tu byung ba rnams kyis kyang phyag bya ba kho na ste/_yon tan gtso bor gyur pa la phyag bya'i rtags la ni ma yin te/_yon tan dang bral bar gyur pa'i rtags ni shin tu
[\[175a.3\]]smad [#]pa yin te/_ji skad du/_gang dag rab tu byung yang dngos po kun nas [#]nges ma byung /_/gang dag ngur smrig bgos kyang sems kyi skyon ma spangs/_/gang dag lhung bzed thogs kyang yon tan snod ma gyur/_/rtags 'dzin byed kyang khyim pa ma yin dge slong min/_/char pa [#]med pa'i sprin bzhin chu med khron pa
[\[175a.4\]]bzhin du dang /_/lo tog [#]nyams pa bzhin du [#]myu gu mi 'byung sa bon bzhin/_/dge slong nyams pa'i dge slong de 'dra bde gshegs gsungs[#]/_/ri mo'i mar me bzhin du de ni yod min med ma yin/_/zhes bya bas gang dag rtags blangs pa tsam gyis dregs par ci'i phyir bya ste/_rab tu byung ba'i rtags
[\[175a.5\]]blangs pa'i don tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa'i nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_shin tu dbul por gyur pa dang /_nor chen po dang ldan pa bzhin du khyad par shin tu che [#]ste/_de dag ni byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa nas bzung nas
[\[175a.6\]]pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi dge ba'i [#]rtsa ba bsags pas legs par bsdams [#]pa dang /_theg pa chen po'i gzhir gyur pa'i bzhon pa chen po can gyi ded dpon chen po bzhin du skye bo'i tshogs mang po dang thun mong du gyur pa'i nor can ni skyes bu dbul po le lo can lta bu'i nyan thos rnams dang yang mtshungs pa ma
[\[175a.7\]]yin na rtags tsam dang ldan pa'i rmongs pa gzhan dag dang lta smos kyang ci dgos/_de lta bas na yon tan dang ldan pa'i khyim pa rnams ni yon tan gyis dbul bar gyur pa'i rab tu byung ba dag gis [#]phyag bya ba kho na yin te/_sde pa bco brgyad phal chen gyi gzhung las kyang /_byang chub sems
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]dpa' la phyag bya bar rab tu grags te/_ci ltar dge 'dun [#]phal chen sde'i nang tshan don grub pa rnams rig pa 'dzin pa'i sde snod 'don pa na dge slong dag nga'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni byams pa 'di la dad pas gang byams pa la mngon par phyag byed pa de [#]ni bla na med pa yang
[\[175b.2\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nga la phyag byas pa dang mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/nga gang dag gi ston pa yin pa dang /_gang dag gi mchod gnas bla na med pa yin pa de dag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'di la yang phyag bya ba dang mchod pa bya ba yang yin no/_/dge slong
[\[175b.3\]]dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma dang /_'khor bzhi po thams cad kyis kyang rgyal tshab byams pa 'di la yang phyag bya'o zhes bya ba'i bcom ldan 'das kyi [#]bka' thos nas dgra bcom pa stong nyis brgya lnga bcus dus gcig dang dbyangs gcig gis 'di skad ces/_
[\[175b.4\]]rgyal tshab du dbang bskur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag cag so so nas phyag bgyi'o/_/lha sbas dang lam sbas na gnas pa de dag la yang phyag bgyi'o zhes bya ba dang /_de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gnas
[\[175b.5\]]brtan rab 'byor gang de bzhin gshegs pas sems can gyi spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong zhig mkhyen pa de khyod kyis shes sam/_rtogs sam/_mthong ngam/_de dag dang mthun par gtam rjod [#]par byed nus sam/_smras pa/_'jam dpal de ni ma yin no/_/smras pa/[#]gnas brtan ting
[\[175b.6\]]nge 'dzin gang la snyoms par zhugs shing gnas na sems can thams cad lta ba dang /_sems can gyi spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong lta bar byed pa dang /_shes par gyur nas ji ltar 'os pa bzhin du chos ston par 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin de la khyod mnyam par 'jog nus sam/_smras pa/_'jam dpal
[\[175b.7\]]de ni ma yin no/_/de nas yang gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal yang byang chub sems dpa' 'ga' zhig sems can gyi spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong shes pa dang /_sems can gyi spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong dang
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]rjes su mthun par chos ston par byed pa 'ga' zhig yod dam/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_gnas brtan rab 'byor bcom ldan 'das la zhus shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis ston par 'gyur ro/_/de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das
[\[176a.2\]]la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong yang dag par 'tshal zhing /_sems can gyi spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong dang mthun par chos ston par bgyid pa 'ga' zhig mchis lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab
[\[176a.3\]]'byor chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis mnyam par rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/_byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gis ting nge 'dzin de thob par gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de thams cad ni sems can gyi spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong yang dag par shes shing sems can gyi spyod pa brgyad khri
[\[176a.4\]]bzhi stong dang mthun par chos ston par yang byed/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ma yin pa thams cad kyang shes par gyur pa yang yod do/_/de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
[\[176a.5\]]rnams ni ngo mtshar du bgyi ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rmad du byung ba'o/_/nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul ma lags pa gang lags pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yul lags so/_/nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams la ma
[\[176a.6\]]mchis pa'i rdzu 'phrul byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchis te/_bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag bgyi'o zhes 'phags pa dge 'dun phal chen sde'i shar gyi ri bo la gnas pa gang dag la las kyi yul 'khor na gnas pa zhes kyang bya ba rnams kyi byang
[\[176a.7\]]chub sems dpa'i sde snod las byung [#]ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srungs chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu ci'i snga ltas lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'od srungs chen po 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' dra
[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]ba can gyi 'od kha dog gcig pa ste/_de'i 'khor yang 'di ltar gser gyi kha dog tu 'gyur ro/_/de'i 'khor rnams kyi mos pa yang gcig tu 'gyur te/_'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mos par 'gyur ro/_/der nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas ni ming yang med par 'gyur gyi/_
[\[176b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srungs chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ngo mtshar du bgyi'o[#]/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni
[\[176b.3\]]rmad du byung ba'o/_/bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul ma lags pa gang lags pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yul lags so/_/nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas la ma mchis pa'i rdzu 'phrul gang lags pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
[\[176b.4\]]la mchis te/_bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag bgyi'o zhes bya ba/_'phags pa dge 'dun phal chen sde'i nub kyi ri bo la gnas pa rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod las 'don to/_/stobs dang mngon shes dbang thob pa/_/thub pa nyi [#]ma rnal
[\[176b.5\]]'byor pa/_/kun du bzang la sogs pa ni/_/sa bcu po la gnas bcas nas/_/khams gsum smra ba'i rtag gyur par[#]/_/smra ba thams cad pham mdzad pa/_/gang dag nyan thos rang sangs rgyas/_/rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin pa/_/chos de sems can rnams la ni/_/chos
[\[176b.6\]]gsung ldan pa ston par mdzad/_/ces bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/sangs rgyas skyob pa gang rnams kyi/_/chos lta bcom ldan shin tu ring /_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang /_/
[\[176b.7\]]bdag gir gyur pa ma lags so/_/bcom ldan de slad bdag cag ni/_/byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che/_/kun la thal sbyor dngos kun gyis/_/legs par btud nas phyag bgyi'o/_/zhes dge 'dun phal chen sde pa'i bzang po'i lam pa pho brang dpal yon can na gnas pa rnams
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]kyi [#]shin tu rgyas pa'i sde snod las 'don to/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sku'i gsang ba gang dag yin pa dang /_gsung gi gsang ba gang dag yin pa dang /_thugs kyi gsang ba gang dag yin pa de dag la nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes 'jug
[\[177a.2\]]pa ma yin no/_/kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi skye ba lnga brgya tsam yang nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis [#]yongs su shes par mi nus so/_/gang yang spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag kyang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams la
[\[177a.3\]]med de/_kun dga' bo gang [#]ming 'dzin pa tsam zhig byed pa'i sems can de thams cad kyang 'jigs pa [#]thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di dpa' bo ni/_/mi
[\[177a.4\]]'jigs snying rje'i bdag nyid can/_/spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug ni/_/thub pa che la rab tu 'dud/_/ces dge 'dun phal chen sde'i gangs kyi ri la gnas pa rnams kyi [#]skyes pa rabs [#]kyi sde snod las 'don to/_/'od srungs chen pos gsol pa/_'gro ba'i mgon khyod gang gi tshe/_/
[\[177a.5\]]sems can kun la sman bzhed nas/_/spyan ni phyung nas sbyin mdzad pa/_/de tshe'i phyag 'os de phyag bgyid/_/gang gi phrin [#]las rtogs brjod pa/_/sku tshe snga ma'i thos gyur gang /_/mgon po thub pa chen po yi/_/skyes pa'i rabs la phyag bgyi'o/_/gang tshe dga' ldan gtsor gyur dang /_/shAkya'i
[\[177a.6\]]rigs su 'khrungs pa dang /_/gang tshe khyod ni rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/thub pa khyod kyi de dag 'dud/_/ces 'phags pa dge 'dun phal chen gyi mdo sde'i sde snod las 'don te[#]/_'jig rten 'das pa zhi ba dang /_/don grub pa dang ri gnyis gnas/_/bzang po'i lam pa [#]gangs ri pa/_/
[\[177a.7\]]dge 'dun phal chen rtsa ba'i drug_/de rnams kyi yin no/_/sangs rgyas sras po byang chub sems/_/'jig rten kun gyis phyag bgyi'o/_/shes rab dpag tu med pa dang /_/tshul khrims shes rab rnam grol dag[#]/go cha chen po'i go bgos nas/_/bsam gyis mi khyab dbang thob cing /_/pha rol
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]phyin bcu rdzogs gyur nas/_/sangs rgyas chos rnams mngon gyur pa/_/'jig rten kun gyi mchod rten la/_/'jig rten kun gyis [#]phyag bgyi'o/_/shes rab tshul khrims ting 'dzin gyi[#]/_/de dang mnyam pa'i dge 'dun med/_/'jig rten kun gyis phyag bgyis pa/_/sangs rgyas kun mkhyen
[\[177b.2\]]ma gtogs [#]pa'i/_/lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten ni/_/'gas kyang phyag mi bya ba min/_/zhes 'phags pa gnas brtan pa 'jigs med ri la gnas pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rigs khri nyis stong las 'don to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus mnyan yod du cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa mthong
[\[177b.3\]]bas/_bcom ldan 'das la sems shin tu dang bar gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das de ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar bas phyag 'tshal te tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bstod pa/_bag chags bcas pa'i skyon las rgyal/_/mu stegs ma lus kun las rgyal/_/cho 'phrul
[\[177b.4\]]bstan pas lha rnams kyi/_/'jig rten 'og min mthar thug [#]mdzes/_/'jig rten phra rab rdul snyed kyis/_/dpa' bo che la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems bskyed las brtsams nas/_/drang srong che la bdag phyag 'tshal/_/byang chub kyi sems bskyed par mdzad pa de la yang phyag
[\[177b.5\]]'tshal lo/_/mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa [#]de la yang phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mdzad pa de la yang phyag bgyid do/_/bsil bar gyur pa la yang phyag 'tshal lo zhes btags [#]par smra ba'i mang du thos pa pa rnams kyi cho 'phrul chen po'i mdo las 'don to/_/de nas tshe dang
[\[177b.6\]]ldan pa gang pos mnyan yod du cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa de mthong bas/_bcom ldan 'das la sems shin tu dang bar gyur nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/mgon po khyod ni byang chub sems dpar gyur pas cho 'phrul brgya stong mdzad pa de la yang phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpar gyur
[\[177b.7\]]pa'i skye ba rnams cho 'phrul brgya stong gi 'byung gnas su gyur pa la yang phyag 'tshal lo/_/mgon po khyod gshegs pa na yang phyag 'tshal lo/_/mgon po khyod bzhugs pa na yang phyag 'tshal lo/_/mgon po khyod sku g.yo ba na yang phyag 'tshal lo/_/spyod lam dag ni thams cad du/_/sangs
[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]rgyas mdzad pa thams cad kyis/_/sems can kun la sman mdzad pa/_/phyag 'os phyag bgyi khyod phyag 'tshal/_/zhes 'phags pa mchod rten pa'i cho 'phrul chen po'i mdo las 'don to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs gzhon nus mnyan yod du cho 'phrul chen po
[\[178a.2\]]bstan pa de [#]mthong nas sems shin tu dang bar gyur pas/_bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar bas phyag 'tshal nas/_tshigs su bcad pas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa/_dga' ldan gnas nas 'pho ba dang /_/lhums su 'jug par mdzad pa dang /_/bltams dang bltams par
[\[178a.3\]]gyur pa na/_/cho 'phrul dag ni ston mdzad pa/_/phyag 'os kun gyis phyag bgyis pa/_/dpa' chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/zag med drang srong gyur pa yi/_/lam mkhan ded dpon mchog gyur dang /_/skye ba spangs pa yang srid med/_/rgal nas dgon pa las sgrol ba/_/cho 'phrul bcas pa [#]
[\[178a.4\]]ston mdzad pa/_/byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal/_/'od srungs chen pos gsol pa/_/dpa' bo zhabs ni brkyang mdzad cing /_/da ltar 'jig med phyag 'tshal lo/_/mgon khyod bltams pa la phyag 'tshal/_/bla med rdzogs par byang chub dang /_/chos kyi 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal/_/
[\[178a.5\]]thub pa mya ngan 'das pa dang /_/skyes pa'i rabs ni thams cad dang /_/sku gdung bzhugs pa thams cad de/_/mgon po kun la phyag 'tshal lo/_/zhes 'phags pa ba lang gnas chen po mchod rten pa rnams kyi cho 'phrul chen po'i mdo las 'don to/_/'phags pa shA ri'i bus
[\[178a.6\]]gsol pa/_gang nas bzung ste thub pa khyod/_/byang chub tu ni sems bskyed pa/_/de nas bzung ste spyi bos bdag_/mi mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sems can bde don kun 'dren pa/_/byang chub brnyes pa'i kun mkhyen la/_/lag gnyis spyi bor thal sbyar nas/_/brgya
[\[178a.7\]]phrag mang por bdag phyag 'tshal/_/gang tshe don 'dod pa la don/_/nyid kyi sha yang stsol [#]mdzad pa/_/de tshe nyid du phyag 'os ni/_/kun gtso mchod gnas mnga' bdag gyur/_/mngon shes drug po mngon shes che/_/rkyen rgyal gtso bo rnams kyis kyang /_/de tshe gtso bor gyur pa khyod/_/
[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]]phyag dang mchod pa byas pa yin/_/zhes 'phags pa 'od srungs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam las 'don par byed do/_/tshe dang ldan pa re btas [#]gsol pa/_dpa' chen khyod kyi spyod pa ni/_/thams cad la yang bdag phyag 'tshal/_/khams gsum phyag 'os phyag bgyis pa'i/_/skyes pa'i rabs
[\[178b.2\]]la bdag phyag 'tshal/_/zhes 'phags pa gos dmar po'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa las 'don par byed do/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol pa/_'od zer mdzes pa'i kha dog gis/_/dga' ldan gnas ni snang mdzad nas/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'dir gshegs pa/_/shAkya
[\[178b.3\]]thub la bdag phyag 'tshal/_/shAka rigs gzhon nur 'khrungs pa la/_/gang 'di rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i gtso/_/dran dang shes bzhin gyis bsdams pa'i/_/shAkya thub la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang zhig 'dzam bu'i grib ma la/_/bzhugs tshe nyi ma yol gyur kyang /_/mnyam med grib mas ma
[\[178b.4\]]btang ba/_/shAkya thub la phyag 'tshal lo/_/zhes 'phags pa mang pos bkur ba ku ru ku la'i gnas pa rnams kyis 'don par byed do/_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_tshogs ni yongs su rdzogs pa las/_/shAkya'i rgyal rigs 'khrungs pa la/_/lha mi'i tshogs kyis [#]mchod
[\[178b.5\]]gyur pa/_/phyag 'os de la'ang phyag bgyi'o/_/byang chub shing gi rtsar bzhugs nas/_/sder bcas bdud las rgyal byas [#]te/_/gang tshe kun mkhyen nyid gyur pa/_/de'i tshe phyag 'os de [#]phyag bgyi/_/bA rA Na sI'i [#]drang srong tshal/_/bdud rtsi'i go 'phang mkhyen gyur nas/_/bdud rtsi'i 'khor lo
[\[178b.6\]]bskor mdzad pa/_/de tshe'i [#]phyag 'os de phyag bgyi/_/zhes 'phags pas ston pa rnams kyis [#]tshoms brgyad pa las 'don par byed do/_/tshe dang ldan pa nag po 'char kas gsol pa/_sems can kun la sman slad du/_/spyi gtsug nor ldan pa yi dbu/_/gang tshe khyod kyis [#]sngon btang ba/_/
[\[178b.7\]]de tshe'i gtso bo de phyag bgyi/_/zhes 'phags pa rnam par phye ste smra ba rnams kyis [#]sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa las 'don par byed do/_/gang tshe mar me mdzad kyis ni/_/nga ni lung bstan gyur de tshe/_/sa brgyad pa ni ngas thob cing /_/dbang bcu dag kyang thob gyur la/_/'jig rten mgon gyis
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]mngon sum du/_/nga lung bstan par gyur thos nas/_/lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis/_/gus bcas nga la phyag kyang bgyis/_/nga yi ral pa'i phung po la[#]/_/sangs rgyas zhabs kyis [#]mnan mdzad de/_/lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis/_/phyag 'os 'di la
[\[179a.2\]]phyag gyis shig_/spun zla sa gnyis gnas pa dang /_/sangs rgyas kun mkhyen ma gtogs pa/_/'di la phyag byed rigs min pa/_/'jig rten 'di na 'ga' med gsungs[#]/_/zhes 'phags pa chos sbas pa rnams kyis [#]chos kyi rkang pa las 'don par byed do/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos ga
[\[179a.3\]]sol pa/_gang bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpar gyur pas dga' ldan gyi gnas nas 'phos nas dran pa dang shes bzhin dang ldan [#]bzhin du yum gyi lhums su zhugs pa de yang bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos su 'dzin lags so/_/de la
[\[179a.4\]]'di skad ces bya ste/_gang zhig dga' ldan gnas 'phos nas/_/dran ldan shes bzhin ldan par ni/_/yum gyi lhums su gshegs pa dang /_/lhums gnas de la bdag phyag 'tshal/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' bltams par gyur pa na stong gsum gyi stong
[\[179a.5\]]chen po'i 'jig rten 'od kyis gsal bar mdzad pa dang ldan pa de yang bcom ldan 'das bdag gis byang chub sems dpa'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos su 'dzin lags so/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_gang yang bltams tshe stong gsum 'di/_/'od kyis gsal bar mdzad dang
[\[179a.6\]]ldan/_/nyi ma bye ba mtshungs pa yi/_/bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang yang bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' bltams ma thag tu gom pa bdun du gshegs pa 'di yang bdag gis byang chub sems dpa'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos su 'dzin to/_/de la
[\[179a.7\]]'di skad ces bya ste/_bltams ma thag tu gom pa bdun/_/pad+ma la ni gnas pa dang /_/ban glang [#]rol pa ltar gshegs pa/_/gau ta ma la phyag 'tshal/_/zhes 'phags pa thams cad yod par smra ba'i chos rmad du byung ba las 'don to/_/de ltar na sde pa bco brgyad kyi gzhung las dang
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]po sems bskyed pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag bya bar grub pas theg pa chen po sde pa bco brgyad kyi khongs su gtogs pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/ci yang byang chub tu sems bskyed pa tsam gyi khyim pa kun la yang [#]rab tu byung bas phyag bya ba yin nam zhe na/_
[\[179b.2\]]ma [#]yin par brjod par bya ste/_gang dag sa la bzhugs [#]pa dang /_lung bstan pa thob pa yin par thos pa de dag ni gang dag ri bong dang ngang pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa dud 'gror gyur pa la yang phyag bya ba yin na mi la sogs par gyur pa la lta smos kyang ci dgos/_gang yang dge slong gis
[\[179b.3\]]phyag bya ba ni gnyis te/_sangs rgyas dang dge slong rgan pa'o zhes bya ba de la yang sangs rgyas kyi ni gnyis la phyag bya ba yin te/_bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi bdag nyid kyi yon tan dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyi [#]bdag nyid kyis rtogs pa'o/_/gang de dag gnyi ga'i rtsa ba ni byang chub kyi sems
[\[179b.4\]]yin te/_'phags pa blo gros mi zad pas bstan pa'i mdo las/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la sogs pa dang /_sbyin pa la sogs pa de rnams ni byang chub kyi
[\[179b.5\]]sems kyi rtsa ba las byung ba yin te/_de'i phyir de dag ni mi zad pa yin no zhes gsungs so/_/de bzhin du/_byang chub sems kyi [#]bsod nams gang /_/gal te de ni gzugs can gyur/_/nam mkha'i khams ni kun bkang [#]ste/_/de ni de bas lhag par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la
[\[179b.6\]]sogs pa yang 'byung ngo /_/de kho na nyid rtogs [#]pa med du zin kyang de'i rten byang chub kyi sems brtan par yod na phyag bya ba kho na yin no/_/mngon par rtogs [#]pa yang sa dang po la ni sgra'i rjes su 'gro ba'i bzod pa'o/_/drug pa la ni rjes su mthun pa'o/_/brgyad pa la ni skye ba med
[\[179b.7\]]pa'i chos la bzod pa zhes bya'o/_/mngon par rtogs [#]pa'i mthu ni 'jig rten gyi khams brgya snyed rdzu 'phrul gyis g.yo ba dang /_snang ba dang /_gshegs pa dang /_bskal pa brgyar gnas pa dang /_sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' la 'jug pa la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab
[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]]pa thams cad du nyan thos la sogs pa dang thun mong ma yin pa yin pas dang po sems bskyed pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang la [#]yang phyag mi bya ba ma yin no zhes bya ba dang 'gal ba ci yod/_/sangs rgyas la phyag byed pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' la yang
[\[180a.2\]]phyag bya ste/_rgyud tha dad pa ma yin pa'i phyir n+ya gro'i myu gu dang /_chen por gyur pa lta bu'am/_'khor los sgyur ba'i bu la phyag byed pa bzhin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' las sangs rgyas/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas las chos yin te/_chos las 'phags pa'i tshogs 'byung ngo /_/de las
[\[180a.3\]]dkon mchog gsum 'byung phyir/_/byang chub sems dpa' la gang sdang /_/de ni dkon mchog gsum la sdang /_/dkon mchog gsum po gang spang [#]ba/_/dge slong med cing sdom pa med/_/ma gol la sogs pa bstod pa byed pa phal cher gyis kyang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi sku tshe snga ma rnams kyi
[\[180a.4\]]mdzad spyod la mngon par bstod pa/_yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub rgyu/_/sems ni rin chen de nyid kyang /_/dpa' bo khyod kyis snying por mkhyen/_/de las gzhan pas ring bar gyur/_/dang por khyod la phyag bgyi'am/_/'on te gang gis [#]'khor bar khyod/_/skyon mkhyen yun
[\[180a.5\]]ring de lta bur/_/bzhugs mdzad thugs rje che la bgyi/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba dang /_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom pa las kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba'i yon tan rjes su dran pa las gsungs te/_sngon gyi sbyor ba yang sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung
[\[180a.6\]]ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'o/_/gal te yang sngon gyi sbyor ba rjes su dran pas de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su dran par 'gyur ba yin na/_sangs rgyas la phyag bya ba yin zhing byang chub sems dpa' la phyag bya ba ma yin par ji ltar 'gyur/_gang yang theg pa chen po'i
[\[180a.7\]]mdo [#]sde kha cig las/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis [#]nyan thos rnams la btsun pa zhes bya ba gus pa'i tshig gis spyod par byed cing phyag byas pa dang /_nyan thos rnams kyis kyang de dag la rigs kyi bu zhes bya ba'i tshig gis gtam rjod par byed pa ni 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob nye bar bzung
[\[180b\]]
[\[180b.1\]]pa yin no/_/'di ltar bzod pa rtogs par gyur cing /_dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa thob pa sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa ston par mdzad pa de dag ni dgra bcom pa la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang phyag bya ba yin no/_/gal te de dag nyan thos la sogs pa'i phyag bya ba'i gnas ma yin na
[\[180b.2\]]ni/_de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa yang ston par mi 'gyur la/_de dag gis [#]phyag bya ba yang bdag gir byed par mi 'gyur te/_'phags pa nyer [#]sbas kyis bdud la smras nas sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa byas pa lta bu'o/_/khyad par rtogs par 'dod pas ni theg pa chen po'i gsung rab zab
[\[180b.3\]]mo rnams blta bar bya ba'i phyir rab tu sdang ba rtsom pa [#]dang 'bral ba'i ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i rgyu tshig ngan pa mang po smra bar bya ba ma yin no/_/gang yang gang gA'i [#]klung bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan bzung ba'i bsod nams dang /_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
[\[180b.4\]]dbang phyug gi mtshan bzung ba'i bsod nams mnyam par gsungs pa dang /_gang yang dkon mchog brtsegs pa'i mdo las/_zla ba tshes pa dang nya ba'i dpes byang chub sems dpa' la khyad par du bsngags par 'byung ba yang de las 'phags pa 'byung zhing ster ba yin pa'i phyir dang /_
[\[180b.5\]]phar gyur pa'i phyir dang /_byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la sogs pas dang po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du gyur pa'i phyir dang /_byang chub kyi sa bon rab tu 'byung ba yin pa'i dbang du byas nas bstan pa yin no/_/nam mkha' mdzod kyi smon lam la sogs pa yang tshig tsam ma yin te 'bras bu
[\[180b.6\]]mthong ba'i phyir ro/_/da ltar ci'i phyir mthong bar ma gyur ce na/_dge ba'i rtsa bas [#]dbul bar gyur pa'i rgyud la 'bras bu yod bzhin du yang bar du nyams par 'gyur ba'am/_phyin ci log tu mthong ba yin te/_gang gA'i chu klung skams pa'am/_rnag gam/_me mar mur du mthong ba bzhin te/_
[\[180b.7\]]ji ltar chu bo gang gA'i 'gram na yi dgas brgya stong mang po gnas pa rnams bdag nyid la skal ba med par gyur pa'i dbang gis gang gA'i chu klung yongs su skams pa'am/_rnag gam me mar mur du 'bar ba mthong ba bzhin no/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam las yongs su byung ba'i
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]]nor gyi char phab par gyur kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bsags pa'i sems can gyi khams rnams la 'bab par mi 'gyur te/_nam mkha' nyid du med par 'gyur ba'am thog la sogs pa'i ngo bor gyur nas 'bab par 'gyur te/_ji ltar chu 'dzin dang bral bar gyur pa'i nam mkha'i
[\[181a.2\]]dkyil du 'od zer stong 'gyed pa'i nyi ma shar bar gyur kyang dmus long gis sngon gyi [#]las kyi dbang gis 'od zer gcig tsam yang mthong bar mi 'gyur ba bzhin no/_/de bzhin du nam mkha'i dkyil nas rin po che'i phung po 'bab par gyur kyang skye bo bsod nams chung ba dag gi sngon gyi las kyi [#]nyes pas cung
[\[181a.3\]]zad cig kyang de'i nye bar longs spyod par 'gyur ba ma yin no/_/gal te rang gi [#]mthu nyid kyis 'byor pa dang rgud pa dag tu 'gyur ba yin na ni de lta na ni byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dag la nus pa med par gyur pa yin no zhe na/_gzhan la phan pa 'byung ba ni tshogs pa las byung [#]ba yin pa'i phyir nus pa
[\[181a.4\]]med pa ma yin te/_ji ltar sa dang /_chu dang /_me dang /_rlung dang /_nam mkha' rnams tshogs pa las myu gu 'byung gi_/rkyen gcig [#]ma tshang na yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du gtong ba dang /_ser sna spangs pa dang /_'dod pa med pa mang du goms pa dang /_mnyam
[\[181a.5\]]pa'i sems dang /_'dod pa la sbyin pa rdzogs par byed pa dang /_lan du phan 'dogs pa la re ba med pa dang /_'bras bu la 'dod pa mi skyed [#]pa dang /_sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas pa'i sbyin pa [#]bas ni nor gyi char pa 'bab pa la sogs pa thob par 'gyur ba'i 'bras bu rnam
[\[181a.6\]]par smin par yongs su 'dzin cing gsal bar byed pa yin gyi[#]/_de las rkyen gang yang rung ba zhig ma tshang na 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de lta bas na nam mkha' mdzod la sogs pa'i smon lam ni 'bras bu dang bcas pa kho na yin no/_/shAkya thub pa yang sprul pa kho na yin par rigs te/_
[\[181a.7\]]'og min gyi spyod yul can chos kyi sku la brten pa'i longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku las rab tu byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro/_/gal te chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dag ni rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' ba yin la de dag la rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' na yang sprul pa'i sku ga las 'byung bar 'gyur
[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]te/_ma yin no zhe na/_brjod par bya ste/_'di ni bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na smon lam btab pa yin te/_bdag gis rnam par mi rtog pa'i chos nyid thob nas spyod pa gang dag dang skad kyi rnam pa gang dag gis sems can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i spyod pa de
[\[181b.2\]]dag dang /_cha byad [#]de lta bu dang /_skad kyi rnam pa de dag gis rnam par rtog pa'i rtsol ba med bzhin du yang 'jug par gyur cig ces bya ba'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi shugs kyis/_rtsa ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku las dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa la sogs pa nas mya ngan las 'das
[\[181b.3\]]pa'i bar gyi sems can la phan pa'i thabs su gyur pa rnams 'jug [#]par 'gyur ba yin te/_sprul pa'i sku med par ni 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya rnams su 'pho ba dang /_'jug pa dang /_bltams pa dang /_bzo'i gnas bslab pa bstan pa dang /_btsun mo'i 'khor na gnas pa dang /_
[\[181b.4\]]mngon par 'byung ba dang /_bdud 'dul ba dang /_mngon par byang chub pa dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'das par ston pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams 'dul bar nus pa ma yin no/_/sde pa tha dad kyi gzhung las kyang /_sangs rgyas kyi sprul
[\[181b.5\]]pa ston pa yod de/_ji ltar phyin ci log tu mngon par zhen pa'i rngon pa gdul ba'i phyir rngon pa'i gzugs su sprul pa dang /_mi dbang pad+ma skyes bus [#]gdul ba'i phyir rgan po'i gzugs su sprul pa dang /_lha'i mig gis ci zhig mthong zhes dris pa na 'phags pa ma 'gags pas smras
[\[181b.6\]]pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa dang /_srid pa bar ma'i sems can grangs med pa dag mthong ngo zhes bya ba ni ji ltar sprul pa de dag gis sems can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ba de ltar sprul nas 'jug pa yin no/_/de bzhin du/_shAkya thub pa'i sprul pa yang 'jug pa yin la/_
[\[181b.7\]]yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin ma yin pa'i sgyu ma dang 'dra ba yang ma yin zhing /_gnas gtsang ma na gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi byin gyi rlabs [#]kyis bstan pa yang [#]yin la/_sprul pa'i sangs rgyas de rnams tha dad pa'i sangs rgyas kyang ma yin te/_rten gcig
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]pa'i phyir nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor las rab tu bkye ba'i 'od zer lta bu'am/_mi'i bdag po la brten pa'i bya ba byed pa'i skyes bu mang po bzhin du sprul pa rnams mang po nyid yin na yang mdzad pa gcig pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa ni mang po nyid ma yin par 'dod de/_
[\[182a.2\]]des na 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu sangs rgyas mang po 'byung ba ni gnas med cing skabs med do zhes bya ba dang yang mi 'gal te/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dbang du byas nas bstan pa yin gyi/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du ni ma yin pas so/_/ji
[\[182a.3\]]ltar chos sbas pa rnams kyang /_sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos dang /_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grags ldan pa'i/_/sku kun la yang de bzhin te/_/rdzogs sangs gang du bltams pa dang /_/gang du byang chub la reg dang /_/chos kyi
[\[182a.4\]]'khor lo bskor ba dang /_/gang du zag med mya ngan 'das/_/gang du gnas dang 'chag pa dang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa dang /_/seng ge lta bur gzims [#]bshams pa'i/_/gnas de la ni bdag phyag 'tshal/_/rkang gnyis dam pa shar dang ni/_/byang gi phyogs na
[\[182a.5\]]bzhugs pa yi/_/rgyal ba bsten [#]dka' zhes bya ba/_/des ni tshigs bcad 'di gsungs te/_/gang gis tshigs bcad 'di bzhi yis/_/de bzhin gshegs la stod [#]byed pa/_/bskal pa bye ba stong rnams su/_/ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/_/zhes 'don par byed do/_/
[\[182a.6\]]yang gnas brtan shA ri'i bus bzhag pa'i skye [#]rags gnas brtan maud gal gyi bus rdzu 'phrul gyis bteg par ma nus pa na bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu khyod ni rdzu 'phrul las nyams pa ma yin gyi/_'on kyang dge slong shA ri'i bus rang gi shes rab kyi stobs
[\[182a.7\]]bskyed pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa bsten [#]par dka' ba'i seng ge'i khri la skye [#]rags kyi sna btags shing bsten [#]pa yin no zhes gsungs pa dang /_gser mgar dang shing mkhan gyi gtam rgyud kyis sangs rgyas dang bcas pa dang /_sangs rgyas med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]rnams nye bar bstan par shes par bya'o/_/yang gsungs pa/_gang dag 'das pa'i rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/gang dag ma byon sangs rgyas dang /_/gang yang da ltar rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/mya ngan sel mdzad mang po rnams/_/kun kyang chos la rim gro yis/_/gnas par gyur
[\[182b.2\]]cing gnas mdzad la/_/da dung du yang gnas mdzad de/_/'di ni rdzogs sangs chos nyid do/_/zhes kyang 'byung bas/_gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na de bzhin gshegs pa ni [#]gcig cig bzhugs so snyam sems pa de dag gis ni gsung rab kyi don mi shes pa yin te/_ji
[\[182b.3\]]skad du mar me mdzad dang /_rin chen gtsug tor can la sogs pa sangs rgyas mang po zhig ni 'das par gyur/_seng ge dang /_rgyal la sogs pa mang po zhig ni 'byung bar 'gyur zhes kyang 'don pa dang lung gi mdo las kyang 'don par byed de/_ji ltar zhe na/_'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed
[\[182b.4\]]cig ce na/_gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed do/_/ma byon pa ji snyed cig ce na/_gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed do zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung bas 'jig rten gyi khams mang po dag tu mang po 'byung bar rigs pa nyid yin gyi [#]gcig ni ma yin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa
[\[182b.5\]]nyid yin na yang /_dus gsum du gzigs pas gzigs par mdzad pa nyid do/_/zhes gsungs pa ni 'jig rten gyi rjes su mthun par zhugs pa yin te/_mnyam par bzhag pa nyid na sngon gyi smon lam gyi shugs kyis mdzad pa 'di dag thams cad 'jug par 'gyur ba yin gyi[#]/_
[\[182b.6\]]rnam par rtog pa mdzad pa ni ma yin te/_chu'i yur ba rka sna tshogs su dang po bkye zhing /_'dod pa'i phyogs su btang ba byas nas phyis bya ba med par sdod par byed pa'i chun pa'i skyes bu bzhin no zhes bya bas [#]sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma yin pa ma yin no/_/gang yang theg pa chen po'i mdo sde las phan
