[\[300a.3\]]bar zhi ba'i lam mo zhes bya bar shes par gyur na/_de [#]gzhan dag la yang zhi ba'i rgyu ston par byed par [#]nus kyi/_gang dag 'di ltar rang nyid kyang /_/'khor bar 'jug pa dang ldog pa'i rgyu mi shes par gyur pa des ji ltar gzhan dag la grol ba'i lam nye bar ston par 'gyur/_rang gis [#]
[\[300a.4\]]lam mngon par shes pa yin pas gzhan rnams la yang lam nye bar ston par nus pa [#]yin no/_/yang ji ltar de rnams rgyu la rmongs pa yin par nges par gzung bar bya zhe na/_rigs [#]las rnal 'byor bstan pa ni/_/de bstan pa las nyams pa'i phyir/_/chos bsrung bar ni nus pa yi/_/re
[\[300a.5\]]zhig chos bden smra mi nus/_/gang rig byed las nye bar bstan pa'i rnal 'byor de ni thar pa'i rgyu nye bar bstan pa las nyams pa yin te/_phyin ci log yin pa'i phyir ro/_/des na 'di dag ni yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin gyi chos smra bar byed pa ma yin pas chos [#]srung bar byed nus pa ma yin te/_sgrub
[\[300a.6\]]pa las ni nyams pa'i phyir/_/gzhan dag zhi bar 'khrid mi nus/_/ji ltar g.yang sar rang ltung [#]ba/_/gzhan dag 'dren par mi nus so/_/sgrub pa las nyams pa'i phyir zhes bya ba [#]bdag nyid kyis [#]lam mngon par mi shes pa'i phyir te/_ji ltar 'ga' zhig rang nyid g.yang sar lhung bar gyur
[\[300a.7\]]na gzhan dag gdon par mi nus pa ltar de bzhin du rang nyid 'khor ba'i g.yang sar ltung bar gyur pa nyid kyis gzhan dag gdon par nus pa ma yin no/_/ji skad bshad pa'i rim pa de nyid kyis/_/rtog pa'i dra bas [#]btags pa yi/_/log pa'i gtan tshigs gsum po la/_/rigs sam
[\[300b\]]
[\[300b.1\]]mi rigs dpyad nas ni/_/gsum po 'di ni gtang [#]ba'i rigs/_/grub pa'i mtha' kun dang 'gal ba'i rtog pa'i dra bas nye bar bsags pa'i 'bru dang /_byol song dang /_mar dang /_chung ma'i 'brel ba'i las la [#]sogs pa can gsum po ni thar pa'i rgyu la phyin ci log dang ldan pa yin pas/_
[\[300b.2\]]ji skad bstan pa'i rim pas rigs pa dang 'gal ba yin no zhes rab tu sgrub pa'i phyir lam gsum po gang yin pa de ni gtang [#]bar rigs so zhes smras so/_/gzhan yang /_sna tshogs byed pa bde byed sogs/_/rigs [#]pa min par sngar smras so/_/byed po yin par bden nyid na/_/'di dag gis ni
[\[300b.3\]]ci zhig byas/_/de kho na nyid kyi shes pa tshol [#]ba'i rab tu byed par dbang phyug la sogs pa'i rgyu rnams thams cad dgag par byas pa [#]de la brnyas nas yang gal te khyed 'gro ba rnams kyi byed pa po dbang phyug la sogs pa yin no snyam du sems na/_dngos po ci zhig de dag gis [#]byas par smra dgos so[#]/_/
[\[300b.4\]]de la re zhig bdag ni ma skyes phyir/_/de yi byas par mi 'dod do/_/chos dang chos min des ma skyed/_/de yi yon tan ji [#]ltar bzhin/_/re zhig bdag ni ma skyes pa yin pa'i phyir bskyed [#]par mi nus pas de ni dbang phyug gis byas pa ma yin no/_/chos dang chos ma yin pa yang de'i yon tan yin par 'dod
[\[300b.5\]]pas [#]dbang phyug gis bskyed pa ma yin te/_ji ltar na da ltar gyi chos dang chos ma yin pa'i rgyus mi la sogs pa nyid byas pa yin gyi/_ma byas pa'i chos dang chos ma yin pa mi dmigs pa ltar sngon yang de bzhin no/_/ji ltar yang /_gal te 'di dag byed pos yin/_/las kyi bya ba'i ma yin na/_/
[\[300b.6\]]las dang bya ba de dag gis/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu ji ltar 'gyur/_/bde dang sdug bsngal nyer dmigs pa'i/_/lus kyang de dag la 'jug pas/_/des na lus can rnams kyi lus/_/dbang phyug sogs kyis byas mi rigs/_/lus can rnams kyi lus kyi 'jug pa yang chos dang chos ma yin
[\[300b.7\]]pa de dag gis byas pa yin te/_ci'i phyir na bde ba dang sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar bya ba'i phyir ro/_/des na lus kyang dbang phyug gis byas pa ma yin no/_/gal te yang dang po srid pa'i dus na ni chos dang chos ma yin pa dbang phyug gis byas pa nyid yin la/_de phyin chad kyi 'jug pa ni chos [#]
[\[301a\]]
[\[301a.1\]]ma yin pas byas pa yin no zhe na/_de la/_bskal pa dang po'i lus can lus/_/sngon byas [#]ma mthong rgyu can te/_/bde sogs 'byung ba'i rgyu yin phyir/_/dper na da ltar lus bzhin no/_/bskal pa dang po pa'i lus can rnams kyi lus byung bar gyur pa yang 'khor ba thog ma
[\[301a.2\]]med pa nyid nas de dag gis sngon byas pa'i chos dang chos ma yin pa'i rgyu can nyid yin te/_bde ba la sogs pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir[#]/_dper na da ltar gyi lus kyi rgyu chos dang chos ma yin pa ltar bskal pa dang po pa'i lus kyang de bzhin yin pas dbang phyug gis byas pa ni ma yin no/_/gzhan
[\[301a.3\]]yang /_gal te dbang phyug gi dbang phyug_/de yang bsod nams byas she na/_/de yang bsod nams gzhan dbang phyir/_/dbang phyug dbang phyug min par 'gyur/_/'jig rten gyi phun sum tshogs pa gang cung zhig ci yod pa de thams cad ni bsod nams kyis [#]byas pa yin te/_lung las/_sbyin
[\[301a.4\]]pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bsam gtan gyis [#]longs spyod dang /_mtho ris dang /_byang grol thob par 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro/_/de la gal te dbang phyug gi dbang phyug kyang bsod nams kyis byas pa yin par 'dod na/_bsod nams kyi [#]gzhan dbang du gyur pa yin pa'i phyir dbang phyug nyid
[\[301a.5\]]nyams pa yin no/_/gal te yang /_gal te dbang phyug gi dbang phyug_/glo bur gyur par 'dod na ni/_/des na gzhan dang mtshungs pa'i phyir/_/dbang phyug dbang phyug min par 'gyur/_/'di'i dbang phyug nyid ni rang byung ba yin gyi/_bsod nams kyis [#]byas pa ma yin no zhe na/_'jig rten thams cad kyang
[\[301a.6\]]dbang phyug nyid du 'gyur te/_bsod nams la ltos mi dgos pa'i phyir ro/_/gzhan yang /_dbang phyug shes dngos yin zhe na/_/des na des byas 'gro ba rnams/_/rgyu yi rjes su byed pa'i phyir/_/kun kyang sems dang ldan par gyur/_/'jig rten na ni 'bras bu rgyu dang rjes su mthun par 'byung ba
[\[301a.7\]]mthong ste/_sems med pa'i nas la sogs pa dag las ni sems med pa'i myu gu la sogs pa 'byung la/_sems dang bcas pa'i mi la sogs pa dag las ni sems dang bcas pa'i lus can 'byung ngo /_/de la gal te dbang phyug shes pa'i ngo bo zhig yin na rgyu dang 'bras bu mthun pa [#]'byung
[\[301b\]]
[\[301b.1\]]ba yin pa'i phyir des na 'gro ba thams cad sems dang bcas pa yin par thob par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang /_gal te dbang phyug rgyu yin na/_/'gro ba phra sogs ldan par 'gyur/_/gal te 'gro ba thams cad kyi rgyu dbang phyug yin na/_ji ltar dbang phyug phra ba dang /_mchod par byas pa [#]dang /_
[\[301b.2\]]yang ba dang /_bdag por gyur pa dang /_dbang du gyur pa dang /_gar yang phyin pa dang /_'dod dgur [#]ldan pa dang /_dga' mgur [#]shes pa dang ldan pa ltar de bzhin du 'gro ba rnams kyang dbang phyug gi yon tan brgyad dang ldan par 'gyur bar [#]rigs na/_'gro ba rnams ni dbang phyug gi yon
[\[301b.3\]]tan brgyad dang ldan pa ma yin no/_/des na 'di ltar 'gro ba rnams kyi byed pa po ni dbang phyug ma yin no zhes shes par bya'o/_/gzhan yang 'di ltar/_las byed dbang phyug yin zhe na/_/de yang dmyal ba dag tu 'tshed/_/de min gzhan dag 'tshed na ni/_/byas nyams ma byas phrad par 'gyur/_/
[\[301b.4\]]gang 'di ltar dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las skye bo dag gis byed pa de'i byed pa po dbang phyug yin nam/_'on te ma yin/_gal te byed pa po yin na ni sdig pa byed pa yin pa'i phyir/_dmyal ba'i me 'bar ba'i phreng ba la sogs bdag tu sreg par gyur pa na [#]ji ltar dbang phyug las nyams par gyur pa ma
[\[301b.5\]]yin/_'on te sdig pa byas su zin kyang 'bras bu mi 'byung ngo zhe na/_las byas pa rnams chud zos par gyur pa yin no/_/dbang phyug gis byas pa'i las rnams kyis [#]de rnams dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar gyur pa yin no zhe na/_ma byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu la spyod pa yin
[\[301b.6\]]pas ma byas pa dang phrad pa'i skyon du 'gyur ro/_/thar pa med pa yang yin te/_rtag tu sdug bsngal rgyu ldan phyir/_/rtag tu sdug bsngal ga la zhi[#]/_/me ni 'bar bar gyur pa yi/_/tsha ba ma zhi mthong ba bzhin/_/sdug bsngal gyi byed pa po dbang phyug yin la de yang rtag pa yin pas rtag tu sdug bsngal
[\[301b.7\]]nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/_/sdug bsngal med pa ni thar pa yin na/_de ni rtag pas nam yang gzhan du bya bar mi nus pa yin pa'i phyir/_sdug bsngal gyi rgyu byed pa po dbang phyug rtag tu yod na de zhi bar ga la 'gyur te/_dper na 'bar ba'i phreng [#]bas kun nas bskor ba'i me yod na de'i tsha ba zhi bar
[\[302a\]]
[\[302a.1\]]'gyur ba rigs pa ma yin pa bzhin no/_/gcig pu sna tshogs min zhe na/_/'bras bu sna tshogs ji lta bu/_/'dod pas sna tshogs yin zhe na'ang /_/gcig pu sna tshogs mi rigs so/_/gal te dbang phyug ni gcig nyid yin gyi sna tshogs ma yin no zhe na/_'bras
[\[302a.2\]]bu rnams kyang dngos po gcig yin par 'gyur gyi sna tshogs su mi 'gyur ro/_/gal te 'dod pa'i dbang gis [#]sna tshogs nyid yin par 'dod na yang sngar ni gzhan 'dod par byed la/_phyis kyang gzhan 'dod par byed pas dbang phyug 'di'i ngo bo gcig nyid du mi 'grub [#]bo/_/gzhan yang /_rtag
[\[302a.3\]]pa cha med phra ba dang /_/'gro ba'i byed po gcig po nyid/_/kun la khyab pa yin no lo/_/'di las mtshar ba gzhan ci yod/_/rgyu 'gyur ba med pa'i 'bras bu gang gi yang rgyur [#]gyur pa ma yin pas des na 'gro ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir 'di'i rtag pa nyid nyams so/_/cha shas med pa yin pa'i phyir
[\[302a.4\]]dang phra ba nyid yin pa'i phyir yod pa nyid kyang ma yin no/_/gcig yin pa'i phyir kun la khyab pa yang ma yin te/_des na rigs [#]pa dang mi ldan pa'i tshig 'di lta bu ni ngo mtshar 'ba' zhig tu bya ba yin no/_/gal te [#]mi 'gyur ba'i ngo bo nyid yin kyang [#]rtsed mo'i don du sna tshogs 'di skyed par byed
[\[302a.5\]]pa yin gyi/_yang 'gyur ba yod pa ni ma yin te/_de bskyed pa'i 'bras bu ni dga' ba yin no zhe na[#]/_gang 'di lta bu'i dga' ba'i gzhan dbang du gyur pa nyid yin pa'i phyir 'di'i dbang phyug nyid nyams pa yin no/_/snying rje dang bral ba nyid kyis skye bo gdug pa can dang khyad par med par bzung [# ]
[\[302a.6\]]bar bya'o zhes bya ba smras pa/_phan tshun za bas 'jigs pa yi[#]/_/bde ba rnyed dka'i dud 'gro dang /_/zhib tu 'thag cing gcod 'bigs pa'i/_/sdug bsngal gyis gzir dmyal ba dang /_/mi rnams skye rga [#]nad dag dang /_/sdug bsngal zug rngu'i rma gtod [#]nas/_/dag 'gyur [#]
[\[302a.7\]]gang yin drag po zhes/_/ming don ldan pa de phyag 'tshal/_/rtsed mo yin yang bdag dang gzhan bde bar byed pa de ni bya bar rigs na/_rtsed mo gang zhig bdag 'ba' zhig bde'i gzhan rnams la shin tu gnod par gyur pa skye bo sdig pa can gyi spyod pa dang mthun par zhugs pa gang yin pa
[\[302b\]]
[\[302b.1\]]des [#]ci zhig bya/_/dud 'gro rnams gcig la gcig za ba la sogs pa byed pas srog gi ngor shin tu 'jigs shing skrag par gyur pa dang /_dmyal ba rnams kyang zhib tu 'thag pa dang /_gcad [#]pa dang /_dbug pa dang /_btso ba dang /_bsreg pa dang /_gsad [#]pa la sogs pa dang /_mi rnams
[\[302b.2\]]kyang skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba la sogs pas sdug bsngal ba mthong ba na dga' ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir des na sdug bsngal bskyed pa'i don gyis [#]drag po zhes bya ba ste/_de ni don dang rjes su
[\[302b.3\]]mthun pa nyid kyi ming don dang ldan pa drag po zhes bya ba ste/_snying rje med pa 'gro ba rnams kyi sdug bsngal skyed [#]par byed pa la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bsting [#]ba'o/_/gal te ci khyod ci 'dod pa smros shig_/'dzin pa can gang nor ldan dang /_/gzhan gyi 'tsho bcas [#]dge ba can/_/chos min can
[\[302b.4\]]'ga' mthong nas [#]ldan/_/dbang phyug spyod par gsal ba yin/_/yon tan nor ldan tshe thung dang /_/ngan par spyod rnams tshe ring dang /_/gtong ldan dbul po mthong bas na/_/dbang phyug gis byas gsal ba yin/_/gtong ba la goms pa'i dge ba can ni nor 'thob par 'gyur zhing nor dang
[\[302b.5\]]ldan par gyur nas kyang gtong ba'i ngang tshul can du 'gyur ba yin na/_gzhan du 'dzin pa can la nor dang ldan par mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du dge ba dang ldan pa ni gzhan gyi gdong la blta bar mi 'gyur bar rigs la/_dge ba can ma yin na [#]ni go 'phang mthon po 'thob par mi rigs na/_chos dang ldan
[\[302b.6\]]pa ni gzhan gyi slong [#]mo la slogs pas 'tsho ba mthong la/_chos dang mi ldan pa ni go 'phang mthon po la gnas pa mthong ngo /_/yon tan dang ldan pa ni tshe ring la/_ngan par spyod pa la zhugs pa ni tshe thung ba dang /_gtong ba dang ldan pa ni 'byor pa dang ldan par rigs na/_'di dag thams cad phyin
[\[302b.7\]]ci log tu mthong ste/_de'i phyir 'di ltar nges pa kho nar 'di dag ni dbang phyug gis byas pa yin no zhes shes par bya'o zhe na/_'di dag thams cad rigs pa dang ldan pa ma yin no snyam du sems te/_gang gi phyir/_kha cig sangs rgyas pa yang bde/_/de la gus pa kha cig sdug_/
[\[303a\]]
[\[303a.1\]]dbang phyug bkas ni bsod nams can/_/dag kyang ci phyir sdig mi byed[#]/_/gal te thams cad kyi byed pa po dbang phyug yin na/_ci'i phyir sangs rgyas pa la yang bde ba dang ldan pa mthong la/_de la gus pa yang sdug bsngal dang ldan par 'gyur ba yin/_'jig rten
[\[303a.2\]]na kha cig sdig pa'i las kyi 'bras bu la spyod pa long ba dang /_'on pa dang /_nad pa la sogs pa yang mthong na de dag ci'i phyir bsod nams kyi snod [#]du ma gyur/_gang yang gzugs bzang ba dang /_stobs dang ldan pa bsod nams kyis [#]las kyi 'bras bu la spyod pa yang snang na de dag ci'i phyir
[\[303a.3\]]dbang phyug gi bka' bzhin du sdig pa spyod par mi 'gyur/_des na 'di ltar ni [#]rigs pa yin no/_/sna tshogs las las mi shes pas/_/de rgyu nyid du smra ba yin/_/'gro ba sna tshogs 'di dag gi rgyu ni dge ba dang /_mi dge ba'i las nyid yin pas des na sna tshogs 'di dag ni las kyis [#]byas pa
[\[303a.4\]]yin la/_'gro ba rnams kyi rgyu ni dbang phyug yin no zhes mi shes pa dag gis sgro 'dogs shing rjod par byed kyang ji skad bstan pa'i rim pas bsgrub par ni dka'o/_/'di'i skye ba po dang byed pa po nyid dgag pa byas pas [#]tshangs pa dang nag po yang 'dra bar dpyad par bya ba nyid yin no/_/ci ltar zhe na/_sna
[\[303a.5\]]tshogs byed par [#]tshangs pa ni/_/mi rigs sngon du bstan pa bzhin/_/tshangs pa byed por bden na yang /_/de yis [#]ci zhig byas par 'gyur/_/de bzhin du/_sna tshogs byed po khyab 'jug min/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no/_/shi ba'i rgyud las bstan pa'i bsam gtan gyi rnal 'byor yang mi rigs
[\[303a.6\]]pa nyid du bsgrub pa'i phyir smras pa/_dang por sems ni mnyam gzhag pas/_/blo yi sgo rnams legs bsdams la/_/yid la shi ba gzhag [#]par bya/_/'di ltar yi ge oM bsgoms te/_/snying la gzugs kyis [#]gzung byas pa/_/sa sogs gzugs la goms par bya/_/bde byed mnyes na
[\[303a.7\]]sdug bsngal las/_/grol 'gyur zer ba 'di mi bde na/_/'di la rnal 'byor pas dang por mnyam par gzhag [#]pa'i sems su byas la/_blo'i sgo dbang po thams cad bsdams te/_phra ba rtag pa cha shes med pa zhi ba la dmigs par bya ste/_tshad gsum dang ldan pa'i yi ge oM brjod cing /_
[\[303b\]]
[\[303b.1\]]sa la sogs pa bstan bcos las bstan [#]pa bzhin du gzung bar bya zhing sems la bzung [#]na/_bsam gtan gyi mig gis [#]dbang phyug chen po mthong bar 'gyur zhing grol ba thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba gang 'dod pa de yang rigs [#]pa ma yin no/_/gang gi phyir/_/ji [#]srid yid kyi shes 'byung ba/_/de nyid [#]grol bar
[\[303b.2\]]mi rigs te/_/yid shes 'byung zhing [#]ji ltar sngar/_/grol bar ma gyur pa bzhin no/_/ji srid yid kyi shes pa 'byung ba yod pa de [#]srid du dbang phyug mthong du zin kyang grol bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni phyogs so/_/yid kyi shes pa 'byung ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs so/_/ji ltar sngar bsam
[\[303b.3\]]gtan gyi rnal 'byor ma skyes pa bzhin no zhes bya ba ni dpe'o/_/ji ltar zhe na/_dbang phyug la gus grol 'gyur bar/_/mi rigs bde byed mthong ba yang /_/dmigs la gnas pa yin pa'i phyir/_/dper na mtho yor mthong ba bzhin/_/rtag pa nyid yin pa'i phyir dbang phyug la brten [#]pa zhes bya'o/_/de mthong bas
[\[303b.4\]]grol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni mi rigs te/_rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma dang bcas pa yin pa'i phyir ji ltar shing dang rdo'i rang bzhin gyi mtho yor mthong ba bzhin no/_/gzhan yang /_sdug bsngal rgyu ni dbang phyug na/_/de ni rtag phyir bcos su med/_/des na sdug bsngal mthar 'gro bar/_/dbang
[\[303b.5\]]phyug nam yang 'gyur ma yin/_/gal te skye ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi rgyu dang /_dbang phyug yin na de rtag pa yin pa'i phyir 'gyur ba med pa yin pas rgyu yod kyi bar du sdug bsngal 'gag par 'gyur ba [#]ma yin no/_/des na dbang phyug mthong du zin kyang sdug bsngal gyi rgyu spangs pa
[\[303b.6\]]med pas dbang phyug rgyur smra ba'i gzhung la nam yang sdug bsngal gyi mthar 'gro ba yod pa ma yin no/_/'dis ni lhag ma'ang dgag byas phyir/_/tshangs pa khyab 'jug bdag smra la/_/mi rigs phyir na dbang phyug sogs/_/btags la [#]blo ni dga' mi byed/_/tshangs pa rgyur smra bas tshangs
[\[303b.7\]]pa mthong bas grol bar 'dod la/_/khyab 'jug pas ni khyab 'jug mthong bas so/_/bdag tu smra bas ni [#]skyes bu mthong ba ste/_thams cad dbang phyug rab tu bkag pa dang 'dra bar bkag pa yin no/_/des na grub pa'i mtha' skyon can yin pa'i phyir/_kho bo cag ni tshangs pa dang /_khyab
[\[304a\]]
[\[304a.1\]]'jug dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_de dag gis nye bar brten [#]cing bstan pa'i rig byed kyi grub pa'i mtha' la yang dga' bar mi byed pa yin no/_/rigs bzhi'i dbye ba la sogs pa yang mi rigs la/_rgyas [#]byed kyi snying po la sogs pa las de'i dbye ba'i
[\[304a.2\]]tshig 'byung ba yang mi rigs te/_gang gi phyir rigs gcig nyid yin te/_skye dgu'i bdag po las gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir/_kha dang dpung pa dang brla dang /_rkang pa las skyes pa yin pa'i phyir/_dper na pa na sa'i [#]shing gi sdong po dang /_yal ga dang /_rtsa ba dang /_yal ga phre'u la sogs pa
[\[304a.3\]]las byung ba'i pa na sa'i 'bras bu ni gzhan ma yin te/_gcig pa nyid yin pa bzhin no//_//dbu ma'i snying po'i 'grel pa rtog ge 'bar ba/_bam po nyi shu drug pa/_gzhan yang 'di ltar bram ze zhes bya ba ni [#]mi'i skye ba las gzhan zhig yin nam 'on te gzhan ma yin/_mi'i skye ba las
[\[304a.4\]]gzhan zhig yin na ni khyi dang phag bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/gzhan ma yin na ni dmangs rigs kyang bram ze'i mi'i [#]rigs las gzhan ma yin pa nyid yin te/_bram ze bzhin no/_/bram ze yang dmangs rigs kyi mi'i rigs las gzhan ma yin pas dmangs rigs so zhe na/_gzhan yang kha ni rtag tu
[\[304a.5\]]mi gtsang ba 'dzag pa yin la/_lag pa dang /_brla dang rkang pa ni gtsang ba yin no/_/des na bram ze ni kha las skyes pa nyid kyi phyir na yang mi gtsang ba dang lhan cig 'jug pa yin pa'i phyir/_bram ze'i rigs ni gtso bo ma yin no/_/yang bram ze mo yang kha nas [#]skyes pa yang ma [#]yin na ni sring mo dang
[\[304a.6\]]'khrig pa spyod par mi rigs so/_/gal te kha nas skyes so zhe na/_mngal gzhan las skyes pa'i phyir[#]/_da ltar 'di dag gi bram ze nyams pa yin no/_/mngal nas skyes pa ni mthong ba'i phyir la kha nas skyes pa ni ma mthong ba'i phyir bram ze ni 'ga' yang kha nas skyes pa nyid du mi rigs so/_/
[\[304a.7\]]gzhan yang 'tsho ba bram ze yin nam/_'on te lus yin/_de la 'tsho ba bram ze nyid yin na ni srog chags kun yang bram ze yin par thal bar 'gyur la/_srid pa gzhan du 'pho bar gyur pa na yang bram ze la gzhan du mi 'gyur bar thal bar 'gyur na/_'di skad du/_dmangs rigs kyis ni yon
[\[304b\]]
[\[304b.1\]]blangs na/_/bram ze bong bur skye bar 'gyur/_/bong bu'i skye ba bcu gnyis len/_/skye ba drug cur phag tu 'gyur/_/khyi yi skye ba bdun cu len/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa drang srong shed kyis [#]bstan pa dang /_de bzhin du/_grong khyer bcu pa'i bran bcu dang /_/mya ngam gyi ni ri dgas bcu/_/mdar rgyu
[\[304b.2\]]tshal gyi dUr [#]ba dag_/bram zes de ma bsams sam ci/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang /_dud 'gro la yang rigs bzhi yod pa nyid de/_gang yang khyi dkar po ni bram ze'o/_/nag po ni dmangs rigs so/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba 'di dag ni mkhas pa rnams kyis [#]bzhad gad du
[\[304b.3\]]bya ba yin no/_/'on te rigs bram ze yin no zhe na/_las rnams kyis kyang ltung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/_gang yang 'di skad du/_gang gis [#]bram ze nyid thob nas/_/rgyal po'i bka' bzhin sgrub byed pa/_/de ni bram ze nyid bor nas/_/dmangs rigs nyid du gyur pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la sogs
[\[304b.4\]]pa dang /_de bzhin du bram ze shi ba'i ro bsregs [#]pa yang bram ze gsod pa nyid yin par thal bar 'gyur ro/_/las ngan byas pas bram ze dmangs rigs su 'gyur ba nyid yin na las bzang po byas pa'i dmangs rigs kyang ci'i phyir bram zer mi 'gyur/_gal te pha dang ma dag pa nyid dang [#]/_bram
[\[304b.5\]]ze'i las la gnas pa nyid ni bram ze yin par 'gyur gyi/_dmangs rigs ni skye gnas ngan pa las skyes pa yin pa'i phyir/_bram ze'i las la gnas su zin kyang bram ze yin par mi 'gyur ro zhe na/_dus chen shin tu mang po 'das/_/bud med sems ni shin tu g.yo/_/de phyir bram ze zhes
[\[304b.6\]]bya'i [#]rigs/_/'ga' yang gang la'ang yod ma yin/_/zhes bya bas rigs [#]dag pa nyid du yang bsgrub par shin tu dka' ste/_'dir bud med rnams ni skyes bu gzhan dang nyal na yang skyon du brtsi [#]ba ma yin pas dmangs rigs dang /_rje'u rigs dang /_rgyal rigs rnams kyang skyes pa
[\[304b.7\]]dang /_gzhan yang bram ze'i rigs yin yang yul 'khor 'dzin la sogs pa rgyal rigs nyid du gyur pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_sna tshogs bshes gnyen la sogs pa rnams bram ze mo ma yin pa las skyes kyang bram ze'i gtso bo nyid yin pa'i phyir rigs ni bram ze'i rgyu nyid ma yin no/_/
[\[305a\]]
[\[305a.1\]]gang yang smras pa/_rtsal dang rtsal gyi sde dag dang /_/de bzhin thos pa'i rtsa chen [#]dag_/drang srong chen po gau ta ma/_/bran song nyal [#]ba'i mngal nas skyes/_/gzhung ni rtsom par byed pa yi/_/kun+da bram ze'i drang srong yang [#]/_/thub pa chen po kun+da [#]yis/_/gdol pa mo dang nyal las
[\[305a.2\]]skyes/_/nya ba yi ni bu mo la/_/pha ni mchog 'gro zhes bya bas/_/nyal [#]las drang srong gling lam skyes/_/de yang bram ze zhes brjod do/_/bram ze'i drang srong 'jig rten grags/_/thos mang rig byed 'don byed pa/_/drang srong rwa [#]zhes bya ba'i ma/_/dud 'gror skyes pa'i ri dgas yin/_/sbom dang de bzhin
[\[305a.3\]]ras bal can/_/dmangs rigs bu yin bram zer grags/_/zla ba'i btung ba mang 'thungs nas/_/'jig rten drang srong chen por [#]grags/_/'jig rten du ni grags gyur pa/_/bram ze lum bu zhes bya ba/_/thos mang de yang gdol pa'i rigs/_/lung ma zhes bya ba las skyes/_/bur shing bu mo las
[\[305a.4\]]skyes pa'i/_/drang srong drang srong ka nA yang /_/ka nA [#]ya yi rigs bcas pa/_/skyes pa yin zhes rjod par byed/_/drang srong ka pi dza [#]la yang /_/drang srong dbang byed chen po yis[#]/_/gdol pa phreng ba mo la ni/_/nyal las skyes pa yin zhes thos/_/a ga sta [#]dang dbang byed ni/_/bum pa'i nang nas skyes
[\[305a.5\]]zhes thos/_/bum pa'ang bum pa'i nang nas skyes/_/de bzhin gtsang skyes chu las skyes/_/pad+ma'i 'dab las [#]shes rab myur/_/ka pat+t+ya [#]ni thal ba [#]las/_/mgo la thod pa can nyid ni/_/thod pa las ni skyes zhes zer/_/zhes bya ba ste/_gal te yang dka' thub dang /_thos pa dang /_skye gnas nyid
[\[305a.6\]]kyis bram ze yin no zhe na/_dka' thub dang /_thos pa nyams pa rnams bram ze ma yin pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro/_/ci'i phyir/_dmangs rigs rnams kyi dka' thub dang /_/thos pa byed pa dgag par bya/_/bram ze dang /_dmangs rigs kyi lus dang /_dbang po dang /_blo la khyad par ni cung
[\[305a.7\]]zhig kyang ma [#]mthong ste/_ji ltar gang gi phyir/_rlung dang bad kan mkhris pa dag ni zhi byed pa'i/_/sman ni rigs kyi khyad par nges pas mi byed ltar/_/'dod chags la sogs nges par zhi bar byed pa'i chos/_/rigs [#]nges pa las khyad par med pa'ang de bzhin no/_/rigs bzhi po dag
[\[305b\]]
[\[305b.1\]]dug gis zin nas [#]sman ni bsten pa las/_/kun la dug ni bzhi [#]'gyur 'dra ste thams cad mnyam pa yin/_/de bzhin nyon mongs dug zin rigs bzhis chos kyi sman bsten na/_/bzhi char dug bral gyur [#]te chos sman kun la mnyam pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa bstan pas rigs bzhi
[\[305b.2\]]brtag pa ni rigs pa ma yin no/_/gang yang 'di skad du/_phyi rol dmangs rigs bud med gzugs/_/'dzin pas rigs ldan gsum 'di spangs/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras pa de yang skyon dang bcas pa nyid yin pas spong ba nyid yin gyi ma brtags pa ni [#]ma yin no zhes bstan
[\[305b.3\]]pa'i phyir/_chu yis [#]sdig pa dag pa 'khrul/_/dge sogs nyo tshong byed pa dag_/nyes bstan gsum la mthong bas na/_/gang phyir gsum 'di gtong [#]ba'i rigs/_/'bab stegs su khrus byas pas sdig pa dag par 'dod pa dang /_bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa nye zhing [#]
[\[305b.4\]]'tshong ba la sogs pa nyes par bstan pa gsum po 'di la mthong bas kho bo cag gis spong ba yin gyi [#]ma brtags par ni ma yin no/_/gang de la smras pa/_sa stengs [#]na mi shi 'bab stegs/_/'od kyis [#]snang dang pad+ma'i snying /_/khams gsum dag ni thams cad na[#]/_/ku ru'i zhing ni rab tu
[\[305b.5\]]bsngags/_/ku ru'i zhing gi rdul [#]dag ni/_/rlung gis khyer bas reg gyur na'ang /_/nyes par byas pa'i las can yang /_/'gro ba mchog tu khyer bar byed/_/gang 'ga' [#]zla ba'i skal can dang /_/de bzhin du ni dbyangs can dang /_/phag can dang ni 'dab ma can/_/sin du [#]rgya mtshor 'dre ba dag_/khrus
[\[305b.6\]]sa 'di rnams gang gi phyir/_/dag par 'dod nas khrus byed pa/_/sdig pa dag pa'i bdag nyid de/_/nges par mtho ris 'gro bar 'gyur/_/rig pa gang dag gis she na/_/'dag 'chal dag gis bsgos [#]pa'i gos/_/dri ma med par 'gyur ba bzhin/_/lus can mchod sbyin gyis bsgos [#]
[\[305b.7\]]nas/_/'bab stegs bkrus pa'ang de bzhin dag_/ces bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes zer ba de dag ni rigs pa ma yin te/_'di ni sdig pa dag mi 'gyur/_/ma rig pa [#]dang ma mthong phyir/_/ma bsgos [#]phyir dang bag chags phyir/_/dran pa'i shes dang dge ba bzhin/_/
[\[306a\]]
[\[306a.1\]]sdig pa zhes bya ba ni chos can no/_/de chus dag par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba ni de'i chos so/_/mi reg pa dang /_mi mthong ba dang /_bsgor med pa dang /_bag chags su gnas pa'i phyir zhes bya ba bzhi ni gtan tshigs te/_gang reg par bya bar nus pa dang gang 'di ni
[\[306a.2\]]'di na'o zhes bya ba la sogs par mthong ba dang /_gang la bsgo bar [#]bya bar [#]nus pa de ni gos la sogs pa bzhin du dag par bya bar rung na sdig pa ni gzung du med pa bltar med pa bsgor [#]med pa yin na/_de ji ltar na dag par 'gyur/_/'on kyang mi dge ba'i sems kyis [#]bag chags bzhag
[\[306a.3\]]pa las sdig pa yod par shes par bya ste/_ji ltar lus can gyi rgyud du gtogs pa'i dran pa'i shes pa dang /_bsod nams chus bkrur med pa ltar sdig pa yang de bzhin no/_/yang na/_pad snying rkang byung klung [#]sogs kyi/_/chus ni sdig pa dag mi 'gyur/_/reg bya'i phyir ram bsgo [#]bya'i phyir/_/
[\[306a.4\]]khyim gyi ngan skyugs chu bzhin no/_/pad+ma'i snying po'i 'bab stegs kyi ngo bo ni pad+ma'i snying po nyid do/_/rkang pa las byung ba'i ngo bo ni rkang pa las byung ba nyid de/_chu klung ngo /_/des sdig pa dag par mi 'gyur te/_/reg tu yod pa'i phyir ram rlan par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/gang reg tu yod pa dang rlan
[\[306a.5\]]par byed pa des sdig pa yang dag par byed nus pa ma yin te/_ji ltar khyim gyi [#]ngan skyugs chu bzhin no/_/gzhan yang /_rang bzhin bsod nams ma yin las/_/chur zhugs sogs kyis zad gyur na/_/'bab stegs sogs su khrus byas rnams/_/sdug bsngal mi 'gyur rgyu med phyir/_/
[\[306a.6\]]sngon mi dge ba la sogs pa'i 'bras bu la spyod pa'i long ba dang /_'on pa dang /_zha bo dang /_grum po la sogs pa rnams gal te 'bab stegs kyi chu la khrus byas shing /_dbang bskur bas sdig pa ma lus par yongs su zad par 'gyur [#]na ni/_chu'i nang du zhugs pa la sogs pa nyid
[\[306a.7\]]kyis [#]long ba dang /_'on pa dang /_zha bo dang /_grum po la sogs pa rnams/_khrus byas pa la sogs pa de phyin chad [#]rgyu med pa'i phyir sdug bsngal 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/las rnams zad pa'ang ma yin pas/_/sdig pa zad pa [#]'ga' yang med/_/nang gi bdag nyid mi 'gag [#]
[\[306b\]]
[\[306b.1\]]ces/_/bstan pa yod pas de yang brdzun/_/gang yang 'ga' zhig nyin re sdig pa'i las byed cing /_sdig pa la sogs pa byed pa de rnams 'bab stegs la sogs pa de rnams su khrus byas shing dbang bskur bas yongs su zad par 'gyur na ni sdig pa byas pa 'ga' yang yod par mi 'gyur la/_
[\[306b.2\]]des na 'ga' yang ngan song du lhung bar [#]'gyur ba zhig na/_gang yang 'di ltar drang srong rgyas pas/_/bdag ni chu bo dam pa sbyin 'bab stegs/_/bden chu'i sbyin pa chu ngogs dka' thub rlabs[#]/_/de bzhin byed dang bcas pas der khrus bya/_/nang gi bdag nyid chu yis dag ma yin/_/
[\[306b.3\]]lus dang ngag dang las rnams ni/_/gang gis gsum po ma dag pa/_/rgya mtsho gsum du khrus byas kyang /_/de ni dri ma med nyid yin/_/dbang po'i sgo ni rab bsdams nas[#]/_/mnyam par gzhag [#]pas gar gnas pa/_/de yis [#]ku ru'i zhing dag dang /_/ne mi sha dang pad snying ste/_/'dod
[\[306b.4\]]dang khro dang rmongs pa las/_/gang zhig rgyal ba de dag dpa'/_/'bab stegs [#]gang du khrus byed pa/_/skyong mdzad de yis ci zhig bgyi/_/chu yis bangs par gyur pa la/_/khrus byas pa zhes mi bya yi/_/phyi nang bcas par [#]dag pa yis[#]/_/dka' thub can gang de khrus byas/_/rdul dang 'dam
[\[306b.5\]]dang dri ma sogs/_/zag pa rnams ni chu nyid kyis/_/dag par bgyid kyi rgyal po lags/_/chos bya'i 'bras bu chu yis min/_/gang gAr bkrus nas dag pa yi/_/lus dang ngag dang yid 'jug pa/_/khyad par phra mo tsam yang ni/_/'byung po rnams la ma mthong ngo /_/'dod pa mchod
[\[306b.6\]]sbyin chen po mchod byas nas/_/mi dbang 'bab stegs rtag tu khrus byas kyang /_/khro dang 'dod dag de bzhin mang 'phel nas/_/gang phyir mi gsod la sogs sdig dag byed/_/de phyir dri ma'i rgyu ni yod [#]gyur pa/_/de srid [#]mchod sbyin 'bab stegs chus mi 'dag_/mar me snying po 'bar
[\[306b.7\]]ba yod pa na/_/'od rnams chu yis blugs kyang mi nyams bzhin/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa bsten [#]pa yod pas khyed rang gi dam tshig las 'bab stegs su khrus byas pas sdig pa yongs su zad pa yin par ma grub [#]pa'i phyir/_chus khrus byas pas sdig pa zad par 'gyur ro zhes
[\[307a\]]
[\[307a.1\]]smra ba 'di ni mdzes pa ma yin no/_/gang yang 'di skad du/_bram ze dag gis [#]sdig pa byas pa dag gi sdig pa blangs nas bsod nams kyi cha 'god par byed do [#]zhes zer ba de yang rigs pa 'dis rigs pa ma yin te/_rgyud gzhan las ni rgyud gzhan du/_/sdig pa 'pho ba
[\[307a.2\]]min par gzung /_/lus can min phyir 'dod chags dang /_/zhe sdang gti mug mi 'pho bzhin/_/dngos dang ldan [#]pa'i rdzas la ni/_/rgyud gzhan las rgyud gzhan la 'pho ba mthong ste/_ji ltar [#]bu bzhin no/_/sdig pa ni gzugs can ma yin pas/_/ji ltar gzhan gyi 'dod chags kyis [#]
[\[307a.3\]]gzhan 'dod chags can du mi 'gyur ba dang /_gzhan gyi zhe sdang gis [#]gzhan zhe sdang can du mi 'gyur ba dang /_gzhan gyi gti mug gis gzhan gti mug can du mi 'gyur ba dang /_gzhan bkres shing skom pa gzhan la mi gnod pa dang /_gzhan tshim pas gzhan tshim par mi 'gyur ba ltar/_
[\[307a.4\]]de bzhin du gzhan gyis byas pa'i sdig pa'i 'bras bu gzhan gyis 'god [#]par mi 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang /_de tshe bsod nams blangs pa ni/_/mi rigs zhes ni nges par bya[#]/_/sems dang mtshungs par ldan pa yi/_/dper na bde dang sdug bsngal bzhin/_/gser dang gos la sogs pa'i
[\[307a.5\]]gzugs can nyid kyi dngos po ni sbyin pa dang /_blang bar rigs kyi bsod nams dang sdig pa dag ni ma yin te sems dang mtshungs par ldan pa [#]yin pa'i phyir dper na bde ba dang sdug bsngal dag sbyin pa dang blang bar mi rigs pa bzhin no/_/gal te bde ba dang sdug bsngal dag sbyin pa dang
[\[307a.6\]]blang bar nus pa zhig yin na ni bdag po thams cad sdug bsngal bar gyur pa na rang gi bran la sdug bsngal lhag ma ma lus par byin nas de dag gi bde ba len par 'gyur la/_snying rje can dag kyang skye dgu sdug bsngal can dag la rang gi bde ba byin nas/_de dag gi sdug bsngal len
[\[307a.7\]]par 'gyur ba zhig na de lta bu ni med do/_/de bzhin du bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa dag len pa dang sbyin pa yod pa ma yin no/_/lung rgyas byed las kyang [#]'di skad du/_'dir ni dge dang mi dge ba'i/_/rang gis [#]byas pa'i las rnams ni/_/chud za bar ni mi 'gyur te/_/de'i [#]phyir
[\[307b\]]
[\[307b.1\]]sdig spangs [#]mdung gi bu/_/zhes 'byung ba yin no/_/gzhan yang /_'bar sogs nang du mchongs pa nyid/_/tshangs pa'i 'jig rten sogs 'gro bar/_/bstan pa'i lugs ngan gsum las mthong /_/de phyir spang bar rigs pa yin/_/mer 'jug pa dang /_g.yang sar
[\[307b.2\]]mchong [#]ba dang /_smyung [#]bar gnas pa la sogs pa'i bya bas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_tshogs bdag dang /_khyab 'jug la sogs pa'i 'jig rten du 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes zer ba mi bden par bstan pa mthong ba'i phyir ro[#]/_/gsum po 'di ni gtang
[\[307b.3\]]bar rigs [#]pa kho na'o/_/ji ltar zhe na/_rigs pa dang mi ldan pa'i phyir te/_mer mchod [#]la sogs tshangs pa yis[#]/_/'jig rten sogs thob rgyu ma yin/_/srog la gnod par byed pa'i phyir/_/phye ma leb sogs mthong ba bzhin/_/gang dge ba'i sems dang bral ba'i mer 'jug
[\[307b.4\]]pa dang /_g.yang sar mchong [#]ba la sogs pa rnams ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten la sogs pa 'thob pa'i rgyu ma yin te/_srog la gnod par byed pa yin pa'i phyir/_/ji ltar phye ma leb dang phyi [#]byi dang /_sbrang ma la sogs pa mer mchong [#]ba dang /_e ne ya dang spre'u la sogs pa g.yang sar
[\[307b.5\]]mchong [#]ba dang /_rgya mtsho'i nang du gru bo che zhig nas/_/skye bo shi bar gyur pa dang /_/lam du lam brgyags [#]ma lus par zad nas 'gron [#]po bkres pas nyen pas srog dang bral bar gyur pa rnams mtho ris su 'gro ba'i rgyu ma yin pa bzhin no/_/gzhan yang /_bza' dang btung ba spangs pa yis/_/
[\[307b.6\]]mtho ris 'thob par mi 'dod de/_/bkres dang skom pa'i rgyu yin phyir/_/zas ma zos pas gdungs pa [#]bzhin/_/zas dang skom ma zos pas mtho ris 'thob [#]pa ma yin te/_bkres pa dang skom pas gdungs pa'i [#]rgyu yin pa'i phyir khros pa'am nad dam/_ma rnyed pa'i dbang gis
[\[307b.7\]]zas ma zos pa bzhin no/_/gzhan yang /_zas ma zos sogs bsod nams 'gyur/_/spangs phyir sdig spangs bzhin zhe na/_/bden sogs [#]spangs pas gtan tshigs 'di/_/ma nges pa nyid yin par 'gyur/_/zas ma zos pas bsod nams 'thob par 'gyur te/_spangs
[\[308a\]]
[\[308a.1\]]pa yin pa'i phyir sdig pa las log pa bzhin no zhes smra ba de yang the tshom du 'gyur ba yin te/_ci spangs pa yin pa'i phyir bden pa dang tshangs par spyod pa spangs pa bzhin du bsod nams ma yin pa nyid du 'gyur ba zhig yin nam/_'on te spangs pa yin pa'i phyir/_'tshe ba
[\[308a.2\]]la sogs pa spangs pa bzhin du zas spangs pa yang bsod nams su 'gyur ba zhig yin zhes spangs pas [#]zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs 'di ma nges pa nyid yin no/_/gzhan yang /_zas spangs bsod nams mi 'gyur te/_/bya ba de la sdig med phyir/_/dge ba yid la byed pa yi/_/yid la byed pa
[\[308a.3\]]spangs pa bzhin/_/bya ba gang zhig spyad [#]pa las sdig pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu spangs pa ni bsod nams su 'gyur bar rigs na zas la spyod pa'i bya ba ni 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi srog 'dzin cing bsod nams skye ba'i sgor gyur pa yin la/_gal te de spyad pas chos ma yin par 'gyur
[\[308a.4\]]na ni 'jig rten thams cad kyang chos ma yin pa kho na dang ldan par 'gyur na de ltar ni ma grags so/_/de'i phyir zas la spyod pa'i bya ba la yang sdig pa yod par ma mthong la/_zas la mi spyod pa'i bya ba la sogs pa la yang bsod nams yod par ma mthong ngo /_/[#]'dis ni gdung ba lnga pa la sogs
[\[308a.5\]]pa'i brtul zhugs kyang lus gdung bar byed pa 'ba' zhig tu zad pa'i phyir mtho ris dang byang grol la sogs pa 'thob pa'i rgyu ma yin no zhes kyang bstan pa yin no/_/rgyas byed la sogs pa'i lung las [#]'di ltar snga phyi 'gal ba yang yod pas rigs [#]pa ma yin te/_gang gi phyir/_nub
[\[308a.6\]]gcig lam [#]ni nub gsum mam/_/bdun du'am ni nyin gcig nyid/_/gang zhig smyung bar gnas pa yi/_/skye bo de [#]ni mtho ris 'gro/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa spras [#]nas yang /_zla phyed dam ni zla gcig tu/_/smyung bar spyad par mi bya ste/_/lus la gnod pa byed pa'i phyir/_/dka' thub
[\[308a.7\]]ma yin chos ldan min/_/'ga' zhig brtul zhugs smyung bar gnas/_/lus la gnod pa byed pa ste/_/nang gi bdag nyid sdug bsngal phyir/_/des ni mtho ris rtogs [#]mi 'gyur/_/rtag tu lus ni rgyas pa dang /_/sems dang dbang po gsal ba yis/_/phra ba'i chos rnams rtogs
[\[308b\]]
[\[308b.1\]]'gyur gyi/_/rgod dang zhum pas ma yin no/_/zhes bstan pa dang /_de bzhin du/_dgun [#]gyi dus su chu yi nang du gnas/_/tsha ba'i dus su gdung ba lnga bsten bya/_/dbyar gyi [#]dus su bla gab med par gnas/_/bram ze de ni dka' thub drag po spyod/_/ces bya ba smras nas/_yang /_
[\[308b.2\]]bram ze me bzhi'i dkyil gnas nas[#]/_/lnga pa nyi mas gdung ba yi/_/gdung ba de ni mdung gi bu[#]/_/lnga pa'i dka' thub ma yin gyi/_/bkres dang chags pa'i me dag dang /_/khro dang 'dod pa'i mya ngan dag_/lnga po 'di las gang rgyal ba/_/de ni gdung ba lnga can 'dod/_/rtag tu 'dod
[\[308b.3\]]dang khro las rgyal/_/bde ldan dbang po bsdams pa dag_/'di ni mkhas pa'i dka' thub yin/_/lus kyi gdung ba ma yin no/_/'tshe med bden pa'i tshig dang ldan/_/khro med dul la drang ba dag_/'di ni dka' thub mchog yin gyi/_/lus skam byed pa ma yin no/_/sdug bsngal rang bzhin
[\[308b.4\]]dka' thub gang /_/sdug bsngal sdug bsngal brgyud mar 'jug_/shes pa'i rang bzhin dka' thub gang /_/bde bas bde ba brgyud mar 'jug_/ces bya ba la sogs pa 'byung bas de lta bu'i rang gi grub pa'i mtha' dang yang 'gal bar smyung [#]bar gnas pa la sogs pas lus gdung bar
[\[308b.5\]]byed pa'i bden pa brtags pas ci zhig bya/_gzhan yang rgyas byed la sogs pa'i lung las snga phyi 'gal ba mang du mthong ste/_bu [#]med pa la 'jig rten ni/_/bzang po ye med rgyas byed kyi/_/ci ltar gling lam can gyis ni/_/rgas kar bsus [#]nas smras pa bzhin/_/zhes bya ba la
[\[308b.6\]]sogs pa smras nas yang /_gzhon nu tshangs par spyod byed pa/_/dka' thub spyod pa spangs pa ste/_/drang srong de ni mtho ris gnon/_/tshangs spyod 'bras bu dam pa yin/_/de bzhin du/_nges par brtse med dga' bo yis[#]/_/g.yul ngor 'bros pa med par ni/_/g.yul la mngon
[\[308b.7\]]phyogs su [#]gyur na/_/shi na mtho ris 'gro bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba smras nas/_yang smras pa/_gang yang rang sems gdug pa yis[#]/_/gzhan la 'tshe de rgyas byed kyi/_/drag po drag po'i las can te/_/shin tu smad pa'i dmyal bar 'gro/_/rang la rjes su mi mthun pa/_/de ni gzhan
[\[309a\]]
[\[309a.1\]]la mi bya ste/_/'dir ni chos rnams bsdus pa yin/_/gzhan ni 'dod pas 'jug par bya/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba ma yin nam zhes smras pa na/_'dir smras pa/_sangs rgyas pa ni [#]'di ltar bdag nyid chos la gnas pa yin no snyam du sems
[\[309a.2\]]shing gzhan la kha zer zhing dmod par byed kyang rang nyid sha za ba la 'bad pa cher byed par grags la[#]/_sems can srog ma bcad par [#]ni sha rnyed par mi 'gyur bas des na snying rje dang bral ba yin pa'i phyir/_ri dgas kyi rngon pa la sogs pa bzhin du sdig pa byed pa nyid yin no zhe na/_
[\[309a.3\]]'di la brjod par bya ste/_thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa ltar dgongs pa/_rus pa dang /_rkang pa'i gting nas brtse [#]ba mnga' ba des ji ltar na sha za bar rjes su gnang ba yin/_theg pa chen po'i gzhung las[#]/_bcom ldan 'das
[\[309a.4\]]kyis ma gnang ba kho na yin te/_glang po'i rtsal dang /_sprin chen po dang /_lang kar gshegs pa dang /_sor mo'i phreng ba la sogs pa'i mdo las/_sha za ba rnam pa thams cad du bkag pa nyid yin no/_/nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gzhung las ni/_mtha' gsum dag pa'i sha gang dag_/
[\[309a.5\]]zas [#]kyang sdig tu mi 'gyur te/_/dngas ma sogs su 'gyur ba'i phyir/_/slong mo'i zas la sdig med bzhin/_/zhes [#]'byung ste/_'di ltar bdag gi ched du srog chags bsad par rang gis mthong ba yang med/_thos pa yang med/_dogs pa yang med pa ni [#]sdig pa'i sems dang bral ba
[\[309a.6\]]yin pas nad la sogs pa zhi bar bya ba'i don du de lta bu'i sha zos kyang sdig tu 'gyur bar brtag par mi bya ste/_dngas ma dang /_gcin dang /_ngan skyugs la sogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir/_ji ltar slong [#]mos rnyed pa'i zas ni slong mo'i zos [#]te/_de zos pas sdig tu mi 'gyur
[\[309a.7\]]ba bzhin no/_/gzhan yang /_gang yang sha ni zos pa yis/_/sdig pa'i rgyur ni mi 'gyur te/_/bkres pa bzlog pa'i rgyu yin phyir/_/ma blangs byin pa'i zas bzhin no/_/sha zhes bya ba ni chos can no/_/de zos pas [#]sdig pa'i rgyur mi 'gyur zhes bya ba ni chos so/_/bkres pa zlog [#]
[\[309b\]]
[\[309b.1\]]par byed pa ste/_zhi bar byed pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir/_/zas kyi dus su ma blangs par rnyed pa'i zas skom bzhin no/_/sha ni mi bza' ba yin phyir/_/mi za zhe na lus la gtogs[#]/_/sa bon dang ni brtan [#]byed pa/_/mi gtsang mi gtsang srin bu bzhin/_/sha ni [#]bza' bar mi bya ba
[\[309b.2\]]nyid de/_/phyi sa la sogs pa bzhin no zhe na rang gi lus 'di yang brtag par bya ba nyid yin te/_skra dang /_sen mo dang /_ba spu dang /_pags pa dang /_phyi shun dang /_sha dang /_rgyus pa dang /_khrag dang /_rus pa dang /_rkang dang /_mkhal ma dang /_snying dang /_glo bsral [#]
[\[309b.3\]]dang /_mchin pa dang /_mtsher pa dang /_glo ba dang /_rgyu ma dang /_bzhag dang /_long ka dang /_gcin dang /_phyi sa dang /_mchil [#]ma dang /_rngul dang /_tshil dang /_lud pa dang /_mchi [#]ma dang /_rnag dang /_mkhris pa dang /_mchil snabs dang /_zhag dang /_chu ser dang /_dri
[\[309b.4\]]ma dang /_klad pa dang /_klad rgyas dang /_mig rnag dang /_rna spabs [#]zhes bya ba la sogs pa mi gtsang ba'i rdzas sum cu rtsa drug gis gang ba'i rma'i sgo dgu nas rtag tu mi gtsang ba [#]zag pa khrag dang khu ba mi gtsang ba'i sa bon las byung ba/_mi gtsang ba'i khu bas nye bar bstan cing /_
[\[309b.5\]]phyi sa dang ngan skyugs kyi dngas mas g.yogs nas/_mngal gyi nang nas byung ba'i lus 'di ni mi gtsang ba'i nang na gnas pa'i srin bu dang 'dra bar shin tu mi gtsang ba yin na sha zos pas mi gtsang ba lhag pa ci zhig tu 'gyur/_des na 'di ni ci [#]yang ma yin no/_/gal te yang skye bo
[\[309b.6\]]bzang po rnams kyis 'dod pa yin du zin kyang nya la sogs pa'i sha ni bza' [#]bar mi bya ste/_khu ba dang khrag las byung ba yin pa'i phyir/_ba lang dang bong bu'i sha bzhin no zhe na/_'di la brjod par bya ba ni/_khu ba sogs las byung ba'i phyir/_/nya sha sogs ni dmang ce na/_/mar dang 'o sogs
[\[309b.7\]]rgyu yin pas/_/'di ni ma nges pa nyid yin/_/khu ba dang khrag las byung ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ci ba lang la sogs pa'i sha bzhin du nya sha la sogs pa yang bza' bar bya ba ma yin pa zhig yin nam/_'on te khu ba dang khrag las byung ba yin pa'i phyir[#]/_mar dang 'o ma la sogs pa bzhin
[\[310a\]]
[\[310a.1\]]du bza' bar bya ba nyid yin zhes the tshom du 'gyur bas gtan tshigs [#]ma nges pa nyid yin no/_/gal te yang za ba po med na gsod pa po yang med par 'gyur bas des na srog gcod pa ni za ba po nyid yin te/_'tsho bar byed pa'i rgyu mtshan yin pa'i phyir sha'i phyir gsod du
[\[310a.2\]]'jug pa lta bu'o zhe na/_de la/_sha za srog gcod nyid yin te/_/de'i phyir [#]rgyu mtshan phyir zhe na/_/pags sogs thogs pas gtan tshigs [#]ni/_/ma nges pa nyid yin par 'gyur/_/gang pags pa la sogs pa thogs pa'i dka' thub med na shar ba [#]la sogs pa gsod [#]par yang mi 'gyur
[\[310a.3\]]ro/_/des na de ni rgyu mtshan yin pa'i phyir sha'i phyir gsod par 'jug pa po bzhin du sha za ba srog gcod pa nyid yin par 'gyur ram/_'on te de'i rgyu mtshan [#]yin pa'i phyir pags pa la sogs pa 'chang ba bzhin du srog gcod pa ma yin pa nyid du 'gyur zhes bya bas gtan tshigs [#]ma nges pa
[\[310a.4\]]nyid yin no/_/rgyu mtshan tsam gyis rtogs [#]par byed na skyon mang po gzhan yang yod par thal bar 'gyur te/_ji ltar/_'jal dang srang la g.yo byed dang /_/nyo bar 'dod pa mi dge mnyam/_/'tsho byed nor ni rnyed pa de'i/_/gang yang sdig [#]pa dag las [#]ni/_/skyon ni gnyis kyis lhag par du[#]/_/nyo
[\[310a.5\]]ba po las 'byung bar 'dod/_/de bzhin bud med bdag po bzhin[#]/_/'dod pa'i kha zas sbyin byed dang /_/skal ba ldan pa'i bud med dang /_/gang dag chos de ston pa dang /_/tshul khrims med la dmod pa dag_/skyon tshogs 'joms phyir ti ti ri/_/dgra gsos las kyang nges par ni/_/chos ma
[\[310a.6\]]yin pa [#]thob par 'gyur/_/kun dga' ra ba khron pa rdzing /_/de ni lus can shi gyur na/_/byed pa'i skye mched yin pa'i phyir/_/de la skyon 'di yod par 'gyur/_/gsad [#]bya yod pas gsod yod kyi/_/gang phyir med na ma yin no/_/des na gsad [#]bya gsod pa gnyis/_/sdig pa mnyam par 'thob par
[\[310a.7\]]'gyur/_/mthong dang thos dang bsdams pa dang /_/reg dang dran pa nyid dang ni/_/sha la byas na'ang chos min 'brel/_/'di lta bur ni 'gyur ba yin/_/gsal bar byed pa'i nyi ma dang /_/skye ba'i rgyu ni [#]pha dag dang /_/skyong bar byed pa'i mi bdag dang /_/de rnams sdig pa'i byed po nyid/_/gos
[\[310b\]]
[\[310b.1\]]byed pa yi ltar byas nas/_/zas kyi bya ba'ang mi rigs te/_/gang phyir skyon ni gnyis 'byung ba/_/ma zos pa la ma yin te/_/zos las srog chags skye 'gyur zhing /_/de dag thur du 'byung bar 'gyur/_/skyes pa nyams 'gyur ma zos na/_/ma skyes skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gal te gzhan gyi
[\[310b.2\]]rgyu mtshan gyi[#]/_/skyon de khyod ni mi 'dod na/_/gzhan gyis [#]bsad par gyur pa yang /_/sdig de spyod pa ga [#]la 'ong /_/gang phyir mi sdig gnang [#]mi sbyin/_/des na sdig de yod ma yin/_/de phyir sha sogs rjes gnang ba/_/skyon med par [#]ni gzung bar bya/_/gzhan yang /_sha za ba ni skyon bcas min/_/de tshe
[\[310b.3\]]srog chags gnod min phyir/_/mu tig rma bya'i sgro sogs dang /_/'bras dang chu yi dgos pa bzhin/_/srog chags kyi lus la sdug bsngal skyed [#]nas sha zos na skyon dang bcas par 'gyur gyi/_sha za ba'i dus na srog chags kyi lus kyi sha la sems med pas sdug bsngal skye bar mi
[\[310b.4\]]'gyur na sdig par lta ga la 'gyur te/_ji ltar nya phyis dang /_nya dang /_glang po che'i mu tig gi [#]'bras bu rnams dang /_rma bya'i sgro dang /_g.yag rnga dang /_so dang /_rus pa dang /_pags pa la sogs pa rnams nye bar longs spyod par byed pa'i dus na/_srog chags la sdug bsngal cung zhig
[\[310b.5\]]kyang med pa dang /_'bras bu [#]dang /_chu la sogs pa longs spyod pa'i dus na gang la yang [#]gnod pa med pa ltar de bzhin du sha za bar byed kyang de'i tshe gnod pa med pas skyon med de[#]/_skyon yod na ni shi ba'i ro sreg pa yang sdig pa yod par 'gyur ro/_/gal te yang 'dir de lta na yang sha ni bza' bar
[\[310b.6\]]bya ba ma yin te/_'dod chags la sogs pa skye bar byed pa nyid [#]yin te/_sha zos na ni stobs skye bar 'gyur la/_stobs las ni 'dod chags la sogs pa skye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhe na/_de la/_'dod chags kun rtog [#]las byung phyir/_/sha zos de yi rgyu ma yin/_/de ma zos la'ang de 'byung ste/_/rtswa zan ba
[\[310b.7\]]lang la sogs bzhin/_/zhes brjod par bya ste/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug rnams rtsa bar gyur pa las 'byung gi [#]sha zos pa las ma yin te/_ji ltar/_kun rtog las ni 'dod skyes pas/_/'dod pa'i rtsa bar shes gyis te/_/khyed ni kun rtog ma byed dang /_/des na
[\[311a\]]
[\[311a.1\]]khyod la 'byung mi 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba lta bu ste/_ci ba lang dang /_bong bu la sogs pa rtswa za ba de dag dus thams cad du 'dod chags kyi sems kyis gnod par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ci sha za ba yin nam/_des na mtha' gsum dag pa'i
[\[311a.2\]]sha zos nas/_skyon dang ldan par 'gyur ba ma yin pa nyid de/_ji ltar/_mthong dang thos dang dogs pa yis[#]/_/gang gi ched du byas shes pa'i/_/sha de de yis bza' mi bya/_/de las gzhan gang yin des bza'/_/ro chags tshol [#]dang gsod pa dang /_/snying rje med pa'i bsam spangs nas/_/
[\[311a.3\]]sha ni zos par gyur [#]na yang /_/skyon bcas ma yin zas mchog [#]bzhin/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba lta bu'o/_/lam gsum po [#]de spangs pa'i rgyu gzhan yang smras pa/_sems med pa yi bstan [#]pa la'ang /_/sems ni yod par rtogs byed pa'i/_/nyes bstan gsum la [#]mthong bas na/_/
[\[311a.4\]]gsum po 'di ni spang ba'i [#]rigs/_/zhes bya ba ste/_ljon shing rnams ni sems dang bcas pa yin te/_dbang po yod pa'i phyir mi la sogs pa bzhin no zhes bya ba ni gsum po de las 'dod pa yin no/_/de yang 'di ltar rgun 'bru dang tra pu sha la sogs pa'i 'khri [#]shing rnams ni gzhan la
[\[311a.5\]]brten cing rgyas par 'gyur ba mthong ba dang /_sman sbrul mgo dang nyi ma'i rjes su 'brang ba la sogs pa rnams nyi ma ji ltar 'gro ba'i rjes su yongs su 'gyur bas na mig gi dbang po yod pa nyid du rjes su dpag pa yin la/_ljon shing rnams kyang sprin mthug [#]po las sgra 'byung bar gyur pa
[\[311a.6\]]na chu shing la sogs pa rnams kyi 'bras bu 'byung bar rtsom pas na rna ba'i dbang po yod pa nyid yin la/_ma tu lung ga'i [#]shing gi rtsa bar khyi ro rul pa gzhag [#]pa na 'bras bu mang du 'byung bar 'gyur bas sna'i dbang po yod pa nyid yin no/_/skyu ru ra'i shing la 'o ma blugs pa na 'bras bu
[\[311a.7\]]mngar bor 'byung bar 'gyur bas lce'i dbang po yod pa yin no/_/reg na 'khum pa'i 'o ma can la gang gi tshe reg par gyur pa na 'di ltar 'khum pas lus kyi dbang po dang ldan pa yin no/_/gang gi phyir 'dod pas myos [#]shing sgeg par gyur pa'i lang tsho la bab pa'i [#]bud med kyi rkang pa
[\[311b\]]
[\[311b.1\]]rgya skyegs kyi khu bas bskus shing rkang gdub dang ldan pas ched du brtsams te/_shing mya ngan med me tog dang 'bras bu mi 'byung ba la brgyab na [#]'dod pa dang ldan pa'i bud med rigs las nyams pa dang /_spyod pa na [#]bde ba dang ngo tsha ba dus gcig skye ba ltar mya ngan med kyi shing yang de [#]
[\[311b.2\]]rkang pas reg pa na bde ba dang ngo tsha ba dang ldan pa bzhin du me tog dang 'bras bu rgyas par 'byung ba dang /_de bzhin du lang tsho la bab pa'i bud med kyi kha bur chang gis [#]bkang nas me tog mi 'byung ba'i ba ku la'i shing la gtor nas bgad na me tog rnams gad mo byed cing 'byung ste/_shing
[\[311b.3\]]rnams kyang dus ji lta ba bzhin du me tog dang 'bras bu la sogs pa 'byin par byed pas yid kyi dbang po yod pa yin no zhes zer te/_de lta bu sems med pa'i shing la sogs pa la yang sems yod par rtog cing nges par 'dzin pa'i rig byed gsum po 'di spang ba'i [#]rigs so/_/
[\[311b.4\]]ji ltar zhe na/_dbang po yod pa'i phyir zhes bya ba 'di ma nges pa nyid yin te/_dbang po med pa rnams la yang sems med bzhin du yang yul la nye bar dmigs pa lta bu'i 'khrul pa 'byung ste/_ji ltar mig med kyang rdo khab len dang /_lcags nye bar gyur pa las lcags 'byar bar
[\[311b.5\]]'gyur ba dang /_khar ba'i snod la rna ba med bzhin du yang sgra chen po gzhan grag pa na de las sgra brnyan 'byung ba dang /_dug la sna [#]dang /_lce med kyang khrag dri'i rjes su rab tu rgyas par 'gyur zhing tsha dang phrad pa las lbu ba 'byung ba dang /_dril bu la sogs pa la lus kyi dbang po
[\[311b.6\]]med kyang sgra'i rgyun 'byung ba dang /_/byi ba'i dug gis dus tshod shes pa med kyang nam zhod byung ba'i tshe rgyas shing ldang ba ltar/_de bzhin du rgun 'bru dang tra pu sha la sogs pa rnams la mig gi dbang po med kyang rlung gi khams rgyas par gyur pa las 'khri shing steng du 'byung bar 'gyur
[\[311b.7\]]ba me 'bar ba bzhin no/_/sman sbrul mgo dang su gar tsa [#]la sogs pa yang chu'i khams kyis rgyas par gyur pa la nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis phog par gyur pa [#]na nang gi chu skams pa na lus dang 'dab ma rgyas pa de nyi ma la mngon du phyogs par 'gyur ba ma yin te/_pags pa rlon pa
[\[312a\]]
[\[312a.1\]]skams pa bzhin no/_/chu shing dang ma du lung ga la sogs pa'i 'bras bu 'byung ba dang /_mya ngan med pa la sogs pa'i me tog ni rkyen du ma nyid las grub pa'i 'bras bu yin pas mkhyud spyad kyis [#]sbyor ba yin par shes par bya ste/_ji ltar rims nyin gsum pas
[\[312a.2\]]btab pa la thun mtshams [#]rnams su phag chag [#]pa'i dum bu re byin pa nyin gsum du byas na zhi bar 'gyur ba bzhin no/_/de bzhin du reg pas 'khum pa'i lo ma can dang /_nyi mar gyur pa'i rjes su 'brang ba la sogs pa'i gtan tshigs kyang me la sogs par reg par [#]pags pa dang /_spu dang /_
[\[312a.3\]]mgos bshud [#]pa'i bal gos dang /_rtswa'i pir la ba lang gi lci ba skam po'i phye ma btab pas tshon rtsis bsku bar bde ba dang /_'khrul 'khor dang /_rgyu skar dang /_'khor lo la sogs pa rnams kyis ma nges pa nyid yin la/_dus gcig tu 'byung ba'i chu bur gyi phreng ba la sogs
[\[312a.4\]]pas kyang ma nges pa nyid yin te/_me tog 'phrog gi lha bskyod par gyur pa lta bu'o/_/skyu ru ra'i shing gi [#]ro myang ba med kyang /_/rten la 'o mas rgyas par gyur na 'bras bu mngar por 'byung ba yin no/_/sna'i dbang po med kyang dri zhim po 'byung ba yin te/_tsha dang le [#]li ta sbyar ba las 'byung
[\[312a.5\]]ba bzhin no/_/de bzhin yid kyi shes pa med kyang dus su skye ba nyid ni sems can rnams kyi las dge ba dang mi dge ba [#]bdag por gyur pas yin no/_/gzhan yang /_ljon shing sems dang bcas pa min/_/skye gnas bzhi [#]ni ma bsdus phyir/_/dkyil du bcad kyang bzod pa'i phyir/_/
[\[312a.6\]]phag dum bzhin du bems po yin/_/ljon shing ni chos can no/_/de la sems yod pa ma yin zhes bya ba ni de'i [#]chos so/_/chos dang chos can bsdoms pa ni phyogs so/_/skye gnas bzhis ma bsdus pa'i phyir zhes bya ba dang /_dkyil du bcad kyang mi bzod pa med pa'i phyir
[\[312a.7\]]zhes bya ba gnyis ni gtan tshigs te srog chags rnams ni sgo nga las skye ba [#]dang /_mngal nas skye ba dang /_rdzus [#]te skye ba dang /_drod gsher las skye ba zhes bya ba'i skye gnas bzhi las skye zhing 'byung bar mthong na ljon shing ni skye gnas 'di dag las skye ba ma yin no/_/yang gal te
[\[312b\]]
[\[312b.1\]]brtol nas steng du skye zhes bya ba skye gnas lnga pa yin no zhe na/_ljon shing la sogs pa sems dang bcas pa yin no zhes zer ba brtags pa nyid yin pa bzhin du 'di yang brtags [#]pa nyid yin te/_kho bo cag gi phyogs la ma grub bo/_/brtol nas steng du 'byung ba'i skye gnas can yin du
[\[312b.2\]]zin kyang /_ljon shing la sogs pa dag sems dang bcas pa nyid ni ma yin no zhes sgrub par byed pa nyid ni gang srog dang bcas pa de ni tshor ba yod pa'i phyir shin tu g.yo zhing mi bzod pa yin na ljon shing de dag ni dkyil du bcad kyang g.yo ba med de/_tshor ba med pa'i phyir ro/_/gang dang
[\[312b.3\]]gang du [#]skye gnas bzhis ma [#]bsdus shing /_/[#]gang dang gang [#]dkyil du bcad pa na g.yo 'gul yod pa de ni sems dang bcas pa yin te/_bems po nyid du mtshungs par rjes su dpag pa yin pas dper na phag dum bzhin zhes bya'o/_/dkyil zhes smos pa ni rte'u sbrul dang lung gi
[\[312b.4\]]mjug ma [#]dang /_lha dang lha ma yin gyi lus bcad pa spang ba'i phyir ro/_/yang tshul gzhan gyis gzhan gyi bsam pa nye bar dgod pa ni/_gal te srog chags rkang brgya ltar/_/reg na 'khum [#]par 'gyur bas na/_/sa ma ga dang thal sbyar ni/_/sems dang bcas par 'dod ce na/_/zhes
[\[312b.5\]]bya ba ni/_sman sa ma ga dang thal sbyar ni sems dang bcas pa yin te/_reg na 'khum par 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir/_srog chags rkang brgya bzhin no/_/rkang brgya zhes bya ba'i srog chags yod de/_de la reg ma thag tu 'khyil bar 'gyur ba ltar/_de bzhin du sman sa ma ga dang
[\[312b.6\]]thal sbyar la yang nyi ma'i 'od kyis phog na rgyas la reg na 'khum [#]par 'gyur ba yin pas de'i phyir/_sems dang bcas pa yin no zhe na/_me yis [#]reg pa'i skra sogs dang /_/skra la mtshal [#]phyes blugs pa yi/_/khyad par de dag nyid kyis kyang /_/'di ni ma nges pa nyid yin/_/
[\[312b.7\]]skra ni sems dang bcas pa'i lus las [#]skyes pa yin na yang de lta na yang sems dang bcas pa ma yin te/_des bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba [#]myong ba'i phyir ro/_/de las [#]mes reg par gyur pa na yang 'khum [#]par 'gyur la/_mtshal [#]gyi phye mas khyab par byas pa na yang
[\[313a\]]
[\[313a.1\]]'khum par 'gyur du zin kyang /_'khum pa tsam gyis [#]skra rnams sems dang bcas pa nyid yin par ni nges par bya bar mi nus pa ltar/_de bzhin du sman thal sbyar la sogs pa rnams kyang rlung gi khams lhag par yod pa las 'khum pa dang rgyas
[\[313a.2\]]par 'gyur te/_nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis reg pas pad+ma la sogs pa'i me tog rgyas par 'byung ba bzhin no zhes dpyad par bya ba yin te/_ci 'khum par 'gyur ba'i phyir/_/srog chags rkang brgya la sogs pa bzhin du ljon shing rnams sems dang bcas pa nyid gcig yin nam/_
[\[313a.3\]]'on te mes reg pa na skra 'khum pa bzhin du shing rnams sems med pa nyid gcig yin zhes bya bas gtan tshigs ma nges pa nyid yin no/_/gal te ljon shing rnams ni sems dang bcas pa nyid yin te/_tshe'i dbye ba dang nad gso ba la sogs pa'i bya ba'i man ngag nye bar bstan
[\[313a.4\]]pa'i phyir ro/_/sems med pa [#]rdo la sogs pa rnams la ni gso ba'i thabs gang du yang ma mthong la/_ljon shing rnams la ni gtsang gcad pa la sogs pa bstan pa yod pas de'i phyir/_sems dang bcas pa yin te/_me bzhin no zhe na/_'di skad brjod par bya ste/_nad gso ba zhes bya
[\[313a.5\]]ba ni sems dang bcas pa'i lus kyi chos yin pa'i phyir/_sems med pa rnams la de ma grub pas gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid yin te/_'byung ba'i 'gyur ba ldog pa nyid tsam 'dir mngon sum du gyur pa la/_de dag kyang sems dang bcas pa lta bur mthong ba'i chang dang /_
[\[313a.6\]]gla [#]rtsi dang /_mtshon cha la sogs pa rnams kyis [#]ma nges pa [#]nyid yin no/_/de bzhin du/_gso [#]ba yod pas shing rnams ni sems dang bcas par mi 'grub ste/_chang la sogs pa nyams pa dag_/ldog pa yod pas the tshom 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba smras te/_chang dag nus pa nyams par
[\[313a.7\]]gyur pa las yang 'dus byas pa'i khyad par gyis [#]nus pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba'am/_gser la sogs pa rnams kyang dri ma dang lhan cig 'byung bas dri ma can du gyur pa la yang /_'dus byas pa las yang [#]dag par gyur cing lci ba nyid la sogs par 'gyur bas gso ba yod pa'i phyir
[\[313b\]]
[\[313b.1\]]zhes bya ba 'dis the tshom du 'gyur ba yin te/_ci gso ba yod pa'i phyir/_mi la sogs pa bzhin du sems dang bcas pa yin nam/_'on te gso ba yod pa'i phyir nyams par gyur pa'i chang ldog par 'gyur ba bzhin du sems med pa nyid yin zhes bya bas 'di ltar sems dang bcas pa nyid du ma grub
[\[313b.2\]]pa nyid yin no/_/yang phyogs snga ma bas nye bar bzlog pa'i phyir gzhan smras pa/_mthun pa las skye 'phel 'gyur dang /_/sdang sems dus ldan [#]skye ba'i phyir/_/de bzhin gnyid log smyo ba'i phyir/_/sems yod rta [#]sogs bzhin du 'dod/_/ji ltar rta las rta skye'i [#]ba lang ni ma yin no/_/
[\[313b.3\]]de bzhin du nas kyi sa bon las nas kyi myu gu 'byung gi_/'bras khar ba'i myu gu ni ma yin te/_'di lta bu ni mthun pa las skye ba'o/_/ji ltar rte'u dang /_gzhon nu dang /_rgan po'i gnas skabs kyi dbye bas rta dag 'phel bar 'gyur ba bzhin du ljon shing yang myu gu dang /_sdong bu dang /_
[\[313b.4\]]sdong po dang /_yal ga dang /_lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu rim gyis [#]'phel bar 'gyur te/_'di lta bu ni 'phel ba'o/_/gnod par bya ba'i bsam pa gang la yod pa ni sdang sems nyid de[#]/_dug gi shing la sogs pa rnams kyis [#]srog 'joms par byed pa'i phyir 'di la sdang [#]ba'i
[\[313b.5\]]sems yod do zhes shes par bya ba yin no/_/ji ltar ba lang dang rta la sogs pa ni dpyid kyi [#]dus la sogs pa dag las skye bar 'gyur la/_khyi ni ston gyi dus su skye ba ltar de bzhin du ljon shing yang dpyid dang dbyar gyi dus dang ldan pa las skye ba'o/_/ljon shing gi tshe'i dbye ba las 'di
[\[313b.6\]]ltar/_gnyid log pa'am/_myos pa'i dus su bskyed do zhes 'byung ste/_dgun [#]gyi dus su ni gnyid log go/_/dbyar gyi dus su ni smyo ba yin te/_ji ltar rkyang la sogs pa gnyid log pa bzhin no zhe na/_'di'i lan ni/_lhog [#]pa byu ru bai DUr+ya[#]/_/rin chen gser gyi myug sogs kyis[#]/_
[\[313b.7\]]shing rnams sems dang bcas par ni/_/'di ltar [#]ma nges pa nyid yin/_/'di ltar mthun pa las byung ba zhes bya ba'i dper na [#]skra nye bar dgod de/_skra bregs pa na skra nyid las yang skye bar [#]'gyur yang de sems dang bcas pa ni ma yin pa bzhin no/_/'phel bar 'gyur ba yang 'di ltar skra dang
[\[314a\]]
[\[314a.1\]]sen mo dang /_sen 'dab pa'i tshad dang /_ku sman da'i [#]'bras bu dang bcas [#]pa dang /_bai DUr+ya [#]dang /_gser gyi myu gu dang /_grog mkhar gyi sa dang /_lhog pa dang /_byu ru la sogs pa 'di dag thams cad ni dpe ste/_'di dag thams cad kyang 'phel bar
[\[314a.2\]]'gyur ba yin na yang sems dang bcas pa ni ma yin pa bzhin no/_/gal te lhog pa yang sems dang bcas pa yin te/_sems dang bcas pa'i lus las byung ba'i phyir ro/_/de la tha dad pa'i sems ni yod pa ma yin no/_/rin po che dang gser gyi myu gu la sogs pa rnams chu 'dzin gyi sgra
[\[314a.3\]]sgrogs pa'i dus su skye bar 'gyur ba ni dus su skye ba'i dpe nyid yin no/_/ljon shing rnams dgun gyi dus su gnyid log pa ni ma yin te/_'on kyang me'i khams nyams shing yongs su smin par gyur pa las lo ma dang 'bras bu bsags pa lhags [#]par gyur pa yin la/_de'i tshe de'i nang gi khu ba
[\[314a.4\]]rnams rim gyis skams shing med par gyur pa yin no/_/rang gi gnas dang sa gzhan dag kyang nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis skams shing gdungs pa las rim gyis 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/dbyar gyi dus su ni chu shin tu mang bar gyur pas skam par mi 'gyur zhing rang dang gzhan gyis
[\[314a.5\]]'phel ba nyid kyis smyos pa [#]yin no/_/gang yang 'bras [#]khar ma'i sa bon dang /_bur shing gi myu gu la sogs pa yang sos ka'i dus [#]chu dang bcas pa la bskrun na 'phel bar 'gyur ba yin yang de dag gnyid log pa'am/_smyo bar gyur pa [#]yin no/_/gzhan yang 'khums [#]shing mi bskyed
[\[314a.6\]]pa gnyid log par 'dod pa de yang nas la sogs pa'i lo tog smin pa dang /_sman yid bde dang /_ba [#]san+ti dang /_'bri ta ka ra la sogs pa ni dpyid kyi dus su me tog rgyas par 'gyur la/_bil ba'i 'bras bu 'phel ba dang /_skyur rtsi chen po dang /_sa bon gyi snod la sogs pa'i 'bras
[\[314a.7\]]bu rnams dgun gyi dus su yongs su smin par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du nags dang 'gal ba zhes bya ba'i shing gi myu gu dang /_yal ga dang /_lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu yang dus der smin par 'gyur bas ci kha cig [#]ni gnyid log pa kha cig ni gnyid ma log pa [#]yin nam zhes
[\[314b\]]
[\[314b.1\]]bya ba dang /_yang de la mthun pa las skye ba yin pas ci skra la sogs pa bzhin du sems med [#]pa nyid gcig yin nam/_'on te rta la sogs pa bzhin du sems dang ldan par 'gyur zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin du 'phel bar 'gyur ba yin pas lhog [#]pa dang /_byu ru la sogs pa bzhin du
[\[314b.2\]]sems dang mi ldan pa zhig yin nam/_'on te 'phel bar 'gyur bas ba lang la sogs pa bzhin du sems dang bcas pa nyid gcig yin zhes bya ba de ltar ma nges pa nyid yin pa'i phyir/_sems dang bcas pa nyid du ma grub bo/_/gzhan yang /_'di dag la ni sems med phyir/_/sdang
[\[314b.3\]]sems zhes bya 'ang [#]ma grub nyid/_/gtan tshigs don yang ma grub ste/_/lhog [#]pa sogs kyis [#]ma nges nyid/_/sems dang ldan na ni gnyid log pa dang /_sdang [#]ba'i sems kyang 'byung bar rigs kyi sems med pa la ni ma yin pas des na sdang ba'i sems dang gnyid log pa zhes bya ba'i gtan
[\[314b.4\]]tshigs gnyis ni gzhan kho bo cag la ye ma grub pa yin no/_/lo ma 'khum pa dang /_me tog dang 'bras bu 'byung ba zhes bya ba de yang sems med pa'i 'byung ba gzhan dag la yang mthong ba yin te/_dper na kha ba dang /_zla ba dang /_nyi ma dang /_rin po che dang /_rdo khab len dang /_nye bar grub pa las
[\[314b.5\]]rtswa [#]dang /_lo ma dang /_chu shel dang /_me shel dang /_chu las 'khum pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_chu dang /_me 'byung ba dang /_lcags g.yo bar 'gyur ba la sogs pa 'byung ngo /_/mthun pa las skyes pa [#]la sogs pa'i gtan tshigs gzhan gsum ni mdze nad la sogs pa dag gis ma nges pa
[\[314b.6\]]nyid yin te/_ji ltar lus kyi phyogs gcig tu byung ba'i mdze nad nyid lus kyi phyogs thams cad du rim gyis skye bar 'gyur ba dang /_za 'phrug la [#]za 'phrug nyid 'byung ba [#]mthun pa las skye ba de dag nyid kyis gtan tshigs ma nges pa nyid yin te/_ci mthun pa las skye ba yin pa'i phyir/_rta la sogs pa bzhin
[\[314b.7\]]du shing rnams sems dang bcas pa zhig yin nam/_'on te mdze nad la sogs pa bzhin du sems med pa nyid gcig yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no/_/de bzhin du lhog rgal la sogs pa dang po ni chung ngun du skrang la/_phyis de bas cher 'gyur zhing nyi ma gzhan dag la de bas kyang shin tu che
[\[315a\]]
[\[315a.1\]]bar 'gyur bas de bas na 'phel bar 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs 'di ni ma nges pa nyid yin te/_'phel bar 'gyur ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ci ba lang la sogs pa bzhin du sems dang bcas pa zhig yin nam/_'on te lhog pa la sogs pa bzhin du sems med pa zhig
[\[315a.2\]]yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa bzhin [#]no/_/de bzhin du ston zhes bya ba dang /_dbyar dang /_dpyid kyi dus rnams la mkhris pa dang /_rlung dang /_bad kan rnams skye bar 'gyur zhes bya bas ci nus [#]su skye ba yin pa'i phyir mkhris pa dang /_rlung dang /_bad kan bzhin du sems med pa zhig yin nam/_'on te rta la sogs
[\[315a.3\]]pa bzhin du sems dang bcas pa zhig yin zhes bya bas ma nges pa nyid yin no/_/gal te sangs rgyas pa shing rnams la sems med par 'dod na 'di rnams gang las ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_ci ltar na kha cig ni gnod par byed pa yin zhing /_kha cig ni phan pa bzhin du sems dang bcas pa zhig [#]yin/_
[\[315a.4\]]ji ltar na dus su skye bar 'gyur ba nyid yin zhe na/_de la/_sems can rnams kyi las dbang gis/_/rtsa bas 'byung ba dus su skye/_/dmyal ba dang ni mtho ris kyis[#]/_/mtshon dang dpag bsam shing bzhin no/_/zhes bya ba smras te/_snod kyi 'jig rten ma lus pa ni sems can gyi las bdag por gyur
[\[315a.5\]]pa nyid las kun du 'byung ba yin no/_/khyad par du dmyal ba rnams kyis [#]las ngan pa byas pa bdag por gyur pa las/_ral gri lo ma'i nags tshal dang /_/shal ma ri'i sdong po la sogs pas gcod pa dang /_'bigs pa dang [#]/_gshegs [#]par byed pa la sogs pa 'byung ba yin no/_/
[\[315a.6\]]mtho ris kyi 'jig rten gyi las bzang po byas pa'i rgyu las ni dpag bsam gyi shing las gos dang /_zas dang /_nye bar spyad pa dang /_bde ba'i 'byor pa sbyin par byed pa 'byung ba yin no/_/de bzhin du mi'i 'jig rten la yang tsher ma dang dug gi shing la sogs pa 'tsho ba la gnod par byed pa
[\[315a.7\]]dag kyang sdig pa'i las bdag por gyur pa las byung ba yin la/_tsam pa ka dang /_a sho ka dang /_pad+ma dang /_ut+pa la dang /_a mra [#]dang /_pa na sa dang /_na li ke ra la sogs pa rnams sems med kyang dge ba'i las kyi rgyu las phan pa dang /_bde ba sbyin par byed pa yin te/_
[\[315b\]]
[\[315b.1\]]gser dang /_dngul dang /_shel dang /_bai DUr+ya la sogs pa'i rin po che bzhin no/_/'di dag gi dus su skye ba nyid kyang las nyid kyis bskyed pa yin te/_dus ji lta ba [#]bzhin du nye bar longs spyod pa'i phyir ro/_/des na 'di dag la sems med pas nye bar spyad par bya ba yin pa la
[\[315b.2\]]skyon med do/_/yang sems dang bcas pa nyid gcig yin na ni 'bras chan [#]dang /_phye ma [#]dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_lo ma la sogs pa zos na yang sems can gyi sha zos par 'gyur ba yin la/_til gyi til mar dang /_bur shing gi khu ba la sogs pa 'thungs [#]na yang
[\[315b.3\]]srog chags kyi lus las byung ba'i khrag 'thungs pa yin pas des na 'jig rten thams cad kyis kyang sdig pa chen po byas par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang /_'tshe ba med pa chos kyi mchog_/ces bstan pa 'byung bas/_des na kha zas kyi bya ba la [#]rtag tu spyod pa na 'tshe ba la 'jug
[\[315b.4\]]pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir chos kyang ga la yod de/_'khor ba las ji ltar grol bar 'gyur te/_thar pa 'dod pa rnams zas ma zos na ni 'chi bar 'gyur la/_zos na ni srog chags la gnod par 'gyur bas chos nyams par 'gyur ro/_/des na ljon shing la sems yod par
[\[315b.5\]]rtog pa 'dis ni bdag nyid la gnod pa byed pa yin no/_/de yang sngon gyi slob dpon dag gis 'di skad du/_tshe dang drod dang rnam shes dang /_/g.yo ba zhes bya so so'i zhing /_/chos 'di gang la dmigs gyur pa/_/de la 'tsho ba zhes bya'o/_/drod med g.yo ba med nyid dang /_/
[\[315b.6\]]thos la sogs par mi 'gyur dang /_/sgra la sogs pa rtogs [#]med ni/_/sems can ma yin bstan pa nyid/_/dge ba dang ni mi dge'i las/_/sems yod rnams la 'byung 'gyur gyi/_/bstan pa rnams la de med pas/_/des na [#]shing rnams sems med yin/_/'dod dang zhe sdang
[\[315b.7\]]dang bral zhing /_/lus la ngal ba med pa dang /_/rigs dang mi rigs las grol bas/_/des na shing la sems pa med/_/srog ni 'byung 'jug bye [#]btsums sogs/_/lus kyi phyi rol bya ba rnams/_/bstan pa rnams la ma mthong bas/_/de nas [#]shing la sems pa med/_/
[\[316a\]]
[\[316a.1\]]ces bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba yin no//_//dbu ma'i snying po'i 'grel pa rtog ge 'bar ba/_bam po nyi shu bdun pa ste tha ma'o/_/yang dpyod [#]pa pa'i rgol ba gzhan bstan pa'i phyir smras pa/_lam gsum ji bzhin don ldan yin/_/tshangs pas
[\[316a.2\]]bstan phyir sman dpyad bzhin/_/'das dang ma 'ongs mkhyen pa po[#]/_/des bstan pa [#]bsgrub bya yin zhe na/_lam gsum ni chos can no/_/don ji lta ba bzhin yin te zhes bya ba ni de'i chos so/_/tshangs pas bstan pa yin pa'i phyir/_/'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa mkhyen pa'i thub pas bstan pa'i
[\[316a.3\]]phyir zhes bya ba gnyis ni gtan tshigs te/_gang dang gang tshangs pas bstan pa'am/_'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa mkhyen pas bstan pa gang yin pa de dang de ni don ji lta ba bzhin te/_dper na sman dpyad bzhin no zhes bya ba ni dpe yin no zhe na/_de la 'di ltar/_tshangs smras zhes bya'i gtan
[\[316a.4\]]tshigs dag_/skyed byed sogs kyis [#]smras pa ni/_/nyes par brtags par bsgrubs [#]pa'i phyir/_/des na khyod kyis 'di ltar nges/_/skyed [#]par byed pas na skyed [#]byed de/_'jig rten gsum gyi skyed [#]pa po'o/_/gang dag la skyed [#]pa po dang po na yod pa ni skyed byed sogs te/_mchod sbyin dang /_byol song
[\[316a.5\]]bsad pa dang /_dge ba la sogs pa nyo zhing btsong ba rnams so/_/nyes par brtags pa ni mi shes pas so/_/skyed [#]byed la sogs pa rnams kyis smras pa ni/_ji skad bstan pa'i rigs pas bdag gis bsgrubs pa'o/_/des na skyed [#]byed sogs kyis smras pa ni nyes par brtags
[\[316a.6\]]par bsgrubs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ste/_des na tshangs pas bstan pa'i phyir/_/zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs ni ma nges pa nyid yin te/_ji ltar tshangs pas bstan pa yin pa'i phyir/_sman dpyad la sogs pa bzhin du ci lam gsum po 'di bden pa nyid gcig yin nam/_'on te skyed byed la sogs
[\[316a.7\]]pas smras pa/_nyes par brtags pas [#]bsgrubs pa bzhin du don ji lta ba bzhin ma yin pa yin [#]zhes bya bas ma nges pa nyid yin/_gal te yang sman dpyad bstan pa bzhin du skyed byed kyis bstan [#]bzhin du don ji lta ba bzhin du yin no zhes bya ba [#]smra bar byed na de la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/_
[\[316b\]]
[\[316b.1\]]'ga' zhig don bzhin mthong ba yis[#]/_/kun du don bzhin ma yin te/_/gnag rdzi smyon pa'i tshig [#]rnams ni/_/kun du ji bzhin don min bzhin/_/de kho na nyid mthong ba rnams la ni ji lta ba bzhin gyi don dang ldan pa yin no zhes tshul 'di rigs kyi/_tshangs pa ni de kho na nyid mthong ba ma yin
[\[316b.2\]]par sngar rab tu bsgrubs pas de'i tshig ni la la ni don ji lta ba bzhin du 'byung la la la don ji lta ba bzhin ma yin par shes par bya ste/_ji ltar ba lang rdzi'i tshig rnams sam/_smyon pa la sogs pa'i tshig rnams [#]la la ni don ji lta ba bzhin yin [#]la la la ni ma yin pa bzhin no/_/gang yang 'das pa dang ma 'ongs
[\[316b.3\]]pa shes pas [#]bstan pa yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba 'di yang /_/'das dang ma 'ongs shes pa nyid/_/yi dgas la sogs la yang yod/_/de yis smras pa thams cad min/_/de phyir gtan tshigs dpyad bya yin/_/yi dgas dang /_srin po dang /_gnod sbyin la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang 'das pa
[\[316b.4\]]dang ma 'ongs pa cung zhig shes pa yin gyi/_thams cad ni ma yin te/_bya rgod kyis shi ba'i ro shes pa dang /_khwa dang /_grog ma la sogs pas char 'bab pa shes pa ltar/_de bzhin du a tre dang /_rgyas pa la sogs pa'i thub pa rnams kyis kyang gang 'ga' zhig shes pa yin gyi/_
[\[316b.5\]]thams cad ni ma yin no/_/de'i phyir de dag gis [#]smras pa/_thams cad rigs pa dang ldan pa ma yin pas dpyad par bya ba yin te/_ci 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa shes pa'i thub pa rnams kyi tshig bzhin du/_lam gsum po 'di don ji lta ba bzhin yin nam/_'on te 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs
[\[316b.6\]]pa shes pa'i yi dgas la sogs pa'i tshig bzhin du don [#]ji lta ba bzhin ma yin pa zhig yin zhes bya ba'o/_/gzhan yang /_chos sogs 'di la gang yod pa/_/de nyid gzhan la'ang yod ces pa[#]/_/res 'ga' srin bu'i [#]yi ge'i tshul/_/legs bshad 'ga' zhig mthong ba yin/_/
[\[316b.7\]]gsum po 'di la ni yongs su dag pa'i chos 'ba' zhig yod par ma mthong ngo /_/'ga' zhig la res 'ga' chos kyi cha mthong ba ni srin bu'i yi ge'i tshul 'di yin te/_yon tan zhes bya ba'i srin bus shing la zos pa dang /_la lar yi ge 'dra ba'i ri mo 'byung yang re zhig de la
[\[317a\]]
[\[317a.1\]]yi ge shes pa'i rigs pa ni yod pa [#]ma yin no/_/gzhan yang /_ji ltar mi gtsang phung po'i nang /_/rin chen 'ga' zhig mthong gyur pa/_/rab tu skye dang de yi mthu/_/shes dang ldan pas de shes gyur[#]/_/ji ltar/_mi gtsang ba'i phung po 'ga' zhig gi dkyil du rin po
[\[317a.2\]]che yod pa mthong ba na rin po che brtag pa la mkhas pas de mthong na ni rgya mtsho chen po'i rin po che'i ri de las 'di byung ba yin gyi/_mi gtsang ba'i phung po 'di las byung ba ni ma yin no snyam du shes la mthu yang shes te/_'di'i mthus nad la sogs pa zhi ba dang /_dug nyams par byed pa'i mthu yang 'di la yod
[\[317a.3\]]do snyam du shes pa yin no/_/legs bshad 'ga' zhig gsum pa la/_/rab tu mthong ba'ang de dang 'dra/_/khyim srang mi gtsang phung po las/_/rin chen 'byung ba ma yin no[#]/_/srog chags la 'tshe ba dang /_chang 'thung ba dang /_brdzun [#]du smra ba la sogs pa skyon du ma dang ldan pa'i mi gtsang ba'i phung po
[\[317a.4\]]dang 'dra ba lta ba gsum po'i nang na/_rin po che gser dang 'dra ba chos rin po che 'ga' zhig mthong du zin kyang /_rin po che brtag pa la mkhas pa 'dra ba rnams la 'di lta bu'i shes pa 'byung ste/_'di las ni chos rin po che 'di lta bu 'byung ba ma yin gyi/_gzhan du na sangs rgyas pa la sogs
[\[317a.5\]]pa'i gzhung las btus nas de'i nang du bsres pa yin te/_skye bo tha mal pa rnams kyis [#]nye bar spyad pa'i grong bar gyi srang na mi gtsang ba'i phung po yod pa las bai DUr+ya la sogs pa'i rin po che 'byung ba ma yin pa bzhin no/_/de ltar na [#]bong bu'i 'o ma bsrubs pa las mi gtsang ba'i dri 'byung
[\[317a.6\]]ba ltar mu stegs pa rnams kyis smras pa yang de bzhin no/_/gang yang rjes su dpag pa gtsor bzung nas/_lam gsum po sun 'byin par byed pa rnams ni dmus long g.yang sar lhung bar dka' ba ma yin pa dang 'dra'o zhes zer ba de yang rigs pa ma yin te/_gang gi phyir/_
[\[317a.7\]]skyon med rjes su dpag pa yis[#]/_/rigs sam mi rigs ma dpyad par/_/blo ni gzhan gyis bskyed pa'i phyir/_/lung gzhan dag la the tshom za/_/slob ma ni rnam pa gsum yod de/_lung gzhan mthong na 'di ltar yin nam/_ma yin zhes the tshom za ba'i blo can dang /_lung gcig la
[\[317b\]]
[\[317b.1\]]rab tu zhugs shing zhen par gyur nas gzhan la sems kyis sdang [#]bar gyur cing phyin ci log tu zhugs pa'i blo can dang /_lung thams cad la rigs pa yin nam/_rigs pa ma yin zhes dpyod [#]par mi nus pa'i rtogs [#]pa dang bral ba'i blo can no/_/de la lung gzhan gyis [#]the tshom bskyed
[\[317b.2\]]pa'am/_phyin ci log tu zhen par gyur pa'i blo gang la yod pa de dag ni rjes su dpag pa med par rigs sam/_mi rigs zhes dpyod [#]par nus pa ma yin no/_/ji ltar klung chen brgal [#]'dod pa/_/gzings dag yongs su 'dzin pa ltar/_/de bzhin gtang [#]bya yin na yang /_/rjes su
[\[317b.3\]]dpag par gzung bar rigs/_/ji ltar chu klung chen po rgal bar 'dod pa rnams gzings dang /_gru la sogs pa la brten nas pha rol du 'gro zhing der phyin pa dang bor nas 'gro bar byed pa ltar/_de bzhin du shes bya'i chu bo rgal bar 'dod pas kyang rjes su dpag pa'i gzings 'di yongs su
[\[317b.4\]]gzung [#]la shes bya rtogs par gyur pa dang /_de yang gtang bar bya ba yin no/_/de lta [#]bas na gtang [#]bar bya ba de/_spang bar bya ba yin na yang 'di ni re zhig gzung bar bya ba nyid yin te/_de med par de kho na nyid mthong ba yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de ltar slob ma gnyis bsngags pas bstan nas/_
[\[317b.5\]]dpyod pa med pa'i blo can gyi slob ma rab tu bstan pa'i phyir smras pa/_sgra tsam rjes su 'brang byed cing /_/song ba'i rjes [#]su 'gro byed pa'i/_/dmus long bzhin du dkyil 'khor 'dir/_/byis pa 'khor bar 'khor ba yin/_/ji ltar dmus long rang gis [#]mthong ba med par gyur pa de gzhan gyis
[\[317b.6\]]sgra byas pa tsam gyis [#]rjes su 'brang ba de dag ni/_g.yang sa'i gnas dag las rgal bar 'gyur ba ma yin pa ltar de bzhin du byis pa mi shes pa dag gis byas pa'i [#]lung zhes bya ba'i sgra tsam gyis [#]rjes su 'brang bar byed pa dag kyang srid pa gsum gyi 'gro ba'i 'khor ba las thar bar
[\[317b.7\]]'gyur ba ma yin no/_/des na sgra tsam gyis rjes su 'brang ba na [#]ltung bar 'gyur bar sla ba nyid yin pa'i phyir smras pa/_brten pa med pa'i dmus long dag_/nyam nga'i gnas su 'gro byed ltar/_/sgra tsam gtso bor byed pa rnams/_/ltung bar dka' ba ma yin no/_/ji ltar dmus long dbyug
[\[318a\]]
[\[318a.1\]]pa la sogs pa'i rten med cing /_mig dang ldan pas nye bar bstan pa med bzhin du sgra thos pa tsam gyis rjes su 'brang [#]nas/_nyam nga ba'i lam du 'gro bar byed pa ni ltung bar 'gyur ba zhing yin la/_rten dang bcas pa legs par bstan pa'i lam bde ba
[\[318a.2\]]nas 'gro ba ni ltung ba'i skal ba can du mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du rtog ge'i shes pa rjes su dpag pa'i mig gis gang dngos po'i don gyi de kho na nyid ces bya ba nges par bzung ba de ni dmigs pa yin no/_/de kho na nyid de [#]la dmigs par mi byed par 'khor ba las nges par 'byung bar 'dod pas mi shes pa
[\[318a.3\]]brtags pa'i lung zhes bya ba'i rjes su 'brang ba'i dmus long dang 'dra ba ni 'khor bar ltung bar 'gyur ba yin no/_/de kho na nyid mthong ba gang dag nges par brtags pa'i lam bde ba nyid 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad nas/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la brten nas 'gro ba de ni 'khor
[\[318a.4\]]ba'i g.yang sar ltung [#]bar mi 'gyur ro/_/des na sgra tsam gyis [#]rjes su 'brang ba nyid ni ltung bar sla ba nyid yin pa'i phyir/_rjes su dpag pa [#]gtsor 'dzin rnams/_/ltung bar dka' ba ma yin no/_/zhes gang smras pa de ni legs par smras pa ma yin no/_/gang yang rig byed nyid [#]thams cad mkhyen pa [#]yin gyi/_
[\[318a.5\]]thams cad mkhyen pa'i skyes bu nyid ni spong bar byed cing sdang ba'i sems kyis 'di skad du/_'di na gang yang [#]kun mkhyen med/_/gang phyir 'di ni ma mthong phyir/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa smra ba de'i lan ni 'di yin te/_kun mkhyen zhes [#]bya'i sgra 'di yang /_/yul 'ga' zhig la ji bzhin yin/_/seng ge'i
[\[318a.6\]]sgra yang la la bden/_/kha cig nye bar btags pa nyid/_/gang yang mdzes [#]mi dang /_ser skya dang /_gzegs zan la sogs pa thub pa rnams ni nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems can la phan pa'i thabs la mi [#]mkhas pa dang /_de bzhin du 'das pa la sogs pa'i shes bya'i phyogs gcig
[\[318a.7\]]shes pa'i dbang du byas nas de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba'i sgra nye bar 'dogs pas [#]brtags pa pa yin te/_thub pa ser skya kun mkhyen nyid/_/ces bya ba la sogs pa'o/_/de dag ni nye bar btags nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces [#]bya ba'i sgras brjod pa yin par nges par
[\[318b\]]
[\[318b.1\]]gzung [#]bar bya ba yin la/_'dir ma mthong du zin kyang chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mkhyen pa nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral ba/_sems can thams cad la phan pa mdzad pa ni/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin zhes nges par gzung bar bya ste/_ji ltar sen mo dang /_mche ba rno ba dang /_
[\[318b.2\]]ral pa la sogs pa med kyang dpa' ba dang /_rtul [#]phod pa la sogs pa'i bya ba dang ldan pa'i skyes bu la seng ge zhes nye bar 'dogs te/_bram ze la yang seng ge zhes zer ro/_/ma mthong du zin kyang seng ge zhes nye bar btags pa'i sgra las rjes su dpags nas nges par ral pa brgya bshig
[\[318b.3\]]cing g.yengs pa sder mo rnon po dang ldan pa/_mche ba rnon po gtsigs pa/_ri dgas la sogs pa gzhan skrag par byed pa'i nga ro can seng ge zhes bya ba'i sgra dngos su bstan par bya ba gzhan zhig yod do snyam du sems so/_/de bzhin du da ltar ma mthong bas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid [#]med pa ma yin no/_/
[\[318b.4\]]gang yang 'di skad du/_sangs rgyas ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin te/_skyes bu yin par mtshungs pa'i phyir skyes bu gzhan bzhin no zhes zer ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin te byas pa yin pa'i phyir skyes bu gzhan gyi shes pa bzhin no zhes zer ba de la yang /_chos
[\[318b.5\]]dang sprul pa'i sku dag ni/_/nga la mi nyid du ma grub/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'ang ma grub ste/_/des na ma nges pa nyid yin/_/skyes bu'i mtshan nyid [#]dang ldan pa la skyes bu zhes bya ba'i sgra 'jug pa bzhin no/_/de khams dang /_'gro ba dang /_skye gnas kyi rnam pa gang du yang ma gtogs pa'i phyir dang /_gzugs
[\[318b.6\]]med pa yin pa'i phyir bud med dang /_skyes pa la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa 'jug pa ma yin pas re zhig chos kyi sku la ni skyes bu zhes bya ba med do/_/longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la yang rten gnas gyur pa 'jig rten las 'das pa zlog [#]pa med pa'i phung po dang ldan pa'i phyir/_khams dang /_'gro
[\[318b.7\]]ba dang /_skye gnas rnams las shin tu 'das pa'i phyir dang /_'og min gyi spyod yul can yin pa'i phyir dang [#]/_skyes pa dang bud med kyi dbang po mi mnga' ba'i phyir skyes bu med do/_/de'i byin rlabs kyis [#]'jug pa 'dir 'khrungs pa'i sprul pa'i sku yang gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_ro dang /_
[\[319a\]]
[\[319a.1\]]reg bya zhes bya ba skye mched bzhi'i bdag nyid can sgyu ma mkhan gyis sprul pa'i skyes bu bzhin du sems can ma yin par grags pas de yang skyes bu nyid yin par ma grub pa'i phyir skyes bu yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs ma grub pa nyid yin la/_skyes bu'i dpe
[\[319a.2\]]yang bsgrub byas stong pa yin no/_/de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du tshogs bsags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa thogs pa med pa/_lhun gyis [#]grub par 'jug pa/_rnam par rtog pa med pa nam mkha' bzhin du thog mtha' med pa/_nyon mongs pa'i dra ba rnams
[\[319a.3\]]bag chags dang bcas par drungs nas phyung ba/_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i ye shes gang yin pa yang gang dag phyi rol gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba dang /_slob pa dang /_mi slob pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes pa rnams kyang nyin par byed pa'i 'od zer gyis zil gyis [#]mnan pa'i srin bu
[\[319a.4\]]me khyer gyi 'od bzhin du mdzes pa ma yin na de yang [#]tha mal pa'i skyes bu ngan pa'i shes pa 'dra ba lta ga la yin/_des na skyes bu'i shes pa bzhin/_/zhes bya ba'i dpe yang ma grub pa yin no/_/gzhan yang /_gal te ji ltar khyed bcom ldan/_/thams cad mkhyen pa min par 'dod/_/bde byed
[\[319a.5\]]khyab 'jug sogs dag gi[#]/shes pa de ltar min zhe na/_/gal te khyod kyi blo la 'di snyam du tshangs pa dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_sred med kyi bu rnams ni 'jig rten skyed par byed cing sdud par yang byed la/_de rnams nyid kyis ji lta ba bzhin du 'chags pa dang /_gnas pa dang /_'jig [#]pa
[\[319a.6\]]yang shes la/_grol ba'i lam yang shes pa yin no/_/yang sangs rgyas ni de dag la sdang zhing de dag gis byas pa'i skyed [#]pa dang /_sdud pa [#]dang /_mi mthun pa'i skye ba la sogs pa'i rgyu rigs pa ma yin par rjod [#]par yang byed la/_mngon sum du mthong bzhin du yang dngos po rnams ni mthong ba stong pa nyid
